1.content:
The world of Zenith.

A large world.

Your world.

You are an adventurer, and thus it is time to begin your story. The question is, where will you start?

There is the small, independant village of Trillian which is having problems. At first, crops and equipment were disappearing, but now several villagers have gone missing. Is this just a series of coincidences, or something more sinister?

The nations of Rylestia and Coninze, over a dispute about borders, have declared war on each other. Though there have already been a few small skirmishes, each side is interested in keeping their own forces alive. Thus, they are taking a more active position in hiring mercenaries, spying for weaknesses, and taking prisoners for interrogation.

There is a story about the ruins of castle Dormduo. They say that after having become too gluttonous, god punished the fortification and all of those within it by sending fire and brimstone from the skies. While no one knows whether there is truth in this story, one thing for certain is that there are still treasures hidden in the catacombs beneathe the ruins.

While one should always be an upstanding person, thievery was always a fallback option when everything else failed. The southern coastal city of New Forazio was a city of decadence. Fine foods, large structures, scantily-clad entertainers, and lots of money to go around. So much money, in fact, that perhaps no one would notice if a few coins went missing into your own pockets.

And yet, with such a large world, there are always more paths to take. Which path is right for you?
1.title: Every book has a beginning...

choices: Leave and explore on your own
11.content:
You are sitting at a table in the tavern at Trillian, and while outwardly you appear to be enjoying your tankard of ale, in truth you're actually watching the others and listening for clues.

Word about the disappearing villagers spread quickly, and all the neighboring villages have not dared to come close. Traveling salesmen avoid the town entirely. Everyone was beginning to suffer, and it would get worse quickly if answers couldn't be discovered.

The tavern is fairly empty. Aside from you, there is a young man tending the bar, an old man daydreaming at a table in the corner, and a barmaid cleaning some dirty glasses. Every once and awhile, you spot her glance suspiciously in your direction.

After a couple minutes of silence, the barmaid turns to the bartender and talks in a hushed tone. You are barely able to make out her words from the distance.

"...changing upstairs. This place is as dead as a graveyard. I'll see you tommorow."

She walks off to the stairs and heads up to the second floor. Scratching your chin in thought for a moment, you reach into your coin pouch and set a silver coin on the table before standing up.

It's time to get some information.

1121.content:
It takes a while, but you finally get close to where the old man told you to go. Of course there is always the possibility he was lying, but your gut instinct tells you that the man spoke the truth.

At the moment you are deep in the nearby forest, following the subtly marked path that you would never have noticed had the old man told you how to see it. The forest is dark around you, and the moon is hidden above the canopy of leaves. Normally you'd nervous, but now that you know what to expect there is no way a simple group of millipedes can nab you.

A breeze softly blows against your face, and you shiver at the sudden chill. Your head snaps up though, when you hear something like whispers on the gentle wind.

"Turn back.........don't go......please............turn back..."

You press forward, a bit slower than before.

Up ahead you see a clearing, which is probably where you want to go. It looks like any normal clearing, only it is dead; twisted bare grey trees are withering, brown leaves cover the floor. A scorched tree stump marks a trail further into the creepy forest, but it is swathed in shadow and darkness. Moonlight basks the clearing in an eerie glow, and thin mist clings lightly to the air.

You approach the clearing with caution, easing your sword in its scabbard as you do. The sounds of wildlife, so very loud, were now silent. Entering the clearing, you hear something moving on the shadowed path.

Towards you.

Facing the trail where the sound was coming from, you draw your sword and readied yourself for... whatever. You peer into the mist, and see...
1121.title: Where To Start?

choices: Accompany Vyl deeper into her home.
Insist you must leave and prepare.
11211.content:
You see a feminine face emerge from the shadow. Smooth, young, and beautiful, you wonder what someone like this is doing out here in the woods. But as she continues towards you, the rest if her emerges.

You almost scream.

The face was human, but the rest of the body was that of a millipede. Five feet wide and seven feet tall, it is able to tower over you when it lifts its front part up. The beauteous face that once looked so innocent was now grinning evilly. The rest of the giant bug is still coming out of the shadowed path, and you worry just how long the body is.

"Hello, little human. What brings you to my home?" Its/Her voice definitely sounds female, but rings in an otherworldly way around the clearing.

"I a-assume y-y-you're the millipede q-q-q-queen?" you reply. It is an effort to say even that much, and you're surprised your voice didn't freeze in fear halfway through.

Her grin broadens even more. "Indeed. You are talking to none other than the Millipede Queen Vyl. Although company is rare here, so I can suffer informalities from a visitor. Feel free to address me simply as Vyl." Her eyes lose a bit of their evil, and her grin turns into a warm smile.

You are still a bit shaky, but after recovering from the shock you regain a bit of composure. You're still scared out of your wits, but reason finds a home in your brain once again. In a situation like this, it's best to act as guest and scout out her home for a future raid. "If you are okay with it, Vyl," you respond at last.

A quick glance to the shadowy path reveals that the end of her enormous millipede body is emerging. If you were to stretch her out, you would say she's probably at least a few dozen meters long! That's ridiculous!

The Millipede Queen - Vyl - pulls her body into a tight circle inside the clearing, leaving a reasonably large space for you to sit in and no way out. With a wave of one her front legs (which can move like arms, due to some kind of special joint), two smooth tree stumps pop up from beneath the dead leaves, one the size of a table and the other the size of a chair. A tree branch from outside the circle of her body sets down two cups of some liquid, which you suppose you'll have to drink. Great.

The tree branch retreats, and Vyl gestures for you to sit down. Reluctantly, you have a seat on the chair-sized tree stump with the 'table' between you and Vyl - her face at least. You peer down at the cups on the table, and notice that the liquid inside is translucent.

"Relax, it's just water," Vyl consoles as she lifts her cup. You lift yours just as Vyl sips from the 'water'. Wanting to complete the facade as guest you take a sip, and...

Nothing happens. It is, actually, just water.

"So let me ask again, what brings you here?" asks Vyl.

"I came looking for a for the 'fear of the forest' in these woods," you lie. "There are rumors flying around town that something big and eerie lives in this forest and is kidnapping people. I heard the name Millipede Queen mentioned a few times, so I decided to come and slay it to allay the village's fears." You quickly look up at her. "But you aren't something that needs to be slain. In fact, you're quite hospitable."

"Yes, when something bad happens the first thing humans do is blame it on something they don't know enough about." That, you thought, is entirely true. You have no reason to suspect this lonely...person...is behind the kidnappings. Ever since you arrived she has done nothing but welcome you as a guest. "I do get lonely at times, but I would never dream of taking innocent people from their homes."

"I believe you," you say, to your surprise you mean it.

"That's why I appreciate visits like these. They do much to distract me." Vyl takes another sip. "It's been a while since I've heard from the human world. Is there anything you can tell me about developments since a couple years ago?"

And so you find yourself filling her in on recent events in the local area. You tell her who married who, what countries are at war, which people got captured, and other such things. Throughout the conversation, you discover that the Millipede Queen - er, Vyl - has a surprisingly good sense of humor, as well as a natural curiosity. The more you talk, the more you feel that this nice, bug, couldn't possibly be behind the kidnappings.

That's when you begin to wonder. If this person-bug-whatever isn't kidnapping the villagers, who is? The old man at the bar explicitly said that his sister, the Millipede Queen, was behind the kidnappings. Your mind runs in mental circles trying to decide whether Vyl is the kidnapper or not. Finally, you get frustrated enough to ask.

"Hey Vyl, I have a question," you say.

"Ask away, little human."

"I met a man at the bar in Trillian," you begin. "I asked him about the kidnappings, and he said that his sister, the Millipede Queen, was behind them. Do you know who told me that?"

Vyl scowls. "Yes, I know who that is. Indeed, my brother does sometimes wander through Trillian in human form, but he is always telling lies. His name is Kol, and he is called the Millipede Lord. If one of us is kidnapping people, it's him."

You frown. "Thanks Vyl. I think I know what to do now." You get up from your stump and set your cup down.

"Going so soon?" Vyl asks. "Kol isn't going anywhere, and there's so much more I'd like to show you." She uncoils her body from its circle and gestures down the dark path, which didn't look foreboding anymore. "The entire dark half of the forest is my home, and you've only seen the front room."

At first you think to decline, as you need time to prepare for Kol. On the other hand though, the offer strikes you as curious, and Vyl probably has some invaluable information about Kol.
11211.title: Not what you were expecting...

112111.content:
"Very well then," you say, "I guess, if you insist. Will Kol be at the bar tomorrow night?"

"He will, undoubtedly. Kol has gained a habit of visiting that particular bar, finding ways to trick adventurers into thinking the lair of the Millipede Lord is filled with treasure. Once they buy it, he need merely wait for his victims to come to his home."

"And where would that be?" you ask as you begin to walk down the dark path leading away from the clearing. Vyl is right behind you, holding some kind of torch in her right leg. The firelight glows rather than burns, so as not to give off too much heat or light. Under normal circumstances, you'd find this weird. But hey, you're walking into a dark forest with a giant millipede that has a beautiful woman's face who is talking about her brother. You crossed the weird line a while ago.

"His lair is where anyone would least expect it, merely five minutes away from Trillian. It is, put simply, a giant ditch in which he curls up in to sleep. Once an adventurer or treasure hunter reaches the edge, they are too close to even have a chance at running." Vyl explains it all with a slight frown on her face. "I never approved of his methods of attaining humans. They are much more interesting when they come voluntarily, and to talk in friendly manner as opposed to trying to grab some treasure or other."

You are suddenly aware of rustling in the leaves beneath you. In fact, it sounds similar to the rustling noise Vyl is making behind you. Looking down, you see dozens of little millipedes crawling through the dead plants. An urge to yell rises in you, but you suppress it with great effort.

"Oh, allow me to introduce you to my subjects," Vyl says. "The Millipede Queen is not an empty title. Unfortunately, these millipedes have no mind of their own, so I control them all directly. They don't offer much in the way of amusement, but they're fun to play with when I get visitors."

The rustling sounds gradually quieten, as the millipedes crawl ahead. You look back to Vyl, who smiles charmingly and beckons onward. It doesn't take long to reach another clearing.

This one looks much like the last, except three times as big and with several more pathways leading away from it. The moon illuminates the clearing, and on a cloudless night like tonight the clearing seems to be painted a pale color. Some oddly shaped rocks and trees lie around the clearing, perhaps as decoration.

"This is where I entertain my guests," explains Vyl. "They lie on one of the trees and I make them laugh like they've never laughed before. Only visitors I'm fond of come here. Also, if you so wish, the path with the black flower next to it is the way to the guest sleeping clearing. It hasn't been used in some time though, so who knows what might have grown in there. I haven't checked recently."

Vyl flashes a smile at you. "Would you like me to make you laugh? Or would rather rest and regain your strength? I'll have breakfast ready when you wake up."

You cock your head, confused. "Breakfast?" you ask quizzically.

"Only vegetables, fruit, and water I'm afraid. We millipedes lack the means to cook meat or create any kind of juice. Well, would you like to laugh or rest?"

You reply...
112111.title: Deeper In

choices: it's been a while since such a charming man came to visit."
it's been a while since such an attractive woman came to visit."
1121111.content:
"Very well. Please have a seat."

Choosing one of the oddly shaped trees, you rest your tired body on the wooden frame. The shape is roughly like a chair, but there is extended at both sides, meaning that your legs are laying flat on the wood and the tree extends up above your head.

Vyl begins to curl up in front of you, a writhing mass of legs and segments. However, as she coils around her body seems to be emitting a strange blue glow. The color soon envelops her form, now only a silhouette, encasing Vyl in a dome of blue light. Then the silhouette changes shape, shrinking and morphing. By the time the blue light dulls, the silhouette is now a body about your size

You gape.

Standing before you is a very young, very beautiful maiden, with skin that looks silky smooth and pale blond hair the falls gently to her feet. Curves in all the right places, her body would make any woman green with jealousy. And her clothing was not chosen for its modesty: two leather garments that were little more than underwear held her large bosom and hid her round butt. She was beautiful and she knew it.

"Uuuuh, who are you?" you ask incredulously. How had this person suddenly taken Vyl's place?

Two blue eyes smile kindly at you, and now that you examine it the face looks very familiar...

"Don't tell me you've already forgotten the name of your host?" the woman says in a silky voice that soothes you tremendously.

Host? No...

"Vyl?"

The beauty giggles softly. "Why of course. Who else?" Her voice lost its otherworldliness during the transformation, but you can tell it is indeed Vyl, the Millipede Queen. It is almost frightening to think of this young maiden and the Millipede Queen as the same person.

"B-But, how..."

"I've already told you of Kol's human form. Well, here's mine! What do you think?" Vyl asks excitedly, her demeanor completely different to the one she had as a giant millipede. "Impressive, is it not?"

"Well, that's one way to put it..." You shift on your tree seat a little bit, wondering what the point of transforming was.

Vyl's attention immediately returns to you. "Oh I'm sorry! Silly me, you want me to entertain you, don't you?" She bounces right up to you, and you swear her clothes are going to fall off. They don't though, and she places her face right next to yours. "You wanted to laugh right? But there might be a better way to entertain you..."

With a wave of her fingers, Vyl grows a tree exactly like yours across from you and sits in it. She rests her feet on the wooden structure and leans back, displaying her body for the world to see. However, you were the only one watching.

"So, do you want to tickle me, or should I tickle you?" Vyl asks, very nonchalant.

You're not quite sure you heard right.

"I'm sorry... What?" you say, surprised.

"I asked who should be tickled, me or you? I'll be entertained either way, so which way entertains you most?"

"That is a... different, pastime."

"It's something I do with all my cute guests. And besides...

You decide to follow the barmaid upstairs.

You make little noise as you follow her up the stairs to the second floor and down the hallway.

Without looking back, she opens a door on the right and walks in. You step inside behind her before she has a chance to close the door. She looks at you in shock and quickly backs away.

“Who are you?! What are you doing in my room?!”

The woman seems more angry than fearful. As she prepares herself for a possible struggle, you get your first good look at her.

She was tall and curvy in all the right places. Her blond hair flowed past her shoulders and her face had a softness to it that contrasted with the evil look she was now giving you. No doubt about it, she was beautiful. Unfortunately your reverie was broken by seeing her grab a nearby broom and hold it defensively.

“Peace, my lady” you say; putting your hands in front of you in an unthreatening manner. “I only wish to know about the disappearances that plague this land.”

Her defenses don’t waver for a second.

“I don’t care why you are here! Leave immediately or I’ll beat you unconscious and drag you out myself!”

Sweet girl. In her defense, you were being rather intrusive. Maybe she just wasn’t worth the effort. Then again, it may be possible to convince her your cause is just, without resorting to physical violence. On the other hand, perhaps violence is the only thing that will loosen her tongue. You eye her up and down; she may look tough, but you think you can take her without too much trouble…

You wait for her laughter to die out before speaking to her.

“I’m about to un-gag you now. After which you’ll have two choices. You can choose to tell me what I want to know, or you can choose to remain defiant. This includes shouting for help, insulting me, or just keeping silent. This choice will of course lead to more tickling. And while I can guarantee it will last a lot longer than five minutes, I cannot guarantee that it will be limited to just your feet. Understand?”

She just looks at you, not even trying to answer. You lift her head up and pull the gag out of her mouth, waiting for her reply.
11331.title: Wait for her to wake up

113312.content:
“Forget it.”

You sigh. Looks like this might take a while. Well, the least you can do is try and have some fun with the situation.

After slipping the gag back down around her mouth, you pick her up and plop her down on the bed. Since you have already determined that her feet are ticklish, it may be prudent to see where else she is ticklish. With a little bit of effort, you manage to pull down her skirt half way down her rear.

The young woman starts to struggle a little more. It appears you got her attention. With one smooth motion, you place both hands on her hips and give it a nice squeeze.

She gives out a long squeal followed by steady laughter. Encouraged, you continue squeezing and fondling her hips. Whatever energy she had was wasted on what little movement she is afforded in the constraining hogtie. You move your fingers across her midsection, just above her skirt line. You keep up a digging motion, giving her a deep muscle tickle. At this point she has to use the rest of her energy just to pull in oxygen in-between screaming laughter.

You believe you were starting to get your point across. Now you just needed to drive it home. Your hands slowly migrate northward, tickling her stomach. Her laughter started to come down to manageable levels; it appeared the young barmaid wasn’t as ticklish on her stomach as on her hips. You were going to go back to her hips when her tired body jolted and she let out a shriek. You stop tickling and notice where your hands are. Most of your fingers are still covering her stomach, but you notice one of your fingers is buried deep in her bellybutton.

You smile. Let’s see what she has to say after this, you think. You start tickling her stomach to get her laughing again, then without warning, you burry your middle finger in her bellybutton. She gave one last scream before dissolving into silent laughter. She buries her face into the mattress as tears begin to leak out of her eyes. You remain perfectly content to just sit there wriggling your finger while she howls in agony.

It’s been more than half an hour since you last asked her. You might as well ask her again, since you probably tickled all the resistance right out of her. But part of you wishes that she will stay uncooperative. Something about tickling a helpless woman has you all excited. At any rate, you remove her gag and wait for her laughter to die out.

“Here’s your chance to stop the torment.” You tell her. “And trust me, it will be the last chance you have for a long time. Are you ready to tell me about the disappearances going on around here?”

She takes in a few much needed breaths before giving you her reply.
113312.title: Forget it

1133121.content:
“All right. I’ll talk”

You sit down next to her, waiting to hear what she knew.

“There is no link between the victims.” She starts. “All of those who have disappeared were people who just happen to be walking alone at night when the carriage found them.”

You furrow you brow in confusion. “What carriage?”

“The only reason I know is because I saw it myself.” She explains. “It was three weeks ago, and I was walking home after my shift at the bar. I was about half way home when I saw her. About a block away was a young maiden with long black hair. I was wondering what such a beautiful young woman was doing out by herself when I saw it. It was a plain, nondescript carriage coming up behind her. The carriage itself was wholly unremarkable except for the speed at which it was traveling. The horses were going at full gallop. It wasn’t until the carriage was in front of the maiden that the driver brought the horses to a full stop. Just then, the door to the carriage opened, and I saw several arms reach out and pull the young woman into the cabin. Her scream was silenced as soon as the door was closed.”

You listen intently, taking in every detail.

“I just stood there, stunned. I had never witnessed a real kidnapping before. I didn’t come to my senses until the carriage had taken off and pulled up right next to me. The door opened, and I saw two men. I could not get a good look at their faces, because it was so dark, but I did see that one of them was holding the young maiden. The other one reached out and grabbed my arm. I tried to run away, but his grip was strong. He started pulling me into the carriage when the driver stopped him.

“What are you doing?” He asked.

“This one saw us.” The other man replied. “We can’t just let her go.”

“We only have enough room for one, remember? Give her here.”

The man handed her up to the driver. He took her arm and looked right into her eyes.

“You are to tell no one about this. If you do, you can be sure we will find you.”

The man then flashed a badge and let her go. The door closed and the carriage sped off into the night.

“It was the emblem of the royal guard.” The barmaid said, finishing her story. “When I saw that I knew it wasn’t just an idle threat he told me.”

You sat back, considering the implications of what she just told you. If the guard of this countries royal family is behind the kidnappings, than perhaps one (or all) of the royal family was masterminding the disappearances!

“What can you tell me of the royal family?” You ask.

“Well, the king has always been a good ruler. But lately he has been acting strangely. In the last couple of years, he hasn’t stepped foot out of the palace. And he almost never makes public speeches anymore.”

“The queen remains her old loving self. She can often be seen out and about, giving money to the poor. Sometimes she even goes without an escort. Everyone loves her.”

“The prince is another story. Ever since he could walk he has been getting into trouble. Stories of wild parties and orgies have leaked out of the royal palace. He may ruin formal dinners and spoil foreign relations, but I’ve never heard of him doing anything especially devious.”

“The king and queen also have a daughter, but I don’t know much about her. The princess has only been seen once by the general populace, after which she went back inside the palace and hasn’t come back out since.”

You take a minute to digest the information. Whatever course of action you take now, it will eventually lead you to the palace. You turn to your still bound informant.

“How can I get to the castle?”

The young woman’s eyes go wide. “Please! You can’t pursue this any further! If you show up there asking questions, whoever it is that is responsible will know I talked! I won’t be safe anywhere!”

You look down at her face, seeing the fear in her eyes. You think for a second before deciding what to do.
1133121.title: All right. I’ll talk...

11331211.content:
"...You're right...look, I'm...I'm sorry." You say to her, scratching the back of your head. "It's a bad business, but I'm truly sorry for everything, especially forcing you to talk like that. I just worry for the town, you must understand. Please, allow me to pay you back while I think of a different way of approaching this." You offer the barmaid. She grumbles a little and pouts a bit, but she does give a small smile.

"....Honestly, it's alright. I've wished to get that off my chest sooner or later. To be even more honest, I'm simply glad you didn't take advantage of me. I understand what you mean, sir/my lady. And it's rather nice someone cares this much about the town." She spoke up. "...Look, you don't need to repay me...except for the sheets, that will cost you...however..." She then smirked, sizing you up. "My name is Lucilla. What's yours, if I may ask?"

"___________" You reply.

"Ah, _________. Wonderful name. Full of bravery that makes the men and women of the royal guard proud to know such a warrior, I'm sure!" She commented. "Now, I thought of something. I do have a friend in the royal palace. She is a maidservant, and has been my friend since we were girls. Through her, I could get you in disguised as a manservant/maidservant. That way, you could perhaps find incriminating evidence yourself without having fingers pointed at me. OR, I could tell you where I saw the carriage and you could perhaps set a trap. I'm fine with either." She said.

You nodded and chose
11331211.title: Take her with you

choices: Yourself! Without that sword, you're cute! (Female Only)
Plead with a friend you have to be bait!
113312112.content:
"Ironically," Lucilla started as you walked out the tavern, "The carriage was right...ah, here." She said, stopping next to the old apothecary, within spitting distance of the tavern. It was gone, now, replaced with a small field of flowers. The woman and her daughters that had owned the apothecary had to move out when business wasn't all that productive anymore, and instead opened a smithy. Additionally, your best friend, Teresa Vils, was the oldest daughter of the owner. You could understand slightly now what might have caused the royal guard to have so quickly shot down the Vils' apothecary when Lucilla next spoke.

"It seemed to me that most of the people who disappear were last seen around here. I have the suspicion that the royal guard ended the apothecary to make it less likely people would see a kidnapping here. That's just what I think, though. So, I've shown you the spot. Come back to the tavern whenever you want, maybe share a drink with me. Just...don't ruin my room again." Lucilla explained, blushing as she scurried off.

This space was perfect, and you already had a plan in your head. You could set a trap and bait the kidnappers with a fair maiden. But...who?
113312112.title: Lucilla shows the way!

choices: A Dashing young man walks up to you.
1133121121.content:
You quickly decided that, considering you yourself were a fairly pretty woman, having someone else be the bait for the mysterious royal carriage was a risk you didn't want to take. You were fairly confident with your hand-to-hand abilities and thusly decided you would bait the kidnappers yourself! You had to hurry though; nighttime was almost already fully upon you!

Not more than an hour later, you stood in front of the apothecary wearing the finest dress you could find at this time of night (suffice to say, it wasn't very impressive, up close at least) waiting for the carriage to arrive. You stayed there, waiting, at first patiently but soon enough you began to briskly pace back and forth near the side of the abandoned apothecary in mild annoyance. Soon enough though...
1133121121.title: There's no way this plan can go wrong.

11331212.content:
“The possible detriment to your life is a risk I am willing to take.” You say with a grin.

The young barmaid’s face turns pale with fear as you turn around and walk out the door.

After getting directions from the bartender downstairs (and letting him know about his tied up help upstairs) you set out for the palace. After an hour of walking (and carefully checking for any carriages) you arrive at the royal palace.

It is four stories tall and widely spread out. The perimeter is marked by a nine foot tall iron gate topped with spikes. It looks like a thousand people could live comfortably in there. The main entrance was a large gate guarded by seven men in uniform. You could make out several roaming patrols walking the perimeter and the inner court.

You carefully consider your next move. You might be able to get some information by sneaking onto the grounds. Of course if you’re caught, it will be hard to explain your noble intentions to the guards. You could go to the king directly. You’re sure you could convince him to let you seek out whoever is kidnapping his subjects, and having the resources of the royal family will be a big help. Of course, putting yourself out there from the start will surely tip off the kidnapper, especially if it is the king himself! You would have to keep on your toes at all times.

After weighing both options, you decide on the best course of action.
11331212.title: Not your problem

choices: Sneak in through the Main Entrance
Look for a more discrete means of ingress
113312121.content:
You hunker down in the shadow-strewn bushes near the gate and watch ...

After several hours you pick up on the sentries' patterns, noticing one patrol of a solitary guard, passing close by the thickly forested king's woods on the east bank of the castle moat.

You slink to a hiding spot on the reed-choked shore and wait.

Soon enough a guard approaches, obviously bored with the onerousness of his duty and ripe for the waylaying!

With a bit of finesse and a powerful but discrete blow to the back of the head, you soon have an unconscious guard, sprawled out in a tangle of rushes, and -- seemingly -- no notice from his well-armed companions on the castle walls.

It isn't long before you're wearing the glittering mail and tall helm of his Majesty's Royal Guard and your slumbering friend is only wearing a thick gag of hemp rope and cloth, and an expertly knotted length of rope, holding him in a strict but efficient hogtie you're unabashedly rather proud of!

Kneeling over your quarry in the dark of the moonless night, the hogtied guard begins to stir groggily.

Now would be a good time to test his gag, you think. If he starts making a racket and the other guards investigate, this whole gamble will be spoiled.

You gleefully rake your fingers down the bound and gagged guard's helpless soles.

He immediately screams and bucks wildly, straining against your professionally wrought rope bondage, but little more than a muffled whining escapes the gag.

Not too shabby! You think, as the guard squirms helplessly against his bonds, eyeing you fearfully.

Now to infiltrate the castle! Through the main entrance, bristling with guards! Unless there's another way in ...
113312121.title: Sneak around

choices: Some sentries heard that and are coming to investigate! Hide!
By coincidence and some luck, nobody heard that.
1133121212.content: While you were wearing the armor of the Majesty's Royal Guard, going straight through the main gates was still a dangerous idea. That many guards? Big chance of getting stopped and recognized as an impostor. Especially since the guard shift wasn't for awhile. It was probably a good idea to look for a more discrete way of entering. You looked around as much as you could, trying not to look too suspicious to any sentries that might be watching. There had to be something! A cellar door! A tree leading up to a window! A super conveniently placed ladder! Something! You were about to give up and try walking through the front gates when something caught your eye. There was a section of the castle walls that was partially collapsed. There was a pile of bricks on the ground and above it there were some loose bricks that, if you were lucky, you might be able to jump up and grab them and use them to climb up onto the battlements. You quickly look around to see if there are any guards or sentries that might see you. When you don't see any more, you charge at the wall to get a good running start, and then jump off the pile of bricks and manage to grab one of the bricks sticking out of the remains of the wall. Fighting the urge to shout out in delight, you start climbing the jutting out bricks with some effort. When you grab the second or third from the top, you feel some shaking from the wall. Paling and swearing under your breath, you pull your legs up and use the wall to jump up and, just barely, grab the top of the wall that leads onto the battlement just as the wall crumbles a bit more and the bricks fall onto the ground with a bang. Putting a lot of muscle into it, you pull yourself up, swing a leg up and roll onto the battlement, a tad bit exhausted. That's when you realize, that the crumbling was kinda loud. Looking around real quick, you see that-
1133121212.title: Look for a more discrete means of ingress

1133122.content:
The wench lolls back on the bed, still panting heavily. Dark blonde hair plasters to her head, shiny with sweat, and lids flutter over her blue eyes drowsily as she pants out her reply.

"Go... To... N'yashgara... Knave..." With a disappointed sigh, you gently but firmly thrust her gag back into her mouth, uncaring of her outraged attempts to avoid it. Almost idly, you tear away a broad strip of her mussed skirt with your strong hands, binding it around her eyes.

"If I may be so bold, my lady, that was very foolish." You lecture, tone calculated to produce maximum outrage in your bound victim. Judging by her continued shaking and trembling, it is highly effective. "I will inquire again later, when you are prepared to cooperate with an agent of the public well-being ..but for now, I told you that you would be punished for impeding the just in their duties, and I am as good as my word."

Another grunt through her gag tells you exactly how good she thinks that is as well as her prior religious invective had. Heedless of her protests, you begin tying off other ropes on the crude bed-posts, settling in for a more thorough interrogation of the suspect. Said suspect groans and grunts to herself continuously in her firm hogtie, rubbing her wrists raw as she grinds against the ropes. At times, she seems to simply be trying to shift her skirt or shirt into a less revealing location; her struggles only further reducing what little dignity she has.

With the ropes in position, you kneel down beside your suspect, untying the running line holding her wrists to her ankles. You can feel her shake next to you as you grab one bare foot to keep steady, even that small contact making her giggle reluctantly. She springs apart under her own tension as you undo the bind, and you deftly flip her over as she flops like an asphyxiating fish. With the ease of considerable experience, you straddle her bare midsection, back to her head, and grab two of the ropes adhered to the footboard, passing them smoothly through her ankle bind.

Now for the 'tricky' part; you spin around on the spot, feeling the wench buck beneath you, groaning further pleas and protests into her gag, You reach under her, undoing the knots on her wrists, and grab one of her newly freed arms easily with one hand as the other snatches up a noosed rope. As her other arm flails, trying futilely to knock you off, you bring the two together, tying it off nice and tight. That done, you pin her remaining arm under yours. She's strong- but you're stronger, and soon her last free appendage is safely bound and stretched to the edge of the bed.

After a few more tugs to ensure a firm hold, you slide off your prisoner, giving her belly another little spider-tickle absentmindedly. Bound tightly in a 'Y', lying half-naked on the bed in her own establishment, the wench rolls back and forth, moaning into her gag desperately striving for the slightest purchase against the uncaring restraints. There exists none.

"Believe me, my lady," You say regretfully, settling down beside her, letting her feel you through the shifting mattress. "I am sorry that it should come to this." Gently, you grab the mussed hemline of her shirt and tug upwards, revealing a shapely belly toned by life's more arduous requirements, quivering as the cool evening air strikes its owner anew. Casually, you give her a poke, perilously close to her navel, and she sucks in, showing the outlines of her ribs clearly as you carelessly dash her chemise over her head.

You glance at the firm, round breasts also exposed, but resolve to leave those for later. For the moment, you take it slow, walking your fingers over her nude body, feeling her tremble and shudder at your unwanted touch. Your finger your way down her ribs and sides, confirming an impressively ticklish response for each. For the moment, you dance your fingers over her, letting the wench realize for herself how powerless she is to stop you. There is no need to hurry as you caress and tease her; after all, you have all night.

After savoring her bare, sensitive skin for a time, however, you begin to grow impatient, stepping up the tickling. Leaving her curvy hips and feet for later, you instead begin to work over her sides in earnest, lobster pinching from just above her hips to her ribs and back. She squeals into the gag, muffled laughter bubbling out as you play with her body, quietly delighting in the feel of her firm, warm flesh and soft skin under your fingers. Up and down, squeezing and prodding, up and down.

You allow her to settle into the routine -even slowing down whenever you reach the bottom of her ribs, an especially weak point- but then leap to her hips without warning. The shocked wench howls quietly into her gag, thrusting up and bucking wildly as you squeeze against her effeminate hips. You stay on her through every minute thrash and squirm, probing all the while, working your hands expertly to stimulate the deepest nerve cells.

"And just think- you could have avoided all this," You drawl, sliding one arm under and holding her close as the other teases at the upper reaches of her pelvis. "Had you only seen what was just and cooperated." The hand around her side -unbeknownst to her, holding a large feather- wiggles in to swirl around in her navel, you other arm leaving off her hips to hold her quivering belly steady. Pressed up against her soft, sweaty body, you feel her squirm and squeak as you swirl the tip of the feather around in her bellybutton.
1133122.title: "Go to Hell!"

choices: Stay as master in the establishment
Take her home to play with
11331221.content: The blonde wench’s head shakes from side to side and her hips squirm as the feather is twirled around her belly button’s rim. Her body bucks against you as the feather continues it’s course deeper into the wench’s navel. Her tummy quivers at this insanely ticklish invasion, and begins to let out riotous laughter into her gag as tears stream down her face. You feel her scream in laughter as you twirl the feather’s barns against the folds of her navel walls, making her navel shiver in ticklish reaction. The wench’s eyes go wide and you hear her plead through her gag “mfh I’ll talk I’ll talhehehehehehHAHAHAHAHAHAH” right as the feather’s tip begins to stroke the bottom of her navel. Her whole body strains upwards and drives the feather deeper into her navel clit as the sensitive nerves are tortured beyond imagining. Her whole body is shaking with suppressed laughter, her belly is quivering in ticklish pulses set off by her belly button, and your feather is giving no signs of stopping or slowing down. Indeed, you’re constantly edging it further into the belly button in order to maximize the tickles you draw from the belly button clit and the tiny know hidden within its folds. The wench is loosing her mind in tickled, alternating between silent laughter and blubbering nonsense through her tears of mirth. Eventually you give her a few good strokes on her tiny tickle button hidden within the folds of her navel clit, driving her to throw her head back and laugh like a madwoman as she strains as hard as she can against you and the bonds you created. After that, the silent laughter takes her and her lungs and ribs are barely keeping up with her oxygen demands. Her laughter slows down and her squirming relaxes as she tries to draw one more breath through the mind-bending tickles coming out of her sensitive belly button. As she fades into sleep, you lean close and whisper into the wench’s ear “This was just a feather. Imagine what I can do with more toys. Because you didn’t learn your lesson, you’re mine now. I’m never going to let this ticklish belly button get away from me, my tickle slave”. And with that ominous promise, the boisterous laughter you are drawing from the wench’s tummy button fade into silence as unconsciousness takes her. You notice her belly still quivers even in her sleep as you trail the feather’s tip around her navel rim. You step back and consider your options. Do you take her as a tickle slave and stay in this establishment as her master behind the scenes, who tickles her whenever or wherever you desire, or do you tie her up and bring her back to your home, where surprises await her deliciously ticklish body.
11331221.title: Continue the lesson!

114.content:
Outside of the tavern, you take a quick look around. The town is rather small, and due to the disappearances the dirt roads are completely empty. It feels like a ghost town.

Unfortunately, without any clues, you have no idea which direction to even start looking.

Perhaps the forest, or the hills to the north? Or maybe someone else has a lead for you to follow?
114.title: Leave and explore on your own

1141.content:
Taking in a deep fresh breath of air, you decide to hike down one of the dirt roads toward the nearby forest.

After a half hour of riding under the trees, you finally stop at a strange sight.

A large black anthropomorphic seems to be stuck hanging above a large round pit at the base of a oak tree. The wolfs body seems to be all bare except for a pair of leather shorts he is wearing. Gripping tightily to the edges of the pit with his hands and feet. You could note this wolf was fully stretched.

As you dismount and walk toward the pit, the wolf whimpers as he looks permeantly stuck there. The pit below almost seemed to have no bottom but you could get the small feeling there could be tunnels down there.

Finally wanting to have a little fun for the day, you shrug off your armor and weapon leaving you with basic clothing. Taking another calming breath you begin to inch over the wolfs legs until your finally straddled onto his waist. Using your own legs to wrap around his body from falling.
1141.title: What a odd sight!

11411.content:
The wolf looks at you fairly annoyed and worried at your sitting on him as he holds on to the edges of the pit. He looks like he's about to say something, but you start tickling along his sides and underarms, causing him to struggle and laugh. You keep ticking as he tries to say something through his laughter, but you can't quite make it out. Suddenly, You notice his grip slipping as he struggles, and you realize that this was a horrible idea.

You panic an stop, but his grip keeps slipping. You decide to
11411.title: Tickle the wolf

114111.content:
Thinking it would stop the wolf from falling, you grab hold of his body and hold perfectly still.

However your grab was merely just holding onto the wolf by the insides of the wolfs underarms. Wondering how the wolf would take it, you look down at his face.
114111.title: Keep perfectly still

choices: He decides to let you off, for now
1141111.content:
The wolf grimaced, suppressing a laugh and you stare at him desperately, willing him on to keep hold. Alas it was no use as his hands slip and you both plummet into the darkness, screaming. "You idiot!" The wolf shouted over the sound of your screaming and the wind blowing over your ears "I thought it would be funny!" You shout back as you both continue to fall.

You keep going for a good 2 minuets, the walls of the hole streaming past you dangerously fast, your grip tightens on the wolf, hoping he'll somehow break the fall when you finally hit the bottom. "How deep-" you begin to ask but you're quickly cut off as you both land on something squishy and slimy "-oof"
"Oh no!" The wolf says starting to panic and struggle
"Oh sorry," you say, finally letting go of him
"It's not that!" He says "it's...agh!"
"What's going on?" You ask beginning to worry, it's to dark to make anything out but by feeling down you discover that the wolf is being sucked into whatever this squishy thing is. Panicking you grab his ankles try to pull him back out, but it's hard to get a grip with all the slime. Eventually you manage to get your arms stuck (well done -_- ) and start to get dragged in as well! It is at that moment that you realise the horrific truth, your in a mouth, you landed in some creatures mouth and now your being eaten! You struggle with all you might but it's no use as you dragged further and further in.

The first thing you notice in the creatures throat is all the large cilia, big enough to be seen anyway in the dull glow coming from inside the creature. They look like fine hairs waving around, the next thing you notice is how much they tickle as the wave over your skin, causing you to smile. The more of you dragged in means the more of you that's available to be tickled and it's getting harder and harder to suppress your giggles. You look ahead to see you wolfs feet as he squirms and wiggles, you hear his hysterical laughter from further along. Another worrying thing you notice is his shorts dissolving in the slime, looks like your clothing isn't going to protect you very long.

You both slide along, further and further as more of you slips into this tunnel of tickling, everything from your waist up is inside and the top of your cotton shirt is already beginning to dissolve. Giggles keep leaking out of you mouth your left more and more exposed. You look up to see that the wolfs boxers have been left untouched, at least the creature is letting the both of you keep your dignity.

All to soon your whole body has entered the throat and the slime has dissolved everything but your (males:) boxers/ (females:) bra and panties. You laugh and squirm with the cilia tickle every inch of exposed skin. The throat is snug and presses against all of your body leaving no space of your skin unreachable by the cilia, your toes, thighs, ribs, ears... nowhere is safe as you laugh like a madman. However, deciding to make the most of a bad situation you work up the strength to torment the wolf some more: it is his fault for letting go after all. You reach up with your hands and start to tickle his feet. His laughter shoots up and you think you hear some foul language but it's hard to make out. Just in case you punish him by grabbing his ankles and then pushing his feet into the hairy walls giving the cilia complete access to his cute sensitive feet and toes, he goes ballistic and struggles all the more- this time you defiantly hear some swear words. You soon stop torturing the poor wolf as your own tickling is taking its toll. Very quickly it becomes too much and you pass out.
--------------------------

You wake up pinned on your back by a very angry wolf, with one hand he holds your arms above your head (and your still covered in slime- yay :/ ). "What the hell where you thinking?" He snarls "what where you even doing, wondering about the forest?" You explain to him that you where investigating the disappearances that had been occurring and when you found exposed like that you couldn't resist. "Well you want to know where they went?" He asks "here! This is where people have disappeared to, they're trapped in this godforsaken place!"
"Where is here?" You ask, trying to struggle out from under him, you don't like his tone
"The tickle labyrinth, filled with creatures and traps to tickle all who dare enter. I've been investigating, trying to find away to save those people until you came along and ruined everything, now we're trapped here as well!"
"You where stuck in that hole! Either way you where going to end up here!" The wolf scowls at you and you give a triumphant grin "so what was that thing anyway?" You ask, thinking back to that strange creature
"It was a tickle worm, eats you and then tickles you as you past through its long body before finally releasing you. I think it gave you a good taste of what you've gotten us into, but maybe you need another." He grins wiggling his clawed fingers menacingly and closes in on your armpits... "Tickle tickle..."
1141111.title: Not good

1142.content:
You have an equal chance of finding clues anywhere, so why not start with the hills to the north? They give a good vantage point for any raiders while also offering plenty of slopes to hide.

The distance isn't much, but the rising elevation does take a bit out of you. There are several paths already worn into the hillside by shepards and their flock, allowing you to avoid the high grass and rocky terrain in some parts. As you near the top, however, you stop as a peculiar aroma fills your nostrils.

Smells like... smoke, and cooked lamb.

Hurrying, you reach the top... and see nothing. Well, almost nothing. There are the remains of what appears to be a small campsite. The ashy remains of a controlled fire are just beside the path in a small grassy clearing, and there are several bones picked clean lying near a patch of mud.

You make your way over towards the bones and drop to one knee to examine them when something catches your attention. In the mud appears to be a footprint! You squint and identify that it is...
1142.title: Venture into the hills

choices: You accept her offer of training in preparation for fight her mother.
You decline the offer, and decide to just go and try to stop it yourself!
You don't trust her, you decide to tackle and tickle the fox girl!
11421.content:
"Looks human... someone must have been camping here recently." You mutter to yourself
"Indeed, they failed though. My mother already captured them." You suddenly heard a feminine voice say behind you

"What the?!" You turn around alarmed, behind you is standing a young woman dressed in a strange robe, more colorful than typical one worn by mages, that is not the strangest thing about her however, on top of female's long blonde hair you can see a pair of fox ears! And after a moment you also spot a tail growing from her back!
"Don't worry, you don't have to fear me. In fact, I hoped you would help me stop my mother." Started the fox female
"What are you? I never heard of a race like yours."You say, with some suspicion, still carefully looking at her
"Our race comes from a distant continent in the east. We are known as Tikari Kitsunes in our homeland. From what I know, me and my mother are the only ones around here." The female explains
"Why are you on your mother here then?" You say
"Well... my mother was chased out of our village for a crime she didn't commit, and I decided to go with her, as I didn't have any other relatives there. But, after we were banished she has changed, ever since then my mother is consumed by lust for revenge, and wants to gather enough power to destroy our village. Our kind can increase our power by tickling others, and through that enhancing our magical capabilities. She was the one responsible for disappearances around here recently." Explained the fox female

"But... why do you suddenly want to stop her? How do I know it isn't just some trap." You say
"I just think instead of being stuck in the past and her revenge scheme, we should just try to rebuild our lives on this continent. It's not right to hurt innocents just to achieve her revenge! I was trying to tell that to the group who was camping there earlier... but they didn't listen." She says
"Okay, let's say that I believe you. How do you suggest that I can stop your mother?" You ask
"As you are now, you can't. But I can help you train, and then we will go to confront her together." She explains
"I don't even know your name though? And you expect me to just follow and train with you?" You say
"It's Reikatsu. Just Rei is alright though. I found an abandoned household just outside of that forest where we will be able to train without risk of my mother finding out. She only ever ventures to the village, and to her hideout in the heart of the forest." She introduces herself and continues the explanation
11421.title: A mysterious foxy female...

choices: Rei will tickle you to make you stronger!
You will tickle Rei to learn her mother's weak spots!(Risking sudden attack)
A tickle fight to create a bond!
114211.content:
You decide to take the risk and trust the fox girl. Once you tell her that, you can see her smile for the first time since she shown up.

"Thank you, I know it must be difficult to trust a fox, knowing that even in this land they have reputation for fooling people. Now follow me, we shouldn't risk my mother finding out what's going on"Rei says

Both of you go through the forest, luckily the trip is rather uneventful and in about 20 minutes you reach a little hut on the edge of it.
"It belonged to a young druid who happened to be the first victim around here my mother captured. She welcomed us kindly in her home, but my mother still captured her and is using her as tickle toy to enhance her own magic." Explains Rei
"Hopefully we will save her, and all the others." You say
"Yeah..." Said Rei and the two of you entered the house

It was a pretty standard house, with bed, small fireplace and some basic furniture.
"Okay, now let me explain the ways I can train you." The fox girl finally says
You nod
"First option is that I will tickle you..."Said Rei
"What?! Won't you just steal my energy that way?" You say
"Let me finish, okay? I will tickle you, but thanks to a few spells I would cast beforehand, you would actually benefit from it. Your magical energy, that you don't use anyway, because you don't seem like a mage, would be channeled to increase your strength, resistance and other physical aspects." She says
"And other options?" You ask
"Well... eventually you could tickle me..." She blushes a bit shyly when saying that "I am related to my mother, so I imagine our weak spots are pretty much the same. You could try on me first, and then know how to beat my mother. There's a little risk with that plan though... my mother can sense me being tickled and losing my energy, so she could arrive here and attack suddenly."
"Any other ideas?" You ask, not really looking forward to being surprised by an enemy

"The third way is... we have a tickle fight in ancient Tikari Kitsune tradition. After it we will become bond as master and servant, one who wins obviously becomes master while other becomes servant. It will let us share magic energy and be much more effective in battle together." She explains
"If we both get same perks, what's the difference between master and servant?" You ask
"Well... the master gains control spell over the servant. Which can make the servant do whatever they want when used."Said Rei

You think about your options and ultimately decide...
114211.title: Choosing the training method

choices: "But I am a guy!" You correct her
1142111.content:
You reply to Rei about your choice.

"Wow, I didn't expect you to pick that... but I am grateful for your trust. Now, um... could you lie down on the bed? I don't think any restraints will be needed, but you should be more comfortable there." Says the fox girl

You do as suggested, and lie down on the bed. Rei approaches the lower part of it, and almost instantly starts tugging onto your boots.
"Hope you don't mind if I start with your feet..." She says, blushing slightly as she pulls off the first one of your boots, revealing your socked foot
To your surprise she gets her face closer to it for a moment, and seems to take a sniff...
"Hmm... it smells so nice, can't wait to see what's it like under that sock..." Says Rei, her tone suddenly seeming slightly aroused
You are starting to have doubts if letting her tickle you was a good idea after all...

Rei then proceeds to pull off your sock as well, and you feel the nice breeze of fresh air at your tired and slightly sweaty foot.
"You have such soft-looking girly feet..." Rei compliments them, as she starts to tug onto your other boot
1142111.title: Rei will tickle you to make you stronger!

choices: We can take it slower sure
We may not have a lot of time
11421111.content:
You blush trying but soon turning into aprehensión
"Um do we have to start with my BARE feet I uh... just... yeah..."
She looks at you curiously.
11421111.title: "Um... thanks?"You reply(You are female)

114212.content:
"No please I assure you will need my help in stopping my mother" she says
"Please do not mistake your own bravado for power"
114212.title: You decline the offer, and decide to just go an...

choices: Wait for them to leave and search their camp more
11423.content:
It's definitely mammalian, likely feline or canine, you were never much of a tracker. As you look around the campsite, you realize it isn't actually abandoned, a crude tent is propped up, a bit obscured by a small tree. It appears no one is home. You investigate the tent and find a list of names. After reading over it, you realize that these are people who have gone missing!

You hear voices in the distance and jump behind a large rock. You peer over to see who it is.

Gnolls, Hyena folk. Two of them, a male and female. So it wasn't a cat or dog print... They sit in the camp and begin muttering to eachother. It's hard to make out what they're saying. You're sure they're responsible for the disappearances, or at the very least know something about them.

You think over how you should proceed.
11423.title: Feline or Canine

choices: Investigate the campsight more while she's out
114231.content:
You sit behind the rock for what feels like forever and doze off. Way to be attentive. When you wake, Night has fallen. You peer over the rock to see the camp site, and are annoyed that they're still there.

Wait, there's only one there, the female. The other is nowhere in sight. She sits by a crackling fire, simply staring at the flames. You think that you can handle just one.

You step out from behind the rock and she glances up from the fire to you. She snarls and looks back down.

"Get lost." She barks.

You stop for a moment, choosing your words carefully.
"I'm looking into the disappearances around here, would you happen to know anything?"

She glances up from the fire back at you briefly before looking back down.
"No, I said get lost." She replies with a little more hostility.

"I'm pretty sure you do. Why else would you have a list of the people who vanished?"

Her ears perk up in surprise and she stands up.

"I don't know what you're talking about, now scram! Are we gonna have a problem?"
"Not if you tell me what you know!"

You're not sure where you're going with this, you know you wouldn't be able to outmuscle her should this turn violent. Gnolls are known for their strength and ferocity.

Before you know it, she'd knocked you to the ground and has you pinned.
"I Don't know ANYTHING, and if you know what's GOOD for you, y-"

You panic and crack her on the head with a nearby rock, she falls unconscious on top of you. You push her off and dust yourself off, looking around the camp. In the firelight you see some supplies and crates strewn about. You decide to
114231.title: Wait for them to leave and search their camp more

choices: Use her as hostage for information from when her partner when he comes back
1142311.content:
You look around to see if there's anything you can tie her up with. Locating a length of rope, you stretch to find that's long enough for only one bond. So you tie her wrists, then wonder what to do.

Not believing that you're doing this, you pull down her pants to tie her ankles, then cut off her shirt to use as a gag.

Then you decide to...
1142311.title: Tie her up

1142312.content:
Not wanting to spend anymore time here than necessary, you immediately begin rummaging through the camp. Starting with your first clue, the papers detailing the names of people kidnapped you stumble across something. Underneath is a paper that appears to be a map of Trillian and the surrounding areas, only with red circles drawn in various locations.

Studying them for a minute you realize based on your digging on the way here that these are approximate locations of where the kidnappings happened! But why would these gnolls have evidence of their own crimes? Unless they were investigating same as you. But then why be so defensive? The unconscious gnoll behind you was proof of that. You had no idea what was going on.

You didn't have long to ponder either. The growling behind you made it clear the gnoll had awoken. What hadn't been made clear was the backup that had come.

An entire row of snarling gnolls surrounded you from a few feet away. They were well-armed, brandishing axes and blades of varying sizes. As you went for yours, you noticed the line part.

Through stepped a tall woman, dressed in light metal rainments. Her hair was very short, and blonde, her pale skin giving a northern air to her. She reached into a satchel at her waist and pulled out a curious bauble. With stern gusto, she presented the royal seal. "Agent Iren. Trillian special forces. I assume you'll come quietly." Her tone was lined with sarcasm.

Now you were REALLY confused. The Trillian army working with gnolls? Something was afoot here and you didn't like it one bit. But you had to admit this woman did seem legitimate. Not saying that was a good thing.

You had enough space to make a break for it. All you needed was a distraction. You readied a knife to throw from your belt. However, as you extended your arm Iren was on you.

With inhuman like reflexes, Iren jabbed her hand up into your forearm, making it instantly numb and then went for your throat. You had half a second to realize what happened before you were unconscious.

As your body slumped to the ground, Iren slapped imaginary dust from her hands in a mocking gesture. "They never do take my advice." She quipped.

You woke up in a dungeon cell, well lit by torches. As you tried to pull your hands up to your face you were met with pain in your arms. Your wrists were in metal shackles chained to the ground with little slack. Your attempts to move your legs revealed the other half of your bondage. You were sitting on your butt on the floor, with both ankles going into a single hole in a small stocks in front of you.

Before you could start planning your escape, you heard a familiar voice. "Good to see you're awake" said Iren as she entered the cell. "I've been eager to speak with you" She spoke as if you were two friends meeting in a tavern.

"What do you want from me?" You asked plainly. "Hmmf. It isn't obvious? You've been sticking your nose where it doesn't belong. I'm here to find out where." She gave a smirk that implied she enjoyed your predicament.

"You're going to tell me everything you know about the disappearances. Simple enough?" She mocked. "I know as little as you do" You complained.

You couldn't imagine what she wanted to know from you. You didn't feel threatened though, whether she was involved with the kidnappings or not there was nothing to gain from you.

"No matter" Iren removed her leather gloves and cracked her knuckles. "This is what I'm trained for. Haven't had to deal with a..
1142312.title: Investigate the campsight more while she's out

choices: Tie your big toes to the stocks
Tie all ten toes to the stocks
11423121.content:
"What are you going to do me?" You didn't like her choice of words. Iren sat down in front of you. "Relax. I'm very persuasive. It's Trillian law that I'm responsible for your well-being." She said in a friendly manner. You couldn't imagine what she was up to.

You began to feel your boot being unlaced. You spun your ankle in protest. "What are you doing?" You said in surprise. "Making you comfortable. I've been trained to be accommodating to those I seek info from. You'd be surprised at the success rate." She explained

You had heard of agents of other kingdoms offering prisoners with court worthy information full meals. You would have asked for that instead, but given you tried to throw a knife at this law official, you opted against it. Iren pulled off your other boot, then yanked your socks in one quick motion. You rubbed your bare feet together. Iren placed your footwear to the side of the stocks.

She set her plan in motion. She put the large satchel she carried on the ground and began to dig through it. "Have you ever seen a Wyvern during early molting? They look akin to giant four legged birds. The feathers over their scales produce a nerve toxin to ward off predators as it induces massive pain to the biting creature as a defense. However, in small doses their toxin acts a stimulant, heightening awareness. It absorbs right through the skin making it perfect for medicinal purposes. And what I... Have in mind"

You had hoped you heard her wrong but then you felt it. An itchy sensation moving over your trapped bare feet. You slid them under and over each other, trying to dodge the feeling. "You're moving an awful lot." Iren teased, revealing you had been duped out of your shoes. "You wouldn't happen to be... ticklish would you?" Iren was clearly enjoying her game.

You twisted your feet in every direction, unable to escape the feather. Every so often you would get a feather down a whole sole or between a pair of toes, and squirm frantically. "It would be very unfortunate if you were ticklish, seeing as your feet are trapped." Iren continued to tease. "At least admit your feet are ticklish, and I might be merciful" Iren went on.

"The venom isn't permanent, but it will make your feet even more ticklish than they already are." Iren was picking her words carefully to torment you. She was right about the venom. Whether it was mind games or not, every stroke felt worse. Your feet were sweating from how much you wiggled your toes to resist.

The feather kissed every inch of wrinkling flesh, sweeping back and forth, up and down without mercy. "The longer you resist the more venom you absorb, the more ticklish your feet get. Keep this up and you won't be able to wear shoes for days! Every single touch will tickle, tickle tickle." Iren breathed.

You refused to speak, refused to allow your resolve to crack. This woman was mad! You knew nothing, you just had to hold on to that. "Until you tell me everything you know I'll just keep going, you want to know the best part?" She slowed her feather stroke to a crawl and looked you in the eyes "This is just one feather." You immediately felt a second plume added to torment your feet. Now able to switch patterns, Iren got between your toes and down your soles with at least one feather every pass.

Not getting a single respite was wearing at you. Your mouth held back the pressure with all you could bear. Unfortunately, Iren decided to break your resistance. You felt a sharp point dig into your right arch then scribble up your sole while your left was poked by the same feeling, forcing you to burst out giggling.

"Trying to hold out this long when you're this ticklish? Big mistake. Now I shall have to break you to make sure I learn everything you're hiding." Iren said in a complaining tone as she dragged her quills over your flesh, leaving pink trails on your feet.

"No morhore ticklinhing! I cahan't take it!" You pleaded with Iren. "You had plenty of time to confess earlier. I warned you. You have left me no choice." Iren explained. "You could leheave my feheet alohone!" Your sentence trailed into laughter. "I will stop once I'm sure I've left you with no will to resist" the blonde agent answered.

"Now how shall I approach this?" Iren asked aloud.
11423121.title: Woman in a while

choices: Another woman walks in with two more feathers
114231212.content:
"Well.... I can't have your feet wiggling around so much while i'm trying to tickle you..." Iren said as she set one of her feathers down, stroking your left sole with the other one as she pretended to be deep in thought. "Oh! I know what i can do!" she said in an exaggerated excited tone.

         Iren bent your right foot back and you felt something going around your toes, making you wiggle in your state of heightened sensitivity. Eventually, she stopped, picking up a feather and circling the heel of your tied foot. "Can you move? Huh? Can you?" Iren asked. You tried to wiggle your foot around, but ties around each of your 5 toes kept you from doing this. after a couple seconds, Iren seemed satisfied and then did the same thing with your left foot as she did with your right, tying each toe back so that you could not curl your toes or wiggle your feet around.

         "Alright! that looks pretty good to me!" Iren said, admiring her handiwork. "Look, i don't really know anything about whatever it is you gu-" your speech is cut off by Iren. "Hold that thought, Mrs. Ticklish, i have to make sure these toe binds are working." When she said this, you felt a sinking feeling as you realized what she meant by make sure they are working.

         "Oh you don't ha-nnf!" your speech is interrupted by a feather circling the ball of your right foot then traveling down the side, circling the heel, the tracing back up the arch. You try to curl your toes, wiggle your feet, or do anything to stop the sensations but your binds do not give almost any slack. Iren notices your effort and taunts "Does this tickle? Oh man i bet it does, i know that if someone was doing this to my feet, i wouldn't be able to stand it! How is this not bothering you? Haha! Just a joke, i know you're ticklish... I don't know why you're trying to hold it in." You were able to hold your laughter in for the most part, but every time the feather slid over your arch you found yourself letting out a giggle.

         After a few minutes of the methodical feather strokes, Iren looked over at you, stopping her ticklish assault momentarily. "Y'know, i haven't even started the tickling yet... I'm required by Trillian law to give you atleast 30 minutes to answer before i begin "enhanced interrogation" techniques... Looks like you have about four minutes left, then the REAL fun begins! Although, it is fun to watch your face contort when i feather your foot. I notice that the arch is a bit of a soft spot for you, see, riiiiight there" Iren accentuated this point by feathering your arch for a couple seconds, making your knees buck upwards and giggles escape your lips.

         "But i wonder where else on these feet are tic-" Iren is cut off when she absentmindedly runs the feather under your toes, causing you to let out a laugh and jerk your whole body. Iren looks a little shocked by the sudden noise, but quickly smirks and takes the newfound weakness to tease you.

         "Oh, i see, these long toes are ticklish... Just a minute left and i can start, it's good to know i have a little list of weakspots to deal with already!" she said excitedly.
Your mind races thinking of ways to escape, but a minute isn't close to enough time for you to formulate a, if any are even possible, escape plan.


         "Times up! You should have answered when you had the chance, now it's gonna be really bad for a ticklish little _____ like you!" Iren then gets in a comfortable position at your feet, and...
114231212.title: Tie all ten toes to the stocks

choices: You manage to think up of a convincing excuse.
You were fooling no one with your hastily thought-up ideas.
1142312121.content:
Irene hovered the feathers closer to your taut feet as you could only nervously swallow and watch. Just as the bristles were about to contact your skin, you heaved a sigh of relief as your captor paused at the sound of the wooden door to the dungeon creaking open. “You’ve already started without me? For shame, Irene.”

“I was about to begin, Griss, when you so rudely interrupted me.” You turned to see another woman approach. Other than having peach coloured skin and flowing brown locks, her attire and look was very much like her fellow Trillian guard. “Did you bring the special items for testing?”

You heard Griss chuckle as she pulled a similar leather bag from her hip. Placing it down next to Irene’s, her hands dug out two abnormally pale and translucent feathers. “Of course. The harpies were quite the troublesome lot, mind you. After we managed to bring a few of them to the ground, all it took to change their minds was a few minutes under their own flight feathers.” Seeing their ends swaying eerily in the non-existent wind of the cell, the knot in your stomach tightened.

“I don’t think I told you what they did, did I? Let’s show them what our newest toy can do.” Irene smirked as she made space for Griss to sit next to her. When the brunette swiped the length of your arch with her two ghostly feathers, you let out a shriek at the ice-cold sensations. "Aiieeee! W-What kind of feathers are those?!"

“It’s always fun to see prisoners reacting to our new tools. What do you think if added these Wyvern feathers to the mix?” Giggling to each other before giving you giving you sadistic smiles, you fearfully slowly shook your head as deadly “N-No, please, anything bu-”

“I gave you your chance to talk. Now laugh and tell us what you know!” Ignoring your protests, Irene and Griss began to swipe their respective feathers along the arches of each taut foot. As electrifyingly ticklish sensations bombarded your left sole, soft feathery caresses licked your right arches from top to bottom. In just a matter of seconds, your speech was reduced to maddening gibberishness, begging for release. “Pleehehheeease! I don’t know A-Aahahhahaaaanything! I was just inveehehehheeehehestigating the disappearances as well! Gaahahahahahahaaaa!

“Stop lying. You must be either a Rylestia or Coninze spy, kidnapping our villagers for your dastardly war. We’ll show you what happens to captured spies. Irene, hand me one of your feathers.” With both guards now armed with both a Wyvern and Harpy feather, you doubted the tickling could get any worse.

…At least until several minutes later, where hysterical laughter still poured from your mouth like a raging stream. With the toxicating feather increasing the sensitivity of your soles with each passing lick, this left the other feather free to wreck ticklish havoc. Both Trillian guards played your feet like a violin with almost years of practice. Harpy feathers sawed under the bases of your heels and trapped toes, their ice-cold fronds kepping your mind awake and refreshed for another round of feathering.

Lightly snickering at your pathetic attempts to break free, Irene asked. “Are you ready to reveal where the villagers have been taken? Or will you need further proof of our techniques?”
1142312121.title: Another woman walks in with two more feathers

12.content:
Perhaps it's the pay or the risks, but the call of war has caught your attention. Howerver, which side will gain your skills?

The kingdom of Rylestia to the east is lead by King Durian. Their official colors are red and black. While considered by most to have a very strong military presence, their lack of freedoms has also cut crime in the land to a miniscule amount.
Criminals are too scared to commit any crimes, both due to the harsh punishments and the skilled interrogators they train to get information from captives.
Their infantry is honed into a single, well-disciplined fighting force.

The kingdom of Coninze is almost the complete opposite. Located to the west, and with the official colors of blue and yellow, it is run by an unbetrothed Queen named Catherine.
The kingdom is much more open to new ideas than its neighbor, and while the people are free to do as they please, there are many travelers who take advantage of them. Thus, poverty is a bit of a problem.
Despite this, the kingdom of Coninze has skilled archers and boasts having the most successful spies in all the world.
12.title: Mercenary for hire

121.content:
You wait in a large room filed with paintings of famous commanders and bold warriors of the kingdom of Rylestia, but they where nothing to you just useless paintings.

As you waited you thin about what you'll be asked to do for King Durian, most likely he would send you to the front line to die when he finds out who your are but the money was enough to tempt you away from your easy living.

You are just about to head toward the doors that lead into the king's throne the doors open and standing their is...
121.title: Kingdom of Rylestia

1212.content:
A lithe and imposing woman, flanked by two hooded figures in red cloaks, strides toward you!

She is covered head to toe in a complicated network of dark leather bands and red enamel chain, with wide gaps in the torso, exposing a pale, but well-toned stomach and a great deal of cleavage.

A sinister looking scar runs from the left side of her jaw to several inches into her scalp, interrupting what would otherwise be a beautiful, albeit sharp-featured face. Her jaw-length, raven hair is forced back behind her ears, and a leather patch bearing the seal of King Durian covers whatever may have become of her left eye.

"A new sell sword for His Majesty's Kingdom?" She asks, stopping a few inches in front of you while the crimson-cloaked figures ominously flank you.

You stand, and begin to answer with your name and areas of expertise, when one of the cloaks suddenly pulls a coarse cloth hood over your head while the other expertly manacles your wrists behind your back!

"We shall see," you hear the woman say deviously, as the cloaked figures lead you forward with a rough shove.
