You walk stumblingly, blinded by the cloth hood, for a long time in silence (figuring nothing you say would conceivably improve your current situation). Until you are lead through some uncomfortably cold and damp section of the castle, where the odor of wood smoke and mold hangs heavily in the air. All around you echo the screams, and laughter, of countless pleading voices, sending a shiver up your spine.

Eventually, you are brought to a small, stone cell and expertly divested of your clothing and weapons before being hung by your ankles from a pair of manacles dangling from the middle of the low ceiling. Your wrists are freed momentarily only to be quickly re-manacled in hard, iron cuffs, bolted to the stone floor. The hood is yanked from your head and you see the scarred woman eyeing you coldly. You are naked and chained upside down but you meet her gaze with your own determined stare. She seems to snicker at this.

"We must know more about our hirelings than a name, of course," the woman explains, walking casually behind you, "or our ranks would be filled with all manner of Coninze spies and feckless trash."

"I am no spy." you mutter, between clenched teeth.

"No?" asks the woman, "well, then this should be relatively quick and painless."

You flinch slightly when you feel the nails of her fingers brush your ribs, and begin sliding slowly toward your armpits. You are extremely ticklish, of course, and cold sweat begins to bead on your face. You clamp your eyes shut and your entire body tenses in hopeless preparation for the inevitable torture.

Violently she attacks your armpits and ribs, sending you into waves of flinching spasms. Almost immediately, you explode in embarrassing squeals of helpless laughter! And then you feel even more hands, expertly poking and tickling at your thighs and feet, the two red cloaked figures have joined in the interrogation!

Through the delirium of tickle torture you are now and again asked a question and given mercilessly little time to breathe and answer (often you must choose between one or the other) before the tickling continues. It seems your new employers want to know everything about you ...
1212.title: An interrogator

12123.content:
You conjure hasty but believable lies for each and every question, taking every opportunity to exaggerate your devotion to King Durian and unfailing allegiance to Rylestia. After an eternity of expertly sadistic tickling over every inch of your helpless body, the dark-haired woman eyes you suspiciously and you do your best to look honest.

With a suddenness that makes you flinch, the woman turns and leaves the cell. Your whole body is still tingling from the onslaught as you hang, achingly, from your chains, bathed in sweat and breathing heavily. The hooded figures glide silently to either side of the cell door and stand there, facing you. You are unable to make out any features beneath the shadow of their cowls, and they stand uncomfortably still and silent.

After some time your interrogator returns and nods to each of the crimson-robed torturers. Swiftly and silently they begin to unlatch your manacles!

"I'm sure you understand the necessity of this process," the woman says.

You nod curtly.

"But we must know every intimate detail of our hirelings. The safety and prosperity of the realm depends on it."

Unchained, you stand sheepishly in the middle of the cell; your apparel and equipment nowhere to be found. Smiling at your plight, the leather-clad woman tosses you a small bundle.

"You will wear this," she says. "Once you are dressed, these sentries will lead you to your quarters."

She exits the cell without another word, leaving you with the two ghostly, red sentries. You unwrap the small bundle, revealing a slight leather harness that fits over your waist and around your thighs, with violet swatches of gauzy cloth hanging from the front and back. It does little to preserve your modesty, but it beats being naked.

You "dress" and look to the sentries who turn and lead you briskly out of the cell.

You walk for a long time through a labyrinth of dismal stone corridors and dungeon cells. Again, you hear the riotous cacophony of hundreds of unseen tortures and interrogations. As you walk, you wonder at the ease with which you were able to withstand the infamous Rylestian interrogation, and you make a point to repay your interrogator in kind, should the opportunity ever arise.

But as you marvel at your luck, you begin to question its true nature. Did the woman really believe your lies? Or is this some elaborate trick? You remain unarmed and you're certainly wearing a strange uniform for a mercenary ... and you definitely don't appear to be headed toward any sort of room you'd want to see!

Maybe this line of work isn't for you and you should escape from the castle with haste! Or maybe you're just being paranoid ...
12123.title: Tell them lies!

121232.content:
As you think this over, the sentries lead you up a spiraling stone staircase, and the unpleasant sounds of the dungeon slowly fade behind you.

Of course, they believed you! You feel a little silly about thinking otherwise as you exit the staircase into a rather elaborate corridor of polished stone and intricate tapestries. The guards stop in front of a nondescript stone door, opening it inward, and gesture for you to enter, which you do.

The room is dimly lit and unadorned, but far nicer than any room you've ever taken quarter in! Glancing around you see a litter of comfortable-looking pillows and blankets, a stone table with an assortment of food spread over it and several aromatic candles burning. And in the corner a brass bathing vessel and three scantily clad women! How delightfully unorthodox!

The door closes behind you and the three women approach, wearing only the slightest silken skirts and adorned with every manner of jingling body jewelry. They have the full, dusky figure of Thok harem slaves, and their deep, green eyes stare seductively above their shimmering veils. What luck! Old King Durian certainly knows how to treat his loyal subjects!

The women slowly surround you, pressing their ample bodies into yours while their fingers dance lightly over your aching muscles. They lead you over to the waiting bathing vessel, redolent with soothing oils and aromatics.

You are lowered into the steaming waters and treated to an extravagantly sensual bath and massage. One of the women decants a sickly sweet liqueur and raises it to your lips. In a haze of relaxation you are about to quaff the liquid when that old familiar sense of danger starts buzzing in your head. This treatment, though immensely welcomed, seems very at odds with what you've heard about Rylestia and its tyrant king. Though it may simply be a method of enticing love and allegiance from foreign mercenaries, a very effective method at that!

Do you drink the strange elixir?!
121232.title: Follow the sentries

1212321.content:
You drain your cup and close your eyes as you feel the soft, expert caress of hands all over your body. When you reach out to do a little caressing of your own you notice your hand feels strangely heavy!

You open your eyes and note that your vision has begun to blur. Soon the room begins to sway nauseatingly.

"Is it working?" asks one of the harem women, her voice strange and echoing in your ears.

Another of the women stares into your eyes and you attempt to ask what is going on, but you are unable to make a sound. "Oh yes, she says. It's working very well."

The room begins to go dark and the voices of the women start to trail off.

"This one must be extremely ticklish if they're to be part of His Majesty's amusements." Says one of the women, sounding distant.

"Undoubtedly, the poor creature. I wonder if they'll survive." Answers another.

"Might it not be more merciful if they didn't?" Says the third woman, eliciting a chorus of sharp laughter as you black out.

You come to in a large, garishly appointed room. Bright decorations in the colors of the kingdom hang from every rafter and wall. With creeping terror you realize you are exotically bound and gagged: the centerpiece of a heavy wooden table, strewn about with feathers of every variety!

The room is filled with other such tables and similar centerpieces, other young women and men, some seemingly shaking off a drug-induced torpor, others, already awakened and aware of their plight, struggling desperately in their bondage.

You, and every other "centerpiece" is laying on your back, against a heavy, leather-padded wooden device. Unyielding, golden metallic chains circle your chest and abdomen, holding you tight against the device. Your wrists are manacled behind your neck, and your elbows are bound to a cold metal crossbar running behind your head. Your ankles are bound to your thighs, and intricate manacles above and below your knees, are chained to the same crossbar that holds your elbows. You are essentially spread eagle, but bent at the elbows and knees. You are able to wiggle your fingers and feet, but very little else.

You surmise from the other centerpieces, that you are fitted with a delicate metal collar and a hoop of metal around your head, ending in a large, leather ball gag. Both the men and women wear the same leather and cloth loin covering and nothing else.

You hear a familiar voice from behind you and your blood runs cold.

"Ah! You're awake."

The beautiful but scarred interrogator steps into view and leans menacingly toward you.

"Good! I don't know who you are, or what your actual intentions were coming to this kingdom, but I don't really care, "she explains, running her finger over the sole of your left foot, eliciting a frightened squeal from behind your gag. "You'll be far better employed as royal entertainment than ever you could have been as a mercenary, of that much I'm certain. I don't think I've ever met someone so ticklish."

She takes up a stiff, iridescent feather from the table and begins tracing it slowly from your waist toward your chest.

"Look how you shudder and pant at the slightest touch of the feather!" She says, delighted. "And your reaction when I do something actually ticklish ..."

She begins flicking the feather back and forth, several inches away from your armpit, moving it slowly closer.

You plead unintelligibly, and shift helplessly in your restraints, trying desperately to shield yourself from the impending torture. But she stops short and sighs.

"But you must be kept fresh for the nobles, sadly." And at that, a pair of huge, wooden doors swing open on the far side of the chamber and a crowd of baroque looking nobles and courtesans pours in; laughing and chatting and hoisting great, bejeweled goblets of wine.

With varying degrees of interest, the king's guests arrange themselves around the tables; some absentmindedly tickling the foot of a helpless young blonde woman, others smiling lasciviously as they concertedly attack with feather and fingers, the shuddering body of a desperately laughing young man.

Quickly the room fills with uncontrollable laughter and unintelligible cursing and begging. The heavily made-up and portly pair of noble ladies that have made their way to your table, lick their lips giddily, as they take an agonizingly long time deciding where to tickle you and with what. As the older of the two flips your loin cloth out of the way, leaving you wholly exposed and humiliated, the other slowly brings a large, ebon feather down between your legs.

You close your eyes tightly and prepare for an agonizing, and hopefully short, life as a Rylestian tickle slave.
1212321.title: Drink the liqueur

choices: Ask to be her personal entertainment
122.content:
After speaking with a guard at the front gates, he guides you into the castle where Queen Catherine awaits. You're just glad that you didn't step in any mud. Tracking dirt through the beautiful blue carpet beneathe you probably would have not made a good first impression.

As you enter the throne room, you notice the bustle of people moving about. Many of them are carrying scrolls of information, undoubtedly to show to the Queen so she can be fully up-to-date on everything that was happening. The guard brings you forward to the dais of the throne before motioning for you to stop.

"Your majesty, we have someone who has answered your call and wishes to help our cause," says the guard before stepping aside.

The Queen diverts her attention from a parchment in her hands and takes notice of you. She is fairly young for a queen, perhaps thirty or thirty-five years of age, with long brown pulled up into a french bun hairstyle. Despite the expensive sky-blue gown she wore, and the golden crown resting delicately upon her head, she still smiled with the appearance that she was truly interested in you.

"Welcome to Coninze, brave soul," she says, setting the parchment aside on a small table beside her throne. "Is it true what my guard said?"

You bow your head respectfully before responding. "Yes. I am yours to command, your majesty."

She nods with approval. "Very good. I am glad that you'll obey my orders, but please, tell me what it is that you excel at so I can find the best position for you."
122.title: Kingdom of Coninze

1221.content:
"I have some experience in warfare, your majesty. I would like to become part of your military force."

The Queen considers your offer. "Very well," she replies. "So, what do you fare best at? The bow or the sword? Or maybe you have experience with horses?"

You bow and answer...
1221.title: Which role?

choices: A lost villager, stumbling through the bushes. He looks confused and bewildered.
A dryad, who might have been watching you. She looks cautious and afraid of you.
12211.content:
Memories come flooding back to you. Ever since you were little you've had experience with the bow, often riding out with your father to bring back a meal or two to cook. In the many years since you first started hunting, you have never stopped and continually gotten better. Of course, it's not the same as being trained to be an archer, but you think you'll fare well enough.

"How much experience do you have with the bow?" asks the Queen.

"Twelve years of hunting, your majesty. I am not as good as your expert archers - not even close - but I think I will be able to hold my own with the militia."

"The militia it is then." She consults her maps for a second. "Hmmm, there is a town near the border called Braune, with a militia garrison of a few dozen. It is relatively out of the way, so you should not have to worry. If the enemy does attack, remember that you need only hold them off until the citizens escape. Patriotism does this country no good if you die. Now if you'll excuse me, there are other urgent matters I must attend to."

"Of course. Beg pardon, you majesty." Turning, you are escorted back the way you came. You appreciate the Queen's polite concern, but you are a little disappointed that you are placed so far from the action. Ever since your first kill, you feel a thrill whenever you were on the hunt. It was exciting to think that you might have seen a few battles.

The castle guards provide you with a bow and a quiver full of arrows, a mount, provisions to last till Braune, and a map. Thanking them, you ride your new chestnut steed through the capital, under the gate, and out into the forest. Braune is a lumberjack community, with wooden walls and a population numbering only a few hundred. It is a good two day's journey, but you were prepared.

Looking up, you see bright sunlight pierce the canopy of leaves that casts shadows along the trail. The healthy green plants help you feel calm, and you slow your horse to a trot. It is hard to believe that this vibrant country is at war, let alone at war with one of the strongest military powers in the area. You do find solace in the fact that at least the violence hasn't spread too far across the border of either nation. At the thought, you quicken your horse's pace to a run.

The amount of traffic lessens as you proceed further and further away from the capital, to the point where you are the only one on the path. A brief check of your map confirms that you are making good time - better than expected. Braune is only a day's ride away, and nightfall isn't for a couple hours. It is only logical that you should take a break.

Leading the chestnut mount off to one side, you hitch it to the branch of a tree and let it have some nuts. You suspect that the horse's excellent pace and stamina are due the credit of getting you this far so quickly. Seeing no harm in resting, you lay your bow and quiver on the ground, lay your head on the grassy earth , and nap.

You awake just as the sun is setting, the beautiful colors setting the sky alight. In no rush to continue, you stretch and slowly sit up. A quick glance shows that the horse is waiting patiently and your weapon is still by your side.

A rustle in undergrowth behind you shocks you out of your reverie. Grabbing you bow and notching an arrow, you spin to face the noise. The rustling continues, until something emerges from behind a tree...
12211.title: An Archer

choices: Think up a way to help Rose!
122112.content:
"W-wait! D-don't shoot, please!" The greenish girl says, getting on her knees and wringing her hands. She's rather cute: about 5'9, with old, tattered pants and a shirt (Probably to make her look human from a distance) wonderful green hair and eyes, and cute little feet. There are small little leaf shaped bumps here and there on her body, and her skin was tinted ever so slightly green. "I...Y-you just s-scared m-me. I...I thought you were one o-of them..." She said timidly, blushing. Oddly enough, her cheeks actually were small roses- they bloomed whenever she blushed.

You slowly lower your bow, confused by all this. You then ask the question: "One of whom, Ms...?"

"O-Oh, Rose, sir/my lady." She said, giving a small smile. "A-and to b-be honest, t-they are very many...a l-lot of soldiers...some are red and black, and others are blue and yellow...l-like...you. That's why I was scared. B-but...you aren't hurting me. T-thank you." She said nervously. You felt a pang of regret: for whatever reason, the armies were scaring the poor girl. "U-Um...the blue ones have been teaming up with the elves, and the black ones have been teaming with the slimes. B-both of them, slimes and elves...they've been attacking this forest...I'm...I'm one of the few dryads left...I...I..." She got on her knees and crawled slowly to you, looking at you desperately. "I lost my mom and father...to those slimes...I...I know it's a longshot, but...p-please, could you help me in some small way? I don't care if I never see the forest again...I'm just scared...whatever you can do to help me, I'll do it! I-I can be a good travel companion! I-I'm very faithful! I c-could be your partner, too!" She offered, making you blush. While she was cute, and...honestly, you could see yourself courting her, she was going a LITTLE fast, assuming that you were (If female) lesbian (if male) single. Still, she seemed desperate: there probably was some way you could help her.

So....what will you do? Will you help her or leave her?
122112.title: Her name is Rose. Typical.

12212.content:
"I am a fighter your majesty and I am skilled with a blade" you say

"well then you shall fight in either the army or as a guard it doesn't mater to me" says the Queen nonchalantly.

"You would let me choose" you ask shocked

"Of course I would everyone in this land is free to make their own choices" the Queen says.
12212.title: "I am a fighter, your majesty."

122121.content:
"I will fight in your army your majesty" you announce with pride.

"I'm sure you will serve bravely" says the Queen. "Captain Borin is rounding up recruits I will
have you escorted to the armory where you will wait for him".

"thank you your majesty" you say with a bow.

You follow a guard to the armory. the armory is only a short walk away from the main hall.
"You know you might find captain Borin at the tavern" says the Guard as you enter the armory.

"Are you saying I should go to the tavern" you ask in a surprised voice.

"well you could just wait at the armory" the guard says
122121.title: welcome to the army

choices: Quickly run and report to the queen about the traitor and this Merewin person!
You trip while trying to escape and lose consciousness... you awaken tied up!
Try to ease the situation by saying you are willing to join Merewin's cause!
1221212.content:
You decide that waiting at the armory would be rather boring. Especially considering that you have no idea how long would this Captain Borin take before getting back to his duties in there. The guard gives you the pointers to the tavern "The Red Wolf", luckily it was not far from the royal palace, so you didn't get lost on your way there.

The tavern's sign, as expected from the name, was showing a wolf of a peculiar red color, you would expect the owner would rather take one of Coninze national colors, especially given the closeness to the royal palace.
As you walked inside you were greeted by the sight of fairly average looking tavern, with that you went towards the bar and asked the barmaid if Captain Borin was there by any chance.
"Oh yeah, as usual he is there in the corner drinking with his weird knight friend. I can't believe Queen lets him still work with him constantly going there like that... though not like I can complain, since he at least pays for his drinks." The woman who seemed in her early thirties replied

You thanked for the information and went towards the table you were pointed towards. Easily noticing a middle-aged slightly fat, but not obese, man with a big mustache whom you assumed to be Borin. In front of him was a rather mysterious looking fellow fully clad in a rather fancy looking armor, the face covered by a helmet as well. They seemed to be deep in discussion and didn't notice you

"This is all I could find out Merewin. I'm not a professional spy, and I'd rather not risk losing my position with the queen." Borin told the mysterious knight
"Coward! You claim to support my cause, but constantly keep giving me fucking excuses!" A much more high pitched voice than you expected sounds from the armor... could it be the wearer is a female? Upon closer inspection you notice some bits of long blonde hair coming from underneath the helmet on the sides...
"Calm down please... I know what your mother did to you wasn't fair, and you want justice, but if I lose my position, you will lose your only source of information!"
"Tch... I suppose you have a point. Don't call that bitch my mother though, a real mother doesn't disown her daughter, and kicks her out because she got bored of lover she had her with."The armored female replies
"Now now, if you just calm down and wait some more, I'm sure there will be a chance for you to... let's say... settle your differences with her down the line. You can't be so hotheaded if you plan to claim the throne you know?" Captain Borin said the last sentence quietly, but not quietly enough considering how close you were

It certainly sounds like you just heard something that you shouldn't have... and that you aren't gonna be getting any gear from the captain if you stay there for even a moment longer. However, just as you quickly turn around towards the exit, you accidentally hit an empty mug on one of the tables, causing it to fall on the floor and gain attention of whole tavern...

"Shit! This scumbag was listening to us!" The armored female called Merewin quickly connects the dots after seeing how close you were to them and starts getting up from the table
1221212.title: Too much information can be dangerous...

choices: Merewin turns the tables with her newfound freedom!
An inquisitive figure enters the alleyway to investigate the commotion.
12212121.content:
You made a run out of the tavern, throwing open its weathered door. Behind you, a similar slam could be heard as both armored boots gave chase. "Stop right there, bastard! How long have you been eavesdropping on us?!"

"Long enough to figure out there's a pretty face underneath that helmet." You gave a mocking laugh. Hearing the female knight's swearing becoming even more crude, you jumped over some crates of fruit into an narrow alley. Your purseur merely brought out her ornate sword, cutting the obstacles in her way before making progress. "You will pay for that, cur!"

Upon reaching a favourable stretch of the backend streets, you turned to face Merewin with your shortsword. While Captain Borin hadn't joined the chase, you assumed he would have left in advance to secure contingency plans. The sound of clanking metal dragged you from your thoughts, your pursuer having finally caught up. Judging from the hunched posture and awkward stance, your choice of tight spaces was right in limiting her longsword. "Tired already, Miss Knight?"

"Accept death, heathen! I will teach you not to pry into royal affairs!" You unsheathed your smaller blade up against an easily telegraphed overhead slash. Using Merewin's momentum against herself, you easily danced behind her heavy figure. From this position, you easily kept her off balanced with a few gentle pushes as you kept your weapon. "Having fun? We can keep this up all day, and you wouldn't be able to lay a finger on me."

"You bastard! Stand still so I can cut you down!" The female knight growled. Dodging another wide swing, the sound of metal striking against stone echoed through the alley. Figuring it was time to get some answers, you felt around the back of Merewin's armor. If your guesses were correct and she was indeed wearing a set of Coninze-crafted armor... a small 'click' sounded your truimph as the emergency catch of the metal released itself, the back of the intricate plate swinging open. With your first sight being the flowing blonde tresses hidden underneath, simple linen clothes covered Merewin's surprisingly slender yet well-proportioned upperbody. From the sides of her chest, you could already see the strain from the front of her shirt. "I've just released your emergency clasps, Miss Merewin. Would you so kindly engage your armor's stripping mechanism from inside?"

"Why should I do that, you bitch!" Clinging tightly to her back, the female had yet to figure out there was no way to deliver a strike at your current position. Shrugging your shoulders, you gave her sides an experimental squeeze. Hearing the startled squeal from her helmet, you grinned. "Is this lady knight... a little ticklish?"

"Don't you da-aahahahhaaaaa!" You slipped your fingers into her clothes, lightly stroking her sides. In an surprising reaction, the armored knight quickly dropped her sword as her gauntlets hugged and clawed at the front of her armor. "Ceehhehheheease! I demaahahhahaand you to stop!"

"I ask of you the same question; Why should I do that?" You cheekily answered. Moving upwards to tickle her ribs, girlish giggles spluttered from Merewin's helmet as the knight was forced onto her knees. She leaned on a nearby wall for support, even as your fingers begun the task of poking each individual rib of upperbody. "One, two, three... My apologies, I seem to have lost count. May we start over?"

"Dahahahhaaam you! To behhehehheee done in like this, by a bit of... teheheheheeeeckling! Haahahahahaaa!" Merewin could only pound her metal fists against the ground in ticklish agony. Feeling something soft touching your knuckles as you prodded her last rib, you smirked. Giving what you felt a few cheeky scratches, a high pitched shriek could be heard in the alley before the sound of multiple metal pieces fell to the floor. "Wahahahhahaait! Dohohohoon't go there! I'll releheehheease the mechanism, so just stop!"

Squatting down besides the proud knight, you could now see the flowing blonde hair matted over her crooked smile. While multiple parts of her armor had split into detachable sets, a few key pieces remained attached on her body. Giving her another glance over, you took in the sight of her lithe body and flustered cheeks. "I must say, I wasn't expecting my pursuer to be thinly clothed underneath all that armor."

"Laugh all you want. I'll have you hung by the end of todahahahhaahaa!" Merewin collapsed into another fit of giggles as you ran your fingers over the backs of her naked thighs. Moving away before her kicks found their target, you snickered. "Your long legs doth protest, Miss Knight. Now, mind explaining to me the details of that little meeting?"
12212121.title: Quickly run and report to the queen about the t...

choices: Snitch and say Merewin is working with a traitor Captain!
Pretend that you are just a couple! It's safer that way...
Captain Borin reports you both to save his own skin! You both get arrested!
122121212.content:
It was certainly amusing to see the prideful knight girl who was threatening you so much few moments ago start to snicker and giggle with mere movement of your fingers like that. It made you wonder if she would be even more ticklish in more typical spots, like her feet.
"D-Don't you fucking dahahare tohohouch myhyhy bohohohots!" Merewin said mid-giggling as she could see you slowly going down closer to attempt removing those boots, covering her undoubtedly sensitive feet...
But before you could try your luck at actually removing them, you have been interrupted by sudden sound of footsteps coming from behind you!

"What's going on here?!... Hey you two! The streets aren't place for your lewd foreplay! Take it to yer bedchamber, or I am going to have to take you both to prison for the night! Guards there will sure give you a ticklin' so hard you're never gonna even think of doing that again, especially in public!" Said a female voice behind you!

Upon turning around you could notice that the person was one of the town guard, judging from her light armor and emblems onto it. She clearly misunderstood what was going on there, but just as you thought about simply telling her that Merewin seems to be some kind of rebel working against the queen, you heard a whisper coming from her...
"One word about what you heard at the tavern, and you are dead. I'm gonna escape, find you, and hang your sorry ass on nearest tree." The prideful blonde said, classy as ever.
"Oi! Are the two of ya deaf? Take all of yer clothes from the ground, and get yerselves a room!" The town guard added in annoyed tone, sounding noticeably more peasant-like, hinting at her possible background. She seemed fully convinced that you and Merewin were just a couple who probably had few drinks too much and decided to have some fun in public...

While it would probably be morally upstanding thing to do to just tell the truth and snitch on what you heard, perhaps it will be better to keep quiet about it and pretend to be just a couple? Merewin certainly could have some funny reactions to you trying to act like her lover all of a sudden.
Besides, your word might not be enough of a proof to get any long-time arrests, and Merewin seems like the type who could hold a grudge.

There's also the matter of Captain Borin, he might have already reached the barracks, and reported you... and possibly even Merewin to save his own skin, as traitors or rebels. It would probably be a good idea to leave quickly, rather than risk having to testify with you, a random mercenary from nowhere, having to go against a presumably respected Captain.
122121212.title: Town guard's interruption!

choices: She knocks you down in one blow. So much for being quick…
You hold your own, at least for a while.
122122.content:
You think about Queen Catherine’s offer, and decide to join the guard. The Coninze-Rylestian War doesn’t appear to be stopping anytime soon, and you know the Coninzian front-line has been outmatched by the more disciplined Rylestians. Being a soldier with sword and shield would be quite dangerous, even if the Coninzians have need. But a guard is much safer, and might get to enjoy some of the perks of living in the palace. Besides, you justify to yourself, if Coninze doesn’t have good infantry, you might be a welcome addition to a palace at risk from spies and assassins. “If I may choose, your majesty, I would be honored to serve in the Guard.” You tell the Queen, trying to be as respectful as possible to royalty.

The Queen nods. “Very well. We could use more guards here in the palace these days. Present yourself to the guard tower. The Captain of the Guard will give you your assignment. If she is unavailable, ask for a man named Arturo. Her second can also fulfill the task.” You bow and turn away, while the Queen beckons the next person forward. A servant woman at the door gives you directions to the guard tower, and you through the castle. As you walk, you notice there are guards posted in normal intervals. But half the time the guards are posted in pairs, other times by themselves. Usually it’s better to double up, so both guards can’t be taken by surprise. Are the Coninzians having trouble with manpower? If so, perhaps you’ll be more valuable if you prove yourself.

You enter the guard tower, and at the ground floor is a large open area. Weapons and armor are stacked around the wall, and in the center is an arena or training area of some sort. A woman in plate mail is practicing sword thrusts, and appears to be the only person in the room. She’s about your height, with short blonde hair that comes down to her chin. You approach her, careful to keep your distance from the thrust of her longsword. “Uh, excuse me. The Queen has assigned me to the palace guard, and I’m looking for the captain. Can you show me where she is?”

The woman turns to you, and for a moment just stares at you with her piercing blue eyes, as if sizing you up. “I’m Lydia, Captain of the Guard. So you’re a new recruit, huh?” She points to the wall with weapons and armor. “Grab some mail and a weapon. I want to see what you’re made of. I’m not assigning a clumsy guard to protect the royal family.” You nod, her idea is sensible.

You walk over to the armor and look it over. There’s plenty of heavy plate and long swords… but in your experience that wouldn’t do you any good against an assassin in a hallway or a bedroom. You’d want to be maneuverable. Besides, your job would be to protect VIPs more than your own hide. You grab a black leather vest and matching bracer, giving your chest and forearms some protection but still keeping you nimble. You take a short sword and a dagger from the weapon rack, putting the dagger in your belt. The short sword feels nice and light in your hand, easy to swing in small spaces. Lydia notices your choices, and gives you a quizzical look. “That leather won’t keep a sword from stabbing through you, and that short sword doesn’t have much reach.”

You return to the center of the room, facing Lydia with your short sword at the ready. “In my experience it’s better to be quick than armored. I’m ready for the test whenever you are.” Lydia just shrugs at your answer, and you get the sense she doesn’t have much confidence in you. But she raises her sword and moves toward you aggressively. Time to see how good of a guard you can be!
122122.title: Join the Guard today!

1221223.content:
Lydia lunges at you, moving surprisingly fast for all that plate mail she has on. You can only imagine how strong she is underneath. But even with that strength, the heavy plate still slows her down a step, and it’s enough for you to dodge away from her initial thrust. Her longsword is practically a two-hander, and much longer than yours. You dodge backwards, looking for an opening. You can tell that Lydia is skilled and strong. Her swings are powerful, and she wasn’t pulling her punches. If you didn’t know what you were doing, you’d be dead.

But this isn’t your first rodeo, and you know how to deal with this kind of encounter. You dodge and keep your distance from her first swings, clashing swords only when needed. She pushes you back, but you’re careful not to get backed into a corner, turning and dodging. Eventually your patience is rewarded, she can’t keep up those heavy swings too long without starting to slow. You find an opening and get in close to her, striking. She manages to deflect your strike with her sword, but you’re in too close for her longsword. But it’s not over yet, as she keeps defending and trying to push you back. You twist and turn around each other, and that’s when you get your next opportunity. You swing out your leg, tripping her leg and causing her to stumble. Despite crossed blades, it’s all the time you need to grab the dagger from your sheath and bring it up to her neck. “Ah!” you cry out as the two of you freeze in position. “Do you yield?”

For a moment, a frustrated and angry look crosses Lydia’s face, and you wonder if she’ll try to keep on. But after that moment she realizes the match is over, and that you’ve beaten her. “I… I yield.” You pull away your dagger and step back. The two of you both catch your breath for a moment. Lydia looks up at you, this time with respect in her eyes. “You’re the first recruit to ever beat me.” She tells you. “Usually newcomers aren’t fit to guard a sack of flour until I’ve trained them. We could definitely use someone like you in the guard.”

You grin, beaming with pride. You have confidence in your abilities, but this is the first time you’ve been acknowledged like this. You’re going to be an important member of the Coninzian Royal Guard! That sounds important, respectable. “Thank you, Captain!” you tell her, remembering that she’s still going to be your superior officer. “What will be my assignment?”

Lydia looks pensive for a moment, thinking it over. “Normally I wouldn’t give a new recruit an important assignment right away, but you’ve definitely proven yourself. Besides, we’ve already sent many of our guards up to the front, leaving the castle under-defended. So I’m going to make you the personal guard to…”
1221223.title: You best the Captain!

choices: The Princess, enthusiastically tickling a tied up woman
A pile of clothes, where is she?
12212232.content:
You knew a little bit about Princess Victoria. She was the Queen’s younger sister, a full decade or more younger than her sister, the princess is well known throughout Coninze as a- 'free spirit' some would say. That kind of personality might make her difficult to defend and keep an eye on. But you also realize you’ve been given a very important assignment. With the Queen (and Princess Victoria) unmarried and childless, Victoria is next in line for the throne should anything happen to the Queen. “Thank you, Captain. I’m honored to guard the Princess. I’ll protect her with my life.”

“See that you do.” Lydia told you seriously. “Guarding the Princess is a difficult assignment, but you seem like the capable sort. I don’t doubt your ability to defend her, although the Princess will definitely test you in other ways.” The Captain tells you this with a wry smirk, and you wonder just what exactly she means by that. But you decide that you’ll figure it out on your own sooner or later, and push that thought aside.

Lydia lets you keep the weapons and armor, and gives you a set of clothes with the emblem of the Guard over the heart. You change into the proper uniform, and Lydia tells you how to find the Princess’s quarters. Eventually you’ll have to figure out the layout of the castle, but you’ll have time for that when you’re off duty. At least, you assume there will be a time when you’re off duty. Unless they expect you to keep close to the Princess night and day? There is a war on… but you decide to take things one step at a time.

You make your way through the castle, and up to the royal quarters. This area is quite lavish, with elaborate tapestries and silks on the wall. As you look up at them, you can’t help but wonder how much food and clothing they would buy for the poor of Coninze. You guess that all royals need to keep up appearances. Queen Catherine seemed to be a good ruler. While Coninze didn’t have the wealth of Rylestia or Forazio, the people were able to live their lives freely.

You come to the door you were instructed to open, and to your surprise you find yourself right inside the Princess’s bedroom. You thought the last door would have brought you into some kind of antechamber, and not right into the Princess’s personal quarters. On a large bed in the center of the room, you find…
12212232.title: Princess Victoria

choices: Listen to Alexandria and tickle the Princess
Protest, you're a guard on duty!
122122322.content:
There are two women on top of the large bed in the princess’s chambers. The most striking thing about them is that one of the women is straddling the other and energetically tickling the living daylights out of her.

Both women look to be in their early 20’s, the same age as you. Your eyes move to the woman being tickled: She's not wearing much at all, with red silk garments covering her breasts and waist. She has long jet black hair in a braid down to the small of her back. She's obviously beautiful, with toned legs, a flat taut stomach, pert breasts, and dark, hooded eyes. As you take in all of her exposed, tanned skin, you notice four silk scarves tied to her wrists and ankles, which in turn are tied to the head and foot of the bed. She giggles and laughs as the other woman rakes up nails up and down under her arms, teasing the taut and obviously ticklish armpits. The woman laughs easily, and makes no attempt to shake or stop her tickler. In fact, if anything she seems to be enjoying her predicament.

The tickler is a pale skinned brunette with an equally attractive figure. You allow your eyes to slip down her body and like what you see- an untied silk night-robe gives you full view of her underwear taunt stomach and slender figure. She kneels on her toned legs that seem to glisten in the sunlight coming from the window and for a moment you wonder what you'd give to see her in the position of the other girl. Her eyes never leave her victim's face and she seems transfixed on every giggle and involuntary smile the girl makes. As you gaze at her, you realize this is the woman you’ve been assigned to: Princess Victoria.

At the moment you realize this, she seems to notice your presence as well. She turns her head to you, and gives you a quizzical look. Her hands move away from the dark-haired woman’s underarms, but you notice one finger continues to tickle her, making idle figure-eights over her belly and keeping her victim giggly. “Yes?” The princess asks, arching an eyebrow. “Is there something you need? I believe the guards know better than to interrupt my playtime.”

You gulp, not wanting to start off with the princess in a sour mood. “Uh... begging your pardon, your highness. I’ve just been assigned as your personal guard, and was instructed by Captain Lydia to report to you at once. I was told to enter the doors and wasn’t told you were, uh… indisposed.” You say nervously, standing at what you hope is some kind of military attention.

“Hmhmm… what happened to your last guard, Victoria?” The other woman asks, her voice giggly. She gives the princess a playful look, and you get the impression that this insubordinate banter isn’t new.

“Ugh, he was no fun at all, Alexandria.” The princess replies dismissively, pulling her fingertip away and pausing her tickle session. “I had him transferred to the Rylestian front. That dour nature of his will do more good there than here.” You definitely take note of that little bit of information. Don’t be dour, she doesn’t like it. The princess then turns to you. “But I like the look of you much better than him. Come closer. Tell me, are you swearing to protect and serve me?” She asks, that playful glint is still in her eyes.

“Uh… yes ma’am. Your highness. I swear on my life to keep you from harm and obey your commands. I am your shield.”

“Excellent.” Princess Victoria says with a widening grin. “But at the moment I don’t need a shield so much as another pair of hands. Help me tickle Alexandria’s feet while I get the rest of her.” You’re surprised by the first command, as your eyes dart down to the dark-haired woman’s - Alexandria’s - restrained feet at the foot of the bed. And just past them, the princess’s own bare feet…

“Or…” Alexandria pipes in. “You can start tickling her feet and let me out of these scarves. Victoria is due for some payback, and I promise it’ll be worth it…” You eyes widen even more at that suggestion. Would you dare tickle the princess?

“Hush, Alex. Don’t give my new guard any ideas. I’m not done with you yet!” Victoria says, turning back to Alexandria and digging her nails into her sides, wriggling up her ribs quickly. Alexandria lets out a squeal of laughter, arching her back as she undergoes a new tickling assault.

But now what should you do? It doesn’t seem very fitting for a guard to play games with the royals… but you don’t want to lose this job for something more dangerous. The easiest thing to do would be to obey the princess and tickle this Alexandria. She certainly seems ticklish, and it honestly looks like fun. You have to admit the thought of tickling this beautiful woman is exciting. But even more exciting would be tickling the princess… she didn’t seem angry at Alexandria’s suggestion. She seemed… playful. And she did say it would be ‘worth it.’ It definitely would show you aren’t ‘dour’ like the last guard. But are you really that bold?
122122322.title: The Princess, enthusiastically tickling a tied ...

1221223223.content:
"Y-your highness! I couldn't possibly do something so improper. I am a guard, not your playmate!" You exclaim. You immediately regret your outburst when you see Victoria's eyes narrow at you dangerously. She hops off the bed to glare at you directly.

"Oh? On your very first day and you're already defying me." She jabs a finger into your chest. You can already hear the order to have you reassigned to the Rylestian front or some other far flung hellhole that's about to come from her lips. You begin to frantically look around the room for an excuse when your eyes finally come to rest on the bound Alexandria. An idea pops into your head. You can only pray that it's a good enough excuse to distract her from being angry with you.

"N-no, your highness! It's just... um... I'd much rather be tickled by both of you than tickle either of you," you hastily claim. Victoria raises an eyebrow in confusion. Seizing your chance you double down on your lie in an attempt to avoid getting fired on your first day. "I must admit, when I see two beautiful women such as yourselves my only desire is to let them tickle me to their hearts' content. I can't bear to do as either of you ask as long as that option still remains."

"Really? Why didn't you say so in the first place?" Victoria asks with a smile. You can't tell if she's bought it or is simply playing along, but at least it looks like you've avoided being reassigned for now. She spins around to clap her hands in front of her face. "Now, help me untie Alex here so you can take her place." You stiffen up when you hear that. You were looking to buy time until you could think up a reason to excuse yourself from the room, not engage in a tickling session. The threat of revealing your lie by disobeying makes you stiffly assist her in untying the scarves restraining Alexandria, who smiles at you as she gets up.

"Now strip," Victoria commands you. "To your underwear would normally suffice, but if you truly love being tickled as much as you say then you'd be happy to go all the way, yes?" There's a dangerous glint in her eyes. You're trapped. You slowly take off your uniform while trying to think up another excuse. Nothing comes to mind. When you look over both of the women are looking at you expectantly. Your underwear joins the pile of clothes on the floor soon after.

Both of the women look you up and down. When you try to cover your privates with your hands Victoria moves them away. They seem to appreciate what they see.

"I must say, I appreciate having such a..." she begins.
1221223223.title: Protest, you're a guard on duty!

choices: Go to the barracks and settle into your new home.
Lay on the grass and watch the others practice.
12213.content:
"My family owned a stable, and I learned to ride horses when I was eight," you say. "I often had fun pretending to be a knight, wielding a mop against a target drawn on a haystack, but the training grew more serious with age. I 't  have experience with anything except the lance, however."

The Queen ponders for a few seconds. "You will probably become a good light lancer. Very well, you may enroll with the thirty-first light cavalry regiment," she says with finality. "They are currently training here in the capital, so you chose a good time to join. The guards will give you your equipment and show you the way."

You make a deep bow. "Many thanks, your majesty," you say, as you turn to follow the men who brought you here. A quick visit to the tanner, blacksmith, and stable  you fitted with everything you need. You can't help but think about how cool it is; you are actually joining the light cavalry! Then you feel the weight of the lance, and suddenly it isn't as cool anymore.

Half an hour and a walk through the capital sees you in front of a fenced off field, with a couple tracks that remind you of jousts. Men and women are practicing everywhere, either on foot with saber or on horseback with lance. You can hear constant thwacks as wooden weapons hit home, and the occasional yelp or cry as someone scores a point in a spar.

The castle guards bring you to a man who looks to be in his mid- to late-forties, who is currently teaching a woman how to predict a swipe. At a word he turns, and you see a massive scar going from the bottom of his left eye to the right corner of his mouth. His eyes are excited yet wise, and his short dull brown hair barely pokes out of his scalp. His beard is unkempt, and when he grins you notice several teeth missing.

"And what have we here?" he says in a deep throaty voice. "A new recruit ready to become part of the cavalry? Always a good sign to see new faces - it means that there're people crazy as we are!"

"We'll be leaving then," says one of the castle guards. He looks stiff as ever, but his eyes betray his amusement.

"Of course! You don't think I can handle a new recruit? You should know - why, when you came to me you couldn't hold your sword steady! Let alone use it to-"

"We'll be going then." The guard turns and hurries away, the other soon following suit. Turning your attention back to the old man, you find a wide grin display across his somewhat rowdy features. The old man was poking fun at what was presumably one of his former pupils. You could tell you were going to like having him as an instructor.

"Greetings there young 'un! My name's Helix Thorne, former company commander of the thirty-first light cavalry regiment, now instructor of all new cavalry recruits. Have you got any belongings?"

You nod, and emphasize it by shaking the knapsack you have hanging over your shoulder. Not much, just a few clothes and sone personal items, just enough to make you feel comfortable.

"Then you should head over to the barracks and settle in a bit, find a place to put your stuff, and come on back so we can get started. On the other hand, if you want to pet that off for a bit, you can watch these trainees practice for a bit. Have to say, they're right good for recruits, and you look like an observant one. You should be able to pick up a few things by watching."
12213.title: A Rider

choices: Get equipped and head out to the training field
122131.content:
Smiling and nodding your thanks to Helix, you walk over to the barracks and head inside, finding yourself surprised and more than a little delighted to find that the bunks are co'ed as you see male and female members of all different types of units preparing for training, talking with each other and just getting a little rest and relaxation. Looking around at the bunks for an empty one, you see plenty of personal items around. Holy symbols, card decks, musical instruments, cooking utensils, shields with noble insignias, and large tomes were just some of the things that could be seen at one bunk or another.

"Wow." You thought, "Coninze really adds all types of people into their ranks." Finally finding an empty bunk, you plopped your knapsack down at the foot of the bed and dropped down on to the bed, which was comfier than you would have thought a soldier's bed would have been. Kicking off your boots, you figured you probably should have head over to the armory and got fitted up with the necessary armor and weapon for training, but your traveler's clothes were so comfy. Even if it was admittedly, not much protection against attacks. You were about to get up when you noticed some soldiers in commoner's clothes several rows over. There was a man with thick black hair, tanned skin and dark brown eyes, as well as a blonde woman with bright blue eyes and fair skin. They were whispering quickly to each other and occasionally glancing over at you. You close your eyes and attempt to hear what they're saying but they're too far away. You only manage to hear the girl say: "-to join the Cult-" but the man seems to be cutting her off anyway. Like he doesn't want to be overheard. They seem to notice that you're looking at them at that point, and with one last glance at you, they head out the door opposite the way to the armory and training field.

You're a bit conflicted. On one hand, you really should get to the training field to start practicing. You don't want to give off the impression of having a lazy or insubordinate attitude so soon after you got here. On the other hand, this 'Cult' was curious. Coninze might have valued freedom and new ideas, but this cult seemed to be in the shadows of even here. It seemed like they'd taken at least a passing interest in you, and that was enough that you should probably investigate, but if it wasn't right now, they might slip through the cracks and you might not find them again. They were heading out the door, so you had to choose now!
122131.title: Go to the barracks and settle into your new home.

choices: You sneak past them into the camp
Something pulls you backwards into the dark forest
1222.content:
It has been over a month since you were placed in a division for spying on the enemy. With word of an impending attack, you were sent into enemy territory by yourself, and with limited supplies to boot.

But that was all you needed... your dark clothing and your wits.

It is night time. The moon is full and high in the sky, but heavy clouds keep it hidden most of the time, helping to conceal your position. Peeking out from the tree line of the forest, you look into the clearing at the rows of tents that have been set up by the enemy's army.

Judging by the number of campfires and the patrols walking along the clearing's edge, you estimate the size to be in the thousands. A good size to cause quite a bit of trouble should they make it past the borders of Coninze.

Your job is information. You need to find out where they plan to attack, and any other information that you happen to find that could be of some use.

Movement at the corner of your eye. You see another patrol coming near you. Slowly, you crouch down and press up against the trunk of the tree, waiting for them to pass...
1222.title: Spying

choices: You sneak into the tent... and successfully capture Princess Kaira!
You sneak into the tent... but Princess Kaira captures you instead!
You sneak into the tent, and capture the princess... but get caught on way out!
You decide to explore the camp some more before making your move into the tent
12221.content:
Luckily for you, the patrols don't seem to be particularly vigilant yet, after all they still have to pass the border to begin the actual skirmishes. You easily sneak past the camp guards, and make your way towards a large tent in middle of the Rylestian camp. As you keep getting closer, you can hear sounds of a heated conversation taking place inside...

"This is madness!" You hear an upset male voice coming from the tent
"My father provided me with full command over this army General Althor, I'd rather not have to report your insubordination to him later." A female voice, with a tone of authority replies to him
"Ugh... With all due respect your highness, your plan is insane! Our army here doesn't have the numbers to march straight for Coninze capital! We will get surrounded from all sides and slaughtered to a man before we are halfway there! I know you are eager to impress your father, but it's not the right way!" The man says, seemingly calming a bit after being reprimanded
"Don't underestimate me, General. My plan is far more than simply marching straight for their capital. I'm going to end this war, and bring my father entire Coninze territory to prove that he was right to assign me task of leading this army." The female voice continued, it certainly seemed like you arrived at just the right time...
"Our army here isn't prepared to besiege a capital! Take over a city or two close to the border sure, but not their capital! I've served in this army for over 15 years, it would do you well to listen to my advice Princess Kaira!" The male general says, clearly not having trust in abilities of the female, who was actually a Rylestian Princess apparently? Seems like their military traditions extend even to children of the ruler.

Just as you are listening, you notice a small hole in the tent, allowing you to glance inside! It's not the best possible view, as you can't see the general, but you get a quite good view of the princess... she has long red hair tied in a ponytail, and wears a rather fancy looking mix of cloth and plate armor in black and red colors of Rylestia, which gives her protection without being too heavy. She also has a sword at her side, which seems to be emitting some kind of glow... which makes you think it's probably better to avoid getting in combat with her, as that thing seems magical, maybe even some kind of family heirloom. You also notice that the princess seems in her early 20s at most, no wonder the clearly older General has his doubts about her ability to lead the army...

"I do listen to your advice General, I know you served my father well for years, but I have a plan, which I can't risk leaking out there for now. You have to trust me."The princess says
"If you say so, your highness... anyway, I will excuse myself." The general says, and you can hear him walking away
Few moments later an armored middle-aged man with an impressive beard leaves the tent, the General himself no doubt.
"That spoiled brat... just because military academy considered her a tactical and combat genius, doesn't make her judgement infallible!" He mumbled to himself once the princess presumably was unable to hear him anymore, and left towards other part of the camp.

Now's your chance! It would appear the Rylestian Princess, who also commands this army, is alone in her tent. Perhaps you can try to capture her and bring her to Coninze for interrogation? Someone like that would certainly be a very good leverage in the war as well! Of course you can try to interrogate on your way as well... the Queen would definitely appreciate someone as resourceful as you, and reward you handsomely.
12221.title: Listening in on enemy commander...

12222.content:
You hold your breath, patiently waiting for them to pass by so you can continue your work, when suddenly...

"Hey! Who's there?!"

One of the patrolling soldiers, a female, is pointing straight at you. You curse under your breath. Perhaps she spotted the outline of you, or her vision is much better than you expected, but it doesn't matter now. Like a rabbit, you're on your feet in the blink of an eye and off running.

You wave around trees, run through bushes, and constantly change direction to keep from possibly being cut off by other patrols that you had slipped past earlier.

Jumping over a fallen log, you risk a glance back at your pusuers. The female soldier who originally spotted you is close behind, trailing only twenty or thirty feet behind you. The other patrollers, two men, are much further back and losing sight of you.

Looking ahead once more, you...
12222.title: You're spotted

choices: The soldier sits on the log
Something is in the log with you!
122221.content:
You realize that you may be able to outrun the two men, but the woman is still hot on your tail. She's a fast one! Your eyes dart over each object that you pass by in hopes of finding a good place to hide. You see lots of bushes and trees, but you doubt that you can effectively hide behind one to avoid her and any other patrol that may have heard the commotion.

However, gods be praised, you spot something that could work; a fallen, hollow log! Perhaps it was a bit too lucky, but at the moment you don't really want to argue with the forces at work.

You dive on to your stomach and quickly shimmy your way into the log. It's very narrow, and to fit you're foced to lift your arms above your head as you crawl in. Your nose rubs up against the bark each time you push yourself further in. Finally, you feel confident that you're completely inside, and you go still. You may not be able to see anything, but you can still hear everything around you.

Moments later, the sound of footsteps come pounding up and stop nearby. "Dammit, where did that fool go. Darien will have my head if I lost another spy," mutters a feminine voice. Your pulse pounds in your ears. If you move an inch, if you make even a peep, you'll be discovered!
122221.title: Spot a place to hide

choices: well-dressed and delicate young lady. (You are male)
armored and rough-looking man. (You are female)
1222212.content:
You feel something moving on your arm.

You stifle a yelp, knowing that any sound you make will attract the guard's attention. Judging by the sensation and length, you guess that a millipede is in the log with you. You realize that it is in fact you who is invading the little bug's home, but there is no time to apologize to a bug as you hear footsteps just outside the log. Your already tight body tenses, the only disturbances in the area being the soldier's walking and the millipede crawling on your left bicep.

Again you force down an outburst as you feel another millipede crawl on your shin. You think back to the times when you were a young child collecting bugs (you liked getting dirty) and found your first millipede crawling through a hollow log similar to the one you're in now. You remember when you asked your professor about them, and you remember him telling you about them. "Millipedes like living in damp places, like hollow logs," he had said. "They normally nest in large numbers, sometimes in the hundreds."

Oh.

As if waiting for you to come to that realization, you suddenly feel the sensations all over your legs and arms. It becomes very distracting, and you can't help but wiggle slightly in annoyance. Fortunately, the guard slowly begins to wander away into the trees. The coast pretty much clear, you begin to slowly pull yourself forward through the log. The process is extremely slow, and it requires you to brush some millipedes farther down your arms. The distraction is minor though, and you look ahead to see the end of the log only a couple feet away from your outstretched arms. It may take a good few minutes to get there, but you're in no particular rush.

Then you feel something tickling your underarm.

You gasp and giggle, not expecting the light tickle. It appears that one of the millipedes got into your sleeves and is now running in circles, figuring out where to go. You shudder; your 'spy suit' consists only of a loose shirt, pants, and a pair of sock-like articles to cover your feet. Apart from your undergarments, these are the only things you are wearing. Lost in thought, your mind is drawn back to the situation as another millipede finds your other hollow. You are now giggling softly, not wanting to attract a guard should there be one nearby.

As if your current predicament weren't embarrassing enough, you now feel more millipedes enter your shirt sleeves and travel farther down your body. Some of the questing bugs find your ribs, having fun crawling in-between each one. Others travel down to your tummy and sides, running in circles where they are. Some just travel between all the places, tapping their little legs over your bare skin.

At this point you are laughing rather loudly. The tickling is by no means intense, but it is slightly torturous and distracts you from getting out of your current situation. Surprisingly, you manage to keep your laughter soft.... until one of the centipedes crawls into your navel. Then you really start laughing in earnest, as your belly button is possibly the most ticklish part of your body. You begin thrashing (at least as much as you can within the confines of the log), trying to shake loose the dozens of little critters.

The worst part is the fact that the rest of your body now seems more sensitive, as if the sensations in your navel somehow sparked a flow of ticklishness throughout your whole body. The millipedes in the hollows of your underarms, light ticklers very recently, were now causing you to squirm and shake and laugh. Your ribs supplied plenty of stimulation that caused your laughter to rise in pitch whenever a millipede ran through a valley created by your ribs and taught skin.

Lost in your torrent of laughter, you fail to notice when the guard returns after hearing your ticklish reactions. Before you know what is going on you are pulled out of the log, thrown to the ground, and left unconscious.



You stir, feeling a dull ache in your left temple. Trying to bring your hand down to rub it, you realize you can't. Your gaze turns upwards and you see your arms shackled high above you, pulling your body taught. You then look down to your feet, seeing them locked in a pair of stocks. After looking around, you have assessed the situation.

You are in an empty room, supposedly for interrogation. The walls, floor, and ceiling are all bare, save for a door to your right and the contraptions that contain you. You yourself are stretched parallel to the ground, on some oddly designed table. You are laying on it like a bed, your feet stocked at the bottom and your arms shackled to each top corner. With the restraints you are stretched into something that closely resembles a Y. The table is like any other table, except that there is a gap that stretches from the backs of your knees to the small of your back. You blush as you realize this exposes your butt to the air, and suddenly you feel a little bit colder.

The door to your left groans loudly, and you turn your head to see who has come to visit. Swinging wide, the door opens and admits a...
1222212.title: Crawly Critters

12222121.content:
You spot a gorgeous brown haired woman walking towards you.

"Well, well Spy." The Woman chuckles "Looks like you're caught in a sticky situation."

You blush like mad

"Tell you what." The Woman says as she approaches your feet "Tell us what you know and we might let you go...If not..."

She pulls out a feather and inches towards your feet
12222121.title: Brainy Brunette

122221212.content:
"I am but a humble woodsman," you reply, rather smugly. "I don't imagine anything I know would be much use to --"

"I was hoping you'd say something like that." The slim brunette interrupts, and immediately attacks your helpless feet with the feather.

"Wha-hahahaha-Ah! Hahaha!" You scream. Oh right, you're extremely ticklish! And this woman is an extremely skillful tickler!

You struggle what little you are able, straining hopelessly against the unforgiving steel manacles and stocks.

Your sadistic "interrogator" halts her attack only long enough to afford you a few desperate gulps of air between bouts of helpless, screaming laughter. You clench and wiggle your feet to avoid the masterful flicking and raking, but it does no good!

You notice your torturer seems inordinately into this! A sheen of sweat has coated her brow, and she's breathing heavily, wild-eyed and smiling madly as she expertly assaults your increasingly sensitive soles!

After a seeming eternity, she halts. The room is spinning and your vision is blurry as you attempt to focus on the woman.

"So, my little woodsman," she pants, withdrawing a thick wad of crumpled jute from her waist pouch and holding it up delicately. "I'm going to ask you again, to tell me what you know. If I like your answer, I might leave you alone ... for a spell."

"But if not," she smiles evilly. "If not, I'm going to stuff your mouth with this gag and tickle you until I grow bored. And I do not bore easily ..."

She saunters closer to your face, running one long-nailed, delicate hand up your leg and over your torso, while playfully waving the gag in her other.

But it will take more than the most intense, agonizing tickle torture you've ever experienced to get you to crack ... right?
122221212.title: Resist

choices: You push her off and pin her down
122222.content:
Your foot catches on something in the darkness, and though you bring your other foot ahead to try and recover, it's too late. You hit the ground and tumble a few times before ending up facedown.

"Ow," you wince before rolling over on to your face. As soon as you do, a figure in red and black literally throws itself on to you. It's the female soldier that had been chasing you!

"You're not getting away, Coninze scum," she growls, her hands reaching for your wrists. Your own hands come up to grab hers, locking the two of you in a fight for survival. You squirm about, but the woman is straddling your waist to keep from being pushed off, and though she isn't as strong as you, her position above you is giving her an advantage.

You grit your teeth and continue to struggle. No one else has appeared yet, perhaps she is the only pursuer who managed to keep up with you. "Hey, I'm just a mercenary!"

"I don't care if you're just a farmer, you're still working for them," she fires back. Neither of you seem to be able to make any leeway against each other.

The clouds slowly roll away from the moon, allowing it to bathe both of you in silvery light.

The woman has short black hair and striking green eyes. Her angular face is marred only by a thin scar that runs down her left cheek. Her skin is a deep tan, and looks extraordinarilly smooth for a soldier. Your eyes widen at the sight of her, but at the same time her own eyes widen at you. It seems both of you were not expecting to be fighting against someone so attractive.

Both of you pause in your struggle, eyes locked on each other. Time seems to freeze as both of you take in each other's details.

However, the moment of peace passes, and one of you quickly takes advantage of the other's stupor first.
122222.title: Trip over a root

1222221.content:
Unfortunately, your strength can't overcome her superior position, and she manages to grab your wrists, pushing them to the ground above your head. Try as you might, you can't tug your hands free of her surprisingly firm grasp. She smirks at you in the moonlight, and in a quick, practiced motion, she grabs a length of robe from around her waist and has tied your wrists before you even realize it. Caught off guard, you thrash angrily, but to no avail as you realize your wrists are tied to the root you just tripped over, leaving her hands free.

"So" she speaks to you in a quiet, husky voice. "How many of you are out here? If you cooperate, this'll be a lot easier on you." As she speaks, she begins unbuttoning your jerkin, leaving you in a small sleeveless undershirt. You are alone out here, and no one will be coming to rescue you. But if you tell her that, you'll be betraying Coninze. There's also no telling what she'll do to you once she has no further use for you. Your only response is to narrow your eyes and glare at her, steeling yourself for whatever she's planning.

"Hmph. I was hoping you'd be difficult. It's so much more fun that way. I haven't had a prisoner to interrogate in ages, and none of them have looked as good as you. And I've got you all to myself…" Her grin widens as you gulp unconsciously. She brings her hands up to your wrists, dragging her fingernails over your bare arms. Her touch is feather light, and you squirm from the gentle touch. What is she doing?

"Oh, is that a twitch I see? Would my helpless Coninze spy just a little… ticklish?" Her fingers curl as she asks the loaded question, and your eyes widen. You try to stay still, but can only twitch again as she rakes her nails along your arms. She's tickling you for information!

Her nails scratch lower, now just a bit above your smooth underarms. You flinch as she toys with you, a forced grin spreading over your face, causing her to snicker. "Heh, you'd better not start laughing on me, spy. If you make too much noise, the others will find us and you'll really be in trouble. But you don't want to tell me anything either, do you? I guess you'll just have to do your best to resist me. Not that you can…" She continues to taunt you, obviously enjoying her task, seemingly taking as long as possible to break you. You don't know whether to be thankful or not as she swirls a fingernail around the perimeter of each stretched underarm, causing you to shiver.

"Such a ticklish spy, can you really keep quiet if I do… this?" she teases you, her voice eroding your resistance. She scritches two nails over the center of each underarm, causing suppressed laughter to shake your stomach. You look up to see that pretty face of hers grinning impishly at you, and wonder how much more of this you can take. With each stroke, giving in seems like a more attractive option.

Noticing the female gaurd's enraptured gaze, you swiftly take advantage of the situation. Twisting your body suddenly throws the gaurd off her balance, and with that you summon all your strength and shove her off you, causing her to stumble backwards and ironically trip over the same root you did. She softly yelps as he falls, ending up tumbling down the small hill you raced up before, causing her to smack face first into a tree.

You see she's passed out from the concussion, and leap down towards her. You draw your dagger to finish the job, but catch sight of her pretty features again. Muttering that it would be a shame to kill her in cold blood, you sheath your dagger and muse over what to do instead with your captive. While pondering, you notice her head begin to turn, just slightly, causing you to decide that her fate could be thought of later, and restraining her should be now. You notice a long coil of rope on her person, strangely enough, but question fortune no more. You remove her metal gauntlets, just one part of an actually rather light set of armor, apart from her small breastplate, thin mail, and leather boots. It was obviously so light to increase mobility for patrol, you figure, and question it no more.

Upon removal of her gauntlets, you bind her wrists around the tree, effectively making her helpless enough. Adding insult to injury, you cut the straps of her breastplate, removing it, and then wrap the rope around her body under her arms. Just as you finish, the woman stirs again, this time waking from her injury.

"Oww! My...HEY!" she cries, noticing her position, then throws you a dirty glare.

"Sorry babe. It was you or me. Just be happy you aren't dead," you reply with a devious smirk. "But while we're here, why don't we dance with the devil in the pale moonlight, and share some of your army's secrets?"

"Piss off," she states simply, and shuts her lips tight in defience.

"So, that's how we're going to play, huh?" you shoot back, smirk still plastered on your face. "I think you forget who's got the upper hand here." The gaurd simply stared knives at you, not opening her mouth. "Fine" you mutter, "Have it your way." Reaching over to her stomach, you lift the mail and cloth shirt up, and stroke your fingers lightly down her sides.

With that, the woman stifens a gasp, then sharp giggles, fighting to stay in control. "Ohohoho, ticklish, it seems," you say, grinning at her. "Last chance to talk..." you offer, eying her coyly. She still refuses to say anything other than with her sharp eyes.

"Fine then, have it your way."
