But sadly, not many are skilled in the art of tickling, and the Queen would not waste her time on amature entertainers. So the ticklers must tickle me first, and if they pass the Queen's test, they may tickle her."

It was very odd, you must admit, but a new more pressing question comes to mind. "What of those who do not pass?"

The woman smirks and looks at you deviously. "Those who fail to entertain the Queen by tickling her, will entertain the Queen by being tickled BY her."

Ouch. Looks like the stakes were real high for you.

"There's no backing out of this, huh?"

"Observant child. There's no turning back now." The woman says, before laying back down on the bed. "The Queen will be here soon. Come here now and use my scarves to restrain me." Not seeing a way out of this, you wander up to the woman ready to do your duty. Before you do anything yet though, she has a few more words. "You may use the scarves to restrain me however you see fit. Just thought I should tell you."
12233.title: You will tickle me.

122331.content:
Your eyes flicker over her curvy form, then to the scarves to her limbs. Keeping her fully exposed would give you the best access to her worst spots. You move forward and draw her limbs out towards the bed posts before taking your time to securely tie the scarves to each one. There is almost no slack in her binds when you are finished. She squirms to no avail.

"Well," she comments. "I see you know how to tie knots well. Let us hope for your sake that this is not all of your skills." She's barely wearing anything, and she's tied to the bed, yet she doesn't seem the least bit scared!You only wish you could be as brave as her in moments like these.

You lean over and place both your hands on her wrist before wiggling your fingers gently along her skin, like a crawling bug. Her hips begin to shift as a smile tugs at the corners of her lips. As your hands journey along her arm towards her body, her squirming grows along with her smile until you can see her brilliant white teeth. Just as you're about to reach her underarm, you halt and pull your hands away. She slumps down with a relieved expression and exhales... and right then you bury your hands into her exposed armpit, fingers scrabbling wildly. Her back arches and a scream of laughter erupts.

"Aahaaieeeeeheeaahaahahaaa!! Cheeheeateheher!" she cries out admist laughter, her black hair whipping about while she shakes her head. You can't help but grin at her reaction while you continue to torment her silky smooth underarm. This girl's beauty was only shadowed by her ticklishness and intoxicating laughter.

Surely any spot will reap a reward, so where should you concentrate your torment?
122331.title: Tie her limbs to each bedpost.

choices: Continue tickling her sides and ribs
1223311.content:
Deciding to take advantage of the way you'd bound her, you decide to continue focus your efforts on teasing her vulnerable upper body.

You continue to tease the sensitive skin of her underarms with your fingers, circling the edge of her armpit and slowly closing in on the center of one hollow while using slow, deliberate strokes on the other. She instinctively pulled at her restraints, but they held tight, leaving her stretched out and helpless to resist the torment. You noted that her laughter gradually increased in pitch as your circling got smaller and smaller, but it was the squeal of laughter escaped her lips when you touched upon the very bottom of her underarm, where the hollow met the top of her ribs, that let you know where her true weak point was. Grinning, you placed two fingers on either side and wiggled your fingers on that exact spot with wild abandon.

"Aaahahahahahahaha! Nohohohohoho, nohohohohot thehehere, nohohohohohohot thehehehehehehere!" she cried out as she laughed, shaking her head and squirming for all she was worth as your fingers exploited the discovery of the weakest point in her underarms. You quickly switched tactics, tickling that spot one one side while your other hand busied itself by drawing tiny circles in the very center of her other hollow. The effect was instantaneous, as she now found two weak points being assaulted at the same time.

You kept it up for a few minutes, alternating your techniques on each underarm every so often to keep her guessing, but you quickly decided that you'd best explore another target, and, looking down, you found the perfect target. Without any warning at all, you slowly crawl your fingers down her underarms and ribs, teasing each and every inch of sensitive skin the whole way. Each touch from your fingers elicits ticklish laughter from her, the pitch increasing greatly as your fingers traveled over her ribs, giving you a hint that you would keep in mind for the near future. They continued their torturous journey until you reach her sides, between her ribs and hips, where you began teasing and stroking the soft skin. Not expecting you to have gone past her ribs down to her sides, she let out a loud, ticklish squeal before she resumed laughing.

"Hehehehehey! Thahahahahat wahahahahahasn't fahahahahahahahair!!!" she yelped out through her girlish laughter, her body trying to twist from side to side in a vain attempt to evade your fingers. Grinning at that, you poked her on one side, being rewarded with a ticklish yelp as she attempted to shift away, only for her other side to run into the clutches of your other hand, which began teasing up and down the soft skin beneath her rib cage. She quickly pulls away from that hand, only to once again be met on the other side by the first hand.

With nowhere left to go, she simply slumped in her bonds and laughed. However, each time your fingers touched upon the skin just beneath her rib cage, she squealed in laughter as she arched her back, revealing her ribs for you in exquisite detail. You grin and decide to take advantage of that, moving your fingers to her bottom set of ribs. You lightly squeeze her bottom pair of ribs, making her arch her back and squeal, before you begin wriggling your fingers on just those two ribs, making her twist and laugh. You repeat the process on the next pair, and then the next. As you reach the midway point, you suddenly go back down and start from the bottom, surprising her once again.

As you continued to randomly squeeze, stroke, and tease her ribs, your gaze was focused on her flat stomach. You were also wondering if it could be just as good a target... maybe even better than her ribs, which were already plenty sensitive enough for your enjoyment.

As your left hand continues to run rampant over her right side and ribs, you reach out and place all five fingers of your other hand on the soft, smooth skin of her firm stomach, spread them out, and wriggled your way from the top of her stomach down until you reached her lower stomach, below her belly button. Much to your delight, she bucked as much as her limited freedom would allow her as a loud squeal escaped her lips.

"Eeeeeeeeeeheeahahahahahahaha! Aaaahahahahaha!" she laughed and squealed as she shook her head frantically. She tugged and pulled at the scarves, but they once again held tight, leaving her helpless to endure the torment your fingers were delivering upon her stomach. You crawled your hand back up again, making her buck even harder, before you switched hands, now tormenting her left side and ribs with your right hand while your left hand began crawling up and down her stomach.

"Aaaaaahahahahahahahahaha! Stohohohohohohohop thahahahahahahahat, yohohohohohohohohou cheaaheheheheheteheheher! Nohohohohohohoho fahahahahahahair!!!" she cried out through her laughter. Her more desperate squirming and pulling let you know that, indeed, her belly was a very ripe target for you, just like her ribs and sides... now you were sure that they were both great targets. The only question was... do you stay with her ribs... or do you focus on her belly...?
1223311.title: Upper body torment

choices: Now I want you to tickle me
I want you to continue tickling her while i watch
12233111.content: You decided to focus on her belly for a while, your fingers danced up and down her smooth belly as she continued to squirm trying to free herself but she still got the same result. Then you slipped one of your fingers in her bellybutton and moved it around and she squealed "Nooooooahahahahahahahahahahahah Sttttttttttoooooohahahaahahahapppppppp" her bellybutton was another one of her sweet spots, it seemed this girl was ticklish all over her upper body, you are surprised she was so calm when she asked you to tickle her. You went back to tickling her sides for a while then you heard the door opened and the queen came in and walked over to you and the girl, you stopped and then the queen said "It seems you are an excellent tickler, I could hear her laughter from down the hall, the girl was breathing heavily trying to catch her breath, then the queen said.....
12233111.title: Tickle her belly

122331112.content:
"Oh do not stop on my account. Please continue," the Queen smiles politely. Well, best to not argue with the Queen, you shrug.

"But your majhahahahasty!" the girl shrieks as your fingers resume their assault on her stomach and sides.

"Yes, I know. Normally I would announce my decision at this point but I am sure you know it already," the Queen replies as the girl arcs her hips into the air and immediately presses back into the bed as your right hand wriggles over her belly button. "Besides, it is always a pleasure to see an expert in action."

Apparently so, because it seems that the best part of half an hour passes before the Queen speaks again. "Enough I think," she declares finally. Your fingers cease immediately and the girl lies still, giggling still and covered in sweat.

"Whew!" is all she manages to laugh as she looks up at you with a huge grin on her face.

"I do not believe I have ever seen Alexandria tickled so well before. And that includes by my hand. Congratulations...
122331112.title: I want you to continue tickling her while i watch

choices: ...Your skin is silky smooth and hairless.
...The hovering feather dusters tell you something went wrong.
1223311121.content:
"My most humble thanks Your Majesty," you smile as calmly as you can. Internally however all sorts of rude gestures and taunts are being flung at a troupe of dancing monkeys and the nobles that replaced you with them.

"The pleasure is all mine my dear,"'the queen replies looking to you then Alexandria, "Now please do demonstrate you way with knots and untie the poor girl." You nod and have her out of her binds quickly. Still giggling she rubs feeling back into her hands. "Alexandria my dear, please escort the newest member of the court down to her chambers as soon as you have recovered enough to do so."

"At once Your Majesty," she nods. To her credit, Alexandria immediately swings her legs off the edge of the bed and to the doorway. You follow, performing a half bow, half curtsy to the queen before leaving the room.

Alexandria leads you on down a torchlit corridor that ends in a spiral staircase that you descend. And descend. And descend. If your new accommodation is all the way down here, so far five floors underground, then worrying about your stamina shall soon be a thing of the past. All the while Alexandria says nothing and you have the feeling she may be giving you the cold shoulder for what you did. You don't want her as your enemy, you think. She most likely has the Queen's ear and for all you know could already be leading you down to the dungeons for a permanent membership. You decide to begin avoidance of that fate early.

"I'm sorry about what I did to you," you begin. Before you can go on, the girl turns to you with a reassuring warm smile.

"Don't be," she says gently, "It's my job and I do it. The Queen tickles me, potential suitors tickle me and I my room and wages are more than I could ever have dreamed of when I was growing up. And for what it's worth," she adds sheepishly, "I actually enjoy it."

"The tickling?" you ask.

"Yes. All I have to do is lie there and laugh and my family and I never go hungry again." Well when she puts it that way, suddenly your new job seems difficult.

Seven floors down, Alexandria leads you down a dimly lit passage, illuminated by torches on the walls. Third door on the left, she stops and opens up the door to reveal a stone room bathed in the orange glow of torches. A bed of silky sheets and cushions takes the back right corner. To the front left a pool, around twelve by twelve feet, of clear water shimmering in the torchlight, clearly for the purpose of bathing. A fireplace, desk and wardrobe also reside in the room as well as a round wooden table and two chairs. The floor, rather than being bare, is covered in expensive looking rugs and carpets. And speaking of expensive, the paintings on the walls look like they could keep a few families in bread for months.

"To your liking?" Alexandria asks with a wry smile and raised eyebrow.

"More than that I think," you nod, still taking it all in. It occurs to you that, rather than stale air, the room seems fresh to the nose and healthy to the lungs. You ask Alexandria about this who points to the shutters on the far left wall besides the fireplace.

"We may be a long way under the castle," she says as she goes to open them, "But we're still some way above the ground." The open shutters reveal the cliff face this side of the castle is built into and the rolling landscape below. A village here, forests there and the straight blue horizon of the sea in the distance. Well look a that a room with a view.

"Your beautician will be along soon," Alexandria says, "then I believe the Queen desires your presence in her court."

"Beautician?" you ask.

She nods. "No offense intended, but you smell and look like a peasant. The beautician will... Remedy that."

After asking if she can provide you with anything she takes her leave and you explore your room in more detail. The water's warm and appears to be bubbling gently. A hot spring perhaps. The wardrobe, though it is nicely scented with spices and essences, is empty save for what you presume to be towels and a silk robe that, even on you, would end above the knees. In the bottom drawer are four scarves like those on Alexandria's limbs, most likely to be used in conjunction with the poster bed. Fresh fruit, many of which you have never seen, reside in a colorfully painted fruit bowl on the table. The apples you recognize at least. The yellow curved things and reddy-yellow ball things escape your knowledge.

As you ponder them and decide that oranges would be a fitting temporary name for the latter, the door opens and a man, either a short man or a tall dwarf enters the room. A mustache almost twice the size of him sits upon his lip and a monocle peeks out from under his bushy eyebrows.

"Good day my dear. My name is Fizwald the Thirty third and I shall be your beautician today. And tomorrow. And presumably for the rest of your time or my time here." Well he seems a happy soul if nothing else. You exchange pleasantries and he takes his fez off and lays a bevy carpet bag down on the floor.

"Now my dear. I hope you don't mind, but I must ask you to take off your clothes. Not required of course, but it does make my job easier. And doable." You oblige and strip down to your skin and you hold your arms out whilst he circles you and works on his evaluation.

"Hm. Well I can see this shall be easy enough. Just a wardrobe change for the most part. Body hair removal too."

"Body hair? All of it?"

"Aye my dear. Queen's regulations." You groan. Because this? This is going to suck. You always wondered how the nobles could bear to tear it out with sticky strips of wax in the name of beauty.

"Any chance we can get it over with quickly?" you ask.

"You say that as if cosmetic magic were anything but," Fizwald exclaims with a chuckle as he goes for his carpet bag.

"Wait, magic?"

"Of course. Why go through all that pain when you can just say a few words and poof. Hair's gone." he pulls out a spell book that definitely looks of Dwarfish origin and flicks in a few pages. Aha. Now then, might I ask you to stand perfectly still. If not I shall be explaining to the queen why you've been turned inside out."

"Wait, what?" He look a t you stone faced and deadly serious. Inside out?! If there's even a small cha- Oh. Oh very funny.

"I'd never be a poker player," he chuckles, "It's not without perils of course, no magic is. But I assure you, not of life threatening, or indeed minor injury value. Now then..."

He clears his throat, uttering an incantation. Upon completion...
1223311121.title: ...my girl. You are hired."

choices: No. Better do as the queen says.
12233111211.content:
"Perfect," Fizwald cheers, clapping his hands together, "And not an inter-dimensional giant floating eyeball to be seen. Not bad, even if I do say do myself." With the softy, downy fuzz of you limbs and torso gone Fizwald considers his work to be done. "I believe that's it my dear. Your new clothes will be down the dumb-waiter soon. In the time being farewell and good day." With that the hairy dwarf packs up and leaves. Clothes. Dumb-waiter. Right then. Whilst waiting for your new delivery you decide to bathe and clean the grime on your skin.

The waters touch against your skin is instantly soothing and refreshing and you sit with your head above the water, enjoying the enveloping warmth. The mud and dirt comes off easily enough dissolving into the gently bubbling water like it was never there. You've just finished washing your hair when you hear a click behind you. Turning, you see your new clothes have arrived. You dry yourself quickly and tie your hair back In a ponytail before examining your new look.

Well... At least you don't have to worry about sweating too much on those stairs. Your new outfit comes in two pieces, plus footwear. A metal string bikini consisting of a patterned copper brassiere with a curved, plunging neckline that fastened behind the neck and back with string. The bottom consists of a metal plate, front and back with red flowing loincloths of silk at the front and back down to your ankles. And to complete the expy of Carrie Fisher, whom of course you have no idea about, high-heeled high boots of leather. The intricate details carved in the metal are nice, but somehow you doubt that anyone will be looking at you for that. Two golden bracelets and an armband add to the decor of your body. It could be worse. It could be four silk scarves.

Still if the Queen wills it...

It fits at least and quite comfortably too all things considered. You consider throwing the robe on over the top but decide against it. You'll probably be asked to take it off up there.

You leave your room and step out into the corridor. At the staircase you start to go up then stop. Maybe you should take a look around first. Just to get your bearings...
12233111211.title: ...Your skin is silky smooth and hairless.

choices: The Queen allows for breaks giving you two time to talk.
The Queen has you tickling all day.
122331112111.content:
Not wishing to be fired within hours of employment you head upstairs, fully conscious of how little you're wearing. You can't help but think of all those officials and how out of place you will likely look. And feel. And be.

But as you come closer to the throne room you can hear only music and low conversation. In fact once you arrive most of the officials are gone. You pass a maid carrying a drinks tray who barely bats an eyelid and make your way to Queen Cartherine's throne. Apparently it's lunchtime because tables have been set up and food laid out for the Queen's entourage. Relaxing music is played by a few flutists.

"Ah good," she says as you bow, feeling a curtsy in this outfit would be hard to pull off, "I see Fizwald did his job well. You look beautiful my dear."

"Thank you Your Majesty." You think you look raunchy, but then arguing with her is probably ill advised.

"The outfit compliments you well too. Now please do show us what you can do. Take a seat behind Alexandria." The other girl sits on a velvet love seat, still wearing very little. Her arms are bound above her and she smirks at you as you sit down behind her. Right behind her, your legs either side of her body. "Be gentle with her dear. She has to last all day."

"Gentle is good," she says in a giggled whisper.

"Don't worry," you reply splaying your fingers and gently placing them on her ribs, "I'll be nice." You set her off giggling and squirming, dancing your fingers over her quivering belly, down her thighs, up her sides. This must be the equivalent of jesters around here, you think as the queen nods in approval. It's certainly much more amusing for you. Okay, people are staring but Alexandria's half-naked body is in front of your half-naked body. No mention of tickling the Queen yet but that's not really cause for complaint.

You smile as you realize you might just have set yourself for life. Royal approval and ticklish bodies. What could be better?
122331112111.title: The entertainer

1223311121111.content:
The royal dinner party continues as you slowly, gently tickle Alexandria. Your hands wander over her sides, stroking at the tanned skin, softly wriggling between each rib. The touch is never enough to make her scream or loudly laugh, only gasp and quietly giggle, never too much volume to interrupt the nobles at their tables. But her soft ticklish sounds and squirming do get their attention, and you notice many sly glances your way.

After what must seem like forever for Alexandria, the elaborate dinner ends. Maids bustle to and fro collecting the plates, as the nobles stand and mill about the room, quietly discussing politics or court intrigue. It's all over your head, anyway. A maid approaches the two of you to let you know that you've been given a break.

"You may stop tickling Alexandria for now, newcomer. The Queen wishes to convey her satisfaction at your first performance." The maid tells you, as you bring your hands down from Alexandria's alluring body. She slumps against you, relaxing in her bonds, her arms still high above her head, her bare back pressing against your chest. The maid glances at Alexandria and grins, an expression that seems partially of impish enjoyment at her predicament, and partial empathy at what it must feel like to be in such a position. You take a moment to examine the maid: a brunette, on the short side with a petite figure, were she a peasant girl she'd definitely catch the eyes of the villagers at a dance. The maid's uniform consists of long, loose black pants tied with a band of cloth at the waist. The top garment is a sleeveless black shirt that fully covers her chest, however stops at her lowest ribs, leaving the entirety of her midriff bare. You find yourself eyeing her smooth, pale stomach and the long indentation of her navel, and wonder if the maids also get tickled here.

The maid notices your glance and you see her flinch nervously. With your performance today, you might be getting a reputation as an expert tickler. She might imagine that you're thinking of targeting and tickling her… which actually wouldn't be wrong, you realize. The maid bows and scurries off to another task, leaving you alone with Alexandria in the room full of debutantes and various nobility.

"Curious about Rosa?" Alexandria asks you, a grin on her face. You can't tell if its stuck there from all the gentle tickling earlier, or from her question. "I could arrange to have her meet you in your quarters later, if you like. A privilege of being in the Queen's personal service. But you can't be too rough on the maids. Unlike us, tickling isn't their primary job."

Having a ticklish maid visit you tonight in your bedroom? Maybe even bringing along a feather duster to "clean" your room? It is a terribly attractive thought...
1223311121111.title: Time to talk

12233111211111.content:
The offer is tempting, but you quickly shake your head. "N-no, maybe some other time." You find yourself blushing slightly at the suggestion, and you see Alexandria's grin widen. You decide to change the subject. "What's going on here? Does the Queen usually entertain nobles like this?"

Alexandria shakes her head. "No. This is a royal welcome for influential nobility. It is important for the Queen to keep good relations with the neighboring minor nations, else we might be surrounded by enemies like the Rylestians." She gestures with her head, pointing out a young woman standing across the room. She's a tall woman of around 25, which would make very young for a ruler. She has naturally tanned skin the color of milk chocolate, and long black hair up in an elaborate style revealing the nape of her neck. Her dark almond eyes glance carefully around the party. She's wearing a tight white dress revealing a very attractive figure- the curve of her hips, her tight tummy, and firm breasts that would be evident even without the plunging neckline.

"That's the Duchess Adelle of Uzien." Alexandria continues. "She's made quite a reputation for herself despite her young age. Our kingdoms are allied, but the relationship is somewhat tenuous. She's probably the most important visitor here tonight."

"If all of this diplomatic stuff is so important, aren't we being distracting?" You ask her, confused. You can't imagine its easy to focus with you tickling Alexandria like you have been.

"Very. That's the whole point." Alexandria continues quietly, outside the hearing of the guests. "A distracted duchess or ambassador is easier to get concessions out of. And Lady Adelle has been very distracted tonight. Especially…" Alexandria whispers in your ear, and you nod in agreement. Obeying the suggestion, you put your index fingers just inside each of Alexandria's hips, and begin to stroke up and down that spot very softly. The touch makes her arch her back and gasp loudly, followed by stifled giggles, Alexandria's smooth belly quivering with held in ticklish laughter. As you continue to stroke that sensitive spot, you notice Adelle's eyes watching your tickling like a hawk, glued to the spot. You notice one of her hands moving as if to cover her own hips protectively, and if you didn't know better you would say you can almost see her belly flinching in a sympathetic ticklish feeling.

"Hehehe… oh, ok stop. St-ahahap!" Alexandria tells you, quietly but firmly. You oblige, reluctantly ending the gentle but very effective teasing strokes. "Rumor has it that's an excellent way to get Adelle's attention. But I've never had the pleasure."

"But, how do you know where she's ticklish? That she's ticklish at all?" You ask, wondering if some kind of ticklish bacchanal happens after all the negotiations are concluded.

"Spies. Court intrigue. Coninze is a very deceptive place, and eventually everyone knows everything about everyone. Besides, the Uzien royal family has been terribly ticklish for generations. It's a poorly kept secret." Alexandria tells you, divulging secrets to you as if they were common knowledge.

"I see." you say, dumbfounded. You find yourself glancing at Adelle again, wondering what it would be like to tickle her. To find out if Alexandria was right… but you look away to avoid meeting the duchess's gaze as she keeps glancing back at you, seemingly quite distracted now. "So, our job is to distract the guests, while the Queen can focus?"

"Well, there's the rub." Alexandria tells you, sighing. "It's distracting to everyone, including the Queen. She's just betting on being less distracted than the others. Although…" A mischievous look comes over Alexandria's face as she whispers another suggestion to you. This time, you find yourself slowly dragging your fingers down her stretched out arms, starting at her elbow. As your fingertips graze along her inner arms, Alexandria squirms from the increasingly ticklish touches. Down the quivering arm you go, and then teasingly circling the outside of her underarms, carefully avoiding the sensitive spot so close by… you look up, and notice that you now have the Queen's full attention, as Alexandria gasps and snickers.

"Mph! Ok stop-stop-don't go in!" She tells you hurriedly, and again you reluctantly obey. "Whew… that's a spot that'll get the Queen's attention, but we only gave a taste. Although that might actually tease her even more… oh well. She can always 'punish' us later, right?" Your eyes widen at the easy suggestion. You weren't trying to get yourself 'punished!' You were eventually going to tickle the Queen, but maybe your first encounter might be the other way around?

But you can't think about that too long, as someone walks up to you:
12233111211111.title: Continue talking to Alexandria

choices: "You shall report to the Princess's chambers tonight."
"You shall join Alexandria in my chambers."
"I will forgive you this time. You are free to wander the castle."
122331112111111.content:
Just as you were nervously thinking about the Queen, she walks up to the two of you, an unreadable expression on her face. "Well, how has the first evening on the job treated my new tickler?" She asks you, and you quickly try to give an appropriate reply.

"Uh… wonderfully, your majesty," you tell her, trying your best to imitate the correct court etiquette. "Alexandria is very fun to tickle, I feel like I could do it all day!"

"Oh, I hope not…" Alexandria sighs over-dramatically, although you still notice the grin on her face indicating that she wouldn't be entirely opposed to the idea herself. "But I must compliment your majesties tastes, the new royal tickler is quite gifted." She now tells the Queen, going on to compliment your innate tickling prowess in a way that you feel is at least a little overblown.

"I see." The Queen replies mildly. "And I noticed that you've been advising our new tickler on some… interesting techniques?" The Queen raises an eyebrow, and Alexandria flinches. Apparently the Queen really was paying attention to those specific little tickles Alexandria was teaching you earlier.

"Your majesty, that was entirely my fault!" Alexandria tells her. "I got carried away in the excitement today, and encouraged the Tickler to do something she shouldn't. She did not know you had forbidden that specific tickling technique to be publically shown!"

"I believe the Royal Tickler can make her own decisions." The Queen tells Alexandria, as well as you. "But I'll keep those words in mind. Alexandria, you're to report to my chambers tonight. I'll have to instruct you exactly on which techniques to display during these little soirees." Alexandria twitches against you again, realizing that she's in for a fairly ticklish night.

"As you command, my Queen. I shall be in your bedchamber when you arrive tonight." Alexandria meekly responds.

"I know you will, Alexandria. Now as for you…" The Queen turns her gaze to you, before giving you her next command.
122331112111111.title: The Queen approaches

1223311121111111.content:
"You shall report to the Princess's chambers tonight. My sister is very eager to make the acquaintance of the new Royal Tickler."
The Queen then leaves the two of you to continue conversing with the nobles. You turn to Alexandria. "Am I in trouble," you ask her ."No," she replies. "But I'm in for a very long night. And you are in for a very fun one," she says with a saucy smile.
1223311121111111.title: "You shall report to the Princess's cha...

12233111211111111.content:
Eventually, the party comes to an end. You release Alexandria and she tells you how to get to the Princess's chambers before exiting the hall to head to her long night with the Queen. You make your way through the halls of the castle until you arrive at a large set of double doors. You knock and you hear a muffled voice say "Enter," in reply.

Upon opening the door, you observe the room. Whilst the Queen had only one wall dedicated to feathers in her room, this room had feathers of all shapes and sizes adorning every wall. It was then that you spotted the Princess. She was eerily similar to the Queen, probably looking how the Queen did a decade ago. With her brunette hair, she also wore a silk nightgown, which as she stood up from her desk chair and turned towards you, you realised was untied. This gave a full glimpse of her pale, slender figure, covered only by tight underwear that covered her breasts and loins. Apart from that, you took in her petite feet and flat belly.

A Coninze spy makes her way quickly but quietly across the road. Of course the matriarchal Coninze wouldn't send a man to do their dirty work, unlike the Rylestians. You take out a small eyepiece to try and get a closer look at her.

She is easy to identify, no longer blending into the crowd, but clothed for stealthy movements through the dark night. A black garment covered her head but for a narrow eyeslit, and tightly covering her neck and chest. The short, sleeveless garment left her arms and midriff exposed to the cool night air, a blessing in the hot, humid no man's land between Coninze and Rylestia. Black pants and muddy moccasins complete her attire. Her caramel skin glistens in the moonlight, sweating slightly as she exerts herself. You notice what appears to be two heavy coin purses on her hip.

You lower the eyepiece as she makes her way toward your tree. That settles it, you think, that uniform means she's from the Silent Sisterhood. While you've never seen one in person, you've heard all the rumors. A cadre of Coninze's finest warrior women, extensively trained in unarmed combat, poison making, spying and seduction. Some say the Sisterhood's unorthodox methods have kept the powerful Rylestian Kingdom from advancing into Coninze. Men and women alike have unwittingly fallen to their tactics. They are supremely self-confident in everything they do. They are said to have unrivaled mastery over the human body, and once they don their stealth gear, no one hears so much as a whisper from them. At least, no one who has survived an encounter...

She's risky prey, especially if those rumors are true. But the rewards... those coin purses she carries must have valuable medicines, poisons, or currency. At least one of them must be important, by the way she's hurrying. The other could be used as a bribe, to get out of sticky situations. Besides, those rumors could have been made by the Sisterhood themselves, to inspire fear. There's no way they're that skilled, right? You contemplate this, trying to gin up your bravery. 13.content:
The forest is silent, and the thick fog prevents you from seeing more than a hundred feet in any direction. The only sounds come from the rhymetic hooves of the horse you're riding it trots along. To prepare for your journey into the darkness below, you have packed a bag which contains a long coil of rope, several short torches, some flint, and some dried meats just incase.

The trees begin to become more sparse before opening up into a large clearing. That's when you begin to notice some broken stones in the grass around you. Slowly, the ruins break the fog as you approach. Unturned stones hint at what once was a majestic sight, now just a pile of rubble that towered above you in certain areas.

You hop off of your horse and sling your bag of supplies over one shoulder before climbing over the rubble, heading towards the center. As you move around a large chunk of stone, you notice that some of the rubble has been moved aside to reveal stairs which descend down into darkness. If your memory serves you right, down there is the store rooms, supply areas, dungeons, catacombs... anything that original occupants would want well protected, or out of sight.

Taking out one of the torches from the sack, you easily light the wrapped end with the flint, and descend down the stairs carefully. The torch in your hand casts a strong orange glow against the stones, but even it has trouble penetrating the darkness ahead. At the very best you can only see thirty or forty feet in front of you.

Now, there remains one more important question... where to begin your search for treasure?

You decide the store rooms are the most logical starting place. After all, where would you put your treasure, a dungeon or a guarded store room? As you enter the store rooms, you see a long hallway with rooms on either side. Most of the doors are hanging open or gone entirely. This may not bode well for your treasure hunt, if everything is so easily acceptable. You walk down the hallway, peering from room to room. Aside from the occasional skeleton or broken table, there doesn't appear to be anything of value in here at all. You turn a corner, quickly scanning another set of store rooms, muttering to yourself.

"Hmph. Figures this place'd be picked clean. This is a waste of time..." you tell yourself quietly. But despite your misgivings, you push onward. After all, you've already committed yourself, might as well make a thorough search. As you pass by yet another room you stop: was something different about that last room? You look back, and notice the floor made of a different material than the others. After looking through hundreds of rooms, any differences quickly stand out to you. Its very subtle, but looking closely you can tell the floor is not made of the usual stone. In fact, its wooden! The hole doesn't seem big enough to swallow you, but you've sunk up to your arms, just a shoulder and head poking comically out of the hole.

Thankfully no one can see this embarrassing predicament, as your cheeks redden slightly at the notion. You try to swing your lower body and pull yourself up, but you can't muster the strength. You jump, completely caught off guard as you feel your reflections fingers prodding at your hips.You instinctively try to swat away the phantom fingers as you stumble back from the mirror, a forced smile creeping across your face. Your reflection stops squeezing its hips and you barely have time to recover before it begins wiggling its fingers against its own sides and belly. You are thankful you wore a thick shirt to protect against the cold in the caverns, but still wish it was a bit thicker as you squirm and let out a few giggles when the phantom fingers find a weak spot. Your reflection appears frustrated by your reaction as it uses one hand to lift up its shirt, while the other hand slowly tickles its own belly.

You cover your belly with both arms and ask "Why are you hehehe doing this? hehehe" just as a steady stream of giggles pours out of you. Your reflections only response is to increase the pace of its tickle attack on your sensitive belly, causing you to burst out laughing as you fall to the floor, still clutching your belly. Through tears of laughter you see your reflection stops tickling itself and sits down, cross legged on the floor. You continue to giggle for a few seconds trying to catch your breath when you see that your reflection is looking down at its exposed sock thanks to your missing boot. You panic, realizing what's about to happen an beg, "Please, not there I'll do anythiHAHAHAHAHA!" your pleas are cut off as your reflection pulls off it socks and mercilessly tickles its barefoot.

You thrash around on the floor, tears streaming down your face, as you try to crawl away from the mirror. Just before you decide to give up and accept your ticklish fate, you think of one thing that might save you...
13113121.title: a large mirror

131131212.content: You pick up a rock and throw it at the mirror with all the strength you have left and watch as the rock ricochets off the mirror. You look at the spot the rock hit and see the mirror is..
131131212.title: break the mirror

choices: The Mirrors break down leading to another path,
The Broken Mirrors Have Gained More Reflections!
1311312121.content:
You successfully damaged the wall along with the slow cease of tickling predicament you are in.

You stagger as you slowly stand up regaining a bit of composure and control you decided to break the rest of the mirrors thinking that its a way to get out of this mess.

As you slowly get up you notice that the broken mirrors are.......
1311312121.title: More and More on the wall

choices: You awake, in a flooded cavern.
You come to, unsure of where you are.
131132.content:
You want that boot back. Whatever's in here with you is going to give it back whether it wants to or not. You draw your blade and hold it ready to strike at the slightest disturbance. If you only had a source of light you'd be able to-

A swell licks at the wall to your right and you barely have time to process that information before your feet are pulled out from under you. Water filling your lungs is the only sensation you can comprehend. Then a dull ache to the back of your head. Then darkness.
131132.title: For want of a boot...

1311321.content:
The chipped roof of the underground cavern is bathed in an orange glow from a single candle on the edge of this subterranean lake. Those are the first things you note as you come to. Next is the realization that you can't move. Your wrists are manacled above you and something keeps your ankles restrained in the opposite direction. Something has taken the liberty of relieving you of your clothes but most of you is underwater, the surface of which laps around where your exposed armpits meet your ribs.

Desperately you pull, tug and fight the bonds keeping you captive. But to no avail.

"That won't work stranger." a voice to your side tells you. You crane your to see a raven haired girl, equally naked as you and her lithe form stretched out tight on what seems to be a floating board.

"Where are we?" you ask- the first question that comes to mind.

"I don't know." she replies. "Somewhere under Dormduo I think. How far under I don't know." You test your shackles once more before giving up and resigning yourself to remaining motionless and taking in your surroundings. "I think we have time to talk." the girl says. "My name's Serana. You?"
1311321.title: In the depths

choices: A pair of pale hands rise from the water either side of Serana.
You squeal at a tickly sensation down you ribs.
13113211.content:
"A fellow adventuress then?" Serana nods. "Stray to close to the water?"

"Yeah. I think I hit my head on the bottom. When I woke up-" You do your best to shrug but instead lower yourself slightly further into the water. "Who did this to us?"

A wry grin spreads across her face. "I'd tell you," she smirks, "But it'd be more fun to let you find out for yourself. And seeing as she's heard us talking she'll probably be here any moment." Sure enough...
13113211.title: Occupational hazards

choices: The girl extends a fishy tail to Serana.
Melody turns her attention to her other captive.
131132111.content:
Serana gasps in panic as the delicate hands hover inches from her taunt abdomen. "Oh no. No, no, no..." she giggles as the fingers wriggle menacingly in the air. Then she screams in ticklish laughter as they dance across her skin, flickering so fast you can barely keep up with their movement. For a few moments, though probably far long for the bound girl, the fingers tickle everything from her hips to armpits. Then they disappear beneath the surface, leaving Serana a giggling wreck. "Nohot fahair." she giggles.

You gasp as you feel a serpentine form wrap around your lower body, slippery and warm to the touch. The water surface in front of you breaks and red hair followed by a pale face rise in front of you. It's human. A human girl, smiling cutely at you. She looks a few years yet from her twentieth birthday which would make her slightly younger than you. Looking down into the water you can make out her shoulders and something wrapped around her breasts to afford her modesty- not that she granted you two the same courtesy.

"Hi." the girl beams at you in a way that's too damn adorable.

"Er- hi?" She giggles at your apparent confusion.

"I'm Melody." she tells you excitedly. "What's your name?"

"Teyla."

"Hi Teyla! Do you want to play?" The way Serana is grinning in anticipation concerns you greatly.

"Erm-"

"Don't worry. I'll start gently." Your eyes widen as you feel those little fingers slide ever so slowly up and down your belly. You snigger then giggle as they trace a ticklish path up and down your ribs then trail across your midriff. At the same time something with a silken touch brushes incessantly across your feet. The result of all this is you giggling with eyes screwed tightly shut, wriggling and squirming for all you're worth.

"Wow, you're really ticklish! More ticklish than Serana!" She stops and giggles. "But I need to make sure first."
131132111.title: Melody

choices: A pair of pale hands rise from the water either side of Serana
You yelp at a tickly sensation down you ribs
13113212.content:
"A fellow adventuress then?" Serana nods. "Stray to close to the water?"

"Yeah. I think I hit my head on the bottom. When I woke up-" You do your best to shrug but instead lower yourself slightly further into the water. "Who did this to us?"

A wry grin spreads across her face. "I'd tell you," she smirks, "But it'd be more fun to let you find out for yourself. And seeing as she's heard us talking she'll probably be here any moment." Sure enough...
13113212.title: "Roran"

1312.content:
A slime tongue runs itself along your foot cuasing a slight giggle to come from you. You try to ignore it but soon more tongues join in as well as hands and tentacules. Soon your feet are covered in tongues and the hands and tentacules begin to tickle your legs which sends you over the edge. Your unable to hold on to the edge and soon your swarmed with the creatures that were attacking your lower body and soon your whole body is covered in tongues, hands, and tentacules. this is to much and you pass out.

You wake up tied to a post in a room with a fire on the far side and you can make out the creatures that attacked you. They are humnoid but with pale blue skin and several varying mutations which are the same body parts: tongues, hands, and/or tentacules. Suddenly one appears in front of you and begans to inspect you (which invole tickling in several places). It looks content and tells you...
1312.title: You Feel Something...

choices: "I admit to your capture. Take me to your Master."
"I will not submit to any of you!"
13121.content:
You shake your head slightly as you try to get your bearings. The last thing you remember was falling through a hole in the floor of the storeroom… your tunic getting caught on a jagged edge, exposing your belly and chest. Then a tongue, followed by hands and… tentacles? Ran all over your body, sending you into fits of laughter. What felt like delicate fingers gliding over your quivering bare belly, a tentacle wriggling under your arms, another hand pinching at your thighs… it was all too much. You realize you must have passed out. And now here you are, tied to a pole. Your hands are high above your head, and your tunic is now in rags, covering little more than your shoulders. At least your pants and boots are still on and intact, you think ruefully.

You glance up at your… attackers? They must be, to still be here with you captive. How could you be so stupid, to be captured so easily? But… captured by what? You squint in the darkness, trying to make out the forms in the flickering firelight of their camp. Despite being in some sort of underground chamber beneath the storeroom (unless you have traveled quite far), the fire does not seem to smoke up the room. Indeed, there seems to be no smoke at all. What trickery is this?

You realize the answer may be due to your non-human captors. There are four of them, all having pale blue skin covering their bodies. They are all female, covered in barbarically primitive furs, one wrapped around each chest, another hanging low over their hips. However, they all look quite different for being of the same species.

One of them has four, no six arms! You see her fiddling with something over the fire, each arm seemingly going about its own task in an impressive display of multi-tasking. Another has no arms, instead a panoply of tentacles appear where arms should be. Writhing in perhaps a nervous manner, you can't tell how many tentacles there are in the dim light. The last two seem normal aside from the blue skin. At least, until you see them pick up a bone, licking it clean of meat. Long, dexterous tongues fall out of their mouths, wrapping the bone and scouring it of nutrition. The two strange women seem oblivious to the outside world, their eyes closed, as they lick up their dinner. You shudder and hope those aren't human bones.

Then the six armed woman notices you, standing up from her fire and approaching you. Shirking back, you realize all these women are a head taller than you, and each likely more than a match in a fight. The blue woman stops in front of you, stretching her top arms behind her head, her middle arms leisurely scratching her belly, her lower hands on her hips in a strangely fascinating display.

"Human" She growls at you, revealing her teeth. "You have been captured by we Blue Ogres. You will admit to being our property, and we will take you to our Master. She will know what to do with you."

Blue Ogres! Now you understand the situation. These women were human once, until some black magic removed their inhibitions and their will, transforming them into the thrall of their Master. Clearly, this master must be some kind of sorceress or witch. Now, these half-demons must want to take you to her, maybe even to change you into one of them! You certainly can't allow that, but what can you do? She asked you to admit to being a slave… of course! The thrall must submit before becoming a Blue Ogre. Thankfully you still remember the legends.

You try to think quickly as you notice the ogress starting to glare at you. It might be best to be taken to their Master and try to talk with her. Then again, if you do that, you might put yourself in too much risk. Would it be better to meet such a powerful Wizardess, or take your chances with these four intimidating creatures? Before the Ogress gets any angrier, you open your mouth to speak.
13121.title: Blue Ogres

choices: Attempt to bluff them with the prospect of treasure
131212.content:
"I will not submit to any of you!" You shout!

The cavern echoes with your defiant exclamation. The three other ogresses turn their attention to you, hungrily.

The multi-appendaged leader glances back at them, smiling for a moment, before turning back to you.

"You will submit to all of us," she hisses devilishly, lunging toward you!

Her arms are a blur as they shred what's left of your tattered tunic and pants.

Without missing a beat, the other's tentacles dart into your armpits and flick teasingly at your nipples! There's not even time to take a breath before you begin laughing helplessly, twisting and jerking against the pole to which you'd been anchored.

You barely even notice when one third of the leader's arms divest you of your boots ... at least until a pair of lissome tongues begin licking at your bare feet, flicking hungrily between your toes. Your high-pitched squeals of laughter begin to border on the extra-aural at that point. And this only seems to encourage your tormentors to an ever more violent frenzy of tickling!

The cavern seems to swirl dizzily around you as your naked body is held immobile by an array of well-muscled arms and prehensile tentacles. Between bouts of eyes-shut, screaming laughter, you catch glimpses of maniacally grinning, blue, feminine faces, licking their lips excitedly, waiting for you to break.

You nearly lose your mind when one of the pernicious tongues darts between your legs, while no less than three hands poke expertly at your under arms!

In a moment of clarity you think Treasure! Blue Ogres love nothing more than treasure! You'll entice them to relent with the promise of riches!

Or was that Ochre Boggards that love treasure? Hmmmmm ...

You edge closer to delirium, bucking helplessly against the unceasing onslaught of ogre tickling. You'll need to think of something; bluff them or submit before you're left a naked, babbling heap in this gods-forsaken cavern!
131212.title: "I will not submit to any of you!"

13122.content:
You are taken down long passages that are carved out of the rock, but it looks like something organic not machinary. You pass several doors, some with screams of laughter coming out of them and others whimpers of fear. You also notice several other chambers with no sound coming from them and you notice your being taken to one of them. You try to figure out whats going on before your thrown into the cell and are suddenly knockedout by something big.

You wake staring into the eyes of an
13122.title: Bring him to the cells

choices: Someone knocks you out from behind
You hear a noise from the iron maiden
132.content:
Since the entrance below had already been uncovered, you're sure that the store rooms have already been cleared out. The catacombs might have something, but you decide to check out the dungeon to see if you can get lucky.

Following the winding passages, you open the thick door to the dungeon and step in.

It's exactly as you expected. Thare are several cells to hold prisoners in one corner, and through out the room are devices to bind and torture them. Just in a cursory glance you instantly recognize the stocks, the rack, a closed iron maiden, and shackles all along the walls.

As you continue forward...
132.title: Explore the dungeon

1321.content:
A sharp pain one moment, and in the next... darkness.

In what feels like just a moment, you slowly open your eyes, cringing from the stinging pain on the back of your head. You try to rub it, but something holds your arm in place. The jingling of a chain causes you to snap your eyes wide open and look at yourself.

You realize that you've been placed on the rack in the dungeon. Your ankles are locked in stocks at the foot of it, while your arms are chained above your head to the roller above your head. The chains have been tightened a bit, but you still have enough slack to move your body a bit.

Speaking of body, you also notice that you're missing some clothing. Your shirt has been removed as well as your boots and socks. Luckily, your pants are still intact.

Your torch has been placed in one of the holders along the wall, illuminating the room a bit, but still casting most of it in shadow.

You struggle a bit more until the rattling of your chains draws the attention of the one who attacked you. You can just barely make out a form standing at the edge of the darkness.

It takes a step closer, revealing...
1321.title: Knocked out

choices: Lie to her about finding treasure
13211.content:
It’s a woman. And a well-armed one at that. She brandishes a large spear decorated with feathers and other trinkets, and her body is covered with form-fitting plated armor. Even in the dim light, you notice just how shapely her curves are. You can’t see her face very well, but a cascade of brown hair is splayed out over her shoulders.

“Ahhh. Well, well...” she murmurs in a haughty but playful voice. She notices that you’ve come to, and strides over to you, armour clattering with each step.

“A fellow treasure hunter is it?” she coos, standing over your chained form. “Or is it a lost researcher, seeking the wisdom of the ancients?”

Her eyes are a deep blue, and her face is quite stunning - save for the battle scars across her cheeks. She tucks her ornate spear under her arm, and waves its tip towards you.

“Or perhaps a shape-shifter, looking for new prey to enslave?”

“N-no! I’m no monster,” you stutter, pulling against the manacles binding you. “I’m just looking for treasure, same as you.”

Your captor chuckles, her armour rattling with her voice. “Of course, that’s just what a shape-shifter would tell me.” She kept her spear trained on you, but you could see the flicker of a smile on her lips.

“Tell you what, my friend - or whatever you may be,” the woman said, barely suppressing a giggle. “Give me whatever treasure you’ve found already, and I may just believe you.”

Your stomach turned over. You had just arrived at these god-forsaken ruins when you were knocked out. What possible treasure could you offer her?

“Uhh, well,” your eyes search the barely-lit dungeon for some kind of answer. Your bare chest is mere inches from your captor’s spear tip, and there is no way you could elude this clearly experienced adventurer.

What do you do?
13211.title: A female adventurer

choices: "You're actually telling the truth, aren't you?"
"You're lying, I'll need to loosen your tongue."
132111.content:
"Fine, you got me, I did find some treasure," you reply, figuring that a bold-faced lie might be the only way out of here unscathed.

"Well, go on then! Tell me where!" The female adventurer, jabbing the spear inches away from your face.

Sweat trickled down your brow as you thought wildly, thinking for a way that you could make her let you go. If you told her where this "treasure" was, you'd be banking on the female adventurer's good will to let you go, which frankly did not seem like a very good gamble. She was likely to either just leave you shackled or just kill you.

"Talk!" She barks. Although you're a treasure hunter in you're own right, you can't help but think this woman's ruthless ways are a bit extreme. Time to lie.

"I found this treasure room, full of these golden statues. I was going to hire some mercenaries to help me clear the room." you say, inventing wildly.

The female adventurer scratches her chin. "Why didn't you bring any of this treasure with you? I've searched your stuff," she says, kicking your bag of belongings disdainfully.

"There were these two guards there, and I didn't think I could take them. Look at me!" You laugh nervously, you see the adventurer glaring at you, still stroking her chin.

"You know... I think..."
132111.title: Lie to her about finding treasure

1321111.content:
"Unfortunately," you sigh. "If I could have gotten the treasure myself, I would have."

It looks like she's buying it! She begins freeing your ankles from the rack.

"I knew there was treasure down here," the female warrior admits, unshackling one of your wrists, "it was only a matter of time before I found it."

She smiles at you mischievously as she starts winding a length of coarse rope around your free hand.

"Hey," you groan, "that's not necessary."

"Maybe not," she replies, unshackling your other hand and then roughly binding both hands together behind your back. "but a girl doesn't get very far adventuring trusting strangers."

You can see the sense in that and grumble quietly as she winds the rest of the rope around your waist, pinning your wrists to the small of your back, leaving a length of several feet with which to humiliatingly lead you around.

"Now," she says, "let's get this treasure."

You gulp nervously, and head off in a random direction.

After a seeming eternity of winding corridors and ancient, dust-laden chambers, your captor begins to grow impatient.

"I'm beginning to doubt the veracity of your claim," she says through clenched teeth, eyeing you angrily.

You pass a dismal, lichen-infested wall with a number of slime-black skeletons dangling by their wrists and ankles from dark iron chains set in the ceiling. Several pairs of manacles hang empty over piles of long-ago-rotted remains.

"Maybe I'd be better off leaving you here with these lonely fellows," she says, pointing at a pair empty manacles in a crowd of menacingly grinning skeletons.

"No, no!" You reassure her, working feebly at your bindings, "it's just up through here. Or very close past that ... as I recall!"

As you wander deeper into the ominous catacombs you notice a faintly glimmering symbol on a wide flagstone in the middle of the path ahead. A Rune Trap!

The sultry warrior's foot hovers inches above the rune. Do you warn her or leave her to her fate?!
1321111.title: "You're actually telling the truth, are...

13211112.content:
You are giddily silent as the coarse warrior steps unwittingly onto the glowing rune.

Instantly there is a flash of eldritch light! Spectral shackles erupt from the moldering stone of the passage and clamp around the stunned woman's wrists and ankles, suddenly going taut, pulling her into an uncomfortably tight X.

Her spear clatters to the ground and the end of rope with which she'd been leading you drops with a dull thud.

"What in the name of The Six?!" she shouts. How interesting!

In a flash you've freed yourself from the rope with the angrily struggling brunette's discarded spear. You stand rather gloatingly before your helpless ex-captor.

"Ah! You tricked me! You filth!" The woman spits. "I should have killed you!"

Her plate armor, you notice, would fetch a decent price in the bazaar. Enough for some drinks and lovely company at the Inn anyway.

Ignoring her venom and vituperative, you casually strip her of every last shred of valuable apparel: plate armor, chain shirt, silk breeches, riding boots, et cetera. Very quickly she's completely naked and exceptionally livid! She strains and struggles against the spectral shackles, shouting unspeakably indecent things at you while her ample breasts and thighs bounce enticingly. You wish to the gods the rune had included a spectral gag.

Then you hear the sound of grinding stone.

Both of you look down the hall and see, erupting from a secret antechamber, a shambling rabble of desiccated corpses, their fingers wriggling menacingly on their outstretched hands. Tickle Ghouls!

Most likely these abominations will swarm the naked warrior and tickle her to death! This will, of course, give you ample time to escape, but it's also kind of a rude thing to let happen to someone.

The warrior quickly shifts from defiant to pleading to promising you the fulfillment of your wildest desires if you can save her from this fate worse than death.

You do recall a simple incantation that can dispel most varieties of otherworldly shackles. But you also can't help but notice the warrior's impressively muscled arms and legs ... After all, she may be a bit upset about being tricked, stripped and robbed.
13211112.title: Let her trip the trap

choices: The spell works, and she is free.
The spell fizzles, ineffective against the Otherworldly shackles.
132111121.content:
Letting someone fall prey to Tickle Ghouls was indeed a fate worse than death, and despite all the grievances the female adventurer had put you through, you decide that it wasn't a fate even she deserved. However, you wouldn't dare let her think she could easily sway you.

"Y'know," you say softly as you collected her things, "I believe I could indeed dispel this trap..."

"Well do it then! And hurry!" she shouts, the panic in her voice slowly rising as the Ghouls shamble their way towards you both. You were fortunate in the fact that Ghouls are incredibly slow, the tradeoff being they were absolutely relentless. It gave you ample time to act quite casual.

"But how would I know you wouldn't betray me the moment I undid those binds of yours?" you remark smugly as you put the helmet she once wore on your own head. It was a tight fit, but it wasn't like you were going to keep it after all this regardless.

"What?! I...I would never do that!" she stammers, looking between you and Ghouls rapidly. Time was starting to run out. "Besides, how could I possibly defeat you when you've taken all of my equipment from me? You've left me defenseless!"

You shrug, doing your best to not look convinced. " I think I'll leave you to your fate..." You spin quickly on heel, making it seem as if you were really leaving.

"No! Please! Please have mercy on me!" She cries, panic overtaking her. The Ghouls were not but a few minutes away now from having her in their grasp. She looks at you with tears in her eyes. "Please! I'll do ANYTHING!"

You glance back. "Anything?...Swear on the very Gods themselves that you won't betray me after I save you along with this "Anything", and I shall consider it..."

"I swear! I Swear by the Six that I'll do whatever you want and won't betray you JUST HURRY UP AND HELP ME!"

You loudly sigh, as if truly weighing the options, although you already have decided to save her form this fate. "...Alright. It is a deal." With that, and with the Tickle Ghouls only a couple feet from the brunette adventurer, you mutter in the Old Language the spell that you hoped would free her...
132111121.title: Attempt to dispel the Shackles

1321111211.content:
Just as the Tickle Ghouls had closed in on the adventurer woman, your spell causes the spectral shackles to vanish into oblivion. The warrior falls to the ground, and immediately upon her landing you grab her arm, pulling her to her feet.

"Come on then! Lets get out of this accursed place!," you shout, to which the woman quickly agrees. You both quickly dash down a nearby corridor, frantically trying to put as much distance between the Ghouls and yourselves as possible. It is not until after you ran down many different twisting paths and through as many different doors and corridors as you could before you allow yourselves to catch your breath.

"Well..." you huff, leaning against the wall to help support yourself. You weren't used to running with all of this heavy equipment in tow. "You alright?"

"Ye...Yeah..." The adventurer says softly. She must still be somewhat shocked considering her close encounter with a fate worse than death. "I'm fine now..." She leans against the same wall you are, and slowly slides onto a sitting position on the floor. You become aware of how utterly quiet everything is, and slowly sit down, still a bit winded from all that running. The silence soon becomes fairly awkward.

It was a moderately long pause before the female warrior broke the silence. "...Why?" she asks.

"Why what?" you reply, turning to face her in the eye. She looks at you, and you can't help but notice how very deep and blue her eyes were.

"Why didn't you leave me to die? No thief worth their salt would do such a thing. You had my armor and my weapon and could have sold it for a hefty sum. You could have let me be a distraction to allow yourself to search for more treasure within these crypts. There were a lot of benefits to leaving me there. And it's like you said, how can you trust I won't betray you?"

"Hey, humanity before treasure I always say," you reply, giving her a smirk. "Sure, you can call me a terrible treasure hunter, but what good is money if after all is said and done you're as evil as a mad warlock? I may loot old ruins and corpses, but that doesn't mean I have to be a bad person. And besides, I can get more treasure out of this place with a helping hand, am I right?"

The female adventurer chuckles softly, before replying to your explanation.
1321111211.title: Mercy

choices: Take a chance and ask anyway
Get out of there first then get all the time in the world to ask
13211112112.content:
"Not too many like you left in the world today." she replies.

"Eh I know, its a shame really." You respond. "Anywho in all that excitment and mad dashery I never caught your name."

"The name is Mjoll, I never much figured people wanted to know my name, Im kind of a low profile person."

"Why is that!?" You reply stunned "Girl with your looks is quit a find."

She giggles and says "Well thanks I just never desired the crowds, I like adventure, hence the reason Im here."

Well you didnt want to admit it but you were starting to like this girl, mostly because you were happy to have help, but also she had something about her that drew you in.

Also since she had basically sworn into your service you didnt have to wrry about her running off anytime soon.

You thought also about her ticklishness that you guessed was off the charts considering her reaction but you didnt know if now was the best time too broach the subject.
13211112112.title: "You're an honorable person."

choices: Let's just get out of here
132111122.content:
You cut your losses, gather her things, and scramble down the corridor, away from the ghouls. You hear her cry out to you, her pleas for help dissolving into helpless laughter.
You look back one last time as you're about to turn a corner to see her frantically writhing and crying with laughter as the ghouls swarm around her, their bony fingers scratching, tickling, and prodding at every inch of her naked body. Some are knocked down by others fighting for spots, only to reach up and claw at her bare soles. She looks back at you, desperation in her eyes as her they tear up from laughing. You almost feel sorry for her, but you remember, she did knock you out, strip you, and threatened you at spearpoint for treasure. Still, maybe you'll go back and help her later. Maybe.

You turn the corner and keep walking down the dank corridor, her laughter fading in the distance as you go. The corridor comes to a split, one leading to the exit from where you came, the other deeper into the catacombs, you think you see the flickering of torchlight deep inside. You could leave and pawn off your newly acquired loot, or go deeper, there might be even more valuable treasures to be had. You feel a lot safer with this spear in hand, as well.
132111122.title: Leave her to the ghouls

choices: No going back. Make up another lie!
No point in lying anymore. Admit that you lied earlier.
1321112.content:
She glares at you with a menacing face and says, "You're lying, aren't you?"

Darn! She didn't fall for it. Time for a comeback attempt. "N-no! It's there! I can show you the path as long as you let-"

She interrupts you, "No use telling me about where you wish it was. I'm gonna get that treasure." She slowly walks around your helpless form, still threatening you with her spear. She sees the discomfort in your face and says, "Don't worry, I'm not going to use my spear; I'm not that cruel. I have other ideas of interrogation..." She the spear on her back and you find a slight smile on her face.

Unfortunately, you knew what she meant. She creeped up behind you and began to rack her fingers up and down your sides. You burst out laughing and tried hopelessly wiggled in an attempt to escape your bonds.

After about half an hour, she finally stops and you breathe heavily while your face is already red and sweaty. "Ready to talk? I'm fine with either answer adventurer." You can't take anymore and struggle to say something.
1321112.title: Tickle Interrogation

choices: Struggle harder and try to escape
Try to talk you way out of this
132112.content:
“Well?”

Your captor is growing increasingly impatient with your attempts to stall. She threatens you with her spear once more, but perhaps you can plead a more convincing case if you simply tell the truth.

“I haven’t found anything yet, my Lady. You can threaten me all you like, but you clocked me before I could even begin to look.” You try to sound as forceful as you can, but being shirtless and bound to dungeon shackles doesn’t exactly lend a lot of strength to your voice.

Your nameless captor sighs, and takes her spear away from your chest. The feathered trophies dangling from the tip brush against your toes, and you try your best to stifle a laugh. It would not be prudent to let slip a weakness of yours in this state.

“You know what? I believe you,” she states sadly. She looks to your stolen garments, tossed haphazardly onto the dungeon floor. “From your shoddy clothing, I didn’t think you were very talented at finding treasure. And a shapeshifter would never pick a face so... cute.” She looked to you with what you could only describe as hunger.

“My Lady?” you ask, not liking her tone very much.

“Do you know the history of these walls?” she continued, glancing about the dungeon and the horrible contraptions strewn all around. “They say that the Dormduo people were hedonists and gluttons. They constantly sought pleasure - fashioning their very society to fulfill their basest needs. When these were satisfied, they sought even more extreme measures to gratify themselves. No songs are sung of the Dormduo; and for good reason. They were ravenous beasts, feasting on all that was good and pure in the world. In the end, it is said, they became so slothful that even their slaves were fat.”

You nod your head, not sure where this woman was going.

She removed her plated gauntlets, revealing long slender fingers. “They infuriated the gods with their actions – it is said that no mere mortal should experience the joys meant for the divine.” Your captor placed her gauntlets on the dungeon floor, and carefully picked one of the feathers out of her spearhead. “So they cast down a mighty fireball, and incinerated all who dwelled within these halls.”

Your captor stood silently for a moment, her blue eyes sparkling with the flames of the torch nearby.

“I was fortunate that day, my little prisoner.” Your captor smiled broadly at you.

“What?” You sputter, your stomach churning with a new fear. “That day? But that was hundreds of years ago!”

Your captor nods, and crouches down in front of your feet. You tense them, trying to pull away, but the stocks are secure. You can feel her breath on your trapped soles.

“Lucky for you, I was away when the gods slew my people.”

What happens next?
132112.title: Admit you have nothing

1321122.content:
“Whoa, slow down,” you plead, eying your captor with disbelief. “You’re saying you’ve been alive for hundreds of years?! That’s impossible!”

A long slender finger was hovering above your defenceless toes, eager to start what you imagine would be a torturous attack. In her other hand, she held a long delicate feather plucked from her spear. Now that the woman was so close, you could sense something unearthly about her.

“What do you think a hedonist seeks most of all?” she asked, her fingers teasing your bare soles. You felt the soft touch of her fingernail, which sent a spasm up your leg. You bit your lip, desperate to remain calm and in control.

“Pleasure? Gratification?” her voice was almost hypnotic, and her eyes peered deep into your soul. With the feather, she applied a quick stroke on your other foot, sending yet another burst of sensation up your body. Just the mere threat of her tools sent a shudder through your spine.

“No. Pleasure is fleeting – momentary. This world, and all of its denizens - from lowly man to mighty beast - exist for a brief flicker. What pleasure can be found when death hangs over all of our heads? Oblivion stalks us, and there is no escape from the curse of mortal flesh.”

Her voice had turned melodic, and you felt yourself weaken against her words. Her fingers, dancing achingly close, almost beckoned your feet to accept their touch. You knew you had to resist, or your mind would be lost forever to this woman – this creature.

“So we, the Dormduo, hedonism incarnate, sought pleasure eternal. Our magics were strong, and we broke through the barriers of this mortal world and breached the heavens. We stole the very life essence of the gods. Not to destroy them, nor even to rule over them,” her eyes flashed a pale blue in the dim torchlight. “But to rule over death itself, and prevent our pleasure from ever ending.”

She flashed a wicked smile, and you felt the last of your resistance melt away.

“And now, I’m going to give you a taste of what I’ve spent centuries perfecting – pleasure absolute. Tell me, young one,” commanded the creature, whatever she was. “What do you seek?”
1321122.title: Thief of the Gods

"I... I seek pleasure. Just as you." you stuttered out, almost in a trance.
"Good." The woman purred. She stroked the feather up your defenseless sole.
You let out a stream of giggles, unable and unwilling to contain them. Her fingers scratched, moving upward on your foot, like a machine. The way her fingers moved were like a spider, and the motion of her fingers which stroked downward toward your heel opposed to her hand moving upward was driving you crazy, yet... it was in a good way. Your body involuntarily twitched, even though you were beginning to enjoy the stroking, the feather (which was now sawing in between your toes), and most of all... you enjoyed the fact that this woman was doing it. Her skill, her strange aura, it was strange but benevolent, and you wanted it to continue. Instead of blocking out the sensations and resisting the laughter as you did in the beginning, you now embraced them. You didn't feel the restraints were necessary, but they were nice to have in order to tame your twitching body. You were laughing in earnest, but all the sudden, the tickling stopped, and sanity returned.

All of the sudden, thinking back, tickling is torture for you! How could this woman do this to you?! But at the same time, now a second voice in your mind countered. Wait... this wasn't in your mind, this woman was whispering in your ear!
"The tickling IS torture, but you love it. You think your tickler is cruel, but you want her to go on," she cooed, and ran one dainty finger through your underarm, going in circles and drawing shapes, very, very gently, teasing, no, tantalizing your flesh.
"Yes, you are perfect. Ticklish all over aren't you?" she asked rhetorically, before scribbling on your bare midsection and earning more reactions. Taking an opportunity to speak, you ask, "Why are you doing this? Why me? What gives you such pleasure?"
"I simply enjoy tickling attractive people, such as yourself. It gives me pleasure to inflict such sensations upon others, while it gives your pleasure to have these sensations inflicted. For mortals, death may be an end to pleasure and it may be inescapable, but that's all the more reason to enjoy what you can while you can, so I love mortals especially. Now, if there are no more questions..." she straddled your waist, pressing your body against the rack, "I think I'll get back to your feet later. Lets see what your upper body has to offer."

With a quick flex of her fingers, she slowly reached out for your....

"Come on, laugh for me, " the ticklish torment was getting unbearable as you ultimately break into giggles.

You could hear a playful giggle from her as she delights at your torment. Your eyes traced her fingers as best as they could as she reached out for...

choices: She reaches out for your upperbody
She slithers down to your feet
13212.content:
The first thing you notice is the lack of any footsteps, and as the figure steps into the light, you realize why.

It's a Lamia. The bottom half of a snake, the upper half of a woman.

And a rather attractive one at that. Long, unruly green hair the same shade as her scales, porcelain white skin, and red eyes. A thin strip of torn cloth wraps around her chest to cover her breasts.

She slithers up to your side and looks down at you. You're unsure whether she's deciding what to do with you, or what spices to eat you with.

"Sssso, what are you doing in my home," she asks, her forked tongue slipping out ocassionally as she speaks.

Seeing no point in lying, you respond honestly. "Well.. um.. looking for treasures. Surely there must be some that haven't been looted yet."

She shakes her head, seemingly not caring about your hunt for riches. "You mussst never return. Thisss is my home."

"Okay, okay, I won't! Just let me go then," you say.

She holds up a hand and waves a finger at you. An interesting hand, you notice that she has six fingers instead of five. Her nail, long and painted green, is curled slightly like a claw.

"In time. Firssst you mussst be punissshed..."
