Twelve curved nails make contact with your bare torso and you quiver in anticipation. With six points on your right rib and another six on your belly, you shift uncomfortably in your bonds. Struggling as much as able, you find it near impossible to shake your pitiless tormentor. Wherever you move the claws seem to follow quickly behind. Nevertheless you did manage to lose them a few times, earning you fractions of a second before they found you again and continued their unrelenting tickles.

An eternity seems to pass before the hands cease. In reality your anguish only lasted about ten minutes, but you can't accept that. Once you manage to bring your giggles under control, you look up to see the Lamia's scowling face.

"No no no, thisss won't do," she said, disappointed. Slithering closer to the top of the rack, she begins to turn a wooden handle attached to the roller to which your hands are chained. Your arms are pulled even higher than before, to the point that movement is nigh impossible.

The Lamia's head re-enters your line of sight. "That'sss better. I can't have you ssslipping away from me," she tells you softly, hands reaching for either underarm. "Now let mer hear your laughsss. Laugh for me!"

Your torment resumes, howls of laughter forced by the skillful traces in the hollows of your arms. Nearly completely unable to move, you are forced to experience the truly unrelenting torment of the vengeful Lamia, who seems to enjoy your hysteria a great deal. Hidden deep within the sounds of your forced mirth, you hear her humming a happy tune to your torture.

The circles in your armpits become scratches on your ribs, with the occasional hand wandering down to your belly. Multiple times a fingernail dips into your navel, always causing your laughter to increase. Minutes pass, and your unwavering tormentor doesn't pause for a second. Your sides begin to ache from laughing for so long.

Finally the sensations stop. Even though it takes another minute to register, you finally find some respite. The break lasts long enough for you to gather your breath and look up at the Lamia, wondering whether she'll let you go.

She turns and slithers down to the foot of the rack where your ankles are locked in stocks, spread just far enough that you cannot shield one with the other. Your brows furrow in confusion as she peers down at them.

"Feet are sssuch an interesssting part of humansss," she says. "You walk on them all day, and yet you try ssso hard to keep them sssoft... and sssensitive..."

Suddenly, the tips of twelve nails begin to scurry up your soles. Your back arches the most it can before you burst out laughing, shaking your feet about wildly.

She changes tactics, allowing her nails to spider-tickle lightly along your feet, chasing them as you try to get away. More often than not you end up pressing your feet harder into her nails in your desperate attempts to defend yourself.

"What is it you humans sssay? Ah, yesss... kitchy kitchy koo...!" she taunts you, her grinning visage an obvious sign that she's enjoying herself immensely. You, on the other hand, are laughing helplessly, already wishing that you had been eaten rather than punished.

A new sensation appears, and taken by surprise you howl with laughter. Lifting your head up, you struggle to see what it is.

The lamia is leaning in and flicking the tips of her thin, split tongue along the undersides of your toes of one foot. You curl your toes down, but the tiny points easily slip between them and tease the sensitive skin hidden there.

She finishes quickly, leaving your toes bent back slightly, but more importantly it also keeps your soles almost completely immobile.

13212222.title: She goes to get something to help her

132122222.content:
…foolish girl for entering my territory!” she exclaims smiling and hissing at you. She drag her tickling instruments up and down at a faster pace. She seems to hate your guts for entering her chambers/turf.

“The very reason why you should be punish!” your slim body began to move around as your feet was at her mercy. They weren’t small nor were they large. Your mouth was getting dry as your sides were now aching. The lamia stops letting you breathe.

She then moves back down to your feet and uses the pen to draw smiley faces anywhere she could. Ending it by using the pen to draw ten little smiley faces on the pads of your bound toes. "There. Now you have some nice, happy feet."

You struggle with every pen stroke, but you wonder if it's even worth fighting anymore. You are firmly, thoroughly trapped in the clutches of this lady. Yours thoughts race and you wonder if you should just give in and submit yourself to her...

13213.title: Something/Someone else

1322.content:
There is a bang from inside the iron maiden. You jump and spin to face it, eyes wide, frozen in place.

"H-Hello?" you shakily call out.

"Is... is someone there?!" came a muffled reply from inside the torture device. A feminine voice.

Curious, you make you way over to it. The iron maiden has the etched figure of a person on it, no doubt a reference as to where that person's limb would be inside of it.

"I'm here," you respond.

"Oh thank god! I.. I don't know what happened. I was exploring this place when something hit me from behind, and then I woke up inside this thing! Get me out," she frantically calls out, knocking her hands against the inside.

You peer over the iron maiden, seeing the simple latch on the side that held the device shut. It wasn't locked, but was impossible to open from the inside. However, you also notice several latches placed over the iron maiden in key spots.

Curious, you pull one open on the side, and it pulls open a small piece of the iron maiden, revealing tanned bare skin inside. You realize that it's the occupant's lower hip, identical in placement to the etching on the front of the torture device. No doubt it was designed to torture the person inside without letting them go.

It suddenly occurs to you that you could do anything you wanted to her and she can't stop you, nor would she ever see your face.
1322.title: The iron maiden

13221.content:
"...H-Hello? Are you still out there?" she asks worriedly. You keep quiet as you open up more of the latches, revealing portions of her body around her sides, stomach, knees, thighs, and breasts. Even then, there are a few latches still left shut. Perhaps you'll open them when you want a new place to take advantage of.

Interestingly enough, it seems she has been placed inside naked. The device tightly presses in on her, and her arms appear pinned behind her where she can only move her hands, allowing you full access to any uncovered spot.

You don't respond. Rather, you reach out and wiggle a finger into her navel. She squeals and tries to suck in her stomach, but it comes right back out as giggles begin to flow.

A quick squeeze to her hip makes her shriek, and you surprise her again by lightly running all ten fingers along her inner thighs. She giggles like a lunatic, but two bars inside the iron maiden prevent her from squeezing her legs shut.

Your fingers glide effortlessly along her supple, soft skin, and everywhere you go seems extremely sensitive, but where will you concentrate for now?

13222.content:
"Ok, I'm going to get you out of there!" you tell her. Left alone, she'd probably die in there. It's not like she's done anything bad to you, and she might be able to help you navigate this dungeon.

"Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you! I feel like I've been in here for an eternity!" she cries, probably ecstatic that someone's come along. You undo all the latches, and prepare to over the heavy iron coffin.

"Alright, I'm going to open it, hang out!" you shout, and tug on the iron maiden with all your might. After some initial resistance it finally opens, the force knocking you to the floor.

"Ah, finally! I'm finally free! Oh, it feels so good to stretch." she exclaims. As you look up at the figure before you, you see....
13222.title: Release her

132221.content:
A lithe redhead, wearing a bodice of thin leather, and thin-soled leather sandals: a thief, how fortuitous!

She introduces herself as Malneria, in a thick Ghentish accent. Almost immediately she begins babbling vapidly about her previous adventuring party and their misfortune in the Dormduo Ruins.

Apparently she was traveling with a half-elven sorceress and a stout warrior from the Entherlaands. She was inspecting the iron maiden for traps when she "somehow" became trapped and her party was "unable" to free her and continued on.

The way she prattles on, ignorant of the traps and pitfalls that surround you as you head further into the ruins, makes you think perhaps she's not the greatest of thieves and her previous party locked her in the iron maiden to get her out of the way.

She talks incessantly, oblivious of her surroundings, while the two of you delve deeper into the catacombs. It takes all of your concentration to keep her out of trouble (some thief!), even though you're constantly distracted by the flimsy strip of leather barely covering her backside.

You hear the sound of muffled laughter and follow it through a labyrinthine corridor, shushing Malneria all the way.

The two of you step into a huge, vaulted chamber. The stonework there glows with an eerie green-blue phosphorescence.

In the middle of the room you see a stunningly beautiful woman with slightly elvish features. She is wrapped head to toe in some sort of gossamer material, hanging several feet in the air, stretched out, anchored to ceiling and floor. Only the top of her head, her pale eyes and golden hair; her smooth underarms and small, pert breasts; her artfully manicured V of platinum pubic hair, and her delicate, flushing feet are spared from the flaxen cocoon.

Her eyes lock with Malneria's eyes, and a cacophony of muffled shouting erupts from her silken gag.

"Aledral!" Shouts the would-be thief, bounding toward her helpless cocooned friend.
132221.title: Another Adventurer

choices: Try and sneak deeper into the catacombs
1322212.content:
Malneria bounds into the dim-lit chamber!

Unsurprisingly, she is quickly swarmed by a coterie of half-elven half-arachnid monsters.

She squeals helplessly as the aberrations divest her of her clothing and cocoon her next to her friend.

She stares at you, hidden in the shadows, unintelligibly pleading through her silken gag.

Moments pass. You watch disinterestedly as the spider-elves remorselessly tickle torture Malneria and Aledral, poking expertly at their exposed armpits, feet, and asses.

You assume they're interrogating them, but you have no idea what they're saying. And, after almost an hour of incessant torture, you assume Malneria and Aledral don't either.

The sadistic spider-things flick and tease their stiff nipples and rake mercilessly over their armpits. They flick teasingly at their nethers and poke expertly at their helpless feet. Were it not for the thick web-gags, the room would be echoing with the screaming and pleading of the hapless women, but little more than muffled whining is audible.

Malneria looks pleadingly at you, her green eyes thick with laugh-tears, screaming into her web-gag, seemingly on the verge of unconsciousness.

Perhaps you could succor both adventurers, with a bit of ingenuity! Or sneak past the distracted spider creatures to the treasure most assuredly hidden in the depths of the catacombs.
1322212.title: Let Malneria go

choices: She pounces on you with surprising speed.
132222.content:
As the woman stretches, freed from the iron maiden, the first thing you notice is her clothing. Or rather, her lack of it. Whether she went so bare of her own volition, or was stripped prior to being incased in the iron maiden was impossible to say. Her womanhood protected by a loincloth kept up by a thin golden string around her waist, practically unnoticeable. A thick golden collar adorns her neck, inlaid with jewels and engravings in an alphabet unfamiliar to you. Two cloth straps, seemingly held in place by magic, fall one over each breast, covering her nipples but on the whole leaving quite little to the imagination. She wears nothing else, her tanned, chocolate skin a feast for the eyes. Her long, smooth legs; hourglass figure; taut midriff; and firm, full breast compose a beauty unrivaled for hundreds of miles.

Tearing your gaze from her body, the second thing you notice about her is that she is not quite human. Golden goat horns approximately a foot long spring from her forehead. Yellow cat eyes casually stare back at you, as she grins at you, barely exposing a pair of fangs. Its as though a demoness adorned styled herself an Egyptian goddess. She runs her long fingers through her ebony hair and takes a step toward you, pulling you out of your reverie.

"Do you like what you see, mortal?" she asks you playfully, continuing to stretch provocatively. Whether by magic or her feminine wiles, you find yourself unable to look away, captivated by her form. "You should, I'm quite beautiful, even by demon standards. ...Ah, so fun making the succubi squirm in jealousy. Hehehe." She giggles girlishly, a coquettish laugh that draw you in... as you begin to realize your vulnerability. Here you are with what appears to be a powerful demon, in a room filled with restraints and instruments of torture, and here you are sitting on the floor. "Someone's following me..." you mutter to yourself, just under your breath. You can hardly beleive the nerve of anyone trying to get the jump on you, and think that this shadow must be crazy. "What is the meaning of this?" You ask with a sneer, sword pointed at the shadow dangerously. The person puts it's hand on it's own sword and pulls it out, before shouting in a feminine voice,

"What are you talking about? This place is ripe for the picking, I've been waiting for this for weeks! I'll not let some wandering theif have Miranda the Shade's loot!"

"Hmmm..." You look around the room and see the shackles hanging on the wall. You almost shivered, torturing people was positively revolting in your book, which is when an old memory surfaced in your mind. You remembered the story of an Heiress to an old fortune, who was tickle tortured into reveiling the secret information on the fortune's location. The woman was left unscathed, and the thieves had they're treasure in the end, which sounded A-okay to you as long as you didn't have to really HURT anyone.

Thinking that this could work, you drag Miranda to the shackles on the wall. You have to lift her up to get her wrists, as the shackles are fairly high off the ground, but once you do you snap the shackles shut, locking her wrists in place. You grin, and look around for anything else you could use. As you glance around the room you see the stocks, and think that if her hands are immoble, it would be foolish to leave her legs unbound. After you admire her foot for a moment, you put it in place and remove her other boot, then put her other foot into place. Finally, you close the stocks and lock them tight, the only thing left to do is wait until she wakes up.

About ten minutes later, you hear Miranda begin to stir and moan, starting to wake up. A smile overtakes you as you think that this could be a lot of fun.

"Whaa...What the heck?!" She shouts, fully come to and realizing her situation. She tugs at her bonds to no avail, before throwing a glare at you.

"Surprised you're still alive?" You ask with a smirk.

Miranda's posture straightens and she slowly lowers the tip of her blade until it points at the ground.

"This is pointless," she says, frowning. "If we kill each other here, then no one's getting rich."

"Who says I'd lose," you counter, still keeping your sword raised. She shakes her head slowly with a sigh.

"Even if you didn't, you'd be too injured to make it out of here alive if you continue fighting with me."

You pause, then concede, lowering your own sword downwards. She had a good point about that. A lucky slash to your leg or arm would mean you would have to hold off your treasure hunting until another day, and by then it could be gone. There is no time like the present.

You sheath your blade, and Miranda does the same before stepping closer to you. Now that you aren't focused on her weapon you have a chance to get a good look at her. A thick belt around her waist holds several large, empty burlap sacks; undoubtedly for holding whatever she finds in the ruins. Her sword is sheathed in a scabbard which rests on her back.

"I'm glad to see that you're as smart as you are good-looking," she says with a smirk. You feel your face growing hot with a blush, which causes her to laugh.

"Um.. a-anyway..." you stammer to regain control of the situation. "Where should we be checking first? The store rooms are undoubedly empty, so there's probably some goods stashed in the cells. Perhaps in the bedding or behind loose stones."

Miranda's brows raise, obviously impressed. "Rightfully so. We should go deeper to where the more dangerous inhabitants were kept. That's where thieves who stole more important items were kept."

You frown and shake your head. "We should be checking the larger cells where they put people in temporarily. More prisoners mean more chances that someone left something behind."

She says, sounding stubborn. You shrug and nod, not wanting to make a big deal out of it. "Fine, there's a staircase over there, it should take us to the deep dungeons." you say.

"Right, I'll lead the way! C'mon. "Miranda says, apparently quite the dominant type. You shrug again and follow her down the steps. If there are any booby traps, she'll run into them first. As you walk the twists and turns of the downward passage, neither of you speak for a time. The light begins to grow dim as less and less sunlight trickles through the ruined stone walls and floors. You begin to notice the air becoming still, and the temperature rising with each step. While this is little more than a casual observation for you, you notice Miranda starting to breathe heavier, her shoulders slumping.

"Hey, Miranda, are you alright?" you ask.

"Its nothing! I'm just not used to this damned heat!" She tells you as she takes of her leather jerkin and tosses it in a passing cell. "Feh, my clothes aren't expensive. All that counts is the treasure.

"What if we meet someone down here? That jerkin is useful protection."

"I won't be any good in a fight if I'm half-dead from this heat, you know." Miranda says, wiping her brow. While the temperature increase is odd, you're surprised how much it affects her. It seems little more than a still summer day to you.

"Where are you from, that this heat bothers you so much?"

"I come from a village high in the Shining Mountains, where there is always sun but never warmth." she says, somewhat brusquely. That would explain her exotic appearance, and aversion to the heat. You recall something about the inhabitants of that isolated kingdom... some strange ritual or behavior they engaged in... just on the tip of your tongue, eluding your memory. Oh well, you think, it must not have been important.

"It's getting pretty dark now, I wish we had a torch." you say, concerned at the pitch black on the path ahead.

"Heh, once torch coming up." Miranda says, as she picks up a wooden pole in a nearby cell, breaking it in half. With a deft motion, she rips the lower third of her shirt and wraps it around the torch. Reaching into a sack on her belt, she pulls out a small canister and some flint. With a little dousing and a spark, she's created a very workable torch!

"Very impressive..." you tell her, grinning. Not only were you complimenting her handiness, but her ripped shirt now reveals her midriff, showing off a flat, athletic stomach in the flickering torchlight. She winks at you coyly as she turns to press onward. As the two of you round a corner...

132331111211.content:
You decide that resting can wait, at least until you get a look at the cells. Miranda, freed from the trap, stands up shakily and puts on what's left of her clothing. Your eyes can't help but linger over the exposed skin her top fails to cover, even though she was naked and writhing under your touch only a moment ago. Actually, probably because of that. You shake your head to clear your mind, its not something you should dwell on at the moment, you needed to focus.

"C'mon Miranda, let's look at those cells." you say, and she nods in the torchlight, following right behind you. Her change in demeanor surprises you, as if you flipped a switch of some kind inside her. But she other than fatigue and a bit of shakiness, she still seems able. Her dark eyes dart to and fro in the corridor the two of you enter, on the lookout for any more traps.

"The cells should be just one floor down" Miranda tells you quietly. "I'll search the ones on the left, and you can take the right. Ah… if it pleases you." You notice the vestiges of her alpha personality there, muted by the delayed polite deferral, her eyes cast downward.

"Yea, that sounds like a plan" you agree, seeing no reason not to. You notice her grin sheepily at your assent, and she nods. The two of you descend another staircase, and emerge into a wide hall with barred doors on either side. These were where the most dangerous criminals of Dormduo were kept. Or at least, that's what they say. You honestly have no idea what criteria were used to determine who were the deserving of such punishment in Dormduo.

You make eye contact with Miranda, and with a shared look you each take a side to search the cells. To your disappointment, most of the cells, at least on your side, seem to still be locked. But then you hear a grunt from Miranda and the sound of metal on metal. Turning around, you see Miranda pulling the barred gate to a cell right off its hinges. "Gods Miranda, how strong are you?"

Miranda turns and a wide grin spreads across her face. "Heh. Pretty strong, I'd say." Her face turns more serious. "But the hinges have rusted. We can't pick the locks, but a bit of force should pull the doors right off." You nod and try it on the first locked door on your side. It takes more than a few tugs, and you really need to exert yourself, but you finally manage to yank the rusty door off. The force of your pull sends you to the floor, falling on your rear as the door clangs next to you. Before you realize it, Miranda is at your side, grabbing your elbow to help you up and looking at you with a concerned look. "Are you hurt? Do you want me to do the doors?"

Your surprised by the tender display from the thief, and try to ease her concerns. "No, no. Just pulled too hard, I'm fine. Really!" Miranda nods, but you see her keep glancing at you out of the corner of her eye as you go back to it. You've learned that Miranda is a lot stronger than you are, but thankfully seems to be concerned for your well being.

You look in the first cell, and find little. The second and third are the same. Despite the doors being locked, you don't find the remains of any prisoners. No skeletons, nothing. While you're relieved to not have to deal with human remains, and be reminded of the worst parts of scavenging, it strikes you as very odd. The stories say Dormduo was capriciously governed, with the wanton oligarchy sentencing people for arbitrary offenses, and using the threat of punishment for personal gain. They also say Dormduo was destroyed suddenly in something disastrously magical. So where did the prisoners go?

You backtrack through your cells to try to find some clues and assuage your thoughts. Each cell contains some old straw bedding and a small wooden table. At the back of each are chains and shackles to put prisoners on the wall. You sift through the bedding in the first room. Underneath the straw you find clothing. Women's garments, and still brightly colored. They're fine silk of a bright scarlet color and gold trim, and look quite expensive. The only mitigating factor to the expensive clothing is that there isn't much to it. The top barely is a small sleeveless thing with a plunging neckline that barely covers the chest, and stops just below it to cover nothing else. The bottom is a short skirt that similarly leaves little to the imagination.

With a shrug, you stick both of them in your pouch. To your surprise, a similar search in the next few cells reveals the same thing: underneath the bedding are skimpy silk garments. In the second, black silk with silver trim; the third a deep blue… its very odd. You take them all, the silk takes up little space and looks like it'll fetch a nice price. But it makes you even more curious about what went on here. Did a nobleman imprison his entire harem? It certainly would be odd prison attire.

1323311112111.content:
You hear Miranda calling out to you, and you hurry over to see what's the matter. You find her at the end of her row of cells, each door pulled off its hinges and placed in a pile on the floor. While you had been introspective and doubled back, she had been singularly dedicated to the task. But as you come up to her, something does surprise you: Miranda is wearing the same kind of silk clothes you'd been finding in your cells and pocketing. This variant was jet black, with golden trim on its edges. She turns to you and catches your curious look.

"My clothing is worthless now." Miranda responds to the obvious question. "This is much more valuable, I might as well wear one of them out and have less to store. Besides, its actually quite comfortable." Well, it certainly makes her easy on the eyes. The top clings to her chest tightly, with a gold-rimmed 'V' helpfully guiding your eye to her distracting cleavage. The skirt exposes her smooth, tanned thighs, and between the two pieces you can see the entirety of her firm, and now you know quite sensitive, midriff. The black silk compliments her black hair and dark eyes, and the gold trim offsets her tanned skin quite nicely. It actually fits her very well, and you find yourself staring.

"I'm happy it pleases you." She says, now looking a bit sheepish again. The comment pulls you out of your reverie, and she also pulls herself up to continue. "I've finished my search. There's nothing in these cells but expensive silks. I expected them to either be empty or full of mummified corpses with jewels in their pockets. But these don't make much sense. Still, easy to carry and seems to be worth a pretty penny." You nod, and tell her your search turned up the same, and how you also found it odd.

"This place should have thieves and political prisoners." Miranda says pensively. "It makes me wonder if we're even in the right place." Her thinking aloud is stopped short by a yawn she fails to stifle, and you notice her arms quiver slightly. After your earlier… fun, and opening all these doors, you don't blame Miranda for being exhausted. You've been in Dormduo for hours, and the air here is rather stale. You realize that since coming down to these cells you've started to get rather sleepy as well.

"We should rest for the night." You say decisively. "We can figure it out tomorrow morning. Considering no one else has found these silks, we're probably the only ones to have made it down here. I doubt we have to worry about being stumbled upon." Miranda nods, although you think you still see a look of concern. "And if we're not moving around, we won't trigger any more booby traps." That seems to relax her a bit, and she nods. The two of you gather straw from the rooms to make a pile of it in the center of the room. While it might be easier just to sleep on it in a cell, you don't want to spent any more time inside a cell than you have to, ancient or not.

The two of you make a large pile of straw. The amount and thickness will make it more comfortable than what any of the prisoners had. It's old and musty, but you unfurl a small blanket from your supplies and lay it on your section of the straw. Miranda, apparently traveling lighter than, doesn't seem to have the luxury. She looks down at your blanket longingly, and you realize that the straw would be rather itchy on all that exposed skin she has now. Sighing, you tell her "Alright, Miranda, we can share the blanket."

She nods, and you roll over to make room on the small blanket for her. However, you're surprised when she cozies up to you, pressing her body against your back and spooning you from behind. An arm wraps around yours and over your chest in an embrace. But before you can say anything in protest, you notice Miranda's breathing become slow and regular. Either she had been far more tired than she was letting on, or she had the uncanny knack to fall asleep instantly. Either way, you decide not to wake her and resign yourself to the warm hug. Besides, it was actually quite pleasant. Miranda was beautiful, her bare skin there against the garments on your back, the soft silks cupping her chest alluringly… you shake your head to stop thinking about such things, and try to fall asleep.

Sleep comes to you quicker than you suspect. Either from the poor air or the exertion from earlier, you feel yourself falling into a deep slumber. However, it is not a dreamless one. You find yourself standing in the center of a room. Not a dungeon, but what looks like a luxurious bedroom of some kind. You feel soft carpet under your bare feet, although the dream prevents you from wondering about why you aren't wearing your boots. Or if any other clothing is missing. From the other side of the room, you see a feminine figure walk towards you, clad in the silk harem garments. Even before you can make her out, something makes you realize that she is...
1323311112111.title: Miranda calls out to you.

13233111121112.content:
You looked around the dream-bedroom. There was a very large, fluffy four-poster bed in the middle of the room. The entirety of the floor was composed of soft, fuzzy carpet that felt good on your bare skin. And the walls were lined with feathers, brushes, ropes, and all other sorts of ticklish equipment. You realized with growing arousal, that if somebody were tied to the bed, they would be completely at your mercy.

You see something move out of the corner of your eye, and with a huge smile, you turn your head to face Miranda. Dressed up in the revealing black and gold harem outfit she was wearing, only without shoes on, she approached you with a seductive grin on her face. When she reached you, she pulled you in for a kiss that should have been illegal.

As she pulled away, showing off your silly grin at the kiss you just received, she walked over to the wall to grab some silk rope, practically stalked back to you, and then grabbed your hand and started pulling you toward the bed. Not being a complete idiot, you quickly followed. As soon as you reached the bed, you kissed again, and then grinning impishly, you quickly tied her down so she couldn't stop you in the slightest. Taking the flirtatious wink and excited giggle as a sign to start, you quickly began tickling her...
13233111121112.title: Dreaming of Miranda

132331112.content:
As you fall for what seemed like an eternity, you awaken into the real world, blury vision begining to fade. You try to move your body, but are surprised to discover your arms are chained together at the wrist, above your head. You are on what feels to be a rack like object, your feet locked in stocks and bound together at the ankles simultainiously. To add insult to injury: you're naked! Straps are also wrapped around your body to prohibit your movement to wiggling toes and fingers to moving your head side to side, which you do next. As you do, you immeadiatly become go red in the face, as Miranda is in an identicle position to you, in every way, including the removal of her clothes.

"Wha-What's going on here!?" cries the furious Miranda, turning as red as you were.

"I don't know, I woke like this too!" you shout back.

As you two argue, a figure steps out from the Shadows! It's a...
132331112.title: Captives!

1323311122.content:
As the two of you shoot insults back at each other, a man who looks to have seen his fair share of years steps out from the shadows. His hair was black, but graying, and large of stature. He was clothed in average, everyday, if a beat beaten, garb, including a jacket, undershirt, trousers and boots. He smirks at the two of you as you notice him.

"What's the idea guy!?" Miranda spits, attempting to move in her bonds.

"Oh...nothing you need to know just yet..." he says, and places his hands which have eerilly long fingernails on the soles of Miranda's bound feet. The action quickly produces a soft gasp from the girl, before she goes, "Wwha, what are yo-Hahahaaahaah!!"

The man began to claw her feet, tickling them ever so slightly. Her feet were soft and pale, with a tinge of red from her recent activity. The soles of her feet, which were as creamy as milk, were slightly wrinkled from the moistere her boots once held in on her. "Oh...just having a bit of fun..." he goes, finishing playing with her feet, as he turns to you. "I mean, how could I not..." The man then attacks your feet, which prompts you into a hysterical fit of giggles. This goes on for half an hour, the man alternating between you and Miranda until...
1323311122.title: Mystery Man

13233111221.content:
Half an hour of torment later, you and Miranda both pant for breath, your feet having been viciously attacked in cycles.

"You produce such good laughter..." the man states, reaching into his pocket. Desperatly gasping for air, you don't realize until he does it what he's doing. Very thin and long, but strong leather strips are tied around every single one of your toes, pulling them back taught and tieing them off to rings fastened onto your stocks. The strips leave your sensitive feet completely helpless, as your toes being pulled back so far leave you unable to protect your vulnerable soles. Miranda goes white as she watches the man bind you, and then turn to her with the same plan in mind.

"No...I'll...I'll do ANYTHING! PLEASE DON'T!" she cries helplessly, tearing as the man begins pulling her elegant toes back and tieing them the same way. She moans as the process is finshed, and then yelps in laughter as he instantly begins torturing her feet with his nails.

"I'm afraid not," he goes, now using one hand on Miranda and one on you, extorting hysterical laughter from the both of you. "For you see, I'm no ordinary man. I'm a Mirth Shade. As can be implied, I feed off of laughter, which keeps me alive. I recall when the Dormduoians first summoned me from the Outerplane, I had a glorious feast, capturing each and everyone of them alive and tickling them 'till they died long and tortured lives! Ah, but I get so few visitors now. So I need to make every single one count." The Mirth Creature finishes his speech by producing an extra set of arms from somewhere, so as to tickle each of you with maximum efficiency. You and Miranda are helpless but to laugh and laugh and laugh, for a very, very long time.
13233111221.title: Forever Enslaved

choices: Locked in an Elaborate Set of Stocks
Tied to an Out-Of-Place fancy bed-set.
13233112.content:
So much for your efforts to leap backward, you think, as the ropes have already targeted you and lash around your wrists and ankles, binding you tightly. You struggle for a moment to find yourself hopelessly bound, with neither of the strong cords showing any slack. "Hey Miranda! Give me a-" but, you realize, Miranda is long gone. Her distinctive heels can be heard clacking away in the distance, getting fainter and fainter.

"Shit..." you mutter, realizing you are royally screwed. Your only hope is to somehow wiggle yourself all the back up the stairs and find a sharp enough edge to cut your ropes against. But, you don't notice that while you've been trying to come up with this hair-brained scheme, someone or something, had crept out of a hidden door disguised as the rocky walls of the extensive Dormduo Dungeons. Before you even notice, it thumps you hard on the head with a club of wood, making and audible WHAAACK noise, and knocking you out cold.

You awaken, hours later, to find yourself...
13233112.title: You get Caught Instead!

133.content:
It's likely all the low-hanging fruit has been picked, which would suggest against exploring the store rooms or even the dungeon. The humbler hamlets founded by those who managed to escape Dormduo's fall have produced a handful of looters whose superstitious dread is amply outweighed by their greed. Your easy entrance was doubtless provided by the competition.

As you follow down narrowing stairs and tightening passageways, you reach a point where the ashlars are lost beneath daubed plaster and the venerative shorthand of the pious. A rounded corridor proceeds through an ossuary, marking your entry to the catacombs proper.

You emerge in a gallery floored with smooth and intricately cut flagstones. Three passages are arranged before you in a semicircle.

To your left, the way forward is so heavily choked with cobwebs that you nearly dismiss that path as folly. Thinking twice, you realize it confirms that none have passed that way in some time, which may mean there are valuable items farther along, waiting to be claimed.

The central passage seems even less promising, the masonry chipped and fractured from floor to ceiling. It looks like a loud whisper would bring the entire thing down on your head. As with the cobwebbed corridor, it's possible that treasures are stacked up just beyond. For the adventurous.

The way to your right looks invitingly safe in comparison, but you see a distinctive rune scratched over the doorway. While stopped in the village of Cottenwilk to purchase horse feed and pad out your supplies, some of the locals spoke of a cult known to carry out bizarre rites in and around Dormduo's ruins. Perhaps you've stumbled onto them. And perhaps they'll be so distracted with their ceremonies that someone might slip in and help themselves to whatever catches their eye.

Which will it be?
133.title: Dormduo catacombs

choices: "...I'm after that trove!" (Phoebe wraps you up and tickles you)
"I came all this way just to give you a good tickling!" (Work Phoebe over)
"I'm getting out of here, right away!" (Random occurrence as you attempt escape)
1331.content:
You're not as squeamish about spiders as most folk, so you start batting your torch through the strands and push your way down the passage. The going's easier than you expected, if perhaps dustier. You keep a cautious eye out for spiders, but don't see even one.

As the path begins coiling more sharply downward, you step into an atrium that presents several more tunnels and crawl-ways. It might be prudent to break out the chalk and begin marking your progress.

Reaching into your pack, you feel someone tap you on the shoulder. You shout and jump high enough to just miss clipping your head on the ceiling.

"Greetings, stranger!" says a feminine voice.

You whirl and face exactly what you'd expected: a creature that's half girl and half spider. The arachnid portion is cobalt blue, its hair shining under your torchlight as the six legs dance a little jig of excitement.

The girl part, angling up from the pedicel, presents plenty of bare flesh. She's wearing a bandeau drowning in silver baubles that leaves her navel and arms free, and you can't believe you're noticing this detail in the face of a possible attack... but the smile and lack of any threat display calms you down. Her black hair is woven into an involved mop and secured with lengths of silk, fringe raked back from her forehead to expose the six simple eyes that are the only spiderish touch to her face. Her regular human eyes are blue, but glow red from your torch. You puzzle over the contrast.

"Shouldn't you have eight legs?" you ask her, keeping your cool.

"Well..." says the spider girl, waving her arms. "These count, too. My name's Phoebe."

"Of course it is," you say, eyes closed under an arched brow of disbelief. You introduce yourself.

"It's not often that humans wander down through all the lovely silk to pay me a visit," says Phoebe. "When they do, they're always looking for treasure. I then promptly tickle them to death, for their effrontery."

"You TICKLE them?" you ask, voice cracking on a high note.

"To death!" Phoebe affirms, raising her arms menacingly and showing all of her teeth. Her incisors look longish. "No, not really. That is, not 'to death'. Just until they agree never to waste my time chasing after trinkets, when a cordial visit to my lair is much more rewarding. Sad to say, I've never had anyone call a second time."

"Haven't any of your <ahem> 'visitors' tried to tickle you back?" you ask her.

"They'd be mad to attempt such a thing!" says Phoebe, elated with the suggestion.

"Phoebe, I have to admit..."
1331.title: Cobweb Passage

13311.content:
"...I'm here for your treasure," you say, though to be honest you aren't sure why. She just said that she tortures those who come for her treasure. Perhaps you feel confident that you can defeat her in battle, or at least evade her until you've filled your pouches and run.

She smiles at you, her arms folding casually under her bosom. "Ohhh really? Well, you do realize I will have to punish you, right? I have to admire your honesty, however. I'll tell you what... if you just give up now, I'll go easy on you and let you keep all your possessions. Usually I send my victims outside with nary an article of clothing left on them!"
13311.title: "...I'm after that trove!"

133111.content: "err... now that is something I don't want to have happen" you say looking nervously at her, pausong to look more carefully at the webbing surrounding you it probably isn't a good idea to attempt to go for the gold. " I guess I give up" you say realizing your fate. she gasps happily and clasps her hands ( the ones she didn't use to hold her up) together looking extremely happy as she approaches you pulling you in a embrace. " YAY! your the first to accept your punishment. now I'll be nice and let you chose where you get tortured. your.....
133111.title: Give yourself up.

choices: your laying on the ground at pheobe
1331112.content:
"Feet or armpits, which do you chose?" Phoebe asks as she bounces up and down excitedly. You weigh your options carefully on one hand your feet are the most ticklish spot on your body but Phoebe seems to really want to tickle you there. So deciding to indulge your new found spider companion you tell her, "I choose my feet." Her eyes pop open wide and her grin stretches from ear to ear as she grips you in another powerful hug, "Yes!" she cries in joy then she leans in close and says "I hope you enjoy tickling because your going to get a lot of it on your poor feet." you sigh helplessly and wonder what you have just agreed to as she begins to spin her silk strands around your legs. Soon your legs are completely immobilized in a cocoon of silk, you reach down and give the silk a good tug. It's unyielding as steel cables and you nod impressed by Phoebe's handiwork. "Like it?" Phoebe asks as she removes your boots exposing your smooth tender soles to the cold flagstones of the catacomb floor. "Actually yes i do enjoy being tied up." You confess sheepishly with blush creeping into your cheeks. "Then i bet you'll love this!" Phoebe said as she finished tying your hands behind your back.

You were now fully at the mercy of a tickle crazy spider girl, but strangely you were excited at the prospect of being tickled by Phoebe. She then stood before you, "are you ready now?" She asked licking her lips hungrily. You nod and she grabs you by your legs and flips you upside down, she then loops the excess silk strand through an iron ring set in the wall so your incredibly sensitive bare feet were chest level with her. She slowly traced one finger down your right sole eliciting an excited gasp from you, this seems to excite her as well because she then repeats the process on your left sole eliciting yet another of your excited gasps. All of a sudden she throws caution to the wind and wildly dances all ten of her fingers up and down your soles sending you into fits of hysterical laughter. Next she digs her nails in between your toes which sends your laughter up even higher than before. You wriggle and struggle at your bonds but strangely you don't want the tickling to stop, she then slowly creepy crawls her fingers from the balls of your feet down the arches and right to your heels. now everyone has their Achilles heel your's just happens to be your actual heel. Now you thrash and flail and scream your head off as she works your heels over good.

With all this thrashing, laughing, and being tied upside down you're starting to feel really light headed, it doesn't help when Phoebe licks your foot from heel to big toe. she drags her tongue over your arch coating your already sensitive feet in her saliva which makes the sensation even more insane. This continues for another hour untill you finally pass out. when you awaken you find that...
1331112.title: LowerBody (suspended by ankles)

13311122.content: You awaken a little groggy from your tickle session with Phoebe you try to rub your eyes but soon realize you can't move your hands. Your eyes shoot open and you take in your surroundings your in a dungeon cell lit by many torches with your boots and equipment at the opposite end of the cell by the door. You look down at your self you still have your shirt and pants on but your wrists are locked in iron shackles above your head and your ankles are set in a pair of stocks with your still bare feet spread just far enough apart so that you could not shield one foot with the other, your toes were tied back with more of those silky strands so you couldn't wiggle them. you decide to...
13311122.title: your locked in a set of stocks in a dungeon cell

choices: She hangs you right side up.
133112.content:
You shake your head at her. You won't back down when there's obviously a treasure at the end of this passage! Phoebe sighs and shakes her head.

"Well, I gave you one last chance. It's a shame you didn't use that time to look at your surroundings," she says cryptically. Your brows furrow in thought before she quickly yanks one of her legs back, pulling the webbing out from under your feet.

You cry out as you're airborne for a second, then crash down on to the ground, eyes squeezed shut in pain. Your torch clatters on the ground a few feet away. You quickly gather your wits and open your eyes, only to realize that you're staring into a solid wall of blue. She's standing directly over you!

Yards and yards of webbing pour out from a small hole behind her, and her legs quickly grab it and begin to weave it around you. You try to sit up, but in one pass it's already wrapped around your chest, forcing your arms ot your sides. With each revolution of her lightning-fast legs, the webbing is wrapped around more and more of you, covering you in a layer of white that extends from your shoulders down to your ankles.

In what feels like mere seconds, you're stuck!

"Silly adventurers. You always look ahead, but never up or down," Phoebe says with a chuckle. She steps back and peers down at you. You wiggle uselessly on the ground, unable to move your arms or legs a fraction of an inch. Her blue eyes slowly gaze down your body while she licks her lips with excitement.

As she reaches the bottom of you, she suddenly reaches down and grabs your boots with her hands. With a firm tug she yanks both of them off and tosses them aside. Your bare toes wiggle in the cool air. "You won't be needing these anymore," she comments before dragging one finger up your sole. A startled giggle bubbles forth before you manage to clamp your lips shut and regain your composure.

She laughs and clasps her hands together. "Oh my! You're going to be so much fun! Now... how to hang you before we begin..."
133112.title: Refuse her offer.

1331121.content:
For a creature whose life revolves around her webbing, it comes to no surprise that she is an expert in manipulating it. A long strand of thick webbing is produced, and she wraps end around your ankles before reaching up to slide it through a ring of stone that extends from the ceiling. Her powerful arms tug, and it acts as a pulley, lifting you up into the air. It isn't until your head is a foot off the ground that she pauses to wrap the end of the excess webbing around your ankles, leaving you dangling upside down and facing her. Your head is about the same level as the bottom of her spider-bdoy, but when you peer up, you realize your feet are at her chest level.

"My my," she says, peering down at your vulnerable soles. "I can't say I've met a human who takes care of their feet as much as you. And these toes... so cute!"

Phoebe leans in, and her painted-blue lips plant a delicate kiss upon one of your big toes. You take a short breath in, caught offguard at how such a simple action sent a tinge of pleasure through your body. She gently kisses your other big toe, and it instinctively gives a little twitch as your eyes close.

However, that proves to be a mistake. With your guard down, you're caught completely unprepared by the feeling of ten sharp nails scratching over your left arch. Your eyes snap wide open, along with your mouth, and you burst out laughing.

"You didn't think I was going to be nice for long, did you? I still have to punish you for coming here! Now... tickle tickle tickle...!"

Like a worm on a hook, you thrash around as you howl with laughter. Your only means of defense are to wiggle your feet. You try to cross your soles, shielding one with the other, but Phoebe merely lets her fingers spider-tickle (no pun intended) along the sides of your fully-exposed foot. You cannot hold still for more than a few seconds, and your feet flail around, exposing both once again to the onslaught of her nails.
1331121.title: She hangs you upside down.

13311211.content:
“Coochie Coochie coo!” Phone sings with a giggle as her fingers pluck at your arches, slowing her pace down as she traces them, releasing a steady stream of chuckles and giggles from you. At a snail’s speed, she drags one nail on each of your feet around the sides of your heels and along the tops, pulling them out from under your feet as you jolt to get away.

Her hands were slow and methodical, rewarding every twist, scrunch and flex with a new unbearable set of tickles, each set of sensations etching into your brain that your feet weren’t going anywhere, they were completely at Phoebe’s mercy.

She played with the ball of each foot, dragging the skin along the base of your toes, fluttering her fingers to keep you moving, compelling your bare feet to dance in every direction to try and get away. Her touch was precise, keeping it light enough that any time she hit a particularly responsive area, the spike in your laughter was obvious. Soon she would know every spot on your feet that would make you squeal squirm, or scream and the torture would only get worse from there.

“No more please!” You attempt to plead with Phoebe, looking up at her. She had been cordial with you at the very least. “Please anything... if you have to tickle me just... just not my feet!” It was the most eloquent request you could manage, considering how disoriented you were.

To your dismay Phoebe shook her head and you could hear her tongue click. “Ah ah ah” She tuts, dragging one finger slow down each of your soles, an itchy, teasing tickle your toes frantically wiggled to try and escape.

“Cutest pair of feet to ever fall into my clutches and you think I’m giving them up? No way! I’m obsessed with these things! I find them fascinating, unlike your kind. Thanks for wearing those boots though! Soft and sweaty are my favorite!” She exclaims with glee that makes it sound like her words are somehow being helpful.

Her indexes scrape back up to your heels and begins drawing circles on the squishy flesh. “Phoebe-hehehe plehehease!” You beg through the torturous sensations shooting up your legs. No matter how hard you buck, the webbing of your cocoon holds strong. Phoebe looked down at you with a sigh that still sounded bubbly. “You chose to come here” the Spider girl chided. “You chose to pamper these adorable feet and lock them up in those sweaty boots. You were practically asking for this.”

“I’ve always wanted a pair of beautiful human feet like these! Since you were foolish enough to come here, I’m keeping yours!” Phoebe managed to remark with a casual giggle. Without warning, Phoebe returned to her earlier method of scrambling five of her fingers on each one of your feet, scratching and scraping each of your flailing soles, sending you back into shaking belly laughter.

“NoOooOohaHahaHapleeeeaseeehehehaHahaHa” You screamed, desperate to get Phoebe to stop for even the briefest moment. Phoebe shook her head to unknown rhythm, giggling at your laughter. “Unfortunately for you, I have MANY ways to torment feet. It’s my specialty. And now that your feet are mine, I’m gonna try every method I know on them.” Phoebe leaned forward hovering directly over you. “Besides I saw your face earlier. Feet as sensitive as these, I’ll make sure you end up enjoying this.” You felt Phoebe’s warm breath as she planted a kiss on the sole of each foot, making your toes wiggle on reflex.

“But that will come later, we’re only just getting started!” The spider girl reached behind her and in her hand and you saw her hold up...
13311211.title: The torment continues...

13311212.content:
"Oh great..." Phoebe teases your toes as you felt the ten nails poking or scratching at them deliberately, "You have such adorable feet, so big for my hands to actually get a grip around them!" she coos as she begins to do something. You couldn't see in your correct position wiggling your feet and toes around.

"Such a ticklish person like yourself can't have such feet and toes me so! I wish you could just stay still.... Using my fangs wouldn't paralyze these beauties, oh no, they'll poison you..."

"W-what are you getting at!?" you yell, "L-let me go!"

"So clueless... A human like you just waltz in wanting this treasure of mine... No way, no eh. Your feet are good as mine. I always adored these things. I want some of them~" she was holding something. You just curl your toes feeling a finger at your heels. One finger on your left heel. The sensation drove you into madness. She was wiggling her index finger up and down tickling that one spot you couldn't actually move out of.

"Wiggle those toes, or your heel will experience such a frenzy!" she orders giggling at her motions.

"Stophehehheahhahahhha ahaahahhahahahah ahahha!" you scream. Whatever she was going to do, you know it involves your toes! You didn't give a lean in chance for her to get at them. She began to furiously scribble your heel adding another finger. The sensation was unbearable, your laughs were increasing. The tickling at that one spot made your feet quiver in it's defenses.

"No choice huh?" she said in a happy tone. A sudden breathe roll down your soles as your eyes pop open. You squeal and let a case of laughter explode from you lips. She nibbled on the left heel! Cheater! You wiggle your toes madly losing the little defense you have. Sticky threads were wrapped around all ten toes. Phoebe began to tightened them expertly. She took more thread holding the already stuck toes. Every touch on your toes made you laugh and shake in your bonds. Your toes were at her mercy as she purposely scratch and tie them in the thread. They were stuck onto the surrounding walls of cave as she clapped her hands in her works. Your two big toes couldn't budge along with the other eight toes struggling to quench, wiggle, or even curl. The thread was strong and dried. You moan in the toe ties she did.

"Cute toes can't stop me now... Your feet are utterly open for my divine punishment~" she coo breathing onto your soles and running her index fingers at your heels. The tickling on your feet was unbearable now. You could feel the sudden urge to move something! You wiggle your upper body letting out some laughter that wouldn't climax that far yet. Your feet were now immobile and at her mercy...
13311212.title: Toe-tied by webbing

133112121.content:
You screamed as all ten finger scrabbled against the soles of your feet, as the binds made it impossible for you to move them at all. Phoebe grins, continuing to move her hands up and down your feet, leaving no part unscathed. You try to plead for mercy but all that comes out is laughter, as she seems to increase her pace every time you try to speak through the tickling sensations currently moving across your feet. This is absolute torture as not only does she hit all of your spots, but you also couldn't see what she was doing. One instance she would be focusing all of her fingers on a single heel, then move to under your toes, only to scrape her nails across the soles of your feet, driving you insane.

In the mist of all this chaos you slowly realize that you have no idea how long you have been subjected to this torture. It felt like hours since you started laughing under her ministrations, maybe even days, but the small part of your brain not racked by the diabolical sensations that ravage your feet says that's not possible, and at most an hour has passed. you felt tears stream down your face, as well as sweat collect as the torturous finger never stop, and you slowly believe that your end is near, forever to be a tickle toy for this deranged spider-woman.

Suddenly all the tickling stops, and you feel yourself being moved, until you are horizontal again, with Phoebe stand by your entrapped feet. She stares all along your body before moving her head closer too your ear, and asks...
133112121.title: She uses her nails

choices: You've been freed, but missing some clothes...
133112122.content:
Pheobe wastes no time devilishly nibbling on the heel of your foot while her nails reach out and tickle in between your exposed toes. You cackle with tortured laughter; with your toes bound so strongly by the threads, you can do literally nothing while Pheobe tickles your feet to kingdom come!

"Your feet are so lovely!" Pheobe calls out, mercilessly continuing her assult on your helpless feet. "Oooh, but I wonder what your toes taste like~?"

"No! Please!" you manage to sputter out, but it was too late. Pheobe had begun nibbling and licking your toes, sending you into utter hysterics. You laugh for so hard and so long you almost lose the ability to breath! That, combined with the fact you're hanging upside down, sends a lot of blood rushing to your head. You feel very lightheaded, and it's not much longer until you pass out completely.

When you awaken...
133112122.title: No Mercy

choices: Force the Other Girl to Join You
1331121221.content:
You slowly began to awaken, eyes fluttering open from a sea of darkness. Your mind rushes to catch up with itself, replaying what had just happened. It's not long before you realize you're still a captive; you are sitting up, legs extended out, and wrists bound together and held up by string, exposing your armpits. Armpits? Oh yes; you seem to be without any clothes now. You try to squirm away, but your legs are just as helpless. Your bare feet are both locked in what seems to be a set of stocks, and tied at the ankle with Pheobe's silk string. Your toes are just as helpless as before, strung up and tied tightly, spread out so her nails could tickle any spot she wanted.

"Ahh...my newest treasure awakens!" You hear Pheobe's cheery voice as she climbs down from the ceiling, where she likely has a web.

"Treasure? Wait..." you begin, but Pheobe eagerly jumps in.

"That's right darling; you humans are so very greedy and little old me so very lonely," she begins, her face looking just a little bit sad. But as she starts the next part, her grin returns. "So, naturally I wanted company to pass the time, but no one ever comes to visit! So, one day I managed to get a rumor of a Dormduo Treasure and like magic you curious humans with your beautiful feet showed up! I'll never understand why your kind think so ill of them sometimes. Nevertheless, humans started to come over to play, and now my treasure is real! And you're the newest gem."

Suddenly, the realization hits you. You manage to turn your head around a bit and see behind you several other men and women, all also completely bare and bound tight by Pheobe's string. Most of them look unconcious, but others are awake, trying in vain to break their bindings. The treasure...a harem of bound playthings for a spider-woman?!

"No need to feel tricked," Pheobe says, coming close to your face. "We're still going to have lots of fun together. And I'll eventually let you go," she adds with a creepy smile. " I'll even give you a choice. You can have your fun with me alone and get some of your time down quicker now, or you can have that pretty girl over there who's trying to escape join you in our ticklish fun!" At that, Pheobe dashes over to said woman, who had been furiously trying to scrape the silky strands off of her wrists. She'd have better luck grinding down steel manacles. Pheobe picks her up and you get a good look at her. Auburn hair with pale skin. She started mumbling angrilly as opposed to shouting, because she had been gagged, and Pheobe hungrilly looks over her catch. "She's a pretty one too, huh? And her feet are perhaps even more ticklish than yours!"

You weigh the option in your mind for a moment. If you go alone, she might tire of you faster. But if you have the girl in question join you, Pheobe might spend more time tickling this other girl and less time tickling YOU.
1331121221.title: Pheobe's "Treasure"

1332.content:
It's an incredibly foolish risk, but you decide on the center passage. You'd have to be crazy to walk down there, so it stands to reason that no one else has.

Taking a deep breath, you step in and feel the tunnel's detritus crunching under your boots. The floor seems solid enough, but every step forward brings another groan from the walls or ceiling. Dust sifts down from overhead, and you stifle the urge to sneeze.

Farther along, the grit underfoot is becoming gravel, and the walls are really beginning to grind. There are no offshoot passages, only the perilous way forward. Or back. A sliver of rock pegs you in the head from above as you consider retreating.

Instead, you continue forward in a sort of ceaseless flinch, your shoulders hunched up as you wait for something heavier to fall on you. The passage hooks sharply to the left, and then...

Nothing! All signs of a threatening cave-in cease. A glance back shows the tunnel is in pristine condition!

"Do not count yourself fortunate, fool," a voice groans from all around you.

A chamber lights itself at the end of the sharp left turn you just rounded, and you step inside.

"Dormduo's fall owed in no wise to avarice, nor yet did its doom plunge down in a pluviosity of divine flame," says an apparition before you. The ghost bleeds eldritch light on a room filled with treasure! That's what you like scranching underfoot!

You spare a moment for the lamenting spectre, which you slowly realize is that of Demkogodin, the final regent of Dormduo castle. It's hard to follow the mannered speech, but you have a general understanding as it spins its tale of woe.

"So it wasn't fire or brimstone," you mutter, idly pocketing a sapphire as the spirit spiels on. Some sort of divine visitation. A punishment? A practical joke. A person? A relative. Unbiddable. Unmarriageable. Disdainful of all noble appointment or office. Mischievous. 'Ingenuously ludibund'? Huh?

"So some god packed their brat off on you and that was it, eh?" you ask. "Finito!"

The shade proceeds through its routine, not acknowledging you, as a platform screeches up from under all that lovely hoard. A golden figure reclines on it. Doesn't look like much trouble. Some sort of statue. You might be able to lug it out.

"And thus, brave fool, are you burdened," Demkogodin's ghost concludes, fading out. Torches blaze into life around the chamber as the wraith's glow evanesces.

The statue begins to shift around. It sits up, yawns, and stretches. All right. It's really a person with shining gold skin, not a statue. It spots you just before you wise up and split.

"Hello!" it says to you, smiling. "I'm Dominy, ninth incarnation of the lesser theomorph, Ginga, whom you've probably never heard of. We're going to be very close friends, I can tell!"

"The curse!" you say, very theatrically, whirling toward an invisible audience with a hand against your forehead.

As it turns out, Dominy is roughly your age and indisputably a...

"What's your name?" she asks with a smile.

You open your mouth to respond, but stop at the last second to think things over. Here is a room full of treasure and the only thing stopping others is the illusion of a collapsing tunnel? It seems too perfect.

"That's not important right now... tell me, is all this treasure real, or is it more illusions?" you say, watching her carefully.

She rolls her shoulders with a shrug. "As real as anything else. Why? Are you... interested in it?" There's something foreboding in the way she answers your question.

Especially one that seems to be some kind of minor deity and may or may not have been what caused the destruction of Dormduo castle. But having come this far, you don't seem to have a lot of options. Dominy, the ninth something of something is only seconds away from you, her four arms slayed wide to block any chance to get past her and widen her area of potential attack.

You swing your torch, the only weapon available to you. With the torches magically lit along the walls, your own is now little better to you than a fiery club. If you had time, the short sword in your pack would have been much better, but it was no use now. You swing your torch, vainly hoping her weak to fire and heat, but it's futile. A lower hand bats your torch away and sends it clattering to the stone floor. Her upper hands reach out to you, meeting your own hands as the two of you grapple. It takes all your strength to keep your ground, but you manage to hold your own. Both your hands are intertwined in hers, equally locked. However, you suspect she is merely playing with you. Her lower hands hang in the air, not attacking.

You stare at each other in the torchlight. The flickering light glows against her golden body as you look up at her, she down at you. It's easy to see why you thought her one a gold statue earlier, her body looks as if it were flawlessly carved. Your eyes dart over long, smooth legs, the curves of her hips, taut stomach, and full bare breasts right at your eye level. You force yourself not to become distracted by then, even for more than an instant, despite their allure. You concentrate on her face, golden with golden hair. The stalemate makes you increasingly unnerved, and you can no longer maintain the expectant silence.

"I thought you didn't care if I took some of the treasure!" you cry, feeling duped and ashamed for trusting the word of such a strange being.

"I don't." Dominy tells you simply, "but there is something that I want from you, human." Her eyes appear eager for some reason, as if she's holding back some juicy secret. Her lower arms continue to hang in the air as unused weapons that could easily end this stalemate. Baffled, you have little choice but to respond.

"Very well, want do you want from me, creature?" you say, trying to come across as braver than you actually feel. Quite the opposite, it seems as if you're at the mercy of this Dominy.

"It's been so long since a human has come here, and I find them fascinating creatures..." As she speaks, your sense of worry only worsens. Her lower hands finally reach up to your waist and begin loosening your belt. Your trousers sink over your hips, but thankfully she doesn't loosen them enough to make them fall. However, you can't understand why this is happening.

"My favorite thing about humans is that they have a very curious condition…" With a quick motion, one of her lower hands grabs your shirt and tears, ripping the fabric clean off below your ribs, your midriff now exposed to the warm air of the fire-lit cavern. "I believe it is called… ticklish."

Your eyes widen as you realize what she is planning. Her lower hands begin to slowly wander up and down your sides. You stifle a gasp, willing away a grin and a twitch. Dominy grins at you, "I am going to enjoy sharing this ticklish thing with you."

141.content:
New Forazio. Jewel of the southern reaches, the opulent city was screaming out to be lightened of some wealth. Though you had just arrived in the metropolis, one structure had caught your eye, even from afar. The Enchanted Tower, as the locals called it, was extravagance incarnate. Stretching into the sky with gem-studded parapets, the silver-stone ramparts were etched with richly detailed runes and arcane symbols. A single brick of that ornate wall could ransom a king or queen. You could scarcely imagine the treasures locked within.

However, after talking to some friendly locals, you learned that a sect of reclusive wizards called the tower their home. Wizards, as was your experience, were often anti-social hermits, usually more concerned with reagents and alchemy than amassing treasure. Clearly, these were no ordinary magic-users. But perhaps their unusual behaviour could be turned to your advantage. Although you could try and slip past their guards through their exterior garden, you wondered about another approach.

A charismatic outsider like yourself could leverage a deal with the secluded sect – perhaps as their ambassador to faraway lands. Wizards always needed new ingredients for their spells and cantrips, and for a small payment (of unimaginable wealth), you could fill that niche. Once you wormed your way into the secretive society, you could also pilfer artifacts at your leisure. And the unsuspecting mages would never know.

You approached the tower, and needed to decide on a course of action.

You approach the front gates with as much confidence as you can muster. This little charade was entirely dependent on your ability to stay calm and focused; one small slip-up could alert the wizards that you were up to no good, and you didn't intend to test their wrath. The massive gates were lined with the same sort of arcane runes as the rest of the building, and led directly into a small foray built at the bottom of the structure. You were certain that the wizards already knew you were coming - their divining magics were likely watching every move you made.

Your suspicions were confirmed as the ornate gate began to open inwards, even before you had reached it! The darkness behind the doors contrasted with the bright sunlight streaming in. But even as you slowed your pace, you could sense a tingle of magic in the air. Doubts about this whole scheme were growing large in your mind... if these magic users were truly as powerful as the locals said, maybe you should back off while you still could.

"Welcome, wanderer," said a strangely harmonic voice from within the darkness. You thought it was feminine, yet an odd resonance to the words gave you pause.

"Uh, greetings, Mighty Wizard..." you replied to the unseen speaker. "I would like to propose-"

"An alliance?" replied the voice, a hint of a giggle behind it. "A deal? A pact?"

You tried to squint into the darkness, but you could still see nothing. "Yes... something like that, anyways."

The voice was silent, as if deep in thought. Moments passed, and yet you remained still, fearing the worst. Perhaps their divining magics had already revealed your true intentions? Perhaps these wizards were discussing how best to dispose of you? These and other fears pervaded your thoughts as you stood in front of the ornate structure. A tiny voice in your mind was screaming at you to run, but the promise of riches was too powerful to ignore now.

"Enter, wanderer," the voice finally said, as if sensing your growing apprehension. "We shall discuss the matter within our protected walls."

You smiled happily at the darkness, relieved that you hadn't yet been roasted by a fireball. You took one last look at the sunlight before you entered the Enchanted Tower.

1412112.title: Learning about the Divine

choices: take your chances with the police
142.content:
You run through the alls of the temple making random twists and turns. Your group is now reduced to two beside you, the other three were all ready taken by the monk's strange creature.
Samatha the girl next to you suddenly screams. You quickly turn around and she is gone.

"Okay" you say "this is getting creepy".

You turn the corner and see three passages. One is blocked by a lone monk, another leads outside to the police, and the last one heads back to the inner sanctums of the temple.

"which one which one?" you say.
142.title: .Hiding out in the Temple of Silence

1422.content: You make a dash for the exit, thinking the whatever the police do it wold not compare to what a real monster does to its victims. As you sprint out you see a squad of officers waiting for someone or pretending to as they seemed focused on trying to score with a group of women passing by. You dash into an alley and....
1422.title: take your chances with the police

choices: You make it into the room
1423.content:
The enshrouded monk raises an index finger calmly to his lips:

'Shhhhhhhh.'

But before you can react to this weirdness, you hear a familiar skittering in the shadows -- the creature -- and take off instinctively down the open passage.

You run wildly fast in the dark of the corridor, the noise of your pounding heart filling your ears, and just above that the quick staccato of clawed feet on stone and ragged, feral breathing, getting closer!

You see a light, impossibly distant: a room! If you can only make it another 50 yards!

A bristly pseudo-pod of unimaginable horror flicks hungrily at your shoulder and you can feel hot, monstrous breath on your back!

But you're so close now, you can see the tall, iron-bound door ajar in a large, light-bathed chamber.

Your muscles are long past aching and you're gulping breath in an ecstasy of terror and adrenaline. You reach for the portal!
1423.title: run for the open passage

14232.content:
You dive into the room and somehow manage to swing the door closed behind you. Near panic, you thrust the iron latch into place, just as the full force of whatever was chasing you slams into the door, sending you sprawling!

But the door holds! Another shuddering slam sends a few splinters hurtling through the air and knocks thick curtains of dust from the heavy rafters above. You scoot clumsily away, until your back finds the far wall, all the while the creature lays siege to the door.

Somehow though, the door remains intact, and soon the battering stops. But you can still hear the sinister padding and slavering of the insidious monster in the hall.

As your terror wanes, you realize you're in a library of some sort: books and scrolls cover the four walls, floor to ceiling, and a single solid table and chairs occupy the middle of the vaulted chamber. Strange though, you think, to keep a library so deep in the twisted guts of the temple.

Drained of adrenaline and shaking violently, you realize how incredibly exhausted you are, trapped in the Temple of Silence by some ravenous horror that's already taken the rest of your crew. Being stuck in the city's dungeons starts to look like a welcome alternative!

Still, there's nothing for it. You'll have to find your way out somehow.

You creep to the single entrance and press your ear to the door. Just barely, you think you can hear ragged breathing on the other side. But it may just be your terror-wracked imagination. You look around the room: perhaps there's a secret passage somewhere, or maybe one of these books holds a clue.
14232.title: You make it into the room

choices: Quietly look for the artifact (very quietly)
Wait for one of the monks to find you
142322.content:
Most of the tomes and scrolls are in strange esoteric runes or magical script indecipherable to you. But one unfurled piece of vellum on the table catches your eye; it's written in the common tongue and stamped with the seal of the Temple of Silence!

It's a long scroll, but you've got time. The long and short of it is that the Temple of Silence was once the Temple of Mirth, built on the site of an ancient evil temple destroyed in a great battle in the days of Old Forazio. But some powerful evil remained in the depths of the temple, and shadowy creatures, drawn especially to the sounds of laughter and merriment, soon fell upon the residents of the temple.

After the disappearance of several brothers and sisters of the order, one monk began preaching sullen silence in place of merriment and joy, at first meeting great resistance from the Scions of Mirth, but finding acceptance after several more years of predation from the shadow things.

Eventually the Temple of Mirth became the Temple of Silence, where dour monks worked quietly to keep the great evil below from spilling into the streets of New Forazio, often with the sacrifice of failed acolytes and pilgrims (or thieves on the lam, you think with a scowl).

The tome also mentions, several times, a powerful and priceless artifact, deep in the bowels of the temple; a beacon and focus for the evil that still haunts the tainted fathomage of the catacombs.

Armed with this new knowledge you could conceivably evade the temple's monsters, save your comrades, or at least recover a priceless artifact! Or, you could play it safe, wait for one of the monks to visit the library and then, with their unwitting assistance, escape the temple, or maybe even join up with the Silent (if recent events are any indication, thieving is not the smartest of occupations).
142322.title: Investigate the books and scrolls

1423221.content:
As you press your ear against the door, no noise comes from the other side, so quietly you open the door. Greeted by the dark hallway you begin to walk your way through the darkness of the temple. You begin to think that this was a bad idea, as the scroll, which you still carried had given any direct directions just some vague references to laughter and feathers.

So caught up in your thinking, you slam your face right into a wall, and knock yourself onto the floor. Dazed you can only stare at the temple's ceiling as you attempt to regain your vision, and stop the pounding in your skull. However as you continue to look up, you notice slight flecks of golden light blinking on and off. Eventually the lights form into a giant feather?

You finally managed to sit up, but before you know it the lights suddenly surround you in a dome of shimmering light. Panicking you start to find a way out of this mess, but the dome of light has managed to complete encompass you. To make matters worse it appears to be shrinking in on you, slowly closing the space between you and it. Then one of the lights came in contact with you, they simply phased through your clothes and land on your skin. to which you got to experience the most unbearable tickling you have every felt. Everything a light touched your bare skin, it felt like a thousand feathers dragged across the skin itself.

"HAHAHAHHAHSTHAHAHAOAHAHHAPAHAHAHAHPLHAHAHAEASHAHAHAHAESTHAHAHAHAOHAHAPA HAH!!!!!!!!!" you cry out as more and more lights cling to your skin.

"But why its been so long since I had a good ticklish being in my hands" a soft firm voice says
