You shut your eyes as her hand began to dance across your soles, only to have her other come back to your neck. "You shall address me only as my lady, is that clear?" She commanded, in the tone she had addressed her guards.You were too focused on her tickling to answer. Reanna responded by lowering her fingers more into your feet. " Is that clear?" She repeated. "Yes My Lady!" You blurted out with a giggle.

She stopped tickling and proceeded to caress your hair. She brushed it out of your face and rubbed your cheek with the back of her hand, with an unsettling feeling of intimacy. She massaged your left foot with her thumb, her manicured nail making it torturous. Your face contorted in and out of forced smiles as she spoke. "Given your intrusion, your first lesson in manners shall be to learn what happens to naughty girls who don't behave." She scolded, almost tantrum like. "And for that you must be punished." Lady Reanna then sat up and...
"
14411111.title: A Roya

choices: Have a guard tie you to her bed
Tickle your upper body with her feet
144111111.content:
How embarrassing it was that you were taken down by this small noblewoman was reinforced by the fact that she barely weighed anything on top of you. She shifted her weight towards your shoulders, her long hair brushing against your face.

Despite this woman's chilling presence, her disturbing attraction to you had worn away at the guilt you had for trying to steal from her back pocket.You wanted her off you. Now.

As she began to trace circles on your heels, you decided to protest. You were tired of being tickled. A few swears and demands to stop were let out among some giggles caught in your throat. "Uh uh" Reanna tutted, adding fingers to your heels."A proper lady must mind her language."she said with a bit too much enjoyment as she dug into your soles. You flexed your toes and twisted your ankles but the hogtie prevented any escape from the Lady's nails which were doing a number on you. She taunted your escape attempts by dragging her nails down the top of your feet, making you flex toward her.


She then immediately went for your toes, an area previously untouched. Before you could react, she put her fingers between them and began fondling with her nails. A few seconds of giggling turned into full blown laughter. It was clear your toes were your weakspot, something Reanna did not miss. She proceeded to scrape the soft spaces between your toes in a downward motion. You banged your chest against the floor, snorting with laughter. The tickling of your toes overrode all aching of your bondage.

All at once she stopped. You gulped down air and exhaled with relief. "You have a pretty laugh. Very ladylike." Reanna said with ponder, as if your torture were a fine wine she was tasting.

You curled your toes at once preventing further invasion from her cruel fingers. Clearly this did not please her. "This will not do" she pouted. "You cannot resist. This is your punishment thief. I shall spare you from the life of a commoner and you shall indulge me, for I have a very weary evening ahead of me." She scolded with arms crossed.

You would rather be taken by the guards then be tortured by this woman any longer. You keep your toes curled., hoping she'll have you taken away.

Unfortunately that is not the case. She stands up off of you and heads toward her dresser, returning a few moments later. She sits down next to you again, placing something beside her. She then runs her fingers through your hair again. " I will be gentle. But you shall learn that it is rude not to indulge me. However..." She pauses.

"I mean to give you appreciation. Thus I shall give you something in return." Despite your rebellion against her demands her smile hasn't left her face. Her fingers stop stroking your hair and reach over to unbuckle her shoes, removing them. She then proceeded to get on top of you again.

The petit forazion, with strength you still don't understand once again overpowered you pulling your big toes up and tied them with a hair braid. "As I said I will be gentle, I am generous after all. As a proper lady must be."

Your eyes shot open immediately and your mouth gave to laughter. What you could only imagine was the horse hairbrush from earlier was now gliding across your bare feet. Immediate pleas came from your mouth as the bristles sawed between your toes as the balls were scrubbed. "A proper lady accepts fault for their misdeeds, Yet all I hear is begging for pardon. Have you no manners thief?" You were being tickled far too much to protest. You allowed apologies to burst out in your laughter, swearing on everything to never steal again.

To your amazement, Reanna stops. She looks at you, then decides to...
144111111.title: Leaned forward and straddled you, facing your feet

choices: You fall asleep from exhaustion, and wake up still in Reanna's clutches
1441111111.content:
The Ladyship stood up and took a few steps toward the door. She gave you one last grin before turning her head. "I require a guardsmen! At once!" She let her voice echo out. The impatience in her voice was apparent, as if her guards should already know of her needs.

The jingling of chainmail under light plate was quickly followed by the opening of the door. A thin guard of unsure stature swung the door open, too hard clearly as he had to fumble to catch it. To attempt to redeem for his misstep, he quickly put his hand to his hilt, drew it slightly and held it.

You breathed a sigh of relief. You didn't care why but you were getting out of here! With your feet still tingling from Reanna's brush, the timing felt perfect.

"Yes, My Lady?" He put on as stern a face as he could muster, which wasn't much. His eyes tried as best they could to avoid you. "I require... more time with this matter. Please move this woman to... Erm my bed. I do not wish to leave her on the floor. That would be uncouth." Her damsel mannerisms were back in full swing.

Your heart sank but only partially. Any change in your position would give you a better escape plan than the floor. "As you wish my lady." The guard stammered. He walked over to you slowly. As his back passed Reanna she shot you a taunting smile.

As he reached you it was clear he was unsure how to move you. Reanna spoke again. "Cut the rope. Have her laid down." He drew his blade and sawed the rope holding your wrists to ankles. Given he had his sword drawn, the urge to attempt hopping out was quickly dismissed. You were relieved at the release on your muscles though.

He flipped you over, again not looking at you. You hair was a bit disheveled from struggle and mussing so it seemed he averted his eyes to avoid thinking about your situation. Given Reanna's need to keep up appearances with her guards, it seemed highly unlikely the men that attended her knew of her true nature much more than to fear her. She clearly ran a tight ship.

He carried you in his arms as one would a body and lowered you onto the bed, an extravagant mixture of blue and gold. "Tie her wrists and ankles to the top and bottom" Reanna spoke quickly and coldly. Her every word sounded like a death threat. The guard took more of your rope which Reanna supplied and drew your wrists up above you. Seeing his nervous fumbling, Reanna grew impatient. "Thank you. You may go now." She gave gratitude in the tone of a scold.

He quickly scampered to the door. As he went to leave, he turned around both hands on the door. "Um my lady. The guests are speaking of your absence. Lord Austren is particularly vocal. What shall I-" He was quickly cut off. " I am dealing with an attempt on my life. What if this woman was sent by one of our dear guests downstairs? I shall hardly forsake my safety at the whims of one who may intend to do me harm. Leave me." Reanna spoke evenly and with admonishment. The guard quickly shut the door and marched down the hall.

Even you had to admit Reanna sounded convincing. But the noble Lady dropped her guise and faced you with chilling enjoyment. She grabbed the left behind rope next to you stroking your cheek and returned to the foot of the bed and tied your ankles to it with ease.You watched her with your head on the pillows, it was a bed for her after all. She kneeled down at the end, the bed low enough to still see her smiling at you. She then stared intently at your bare feet, which were just below face level. She then removed the braid holding your big toes, much to your surprise.


You then felt a nail traveling up the middle of your left sole, and you turned your head in response, giggling despite yourself. "How exquisite. I've never had a girl with feet as soft as yours." Reanna said with excitement. She lightly ran eight fingers over your soles which forced you into full on giggling. She pulls squeals from you by poking and prodding, in awe of the affect her nails have on your feet and loving it.

"You are quite the prize, yes." She muses in reaffirmation. "Yes I am doing you quite the favor" she says in earnest. "H-How is that-at? you bubble out through giggles. " You attempted to fleece someone who had their eyes in a mirror. I can't imagine you're a prolific thief." Reanna rakes her nails lightly down your soles, as if to punish you for your folly, to which you flail.

"You would either continue in this foolishness and end up entertaining some posted men in a stone cell, or you would give this up and take a peasent's trade, settling down and be wasted warming the bed of some farmhand." She picks up the pace of her fingers as she continues, almost in frustration, much to your dismay.

She slows again, tapping and dragging the sensitve skin, keeping you twisting and giggling. "But you clearly have exceptional blood for a commoner, to have such perfect features, and I shall not let it go to waste." She spoke with conviction.

Her indexes ran laps on your soles, rippling over the wrinkles created by your clenched toes. "The things I could do to this body, to these feet." Reanna emphasized by digging into the bases of your toes, releasing an "eep!" from you. "I could make you experience things you never thought possible, more than anyone would ever give you." Her hands leave your toes, giving your lungs a needed break.

Lady Reanna stares directly into your eyes examining your exhaustion. "And give I shall. For I am generous after all." She gives you that chilling shooting smile again. Maybe it's because you're worn out, but her smile isn't having the same effect on you.

"Ready to begin?" She asks in a teasing manner. You shake your head no. Her head lowers down and out of sight. All of a sudden, your brain jumps into overdrive and you lurch. A warm, wet sensation that jolts your nerves travels up both your feet. Reanna's face appears again. With a wide grin, she licks the middle of your soles up to your toes so you can see. You scream with reverberated laughter. It tickles SO much worse than the fingers.Having been worked over by the brush amplified the effect of Reanna's tongue. It was clear she had an obsession with feet. You just never imagined she'd do this.

Reanna showed no mercy. She yanked your toes up and stuck both your big toes in her mouth, running her tongue around them and into the spaces. Holding them like that allowed her to probe the rest of your wiggling digits with her nails. Your laughter became filled with snorts as tears ran down your face. You thought you would pass out but Reanna stopped. She looked at you with ecstasy.

"Your feet are an absolute treasure." She cooed, leaning over and giving one long lick along your left sole producing another scream from you. "I simply adore you. Thus I have long decided to keep you. I simply must have these feet." Her attraction to you took the edge off her proclamation.

Before you could protest her claim on you, Reanna began lapping at your soles sending you back into squirming laughter. Reanna began nibbling gently along the edges of your feet, producing squeal pitches in your laughter. Whenever you'd close your toes she would bite your heel and add her fingers, punishing you when they surrendered by licking across the pads.

Reanna then simply gave tiny licks and nibbles all across your bare soles, your constant giggling a music to her ears. After what seemed an eternity she pulled away from your lavished feet.

"I believe it's time we begin our next lesson" She teases with an all too innocent sounding giggle. "Please no" You let out weakly. "A proper girl knows whether or not her say is asked for" She slowly traces a finger down each of your feet. "It is for her own benefit" She then plants a kiss on each of your big toes.

Immediately after...
1441111111.title: Have a guard tie you to her bed

choices: Opens the door to invite someone else in
14411111111.content:
The sucking feeling of Reanna’s lips against the pads of your big toes was enough to make them twitch, a sight you could see her drink in. “Oh you’re in for quite the evening yes” she taunted. It was becoming increasingly clear the power Reanna held over you with your feet so receptive to her idea of fun. Without warning, Reanna ducked down out of sight again. The groan of wood against wood can be heard, followed by a clatter you piece together is Reanna rummaging through a container of some sort.

Your thought process is interrupted however, by the sight of Reanna’s pale feet entering your field of view, heels up. To your dismay, Reanna begins grazing her toes over your arches, light enough to itch as much as tickle. You twist your ankles to avoid your captor’s game, but the range of movement for your feet is much more limited. Soon you are giggling at the feeling of Reanna’s digits running up and down your soles, sliding across her own saliva.

“Wwhahat are you dohoing?” You cry out, needing an explanation to this absurd situation. “Patience thief, a virtue I’ll make sure you learn” You hear from the floor. She pulls her legs away to sit up and greets you with a childlike expression.

Before you can react, Reanna grabs your feet together and reties the hairbraid from earlier. You gulp knowing that means you’re than likely in for a harsher treatment. “A proper girl must take proper care of herself, but fear not thief, I shall teach you the follies of self neglect” Reanna scolds as she picks something up from out of view. “Such labor is far beneath me, but... hehe you belong to me now, and I am quite nurturing to my possessions” Reanna accompanies her words with a cloth she begins using to wipe your feet. The piece of blue fabric is soft, but Reanna switches to a rougher side you assume is used for wiping makeup. The material is coarse enough to tickle terribly when Reanna applies a bit more pressure, and you see her bite her lip as you begin laughing. “NooHohohooo!” You let out in protest.

No matter how you scrunch or arch, the cloth finds it’s way into every wrinkle, along every line of your feet, and you start bucking again when it enter the space underneath your toes. Snorts enter your belly laughs when Reanna proceeds to floss the cloth between each one of your toes, transfixed on their wiggling with small gasps of nothing less than arousal.

Apparently unable to contain herself, she then sucks each of your toes one by one, wrapping her tongue around each and lapping at the spaces in between before wiping them with the cloth again. After minutes of silent laughter her ladyship finally relents. Your sweat drenched hair is now sticking to your tear stained face, and your exhausted mind drifts to how no one has come to investigate despite your “screams” of suffering. How could you have possibly known that trying to rob a spacious manor during a party could ever backfire on you this hard?

“Don’t out on me now thief, truth be told, I haven’t actually started” Reanna chuckles. Your stomach dropped at the realization that this was merely a warmup. You tense what strength in your muscles you can as Reanna...
14411111111.title: Reanna plays "Footsies" with you.

choices: Feathers. Candles? A bowl of ice cubes?!
Bowls of clear liquid. And blades
144111111112.content:
A knocking on the door interrupted your torture. You watched as Reanna huffed at the disturbance, went to the door and opened it to reveal the guard that she had move and tie you to the bed.
"I told you to leave me!" Reanna snapped at him. "My lady, the guests are getting restless. They desire to see you. Or at least receive an explanati-"

"Fine! But I want double the guards on patrol. I can't risk this thief escaping. And tell Anya to come up here and 'prepare' her for further 'interrogation' when I return. Tell the guests that I will be with them momentarily."

By all the gods, she was good at playing the damsel. She was more suited to the stage than a royal house. After the guard closed the door after him, Reanna went back to your feet. "Don't worry my beauty. I won't be gone for long, I'll ensure this party is a short one. And then I'll come back to play with those feet. And explore the rest of you." She planted a big tickly kiss on both of your feet and then left.

You lay in your bondage for an unknown amount of time, wondering how you would get out of this, and almost laughing at your luck that the first house you tried to rob would have an insane noblewoman with huge things for tickling and feet. You then heard the door swing open. You turned to see who you presumed was Anya.
Anya was a maid from your best guess. You say your best guest, because if that was a maid outfit, it was severly lacking in much outfit. She wore only a lacy black bra and panties and a tiny white apron to add to the maid dynamic. She was carrying a large silver tray, which she set down on a table near you. Straining your neck and body to a painful degree, you were able to view the tray. It had on it...
144111111112.title: Opens the door to invite someone else in

choices: Anya refuses and begins to cut off your clothes
Anya agrees if you take her with you
Anya agrees if you help her get revenge on Reanna
1441111111122.content:
Blades! Some small scissors and a dagger, next to the bowls of whatever the hell that liquid was. The girls possibly called Anya picked up the scissors and started coming towards you.
"Please no! Anya! You're Anya right?! Just let me go please! Just let me go!"

Anya quickly shook her head, the fear apparent in her eyes. "No! She'll hunt you down. She always does. And then things will be even worse for you. Just submit. Things will be easier for you. Another pretty girl will come along, sooner or later. Or she will tire of you eventually."

Given how Reanna had been talking about just your feet, you weren't very hopeful that she'd tire of you, but even if she would, you certainly weren't going to leave up to chance how 'sooner or later' sooner or later might be.

"Please Anya, help me! I'll do anything! Do anything you want! Give you anything you want!"
1441111111122.title: Bowls of clear liquid. And blades

choices: You succeed and manage to free yourself!
You lose all hope as Reanna comes back from the party ready to play.
14411111111221.content:
Anya tearfully shakes her head no. "I'm sorry. Please forgive me." She begins to cut away at your garments, using the scissors, and dagger on thicker fabrics when needed, and soon, you are naked as the day you were born. She then returns to the tray, picks up one of the bowls, and pours the contents onto your body. As soon as it touches you, you realise it is oil. You yelp at the cold of the oil, though whether your shaking was due to shivers from the cold oil or shivers from fear was unclear. Anya then rubs the oil all over you, not stopping until every part of you is thoroughly covered with a glistening sheen. In literally any other circumstance, you would have found an oil massage from an attractive woman like Anya highly appealing.
Anya removed the other bowl of oil from the tray, placed it on the table and quickly left. You struggled as hard as you could in your bonds, trying to slip your hands and feet through the knots, pulling with all your strenght to break through the ropes, anything you could do in order to free yourself and escape from Reanna's clutches.
14411111111221.title: Anya refuses and begins to cut off your clothes

choices: Stay to steal the money you need.
14411111112.content:
Despite how much the teasing tickled, Reanna had sapped your strength, and before you could suffer any more of her twisted indulgences, you mercifully drifted off.

You awoke an unclear amount of time later, still in the same position. Although one huge difference was prevalent, Reanna was gone! Seeing this as your chance you began to struggle against your bonds, testing for weaknesses. Lo and behold there was one! The guard in his fear of Reanna, had not tied your wrists perfectly, allowing them to finally become loose.

You freed your wrists, nursing the rope burns with your palms for a moment before setting to work on your ankles. You relished the feeling of slapping your bare feet on the floor, free from Reanna's clutches. You then realized that escaping across a roof without shoes probably wasn't a good idea.

By sheer coincidence, whilst sliding your legs back and forth, you felt something fuzzy touch your heel under the bed. You looked down to see a pair of luxurious slippers which had to be Reanna's, under the side of the comforter.

Hooking them with your big toes and slipping them on, you feel they are a bit small, but you don't have another option. You slid over to the window and crept out, making sure not to trip in your shoes. You came off the building the way you went up, now under the complete cover of dark.

Having other interests, Reanna had not taken your coin purse and thus you made your way to the inn you saw in the market district when you first arrived, which was fortunately quiet.

You purchased a room and bought a drink to ease your parched throat which you took with you. You hadn't exactly slept "well" and so you eased yourself down to sit on your bed and chugged the tankard slowly, letting the cold pile in the back of your throat.

You wanted to just take in the fact that you were alive and free and thank whatever blessings gave you the chance to escape. You fumbled thieving HARD tonight, and as your mind rewound back to remembering why you had entered that manor in the first place, your wisely used common sense was overridden by a pang of regret at the fact that you hadn't pocketed anything from Reanna's room on the way out to pay for replacing your lost gear. But you then looked at the slippers you wore on your shuffling feet and realized the symbolic victory was much more soothing for your sense of pride.

You then realized given your review of funds that you were in an awkward situation. You wanted out of New Forazio as soon as possible. You had caught the attention of someone far too dangerous to stick around. But you really didn't have the money to buy blades or boots and still be able to travel. You had to make a decision. After mulling it over for about twenty minutes or so, cupping the empty tankard in your hands, you decide to...
14411111112.title: You fall asleep from exhaustion, and wake up st...

144111111121.content:
The markets were abuzz as you slipped through the crowd. Your last few days in New Forazio had been relatively uneventful, if that was possible in such a city. You traipsed along scanning your eyes over buyer and seller alike, window shopping in multiple ways.

New Forazio was a place infamous for exotic goods hence your initial interest in traveling. Various teas and accompanying spices owned certain spaces of air, whilst various linens and tapestries hung over market stalls like banners.

Considering yourself more adventurous, your eyes were mostly drawn to the intricate Blades displayed on the wall by a forge, flowery inlays representing various cultures. Your hands were reminded of the recently purchased daggers sheathed at your sides and you prided yourself on the blade's ornamental qualities, testaments to your success.

The armor stall nearby which was mostly out of view due to passing livestock still radiated the smell of tanned leather, and your footfalls became heavier in your fitted boots, which you had paired with socks despite New Forazio's southern climate.

Part of you wanted to kick yourself for still being here, but the coin was good and you had been feeling a lingering mood of inadequacy as of late.Your inward thought led to frustration as you became aware of your lack of focus on potential marks.But as you were about to hit yourself for missed opportunities, opportunity hit you.

A rotund man with a hat too small for his head dressed in robe-like regalia stormed past you barking at his assistant in a language you didn't understand. The assistant was a wiry man carrying a stack of furs much too large for him. You glided up to the portly man and reached into his sagging robe taking a clasped coin purse. Before the feeble laborer could protest the robbery he just witnessed you opened the pouch and deftly threw a handful of gold down his shirt, his change in expression a confirmation of the purchase of his silence.

As you reveled in the retribution you just created you felt the weight of the remaining coins in the pouch and knew you had enough to purchase a mare and travel. You pondered momentarily as you headed to the inn to grab your things, just what had kept you here. You had slipped up BAD. A feeling of dread welled in you as you sat down on your bed. You weren't counting your blessings as much as you should have and you couldn't put together why. You proceeded to load your things into your knapsack as your mind attempted to ignore the recollections of your harrowing experience.

But without thinking your hand touched an object inside the knapsack and, it feeling unfamiliar, pulled it out to see it. Your eyes met with one of the slippers you had taken from HER the night of your escape. You didn't even remember when you had thrown it in there, but images of the inn being searched flashed through your mind in your paranoid state and thus back into the bag it went.

Although it was the early afternoon, you slapped coin onto the bar counter and made a hurried exit. Your fear of being found had caught up with you and once outside, you proceeded to head towards the city gates. You found a southwest exit that connected directly south towards the stables and headed towards it.

You eyed the two guards standing stoically on either side of the arch leading to dirt road. These guards were of the royal family, and thus were equipped for wall defense with black plate mail boasting a dark green trim. They were certainly imposing to say the least, and a very good deterrent to keep crime IN the city.

As you went to cross onto the dirt from stone, your mind snapped back to the world as the two guards drew their swords and crossed them to stop you. Before you could bark out any expletives, the guards bowed their heads and you heard the sound of jingling mail and turned to face it. Approaching through the crowd was a sight that made you nearly vomit from shock.

Lady Reanna's face lacked the expression you associated with her in your mind. She was calm, collected, and gave the perfect air of class. She walked ahead of her guard in short gaits, hands crossed over her sternum as a daughter being appraised for suitors would."Guards, seize the necessary evidence" she said evenly.

One of the men behind you grabbed the knapsack due to your focus on Reanna. Within moments, the bystanders watching were given full view of the contents within the bag, including Reanna's slippers. "You may not have taken your intended quarry thief, but you would be hard pressed to find a pair of shoes such as those, given they were made for me." The Lady gave a stern look. You knew you were caught there. It was clear you were a criminal.

"Any normal thief having been threatened with my dungeon would have run. No, your presence here means you are part of something larger, a cowardly plot by one who would call themselves a part of this city's court and my ally. My watching of you has only further proved my suspicions. The people of New Forazio demand justice. As do I." It was clear she presented herself to the people well. But YOU knew she was lying, and you had to get away from her.

"What shall be done with her my lady?"asked one of the City guards. "Have her brought with me to the spring estate. It has become clear that my life is now in danger here. I cannot stress the prudence of going somewhere remote. We shall deal with her there." You realized you had to make a split second decision as the guards reached to grab you. You could either run for it in the city which would be very hard to escape, given the surrounding guards and then attempt to hide out. But then you would have a bounty on your head. You also could use Reanna's movement of you out of New Forazio to your advantage and escape then, complete with all the obvious dangers that would bring.

You decide to...
144111111121.title: Stay to steal the money you need.

1441111111212.content:
Too many people would be looking for you in the city, and it's not like you wanted to stick around. Taking "free" passage out of the city seemed like the best option. Besides, the fact that Reanna was taking the law into her own hands again meant she had plans for you.

As much as that notion made your stomach twist, it meant that no force of the royal family was sticking a blade in you. Not only did Lady Reanna's coin have a lot of sway with the court, it wasn't like anyone was going to bat an eye in a city of ALL trades in the right places, including slaves.

Thus you decided it was in your best interest to let the guards from Reanna's retinue get behind you and slap on the irons. Your pride burned in frustration as you could only imagine the satisfaction the elegant deceiver was getting from this and so you turned your head to avoid looking at her.

As soon as the shackles were fastened the guards hoisted you roughly against the unmoving metal, which hurt. Before they could turn to take you out the city, their grip loosened and allowed you to walk. Unbeknownst to you, your captor had shot them a most disapproving look.

You were marched out of the city ahead of Reanna and her men. They kept you and her at a distance, ironically trying to protect their sweet looking noblewoman from you. The sandy colored dirty road quickly came to be flanked on both sides by a verdant green plains, eventually swallowed by dense forest. It wasn't long outside the gates of New Forazio until you were brought before a carriage.

You had to admit it had the picturesque look of something you dreamed of robbing, in highwayman fashion. Fanciful trim hugged the curves of it's large frame matching the plush dyed interior of colors that glowed through it's windows. It was akin to a palace room on wheels, held at the front by a breed of horses you knew couldn't be locally bred based on their coats. Their slim frames contrasted by their muscular gaits implied they were stallions of a racing nature, made for attendant knights of a duke or duchess for long journeys.

None of this surprised you given Reanna's fixation on luxury, and you eases slightly at the fact that you weren't being hauled in a cart like a true prisoner. Upon reaching the carriage Reanna turned towards her escorts. "Wait a while before following. An armed escort shall not be needed." Reanna stated, her face a look of command.

"My lady, with all due respect you cannot suggest this. You are a nobl-" "If this thief has accomplices in waiting, an armed escort will be exactly what they shall expect. It would truly sadden me if your tongue conveys ineptitude. Your rank allows me to assume you can have your men follow out of sight and keep me from harm, Captain." Her words surprisingly bit with logic instead of malice.

"It does indeed My Lady" the Captain's face sunk, defeated as he turned his men around. You looked at the expression Reanna held with surprise from darting glances. Her command came not from fear but regality. She truly looked as if to be a young girl wearing the responsibilities of a crown far too large.

It was as if you were seeing a completely different side of her. But as she opened the carriage door she shot you a smile that reminded you of your fear of her. "Don't keep me waiting, thief" she said with a glow that anyone else would have seen as nothing but innocent.

You walked forward and attempted to enter on your own and but found it too high without the use of your hands. Without a second thought, Reanna shoved you inside flat on your stomach and entered with you.

Before you could attempt to stand against the plush, absorbing floor, Reanna swung your legs and sat down on the back bench. Crossing her legs over yours, you were now held to the floor with your legs up in her grasp, your ankles through her lap.

"Now my pretty little thief" she stroked the sole of your boot. "We have much to discuss."
1441111111212.title: Let Lady Reanna arrest you.

14411111112121.content:
The floor began to push up into your face as the carriage rolled forward. Hearing the carriage driver snap at the horses Reanna quickly ended her game with your legs. You threw your legs to the side to pull your face out of the carpet. To your surprise Reanna is blushing slightly, her makeup for travel not as thickly applied. Of all things a look of distress has command of her face. Her doe-like eyes jump to the window and to the ceiling, whilst her fingers stomp her sleeve.

Then it hits you. She was lost in the moment and forgot how close her men were. She didn't just want to avoid getting caught. She was embarrassed.

You began to feel this was your chance. Maybe the shame about her actions would make you let her go. You, to your own amazement, felt you could open your mouth without losing your head seeing her like this.

"My lady?" You ask, almost with legitimate concern. You decide to address her formally. You weren't crazy.

Reanna shoots straight in her seat, as if unaware anyone else was in the carriage with her. "I apologize, but you said we were to discuss something." You put on your calmest face and speak politely as you can, the vibrations massaging the side of your head.

"Yes, quite right please sit" Reanna zips out then remembers your predicament, her face flushes again at her mistake. The carriage was moving slow enough that Reanna was able to stand and lift you onto the seat. Not that weren't still surprised at her ability to do so.

You briefly wondered as you pulled yourself upright why Reanna would put you in a position to dive headfirst out the window if you were foolish enough. Then her red face reminded you she wasn't thinking about that.

"I deeply regret breaking into your home. It was most disrespectful of me. If you let me go, I shall never return to New Forazio for the rest of my days" You did your best to bow which wasn't easy with your hands as they were. You hoped your civility would appeal to her.

"I see" Reanna said slowly. She had stared at you intently as you spoke, as if she was seeing you as a person for the first time. She shifted her hands in her lap, now avoiding eye contact. Her expression turned uncomfortable, almost sad.

"Do you despise me?" she asked still looking out the window. You were taken back by the question. How human it was. "No my lady I-" "I hold no hatred if you do" You now had to factor in that what you thought was relevant to her, which previously was unthinkable.

You had to pick your words very carefully. "No my lady I don't" You finished this time. There was a long pause. "I did not lie you know." She took a sharp breath. "When I said I'd offer you a life" She turned to face you. Her expression continued to be melancholy. "I have no ladies in waiting and I..." Her voice trailed off and she shot her gaze into her lap, then turned back to the window.

Again you were in disbelief. It was almost if she was a normal girl with a oh! It made more sense now. She had a legitimate crush on you! She was more normal than you thought. Although you couldn't discern still whether she was just used to getting her way or simply warped.

The flush in your cheeks to mirror hers at your realization was noticed out of the corner of her eye, and it became clear she knew the reason. "I've had company in my bedchamber before but rarely so well endowed." You tried turning slightly to ignore her glance at your chest.

" I understand you have no reason to trust me, but I simply couldn’t let such a chance slip away." The concern on her face looked as real as one could get, though you still worried this was some kind of trap. "I shall host a celebration at my chateau to honor the quelling of the conspiracy against me, and you shall be free to go. I only ask that you join me for the revelry." She kept a warm demeanor.

It was clear by "conspiracy" she meant you, which meant if she did so you really would be free. As far as you could tell, taking her offer had the least risk to your life regardless of the sincerity of her intentions. "Thank you my lady" You answer shakily.

Within a few moments the carriage stopped, to your surprise. Reanna opened the door to the carriage and gestured. "Come then" She said with a smile. You were helped out by Reanna and treated to a wondrous sight.

Like all Forazion architecture, Reanna's chateau was white adorned with gold, it's shining pronouncement of wealth drawing the eye to the sun drenched courtyard populated by marble fountains. The crystal clear water spewing monoliths depicted various figures you were unfamiliar with.

"I do hope partaking of all this provides some anodyne for my actions." Reanna responded to your look of marvel. You were pulled literally and figuratively from your temporary trance by Reanna's men dragging you away from her. "Halt!" She called out. "This woman has proven most useful. She has given the names I require to begin dealing with those who have betrayed me. She is an honored guest. Uncuff her." Reanna's men had clearly gotten tired of being on the receiving end of her lashings, for they gave you up without a fight. You rubbed your wrists in relief.

You were however, concerned. You weren't sure if you had thrown her off, but Reanna's lie seemed less airtight than her previous ones, the irony not lost on you. "My lady" You bowed and approached slowly. " I am truly grateful, but I gave you no names. What shall you tell your men?" You asked as respectfully as you could. "You mean since you are connected to no one who has betrayed me?" She smiled knowingly."Er yes " You didn't know how to respond.

"The answer is simple" She smiled innocently. "Invite them to my celebration" Your eyes widened.
14411111112121.title: Carpet Diem

144111111121211.content:
Reanna extends a hand gesturing you through the courtyard. It takes you a moment to process the full ramifications of her words. "You mean you're actually in danger?" You ask, legitimate worry leaking into your voice. Reanna looks at you as you traipse, her demeanor somehow still warm as befitting the scenery.

"Dissent is not something I'm unfamiliar with. That would be... unwise for someone of my influence." She seemed completely unfazed. "Common enough that you coming through my window, on the same evening that a movement planned against me was by no means impossible." Her tone bounced with pride. "In fact" she raised a pointer finger to the air."Your arrival confirmed it."

One look at your face confirmed to Reanna she had lost you. "The guard I called to assist me. How long it took him to reach my room. How nervous he was when I had him tie you to the bed. Not because of you. Because of me." The bemused look didn't leave you. Reanna turned towards you and waggled her extended finger.

"I don't hire novices from the city guard. Peddler's sons their first day in a suit of armor. You've seen more than enough of the men I hire. But that..." She paused. "Wasn't his fatal error. It was the name he gave. Informing me of Lord Austren's complaint. Why would one of my guests say anything of my absence to my guard rather than my servants? It was a threat, but of a far different nature." You had to admit her deduction was sound if not unnerving, although Reanna only seemed to accept the compliment she saw in your face.

"But my Lady, if this Lord Austren plots against you, why reveal himself? Not to mention in such a bold manner?" You had to know where she was going with this. "That" she gestures to keep walking. "Is an excellent question" she gives you an approving glance. "One to which I have the answer. Lord Austren does not conspire alone." You had figured that, but it didn't feel any better hearing it. "But he still put himself at risk" you say as you reach the stairs, the gleaming white stone reaching far upwards.

"Lord Austren is a man whose name is all he holds of his family's legacy. A man I would refuse from this gathering, circumstances or otherwise. Meaning he was coerced into such a move by one with far greater status than him. Someone who made him promises they most likely have no intention of keeping. We are talking of someone...who rivals my status." She looked at you with a sense of accomplishment.

The gravity of the situation stops you short for a moment as you reach the landing. "Are there even people in the Forazio court who hold as much power as you my lady?" You ask, making sure to word the question correctly. Her amused expression implied her awareness of you walking on eggshells.

"As much as I'd like to say otherwise I cannot. I take pride informing you there are less than ten. However, they number far too many for me to simply have someone thrown in irons." You reached the entrance to the manor itself. "Thus I shall invite them all here under the pretense that I have caught whoever is responsible. A most advantageous position to hold don't you agree?" She beamed.

"Your diplomatic prowess is quite impressive my lady" You reply, your legitimate respect of her bravery in the face of danger clear in your voice. "Now you know why I called you an amateur" Reanna quips with a smirk. You were in way too far over your head for that to bruise your ego. "Well then, I shall need to make preparations for such a momentous occasion. Shall we?" She states as before pushing the large ornate doors open.
144111111121211.title: The Sun casts a shadow...

1441111111212111.content:
The inside of Reanna's summer abode looked just as much like a painting as the outside. A very valuable painting at that, the cutpurse in you mused as Reanna ushered you into a foyer draped in blue curtains and tapestries. As your eyes took a slow pan of each room you caught a glimpse of Reanna watching you with a childish smile, which you attributed to her narcissistic pride. But even you couldn't deny that touching anything in this place felt illegal.

At first the loud footsteps of you and Reanna's retinue was all that could be heard echoing against marble, but upon entering the main hall, you could barely hear yourself think among the chattering of men and women dressed in bright white and leathers. As a group of them came towards you and began bombarding Reanna with questions it became clear they were her wait staff. As Reanna informed them of the details of her intended gala, you took the time to think of a way to slip out. As much as the idea of all the richest people in New Forazio being gathered in one place gave you fantasies of being set for life, you had already made the mistake of sticking around once and were NOT going to make it again.

Before you could get further into your plan than "Wait for the party to start" you were interupted by the sound of Reanna clearing her throat dramatically near your face. "I will not miss my own party a second time and you will not again be the cause of it. Come now" She grabbed your shoulder and ushered you upstairs, as you attempted to decide which bit more, her tongue or her grip.

You were brought down a hallway of endless bedrooms traced together by a blue carpet until you reached the largest one which took up the whole end of the hall, obviously belonging to Reanna herself. The inside of the chamber was adorned with many sun filled windows and an area that appeared to be it's own dressing room. Reanna let go of your arm, and the slight pain that shot through upon release made you realize just how tight she was holding. "Any reason you're only chatting for the sake of wit?" You quip as you rub the affected area. Your kneejerk reaction is to bring your hand to your mouth, panic hitting you. But to your relief, Reanna's response is calm. "I have a part to play" She says plain faced. "As do you"

As relieved as you are at her demeanor, you find your legs unable to move, trembling. Reanna looks down, noticing the stark movement and you see her bite her lip. She walks over and leans her back against the railing of her comically large bed. "You're allowed to be human around me you know. I do not deny that I haven't conveyed that very well. A terrifying mien is quite necessary I'm afraid." She looks over to see you still frozen stiff. "As I've very rudely mentioned I have... partners within my staff willing to... Do as I ask." Her expression is pained. "Forazio is open to slaves, suffice it to say that is not what I'm looking for." Her grip upon the railing is much like that on your arm. You see words come to her lips, but Reanna stifles them with what appears to be legitimate anguish. Her face, now filled with color, looks at you and then away. "I have an outfit I feel will... compliment you, if you're willing to humor me. I shall fetch servants for the preparation at once." Reanna makes a hurried exit of the room, and you can't decide whether her head is spinning more, or yours.
1441111111212111.title: The Eye of the storm.

14411111112121111.content:
You run your hand against your forehead and find that your face is warm. You settle your nerves and begin to realize how awkward you feel in Reanna's room without her. As much as your instincts tell you to bolt, the thought pangs in your head that the girl isn't a threat right now.

You move to the nearest windowsill and lean against it, exhaling at the cool breeze against the back of your neck. You take a moment to give Reanna's abode a closer look. Like the rest of the palace quality structure, the furnishings are adorned in gold with a blue motif, the bed against the wall to your left next to what you could only describe as a dressing chamber.

The walls are adorned with large and small paintings depicting various grasslands and armies upon them. One of a Calvary unit catches your eye because you see what appears to be New Forazio in the background. The white wall surrounding the city, famous for fending off various barbaric vagabonds, is hard to miss. All in all, the room is quite similar to Reanna's in her estate, and you bite your lip at the irony.

However something odd strikes you. Examining it through the lens of comparison with Reanna's estate room you notice a detail. In your relatively short career of thieving whenever you broke into a residence you always checked who it belonged to, paperwork and store records. Which reminded you that when you entered Reanna's room that fateful night, whilst hiding from her you had scanned the room for a family crest, upon seeing the grandeur of the girl before you. And during your unwilling stay you had never seen one. Yet here above the painting, in the shape of a shield was two horses beside a blade in white and blue. Odder still was that there was only one. As distracted as you were during your tour, your eyeing of Reanna's valuables surely would have caught wind of this. Reanna was certainly proud of her things, so if this was her family's why hide it? You couldn't imagine a reason.

You turn your head to see Reanna coming with three women, carrying various sewing utensils. "You're going to have a fitting of course" She says to the point, but with a smile. "Right this way please" gestures a young girl with bright red hair. You feel uncomfortable at this whole affair but see no way out of it. The other two women begin pulling out various cloths.You walk with the red haired girl to the dressing chamber. Noticing your sheepishness, she looks towards you with a smile warm as the sun."I'm Sara by the way M'lady" Her formality catches you off guard, but you then realize that to anyone who didn't see the scene outside, you're an honored guest. You're brought past enough expensive dresses, bodices and corsets to dress an army's worth of women, then finally to a panel surrounded mirror.

"If it's not too much trouble, I'll need you to undress a bit M'lady" Sara says with apprehension, but a tone that tells you she's said it many times before. You take a deep breath, and slip your vest off, then the leather tunic underneath. You cross your arms over your bra, still trying to adjust. "I know I'm not your usual dresser, but I'm gonna need you to work with me M'lady" She gestures for your arms out to the sides, and after a moment you comply, as you begin to realize Sara really is as kind and genuine as she seems. She takes various measurements of your arms and shoulders. The process however becomes torturous as her fingers end up sliding along your skin. Your muscles jerk slightly each time, but you keep from saying anything. Upon measuring your stomach Sara pokes you in the side after a good 30 seconds of reprieve, and you let out an "eep!" without thinking. Sara looks up at your contorted face, and immediately brings a hand to her mouth. "I'm so sorry M'lady I didn't know you were so sensitive" She seems legitimately concerned, but also wants to giggle. "I usually only dress Lady Reanna, so I've never had this problem before." The fact that Reanna wasn't as unbearably ticklish as you kind of seemed like a kick in the head, but you silenced your irritation.

Sara finishes her measures of your upper body with a more careful demeanor. She gives you a concerned look then gestures for you to remove the rest of your clothes. "The rest stays, including the boots" you say firmly "I kind of just bought them". Sara looks briefly puzzled, then reaffirms herself. "Very well then M'lady, it shall be an overhead dress." She collects a few things in the room. "The boots are nice, and recommended. Much of the festivities will be the garden so they won't out of place" She says with bubbly enthusiasm. She exits the room and you spend a few minutes cupping your hands around your skin. You're amazed that Reanna has people that actually enjoy working for her. The only logical conclusion you can come to is that those moments of vulnerability Reanna's been showing are actually some warm side of her. Perhaps Sara has seen it?

You're snapped from your thoughts by Sara's voice. "Is this to your liking M'lady?" You turn and can't believe your eyes. In front of you Sara is holding the most expensive looking garment you have EVER seen. A two tone blue dress with dizzying floral patterns down the middle, with a golden trimmed outline inside and along the torso. The ornate qualities of the material make you question wearing it. It's clear that Reanna intends to dress you as well as herself. "It is in fact, one of Lady Reanna's garments, but I had to make some adjustments." Sara corrects your thoughts. "Forgive me if I am indelicate M'lady but you have quite an... ample form" She blushes slightly. You reaffirm your grip on your chest at the mention of your features. "I mean it only in the highest of regards M'lady, I daresay there will be few men who do not ask for your hand tonight." She smiles again warmly. She slips the dress over you, and to your amazement, it feels perfect. As perfect as you can imagine a garment of of this nature feels considering you've never owned one. What magic Sara used to make one of Reanna's dresses fit you, you do not know, but you're thankful you won't be stuck in discomfort. You eye yourself up in the mirror while Sara checks the dress and the experience to you feels surreal. Sara gestures you out of the chamber and you step slowly, full of trepidation, careful not to ruin the hem.

You exit the dressing chamber to find Reanna waiting in a garment equally as extravagant. "Ahh just as perfect as I'd imagined." Reanna claps her hands with delight. She notices your eyes look behind her at the windows and she follows your gaze. The light from the windows has grown significantly dim, to the point of almost sunset. By your estimation you've been getting dressed for a few hours! "It's already getting dark?" You question out loud. Reanna chuckles and smirks and at you. "My expertise got you ready right in time for the ball.The guests are JUST now arriving. Quite weary living my life isn't it?" She muses. Reanna extends a hand to you. "Come now. We have much to do, you and I".
14411111112121111.title: Gearing up.

choices: ..and it's just too far. They tackle you to the ground.
..You leap up on onto the window frame, ready to make your escape!
1441112.content:
Just as your noble captor basks in victory, you give her one might push and send her to the floor. She looks at you, first stunned, before her face twists into a venomous glare. A brief moment of silence passes between you both decide to act.

"You..you will suffer for that!" She hisses as she lunges for you. Fortunately, you anticipated her attack and roll to one side, scrambling to your feet while she flounders on the floor. In the adventure tales that inspired you to be a thief, this would be the point where you spouted a triumphant one liner and perhaps sliced your initials into her frock. You decide to forgo that for now, though, as you've got more important things on your mind. More important things like total, abject terror of the sociopath woman who seems to want to keep you prisoner.

A host of six or seven armoured guards burst into the small room to compound your issues. They immediately turn their attention to you and begin to draw their weapons, before the noblewoman's voice snaps out an order.

"Take her alive! No weapons! If I see so much as a scar I'll have you all flogged!"

Going through the door is out of the question, you'll have to get out through the window. Unfortunately, there is a troop of large men and one surprisingly strong young woman. The men seem to take her threat seriously as two of them clumsily lunge towards you, but thanks to your agility, you easily slip past them. A third charges, actually seizing you by the arm, but you're ready for him. You grab a container of powder and throw the thing into his face. He staggers back, pawing at his eyes and cursing you.

While it's an impressive display, you're not out of the woods yet. There's a clear run at the window now, but it's going to be a real test of your dexterity. You begin a desperate dash for freedom, slipping by a fourth guard as you do. The pair you humiliated, though, are now getting up and the others are converging too. This is going to have to be it..!
1441112.title: ..she goes crashing to the floor!

choices: Dragged before her peers to be requested to be locked up
Locked in a cage she requests be brought to the room
144112.content:
You'd blush at the compliment if the person saying it wasn't basically straddling you. You begin to struggle, but she pins your wrists together with one hand.

"Let's see what you're hiding." She picks up the bottom of your shirt and lifts it until it's completely covering your face, eyes and all, leaving your bare chest on display. "Ooh!" she tittered, "I like what I see. So much so that I think I'll keep you." You don't like the sound of that, so you resume struggling. Unfortunately, she let's out the least favorite sound of every thief. "Guards! Guards! Help! Help me! There's a thief in my room! A thief! Help!" This just makes you struggle even harder, forcing her to get off of you. She takes your shirt with over your head and over your arms.

You seize your chance to escape, but you suddenly feel some material being forced into your mouth. Apparently, she had balled up your shirt and was now using it as a gag. The doors burst open and three guards burst in, rapiers drawn. "Are you alright, my lady?" asks one with a helmet that made it look like he had a bowl on his head.

"No thanks to you, Mohor," she snaps, "this thief could've made it away with my brooch and who else knows what by the time you got here! Now strip him of his boots and pants before you bind him!"

You manage to break out of her grip, but are so winded that you don't notice the pig faced guard and his comrade with the frizzy hair sticking out of his helmet jump you until you feel your arms being yanked away from you. As they begin to tie you up, Mohor removes your boots and then Yanks your pants down, revealing several stolen goods (you don't care for that, you're too busy thanking that you remembered to put on clean underwear.) "Hey, look at this haul!" exclaims the frizzy haired guard.

"Yeah, that must be quite a pair of pants to hold all that dough," adds the pig faced guard.

"Lharys! Kurleket!" their mistress barks. "Once you've secured his upper limbs, do the same to his lower ones." The two oblige while your weapon is also confiscated. Once the guards are done, the noblewoman turns your back to the side of her bed and picks up your blade. "Mohor, Lharys, stand guard outside. Kurleket, take the goods to our host, then request for sentries at the foot of this tower." She gives them her instructions without glancing up from your knife.

"Yes ma'am." The three stooges respond and leave to carry out their orders. The minute they're gone, the noblewoman looks up at you and shuffles seductively to you. "Such a fine blade," she muses with what you think is a sociopathic smile. "You know, I think it's sad that a handsome stud such as yourself has to resort to thievery." She's close enough so that you could see down her cleavage. "Live with me and you won't have to. Or," she brings your dirk to your throat. You gulp as best as you can while also trying keep away from the pointy tip, "the consequences will be grave. But in the meantime," she moves your dirk away from your throat and down to your belly, which you instinctively suck in...try to, anyway, "what will I do with you?"

Yes, what does happen to you?
144112.title: Handsome Man!

1442.content:
Tantalizing targets as they are the royal houses and museum need planning and time to tackle. The last few days on the road here have starved you and it's probably smarter to start easy in the market and work your way up. Besides the nobility might leave the security of their estates to browse the wares. They'd more than likely have more than a few coins they could be parted with.

You remind yourself not to be too hasty in your move as you survey the market. You pull the hood slightly lower over your face as you gage the depth of the crowd, map escape routes and estimate the cost of goods on display.

The wafting scents of good food and expensive drink flood your mouth with saliva and you swear your stomach roars louder than a wyvern. The buzz from the crowd is frequently called over by vendors advertising their wares and frantic laughter as you pass a slave trader. A crowd of upper-class nobles look on as a woman, clearly dressed to distract, danced her fingers over a half-naked slave bound to a pole and head thrown back in ticklish laughter. The tickler seems to enjoy tormenting him too much for your liking.

You pass a finely clothed merchant, your fourth, flanked by two armed guards as he browses expensive trinkets and exotic oddities, too dear for a commoner to find any value in. They're all guarded. Not that you expected any different but it would have been nice to see at least one stupid or overconfident noble, silly enough to go out alone.

The vendors bombard you with offers sales- the finest weapons and armor, fine wines from Shajan, treasures that are most certainly not forgeries from the deepest depths of Dormduo. Books of magic and power. Exotic spices. Ticklish slaves. "The time of your life," a barely dressed woman winks at the crowd. No idea what the specifics are, but the other scantily clad woman and the long feather she's holding are an indicator. She blows a kiss at you and you blush, smiling back at her. Maybe another time...

With your mental map updated and fairly confident you recall what's being sold and who's worth your time it's finally time to do what you do best.
1442.title: Start easy

choices: When someone shouts and a hand grips your shoulder.
14421.content:
In your defense, the way the nobles carry their coins so openly, it's too tempting an offer not to take up. It's just a matter of finding the right mark. The slave markets are target rich environments, but guarded closely, both by the men of the nobles and the slavers. There are plenty moving alone but their bodyguards watch them like hawks and eye-up any stranger coming close. What you need is a distraction. Something like...

A woman's voice suddenly cries out in laughter. Rounding the corner you see the two girls have found a client. One smiles to herself as she watches a nobleman tickle the other, now with her hands bound behind her head and unable to escape the teasing torment of the feather she felt before as it glides over her ribs and toned stomach. His guards look on, enjoying the show and covering him at the same time.

The noblewoman behind however, is also enjoying the show. As are her guards. Bingo. As you move in you lock onto the purse on her belt, checking to make sure no guard or potential vigilante is watching you. You stop for a second, pretending to admire a fine necklace in a display cabinet before closing in. Nonchalantly you reach out and take hold of the bag of coins. A gentle tug is all it takes to come lose. And without a break in your stride you keep walking...
14421.title: Art of distraction

choices: The noblewoman you pickpocketed. With her guards.
The girl selling slaves who blew you a kiss earlier.
144211.content:
Reining in the desire to laugh in joy, you kept walking and didn't look back until you were on the other side of the market and the coin purse is in your pockets. When you do look back, you see that the noblewoman still hasn't discovered her missing money. Grinning wryly, you turn back and head out of the market. Normally, you'd attempt to pocket a few more purses, but at the rate your stomach's growling is increasing in volume, you might get caught at the next attempt. So you quickly head out of the market in search of food.

You skip the first few places you see just in case the noblewoman comes looking when she finds her money stolen, but finally settle into a nice pub with plenty of room. After ordering your first meal in days, (beef stew with chopped vegetables added) you find yourself a secluded table on a balcony on the second floor, which gives you a good view of the main section of the establishment. Including the door, in case someone appears that you might wish to hide from.

About an hour later, you've finished your second bowl of stew and half a pint of ale when someone familiar catches your eye coming through the door. It's...
144211.title: Undetected.

1442112.content:
hey there she said, so the two of you sit at a tabe. so i heard u sell slaves, she said yes i do o i dident introce my self,, my name is slave rider.
i have demi god's human's alike, are you looking for one, she said. i wouldent be asking you for one if i dident whant one,
ok, well i have a challenge let me tickel you for one, if u can make it, i will give you 2 demi god's as ur slaves,
but if u loose i will only give you 1 demi god , so deal or no deal,
you asked ur self,, do i whant to take on the challenge and let her tickel me for 2 demi god's
or should i just take one for 50 gil.
1442112.title: The girl selling slaves who blew you a kiss ear...

1443.content:
The Museum of Natural Enjoyment was an odd, if mysterious, aspect of New Forazio. The large building was three storeys high with two large wings coming out from the centre. It dominated the southern side of the Market Place, the darkened bricks giving an almost ominous feel to the place as it loomed over the smaller stalls. Entrance was forbidden to all but the Aristocracy, the young King apparently spending a great deal of his evenings while away from prying eyes. Rumours abounded as to what took place inside, the majority of the staff being female adding fuel to the fires of gossip as many wondered if the King had been ensared by the various decadent aspects that were thought to take place in the building.

From outside, the building looked daunting, the only entrance on the ground floor being a large double set of doors that were guarded constantly. The door was but one entrance in and to a skilled thief such as yourself, the windows presented ample opportunities. Selecting one that was obscured from view from the Market Place, you throw a hooked rope into the air, the sound of glass breaking as it finds its target. You wait a moment to see if there's any outcries but nothing happens, the darkness of the night giving you ample cover to move up, climbing up the rope until you reach the window, clambering through and hitting the floor.

Getting up, you scan round the room and see its largely empty, only a few dusty boxes littering it as it seemed that it had long been in disuse. Taking the rope from the window and storing it for later, you exit the room via a door that leads to a corridor. You take a breath before heading onwards, hoping to reach the fabled treasures of the Museum. Jewels were said to line the bedrooms, gold used for mere candlesticks, the very height of decadence and expensive tastes. All up for grabs for someone who was wily enough to get them.

Your journey up the corridor eventually comes to a fork, one leading directly ahead further along the same floor while to the left, a staircase leading directly down to the bottom floor. From it, you hear the echoes of faint screams, unable to discern much than they seem to be a mixture of male and female voices. That could lead to a party with people that might lead to treasures but at great risk. Maybe it would be safer to continue along the corridor?
1443.title: Museum of Natural Enjoyment

choices: Run forward to try to push them aside and maybe hide in another room
14432.content:
You decide to investigate and quietly shuffle down the stairs. As you reach the bottom floor, the sounds of screams intensify, and you can hear what seems to be laughs among them. You hide under a small table near the stairs, and take a peek out under the tablecloth.

In front of you is a big, high-ceilinged room, lit on the walls by ornate torches and covered on the ground by a soft-looking rug. A large tapestry with the word enjoyment" is hung on the back wall. Wooden doors on either sides of the room lead to other rooms and wings. In the room are a number of well-dressed, pretty women, who you assume are the female staff. Locked in stocks, on x-frames and just being held down are several rich looking people who strike you as young noblemen. The several girls are tickling the men in the room with hands, feathers, and the edges of their frilly dresses, and you realize that what you perceived as screaming is actually rather pleased laughter. After taking a look at the ladies, you guess why the common populace (like yourself) isn't allowed to be inside this building!

At this moment while you are thinking you absentmindedly sit up and knock your head on the table you're under, knocking a small glass bowl off it onto the stone floor. The noise it makes as it smashes echoes throughout the large room. The four or five ladies in the room turn and look at you. In a second they recognize you as a common ruffian, and cease tickling. The women approach you.

What do you do?
14432.title: Go down the stairs

144321.content:
so you said to ur self im gunna try and run past them, so u try to run past them but the 5 lady's got u do the ground, 2 girls is holding you down,
2 girl's is holding ur leg's, she said wel well look at what we have here, a thief, trying to steal some of our stuff, lady's what shall we do to him
tickel him to death, one lady's said, u have a look on ur face trying to move but to no afial. look we dont have to do this.
even though u said to ur self , tickeling by lady's arnt so bad. then the girl's just kept holding you down and the first lady pinned down and started tickling ur feet, u said not there anywhere but there , the lady said not on ur feet huh why u ticklish. yeah i am. so she well then she said i just tickel your feet. o man this bad what shall i do. should i try to break for it. or just let them tickel me and give in to it.
144321.title: Run forward to try to push them aside and maybe...

145.content:
On the east side of the city sits an old tomb, where members of nobility were laid to rest with untold riches. The expansive crypt hasn't been used for centuries, though, as it is believe to be cursed and very haunted. You believe these are stories to simply discourage grave robbers, and believe you could stake out a hefty claim on what treasures the dead tried to take with them.

There's also a caravan passing through the Bazaar known for their exotic magical treasures, at 'reasonable' prices. Do you think you can outswindle the swindlers?

There might still be more to do, though.
145.title: Other

15.content:
Even more paths to take...

In the snowy mountains to the north lies kingdom called Eisbrecher. The king, old but healthy, had three children: two sons, born only an hour apart, and a daughter born a year later. It's clear that the eldest son will inherit the throne when the king passes, but there are whispers of dark plans afoot in the castle. Events will unfold during your visit, and the question is... how will you get mixed up in it, and will you be able to make it out alive in the end?

From traveling so much, you have found that the law can be too slow and that sometimes it must be taken into your own hands. While exploring the world, you also serve as a vigilante of sorts, taking down criminals before they can escape. In a small oriental-styled settlement made by people from across the seas, troubles started when one of their own stole a ship and decided to become a pirate. She goes by the name of "Ruby" due to the color of her hair and obsession with the color of red, and she was last spotted heading west along the coast. Can you take her down, or will you become her latest prize?

Your adventures led you to a secret tower in the hills where people were trained in the art of magic. Rather than killing you, or turning you into a frog, they sensed an innate ability in magic within you and decided to accept you as a trainee. Now, several years later, it is nearing the time of "The Test" which all students must pass before being allowed to learn more advanced spells. Let us hope you are ready for it.

Far far far to the south, where one can boil water by merely placing it in the sun, lies a vast desert. There are rumors of an oasis somewhere within it where both your dreams and nightmares can come true. Just the smallest chance that it is true has fueled hundreds to seek it. All have found nothing. Some have never returned. Will you be the one to finally uncover the secret, or will this be your last journey?

And still, the paths continue...
15.title: More options

choices: You hear the call of the snow harpies!
You hear a roar of a yeti!
The snow stops, and you make it to Eisbrecher
151.content:
You had laughed at the mountaineers as they warned you about the climb. The path to Eisbrecher could only be traversed in the spring, they had said, mentioning that sudden blizzards could send even experienced climbers tumbling into deep chasms. But the promise of kingly wealth was stronger than the lectures of village peasants, so you mocked the warnings even as you sensed the chill grow in the air. No pain, no gain, you had told yourself.

Now, you teetered on the edge of a treacherous cliff, praying that the snowfall stops so you can stumble back to a safer road.

Why did these northern fools live here anyways, you thought hopelessly as your frostbitten fingers gripped icy-cold handholds. Eisbrecher had better serve me a gods-damned feast for this!

It was now the third day of the climb, and there was no going back. You certainly weren't going to face the villagers after you derided them; but more importantly, several bridges had collapsed moments after you crossed them. The winds howled, and there was zero visibility. Your face, although tightly bundled in fine furs, was still being pelted by whipping hailstones. All of the gods of Zenith seemed like they wanted you dead. And if the snow and hail didn't stop soon, that's exactly what was going to happen.

However...
151.title: Conspiracy at Eisbrecher

choices: The creature takes you to a harpy nest
The creature takes you to a castle
1511.content:
Though the wind was howling, you thought you heard something in the distance. Almost like a voice - a sharp, shrill voice. Dismissing it as your imagination, you continue to patiently wait for the storm to end. However, you hear the sound again; this time, much, much closer. You try to find the source, but you can barely see a foot in front of you. But now, you can't dismiss the sound: it belongs to a monstrous creature emerging from the blizzard!

You yelp as two enormous talons seem to materialize from the snow. They grasp your outstretched arms tightly, closing down with vice-like strength. Though you can't see their owner, you can sense a massive form, just out of sight in the blinding weather. For a brief moment it feels like you're falling - your frost-bitten hands useless as you're yanked from the stone surface. You begin to scream, expecting a long fall into a snowy oblivion. But suddenly, you're floating; your entire body held aloft by the talons. Their owner must be fantastically strong; you soar through the blizzard, seeing nothing in any direction, but feeling the immense pressure from the talons.

"My, my," croaks a feminine voice from above. "Lost in the storm, pretty thing?" Whoever was holding on to you was talking! The wind is whipping past you, but you try to shout a reply.

"Uh, thanks! I was really stuck back there," you yell upwards, most of your voice lost in the storm.

The creature, whatever it was, merely cackled. You really did not like the sound of that laughter. It was hard to make conversation in this position, but you tried anyway.

"Where are you taking me, ah, miss?!" Although you see absolutely nothing, you suspected the road was not this way.

But again, all you heard was a cackle; especially creepy as it echoed into the raging storm. Resigning yourself to your situation, you're thankful for the help - whatever this creature's reason.
1511.title: You hear the call of the snow harpies!

choices: You wake up in a bed, cuddled up to a harpy.
You wake up to see several harpies staring at you.
15111.content:
The creature holding you in her talons continues to fly effortlessly through the blizzard. While you're grateful for the rescue, the quick movement through the wintry sky is chilling you to the bone. You can't help but shiver and chatter your teeth.

"Don't worry, pretty little human." The creature holding you tells you. "We're almost there. I have you now, I won't let you freeze on me." The comment is reassuring, although you wonder a little at the 'I have you' bit. Her voice sounds like a normal woman's, although from the talons holding you she's clearly something else. And clearly larger and more powerful than you. All you can do is hope that your rescuer is benevolent, considering your held and half-frozen state, you doubt you could fend off much of anything hostile right now.

But you don't have to contemplate that for long. The sky parts, and you can finally see where you're being taken. A large sheer cliff covers one side of a particularly tall mountain. And across the cliff face appear to be caves or holes of some kind leading deeper into the mountain. In some of them you can make out fires lit, and the prospect of a warm fire makes you forget everything else.

The two of you reach one of the cave mouths, and you feel yourself being gently dropped to the stone floor amidst the beating of mighty wings. With what little energy you have left, you crawl towards the fire, feeling the life-giving warmth on your skin and clothing. You lay there in the warmth, feeling as if you've spent the last of your strength. Now you have a moment to relax somewhere warm, you find yourself getting terribly sleepy.

Fighting sleep, you look up to finally get a glimpse at your rescuer. She stands at almost twice your height, probably almost ten feet tall. Her skin is the pale blue, the color of the icy lakes here. Her face is actually quite pretty: snow white 'hair' of some kind of feathery material, and eyes of a steely grey. She wears very little clothing: her top is a fur lined leather garment that only serves to cover her chest; her "pants," if they could be called that, are a similar fur lined item that covers her intimate parts, but completely exposes her thighs. You wonder how such a creature stays warm. But the obvious parts are the ones which are not human. Below the knees the skin becomes hard and bird-like, ending in a pair of large, sharp talons. And her arms quickly lose their human characteristics to become a very large pair of white wings. A snow harpy.

You don't know much about snow harpies. And the fatigue doesn't help, as you can barely keep open your half lidded eyes. You remember hearing about their impressive size, as well as their long lifespans. There was something else, but now you can't remember it at all. Glancing up at her again, you notice that her figure is actually quite impressive. Her body looks toned but lightweight, and your eyes linger on her smooth thighs, firm stomach, and not-insignificant chest. The snow harpy sees you looking at her, and smiles at you.

"Sleep now, tired little one." She tells you softly. "You will have much to do tomorrow, with those hands of yours. And I am sure you will find the company of my flock to give you much smiles and laughter." Before you can figure out what any of that means for you, sleep finally takes you, and you fall unconscious next to the comforting warmth of the fire.
