"NOOOHOOOOO!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAH AAAHHH!!!!" Tears began to well up in your eyes as Mesmera switched to feathers and fingernails.
You had never felt such a sensation in your life, Mesmera was tickling you all over your body, and in your weakest spots. You tried to suppress the urge, but it kept building up inside of you. Finally, you let it go.
"YEEEHEHEHESS!!!" You cried, "DOOHOHOHON'T STAAHAHAHAHAP!!!!"
"Ah, that's what we wanted, a nice ticklegasm!" You felt humiliated but you couldn't help but beg for more, the vixen's fingers played over your body, softly tickling every spot on it.
1521122112.title: "BAHAHAHA NOHOHO! NAHAHAT THAHAT!!!!"

choices: You could get used to this.
15211221122.content:
"................et up................"

You remember a sword slashing at the mesmers chains. It was...your own.

"....................at ticklish, huh?"

You remember being shackled yourself, your body in a drug like state as your mind was recovering from being broken in an illusion yet fine re-entering reality.

"........come to your new home! For saving me, even if it was pathetic, I'm going to be kind enough to keep you. You're always free to say no, but...I can give you EVERYTHING. All you have to do is live shackled in a furnished cave miles from civilization."

You start to come to. Right, Mesmera had finished playing with you, noticed your true intention, and decided to help the rescue attempt work. To make sure YOU didn't try anything, though, she had your arms shackled and, just in case you could use magic, had been quick to gag you with some cloth. You were on a soft, fluffy bed in a well lit cave, your right foot shackled to the bottom left leg of the bed. She had always been kind enough to...relieve you of your things and replace it with something more fitting 'a loyal, loving savior.' Clothes from the desert regions east of here...in any modern setting, you would look like one of those harem girls from Arabian tales, not that you knew that terminology. She had thought pink your color- pink veil, pink clothes, pink everything, except the circlets and armlets that kept them there. You were too dazed to complain, sadly, as she had put the clothes on you.

Of course, besides the fact the clothes screamed 'suggestive', their true purpose was not lost on you. She knew you liked the tickling, both in and out of reality, and she was making sure she could always capitalize on it.

Now with a clear head, Mesmera stood before you, smiling sweetly. "Dear, you're fine again! Great. The gag is out, so when you wish to speak, do so. As for your reward for saving me...well, life being the recipient of endless pleasure...and tickling. You should be honored! For a Mesmer to offer this means that we truly owe you everything. Slavery isn't bad when the slave likes it, yes?...Of course...if you don't like this, you can just ask for me to let you go. At that point, I'll break your mind a bit so you forget where I live. So, dear...freedom or pleasure?" She asked, getting straight to the point.
15211221122.title: Safe...?

choices: Ruby is there and wants her magic back.
152112212.content:
"I....I was coming...to free you..." You said, panting. In an instant, the tendrils went away, and you hit the ground.

You woke up, the glazed look in your eyes gone. Mesmera was there, a shackle hanging off her wrist. Next to her was a sword you had brought with you; she had used this to escape her bonds, no doubt. She was smirking at you, her face to yours. "Well, why didn't you say so? I was having fun thinking you were a guard. In fact, I was about to leave myself. Pretty ironic that I ended up doing your job..." Your frown made her grumble a bit and pat your shoulder. "Look, sorry. You gave me the tools. Thanks, okay? When we get out of here, I'll be sure to give you something good...while we continue our fun, of course." She smirked devilishly.

You knew enough about her species to know that, while mischievous, they generally kept their word. You could see good money coming from ACTUALLY rescuing her. Besides, taking her hostage and holding her for ransom were FAR out of the window with her powers now known to you. You didn't like her hinting at playing with you more, but...you were sure she wouldn't go too far next time.

"So, let's go!" She said, walking out the door with you behind her.
152112212.title: Mercy at last!

choices: Check out the other rooms here
15213.content:
You hatch a plan to even your odds in dealing with the pirate queen.

Quickly and quietly you fish some lengths of rope from your pack and tip toe to the soundly sleeping pirate, just as she begins snoring thunderously.

With feather-light caution, you tie the sleeping pirate's ankles together and attach the rope end to the foot of the hammock. Then you slowly tie her wrists and pull them, extremely carefully, up over her head, attaching that rope to the other end of the hammock. Once that's taken care of, you grab a worn knee sock near one of the discarded boots and work it slowly and gently between her teeth, drawing the ends up behind her head, and, eager to surprise the luckless woman, knot it roughly in place.

The pirate's eyes fly open, clear and murderous, without any hint of inebriation. Thank the gods you didn't accidentally wake her before she was restrained! Quickly realizing her situation, the bound pirate starts bucking and thrashing wildly, shouting likely unkind things into her gag, but the noise is easily swallowed up by the clamor of raucous partying downstairs. Soon the frenzied woman is covered in sweat and spittle and quite totally exhausted.

You crouch in a shadowy corner near the door to the hall and wait. You don't have to wait long.

Heavy, unsteady footsteps approach and the door is flung clumsily open.

"Ztrella!" A female voice shouts, "you musht cm dnstairs! Hic The celembration's jsht got started!"

"Huzzah! huzzah!" a second voice intones.

Two women, stumble arm-in-arm, into the room, one of them waving a sloshing bottle of grog, both wearing the unmistakable garb of Ruby's finest toughs.

Ztrella, the pirate bound and gagged in the hammock, renews her struggling and indecipherable shouting at the sight of her approaching comrades.

"C'mon, don't whine about it! Back into your boots and come with us!" slurs one of the pirates, wavering over her trussed up friend on unsteady legs. "How on Zenith did you get all caught up in yer hammock?"

"And gagged with your sock?" Asks the other pirate, staring sideways at her struggling friend, as her drunken mind labors almost audibly to piece together the situation.

But before that happens you're looming behind the two soused sailors and a quick expert hand chop to the nape of their necks sends them both sprawling to the floor unconscious. Ztrella groans and rolls her eyes as you beam her a dashing smile.

Soon both women are tightly hogtied with the laces from their corsets, and their mouths well stuffed and gagged with their own socks. That leaves just one more guard to take care of before you can face Ruby on more or less equal footing. You slink back to the shadows near the door and wait.

You nearly nod off a time or two waiting long into the early morning before you hear another set of footsteps, dragging and unsteady, approach the room. The door whines weakly open and the fourth of Ruby's elite squad stumbles sleepily in, tugging off her corset and kicking her boots away as she walks. She grunts and spins, nearly toppling as she pries her tunic over her head and tosses it to the floor. One hand working at her belt she trips over one of her hogtied companions, who barely stirs in her drunken bondage, and spills head first into hammock, falling immediately, soundly to sleep.

You stifle a giggle at the sight of the passed out buccaneer, barefoot and topless, with her pants hanging loosely around her waist, kneeling face down in the netting of her hammock. And while it's unlikely she'll wake up any time soon, you don't hesitate to gag her and maneuver her into a hogtie next to her similarly disposed friends.

Now, with the few remaining hours before daybreak, you can apprehend Ruby with much less difficulty! Of course, you could also take a quick peek at the locked door or Mesmera's room first ...
15213.title: Deal with the Sleeping Guard

152131.content:
You creep up to the third floor and after some hasty inspection of the few suites on this level you determine that only two are occupied. And of these only one room stinks of grog and sea water, although the audible snoring from within is very coarse indeed; perhaps the pirate has a bed companion?

The unlocked door creaks quietly open and you tiptoe into the suite, closing the door behind you. The incongruity of the situation coaxes a snort of laughter from your throat:

Sprawled out on a large, pillow-laden bed near the window, outlined in the soft, early morning light, is one of the most fetching women you've ever seen, completely nude and snoring like a woodsman!

You take a good long look at her, as you quietly approach; a well-shaped athletic body, smaller than you would have expected for a pirate queen, her limbs deeply tanned in high contrast to her chest and loins which are glaringly pale. Her pert breasts rise and shudder with each powerful snore and a huge tangle of crimson hair frames her surprisingly soft face.

She doesn't appear to have any weapons on her, and only a lone scimitar sits sheathed against the headboard. You grab the scimitar and unsheathe it with a keen-sounding ring. You place the blade softly across the sleeping pirate's neck and the snoring immediately ceases. Ruby's eyes fly open and focus threateningly on you, but her body remains statue-still.

"Good morning, Sea Terror," you whisper, "please don't make a sound. The pay is the same one way or the other, but I'd hate to make a mess of things."

With agility that worries you slightly, Ruby turns her left hand over, revealing a small crystal, trimmed in brass; she clicks it with her thumb several times, and each click causes the crystal to flash dimly. Ruby says nothing, but smiles smugly.

After an awkward and confusing moment, you realize the crystal is some kind of signaling device; no doubt for her elite guard, safely bound and gagged below you. You stifle a laugh, carefully taking a rolled-up knee sock from the foot of the bed as the smile fades slowly from the pirate's face.

"It's just you and me, I'm afraid," you say, lifting the blade a few comforting inches from Ruby's throat. "Let's make this easy. Drop that silly crystal and put this sock in your mouth."

You toss the crumpled, striped stocking onto the bed near Ruby's right hand, and steady the scimitar at her; close enough to worry her, but far enough away to allow some breathing room. She stares at you another moment and then signs and ...
152131.title: Go find Ruby

1521311.content:
Stuffs the sock into her mouth, which it easily fills, causing her cheeks to bulge comically.

"Good girl," you purr, "now tie it into place with that red bandanna."

The pirate groans but does as she's told, slowly leaning up and tying her nearby bandanna around the sock gag and knotting it behind her head.

"Roll over," you say, "cross your wrists behind your back."

As she does this, staring daggers at you, and revealing an incredibly toned, blindingly white posterior, you glance around the room for something to bind her with. Your eyes land on a fortuitous coil of coarse rope, piled on the table, amid sea charts and maritime bric-a-brac.

You stretch wide toward the table, not wanting the blade of the scimitar to stray too far from your bounty, managing to just reach a rope end and pull the coil from the table with a light thump. Ruby meanwhile complying, with her face down in a mess of pillows and crimson locks.

Clumsily, you work the rope-end into a cinch, looping it around Ruby's wrists and pulling it tight before setting the scimitar down and quickly straddling the pirate's back.

Muffled grunts and groans punctuate your ropework, as you bind her wrists in several knots, before coiling the rope around her waist and up between her legs, inducing an angry squeal from the pirate.

Once her hands are safely tied to her waist, you use the rest of the rope to bind her ankles, taking special note of her oddly virgin-soft soles, and painstakingly manicured toes. Lasciviously distracted, you somehow manage to tie her dainty legs, leaving her just enough room to hobble.

You stand her up, admiring your work and her figure; she fidgets a bit, tugging uncomfortably at the rope between her legs. Once you're satisfied that none of the knots will give, you start to work on a plan to get the fugitive to the local garrison and collect your reward.

Getting the pirate out of the inn is going to be the toughest part, you think; the innkeeper probably won't be too thrilled to find one of their patron's being led around bound and gagged and naked. And there are probably several ruffians staying here loyal to the Crimson Scourge. Of course, no pirate loyalty is without a price, and you've got four elite guards and potentially a ship as bargaining chips.

Of course, it might be ideal to avoid the front door altogether. But there's just a single window in the room and you seem to have used all the available rope on Ruby herself. What to do ...
1521311.title: Ruby makes it easy

choices: Just go straight to the garrison. No need to risk getting caught.
Head for the woods. It's play time!
15213112.content:
Going out the front door would be suicide, and you quickly dismiss it as an option. But how were you going to get out of the inn? You walked over, opened the window, and looked down. Quite a jump. Maybe if you could climb down, you'd be okay but there was no way to climb down safely. Especially not while carrying Ruby, and all the rope was being used to restrain her. Whatever you were going to do, you had to do it fast. Time wasn't on your side. Eventually one of Ruby's grunts would notice the absence of her and her elite guard and come looking. After tying up Ruby and her elite guard, there was no way that would end well. You looked around the room for something to use like a rope. Maps, the bed, navigation utensils, her journal...wait...the bed, and all those blankets and pillowcases! That was it!

You walked over to the bed, and begun pulling the blankets, sheets and pillow cases off. You made Ruby lay down as you tie a blanket to her, ignoring her look of confusion, as you began the things from the bed to each other to form a makeshift rope. You even tear down the curtains from the window. When you were done, you tie the end not tied to Ruby to the bed post, and look down. It's a bit of a stretch, but you think it'll do. You attach the sheathed scimitar to your belt and pick Ruby up, bridal style. She gives out several muffled protests and squirms around a lot when you try to get her out the window.

"Don't squirm around too much Red. That's a painful fall." Her eyes widened in terror and she stopped squirming immediately. You grabbed the blanket rope and slowly lowered her down to the ground. When it was as far stretched as it was going to get, you climbed out the window and down rope. You had a few moments when you thought it was break, but you got down to ground level, unsheathed the scimitar and cut the blanket. Wincing as you heard Ruby's grunt, you resheathed it.

"Okay, I know I'm kind of abducting you so I can turn you in for bounty money, but I AM sorry about that. I'm just short on time." You then pick her up bridal style again and start running. But where are you going to turn her in at? Your original plan was to turn her in at the local garrison, but the fact that you have a beautiful, naked woman bouncing up and down in your arms makes you regret not having some time alone to play with your prize. If you were to run back to your camp in the nearby forest, you doubt any of her goons would be able to track you. You could have a night of fun and then return her in the morning right? Of course by then, her crew might be all over town, ready to intercept the two of you. And that will be unpleasant. What will you do?
15213112.title: Find another way

152131122.content:
Considering the amount of effort, you had put in to simply tracking the infamous pirate, you decided some vindication was need, and who could say they actually had a pirate queen at their mercy.

“So, standard procedure for turning in a bounty is to report straight to any law enforcement that currently has said bounty on their bounty board” you start to carry her away from the inn, shifting her bound form to your shoulders. “Fortunately this town does hold your bounty valid…” as soon as you say that, Ruby attempts to struggle free, though the bedding you have her bound in limits much of what she can do. “However, we need to clear up some things between us” you continue marching into the forest surrounding the town.

Sometime later you found a suitable clearing, you set your charge down, and quickly build a slightly hidden camp. Turning back to your captive, you notice her attempting to escape, or attempting to emulate an inch worm.

“Okay okay, sorry to leave you waiting” you state sitting on her butt facing her exposed feet. The once pristine soles now covered in bits of grass and dirt. “So first off you are one hard-ass bitch to track down, and I mean that in a respectful way” you begin, brushing off her feet with your hand. This motion caused her to start squirming. “I mean seriously most pirates are known for their favorite ports, but you no you just have to have no havens” you accentuate the last statement with a particularly stiff attack under her toes, causing her to thrash and attempt to screech through her gag. You ease up going back to the light teasing of before, and continue on.

“I spent three months trying to find any leads, and all I got was that she likes red, she is dangerous, and even a there’s plenty of other fish in the sea. I should have stopped, found and easier bounty to track, but for some reason I was driven to catch you” you start listening to the muffled squeaks of the once fearsome pirate. “Perhaps it was ego, perhaps my drive for justice…I’m sorry I must be boring you” you state stopping just a bit, still focusing on the immaculate, if somewhat dirty feet below you. You could take a chance and remove her gag to hear her response, or maybe have some fun with the rest of her body, after all she is still in the nude.
152131122.title: Head for the woods. It's play time!

choices: Ruby trick's you, escaping out of her ropes!
You test the waters of Ruby's ticklish body.
Her follower(s) manage to find you!
1521311222.content:
Giving the pirate queen a few more pokes along her squirming arches, you observed your handiwork. With most of the dirt and dust that had previously been stuck to her feet now brushed away, you admired the pristine, peachy soles once more. "To have such soft feet even when you're travelling the seven seas... Won't you tell me how you keep them so smooth?"

Receiving only a cold stare at your attempts to taunt her, you gave your captive a small shrug as she felt the weight on her back suddenly disappearing, only for you to squat beside her as your hands fiddled with the bedding wrapped around her prone figure, her eyes remaining guarded as she stared at your work. "It wouldn't be fair to your poor feet if they got all the attention, would it? I hope you don't mind me loosening these sheets..."
1521311222.title: Untie the bedding around her

choices: You managed to throw her off your back
Your grip on the scimitar loosens
15213112221.content:
Pulling loose the large fabric which you used to transport her to your camp, you let out a startled choke as a foot slammed into your windpipe, knocking the breath right out of your throat. Falling onto your rear as you painfully rubbed the afflicted area, you glanced up as you saw the ropes around Ruby fall to the ground in a coil, the pirate queen spitting out her gag with disgust. “You have some nerve to kidnap me for a bounty. For even daring to do it… I should just end you with my blade.”

If it weren’t for the ice-cold atmosphere surrounding you, your eyes would have admired the sight of the pirate’s lithe and naked body, it's curves just barely illuminated by the flame of your campfire. Glancing to the side where you had kept her scimitar, you saw its owner do the same as you both made a mad dash for the weapon, knowing that whoever got it would be armed against the other.

Barely managing to reach the blade first, you grabbed the hilt with an iron grip as you felt yourself getting tackled from behind, two soft objects pressing into your back as a husky voice whispered softly into your ear. “Won’t you give that back to me? I promise to be gentle.”

Tightening your grip on your one lifeline, you heard the crimson-haired beauty give a low chuckle. “I’m sorry, but that wasn’t a question.” Feeling digits wiggling into your sides through your clothes, you let out an uncharacteristic squeal, quickly squirming underneath your tickler’s form.

“Oh hoh? Ticklish as well? You shouldn’t have tried to lay a finger on this pirate captain then. Let’s see how long that attitude can last you!” Cackling with glee as Ruby switched to spider-tickling your ribs, you cackled along with her, albeit with a forced smile on your lips.

Buckling like a bull while the pirate captain rode you as easily as a ship in a storm…
15213112221.title: Ruby trick's you, escaping out of her ropes!

choices: Ruby darts forward, sliding her fingers under your armpits
Ruby darts forward, but you strike her a blow with the sword's hilt
152131122211.content:
Though surprised by her unorthodox but potentially effective method of fighting, you manage to withstand the sensations just enough to force yourself upwards, throwing your former captive off your back and onto the dirt. Silently praying thanks to the gods for fortune once again favoring you (though the soft sensation on your back was quite nice) you grip your scimitar and whirl around, hoping to at least wound or disable Ruby before she can gut you or something.

However, the pirate captain rolls backwards from her position on the ground, causing your strike to miss completely, and springs to her feet. You slash again fearfully and wildly, going wide and chopping deep into the trunk of a nearby tree as Ruby slips away yet again. You struggle with the heavy blade, then leave it stuck in the tree as a fist flashes towards your face. Your arm catches what would have been a knockout blow just in time, and Ruby jumps back for a second. "Your skill is greater than you let on, mercenary..." she says ruefully, rubbing her knuckles for a second where they hit your forearm. You're not sure whether or not to take offense to that.

You lean over and yank on your scimitar, and it finally comes free from the wood it's lodged in. You then point it at Ruby, panting hard from the fighting. "Give up now, pirate, or I might be forced to hurt you! And then the bounty might net me less!" you threaten.
152131122211.title: You managed to throw her off your back

1521311222111.content:
Chuckling, Ruby stepped forward, unfazed by your threat. “Hurt me? With those wild swings? I’ve seen sea hags who have more fight in them than you!”

Calling your bluff, the crimson haired fatale guessed correctly as she became a blur, weaving in between your panicked attempts at slicing her. Taking a large step into your personal space, you felt an arm quickly intertwine itself with your sword arm, giving it a sharp twist. Gritting your teeth, you forced yourself to hold onto the scimitar. “I-I’m not going to give it to you, so just give up and surrender!”

“Oh really? Not even if I did… This?” Deftly slipping her other hand into the sleeve of your cloth shirt, you burst into giggles again as nails scratched softly across your exposed underarm. Even if you wanted to pull your limb down, the pirate’s own prevented that move, forcing your sensitive hollows to take the tickling. “Does a certain land-lubber have ticklish armpits? Coochie Coo!”

“Gaahahhaaahahaa! Get out of there y-you fiend!” Trying to break your sword arm free of the awkward angle, your efforts only produced failure as the pirate gripped harder on your shoulder with one hand. With giggles threatening to splutter free from your lips, your other hand tried a desperate last attempt at reaching for her bare body to either push her away or bring her down laughing with you.

Clearly reading your intentions, Ruby merely smirked as she kept just out of reach of your fingers. With a few times almost swearing you felt the touch of bare skin swiping past your fingertips, you soon felt your knees giving way as legs buckled, sending you kneelin. Chuckling with ticklish mirth as your former captive confiscated your blade with a soft twist of your wrist, you felt yourself groan as your back hit the ground, the raucous pirate straddling your hips with a sultry smile, already fiddling with your top buttons.

Gulping, your hands made a move to push her off, only to stop short of her sharp gaze. “I wasn’t able to look closely at you before, but…”
1521311222111.title: Ruby darts forward, sliding her fingers under y...

choices: Your eyes barely caught a pair of feet, hiding in a tree trunk.
The crimson pirate laid a trap for you!
Ruby catches you by surprise, doubling back on her trail!
1521311222113.content:
Eyebrows scrunched up, you see Ruby internally debate between trying to retrieve her cutlass with force or verbal disarmament. Seeing her frown slowly turn into a smile as she chuckled to herself however, a nervous knot started to form in your stomach, your arm the stolen blade a few mock swings. “What’s wrong? Have you decided to come quietly?”

“On the contrary, I just realized something, my dear kidnapper.” A quizzical look on your facade as you gestured for her to continue, a sly grin slowly crept up the pirate queen’s red lips in the light of the fire. “Why am I even wasting my time with you… When I can simply scuttle this dance?”

“What are you-?” As your mind raced to make sense of her coded words, you see the fatale turn around, knocking down your make-shift cooking spit with one well-aimed kick before diving into the surrounding fauna with her new-found freedom. Cursing out loud while your eyes adjusted to the new darkness, you clumsily fumbled behind where you last saw Ruby before she made a run for it. “Damn it! Get back here, you cheating pirate! I won’t hesitate to use this!”

Holding said blade in one hand while you tried your best to follow the broken branches and tattered bushes indicating where your captive had been through…
1521311222113.title: The Pirate Queen runs away

choices: You get the knife and cut yourself free, resuming your pursuit of Ruby
You hear new voices drawing near
15213112221132.content:
You can't see Ruby at all in the darkness, but you can hear her, even as she's getting ever so much farther away. That's a fortune in gold escaping, and it's all because you just had to take her into the woods! You sprint after her, hacking and slashing at the brush with your blade, trying to make out the barely visible tracks. Eventually, you stop hearing her at all, and you reason the lithe Pirate Queen has probably gotten far enough away so that you can't hear her.

"Come on, come on..." you mutter to yourself. You're pretty sure she headed back to the port town; the problem now is in the darkness you can't tell which way that even is. The only way to surely know is to follow the tracks on the ground, which are small normally and even harder to see in the night. A thousand curses!

Suddenly, you take a step forward and a rope tightens around your ankles.. You hear a crack, and the rope springs upward, dragging you with it with a quick jerking motion. Your sword goes flying from your hand and impales itself in the dirt. You are violently shifted upside down, now dangling from a rope attached to a high tree branch by both legs. How the hell did Ruby make a snare trap so fast?? you think to yourself as you hang upside-down. I guess I had been following her for quite a while...

You need to reach the knife in your boot to cut yourself free from the snare, but it's just out of your reach. You strain to grab it, and then...
15213112221132.title: The crimson pirate laid a trap for you!

choices: The princess believes your words, setting you free
Ruby doubles back to claim her new prizes
152131122211322.content:
Pausing your efforts at the sounds of wooden wheels coming to a stop nearby, you decided not to move, hoping that whoever it was would pass by without noticing your embarrassing predicament. Your hopes were dashed however, when the sound of a haughty voice broke the silence of the night along with the sight of two females entering your upside-down vision.

“To think that that half-naked individual was right! There was someone hanging upside down here!”

“My lady, can you please not listen to any suspicious people in the future. What if that was a thug luring us into a trap to rob us?”

“Oh don’t be such a spoil-sport, Hilda. I, Princess Elenor the Second, have always wanted a chance to talk to a bandit!” Finally getting close enough to make out, you could barely make out the curly blonde locks and pink gown of the royal, the other figure wearing a typical brown dress of a handmaiden with brown hair cut to her shoulders.

As the handmaiden lifted a lantern to your face, your eyes squinted at the sudden light. “Please help get me down! I’m currently chasing a wanted pirate captain! Have you seen her? She should have-”

“Crimson hair the color of fire, along with hardly any cloth on her body?” Eyes widening at the princess’ answer, you renewed your efforts to try and break free. “Yes! I was trying to capture her before she ambushed me with a sudden trap. If you could kindly cut that cord-”

“But how would we know that you’re not secretly a bandit trying to lower our guard? For all we know, that woman could have been your unfortunate victim, barely escaping your clutches while you clumsily fumbled in your own trap?” As you hesitated with your answer at recognizing there was some truth in her words, you tried to think of a way to convince the princess of Ruby’s wanted status, cursing that you had left your supplies back at the camp in your haste. “I have the Pirate Queen Ruby’s wanted poster in my bag, a short distance away. I could show you to it if you would kindly cut these ropes?”

Pausing to put a finger on her chin in thought, your hopes were dashed as Elenor gave you a sly grin, snapping her fingers. Finally noticing the carrier of the lantern had disappeared, you yelped as the maid pulled your wrists to the ground from behind your hanging form, pulling your upper body taut. “While I would love to help apprehend a potential criminal… I must make sure that I too, am not being tricked.” Finally revealing what she had hidden behind her back, you see the blonde bring out a fluffy black feather duster from hehind, a glint of mischievousness in her eyes.

“W-Wait… You aren’t seriously going to-Nnngghhh!” Biting your lips as the fronds made contact with the small amount of exposed skin on your hips; the princess gave your shirt a small tug, leaving gravity to do its job. With your whole torso now exposed to the cold winds, you could do nothing but wriggle from side to side as your new tormentor’s teasing strokes began their rounds.

“I’m glad that I asked Hilda to bring this for me. So many areas to clean on your dirty body! Do bandits like you have a ticklish tummy?” Shaking your head with a forced smile, you tried your best to swing your body away from the torturous tool. However, the female royal merely giggled at your efforts, finding new sport of your attempts to shy away.

Dusting lightly over your taut belly, it wasn’t long until the dam collapsed as a few fronds slipped into your navel. Giggling along with you, Elenor toyed in the new-found spot before dipping down into your shirt, fluffing the downy instrument across your bare chest. As your giggles quickly turned into full-blown laughter, you inwardly cursed your horrible luck at firstly having your bounty escaping to a wandering royal entourage having fun with your vulnerable, tied-up body.

Letting out another uncharacteristic squeal as the plumages dragged their way into your hollows once more…
152131122211322.title: You hear new voices drawing near

choices: Elenor finally believes that you're a bounty hunter and lets you down
They decide the feather duster cleaning wasn't enough
1521311222113222.content:
"Waihahait! You have to belieheheve me! I'm the one trying to catch the pirate!" you exclaim as her fluffy feather duster swipes across your underarms again. The princess is leaned in close, the top of her bosom poking out of her tight pink dress, and she reaches a white gloved finger up to shush you. You realize that this coddled noblewoman would rather believe you're some criminal, if it meant she got to indulge in her fantasies.

"Come, Hilda, let's teach this ruffian a lesson!" she giggles. You seize up and let out a surprised yell when you feel the handmaid's unpainted but sharp fingernails wrap around your sides from behind and dig into the soft flesh at your waist. She's clearly taking an opportunity to enjoy herself as well, having affixed your hands to the ground so your body is taut and she doesn't need to hold you.

Your laughter jumps another octave when you feel your pants getting yanked down (or rather, up, since you're upside-down) and the feather duster begins to peruse your butt daintily but determinedly. It sends jolting sensations of ticklishness through your lower body, and you wiggle around, still stuck in the mantrap. The sight of your ass moving around angrily sends Princess Elenor into a fit of giggles, and she continues her assault with the soft feathers.

"Oooh, I think this spot needs a little cleaning! And this spot! And this one!"

Meanwhile, Hilda has moved down to your armpits, dragging her nails over your armpits where Princess Elenor's duster was earlier. She kisses your ear lecherously while ticklishly whispering into it, showing that this diminutive handmaiden was more adventurous than meets the eye. A blush raises to your cheeks as you beg for no avail that you're innocent and must be let down.

Finally, the tickling and caressing stops, leaving you panting for breath. The feathers stop kissing your skin and Hilda's fingers leave your armpits and ribs. Next...
1521311222113222.title: Elenor remains unconvinced

choices: The branch holding you and the princess up breaks with a snap!
Ruby decides to cut to the chase
15213112221132221.content:
“Hmm… I suppose we can let our ticklish bandit down to answer a few questions. Hilda, be a dear and untie their ropes.” Sighing in relief at hearing those words, the sound of a body softly slumping to the floor behind you instantly sent alarm bells ringing. “Hilda? What are you doing taking a nap next to our prisoner like that?”

“She’s not the only one who’s going to sleep.” Before Elenor could turn around to the sound of the sultry voice, a quick gasp came from her lips before a hand slowly lowered her unconscious form to the floor. Unfortunately, you recognized that voice, along with the fiery hair illuminated by the light of the lantern in your upside-down vision. “Ruby! H-How long were you there?!”

“Pipe down, you ticklish bandit.” Unwinding two coils of rope from her shoulders; you guessed that Ruby had doubled back to your camp while you were distracted by the princess and her maid, seeing as that rope had belonged in your pack in the first place. Propping the unconscious maid against the trunk of the tree you were hanging on, the pirate got to work, wrapping one of the coils around the width of the trunk and around Hilda’s arms and waist. “Honestly, I didn’t expect fortune to favor me. To think I would find someone as gullible as her just wondering in the woods!”

Picking up the person in question, you could only watch as Ruby bound both of Elenor’s wrists together while leaving a long stretch of it unused. Using the branch you were hanging by as leverage, your captor tossed said end of the rope over it, hoisting the blonde’s unconscious form up with her arms pulled above her head before tying the loose end to the handle of her scimitar, previously forgotten and stuck fast in the ground where you lost grip of it.

“That’s better. Now, let’s have some answers. Starting with… you.” Giving the discarded feather duster a quick fluff, Ruby dragged its length along your exposed stomach to your giggling chagrin before moving to where the maid was tied up. Gently swishing the feathery tool along Hilda’s exposed collarbone, a small smile appeared on her sleeping lips as the woman giggled softly in her sleep.

“While I would like to play with all to my heart’s content, unfortunately I need to be back of my ship before she sails.” Abandoning the soft-spoken approach for now, Ruby gently laid the feather on the ground before digging one finger each into Hilda’s clamped arms, drilling into her hollows. As the poor girl woke up with a shriek, you could only feel pity as she quickly dissolved into bubbly giggles. “Waahahahaaa?! Waahhahaaat’s going on! Quit it! It teehheheeeheeckles!”

“Oh, but I’m not going to stop until you answer my questions. Who is that other girl you’re accompanying?” Biting her lip as she valiantly fought to keep her employer a secret, all was useless before Ruby’s masterful tickling techniques. In just a few minutes, the pirate had discovered to Hilda’s despair that two feet held in an arm lock made for much ticklish laughter. “I geheheheeeeve! She’s Eeeheheheeelenor! Princess of the neighboring Coninze kingdom! Now pleehheeeheeese! No more, no more!”

Letting go of her prize as Hilda gratefully swallowed huge breathes of fresh air, Ruby placed a finger on her chin, her thoughts racing to connect the dots. “And pray tell, what is a royal like her doing all the way out here? Shouldn’t she be playing tea with all the others of her kind?”

Turning away from Ruby’s sharp gaze, Hilda mumbled underneath her breath. “I can’t exactly say…”

“Hmm, what’s that?”

“Oh wait no-eeheheheheeee! She just wanted to see the county side, so Princess Eleeeheheeheenor snuck out of the cahahahahaaastle! Gaahahahaaaa!” As the twin fingers stopped their assault of her ticklish hollows once more, Hilda could only sink her giggling head low at feeling betrayal of her vassal.

“A runaway Princess eh… I wonder how much the Rylestions would pay if I sold her… Or would it be more wiser to return her as random to the Coninzens? Decisions decision… Speaking of which…” Giving Hilda a small wink before retrieving the feather duster, Ruby stalked over to the last member of the captured trio. “Good morning, Princess Elenor. Did you have a good sleep?”

Groaning as her pretty eyelids fluttered open, the blonde was surprisingly quick on the uptake as her look of surprise was quickly replaced by one of anger at seeing Hilda’s flushed face and her own predicament. “You! Let me out of this right now! I’ll have you know that I am the-”

“Royal Princess of Coninze? Your sensitive retainer told me after I had a go of those cute feet. But I digress, your majesty. Let this humble knave turn that frown upside down.” Grinning maliciously before lightly dusting the exposed top of the blonde’s chest, you slowly saw Elenor’s frown softening as her breathing started to turn ragged, the small grit of her teeth eventually curling into a soft smile. As Ruby continued to dust along the sides of the royal princess’ slightly jiggling chest while humming to herself, even Elenor’s defiance slowly begun to break down as a forced grin became plastered on her cherry lips, the slightest of snickers and chuckles now began to slip free at Ruby’s dogged persistence.

“Such lovely clothes… I wonder how much they’ll fetch if I sold them on the black market?” Trailing the duster along her arms before attacking the taut hollows, Elenor spluttered out into squeals and giggles as her feet swung wildly in the air, unamused at having her own tool used against her even as she grinned wider. “Leheheheeeeet me gooo! I’ll lock you in my stocks dahahahahhaays when I get out-eehehahahahaaa!”

Letting out a bark of laughter to join Elenor’s own, Ruby merely ramped up her efforts as the latter’s laughter grew an octave higher. “I suppose that all I have to do is to not get caught, isn’t it?”

Giggling aloud as the crimson pirate brought the duster back to the front of her pink dress…
15213112221132221.title: Elenor finally believes that you're a bount...

choices: The guards let the carriage through before you could do anything
You take the oppurtunity to de(feet) the crimson pirate
152131122211322212.content:
Smirking at seeing the blonde wail with ticklish giggles, Ruby’s eyes instantly sharpened at hearing a male's voice pierce through the darkness surrounding all of you. “My lady and Miss Hilda, are you there? Forgive me if I’m mistaken… But I swore I could hear the sound of your laughter, and the both of you were taking a long time to return to the carriage. Are the two of you al-Argh!”

Letting out a grunt of pain as the new figure fell to the floor, you winced as Hilda cried out. “Oh relax, he’s not dead. Although judging from his clothes, I’m assuming he’s your coachman. Wait… This could work… Oh yes, this could definitely work…”

Not liking the sound of where this was going, you could only watch as Ruby quickly stripped the male down to his boxers, to both Hilda’s and Elenor’s turned away, blushing faces. Slipping into the worn-out leather pants with ease, the pirate grumbled as she barely managed to button up the white undershirt before putting on the cloth vest. Judging by the strain on the front of her shirt, it could be clearly seen that it was most definitely meant to be worn on a male.

“This will have to do. Now, here’s what’s going to happen. Both of you, the Princess and the Bounty Hunter.” Perking up at being addressed by your captor, Ruby gave you both a devious grin. “I’m sure that your royal highness’ carriage is nearby, so I’m going to bring you both with me. When we get back to city, your highness is going to tell the guards to let us through. From there, I’ll scuttle you onto my ship. Any objections?”

As all three of you quickly dissolved into protests, Ruby slithered over to her scimitar, one hand on its handle in an unseen threat. “I said, any objections?”

“But what about Hilda and my coach driver! Surely you can’t be leaving them here!” Rolling her eyes as she cut the princess down, the latter letting out a cry of pain as she was unceremoniously dropped to the dirt floor, Ruby deftly tugged on the rope to drag the royal to her feet. “Of course I’m leaving them here. Do you see any point for me to bring them?”

As Elenor tried to stammer an answer, you felt a swish of air at your feet before your head hit the ground, groaning as the blood now rushed away from your head. “And you, Bounty Hunter. I’ll be sure to let my crew have their fun breaking you down. I’m sure they would love a new toy to ease their boredom on the high seas.”
“That’s only if I let you capture me!” Digging your feet into the ground as you head-butted the pirate, Ruby let out a surprised grunt as the both of you fell to the ground once more. Cursing your tied up hands as you straddled her stomach, facing her feet as your fingers clumsily tried to grab at them, you only managed to get a few snickers from Ruby’s lips before your captor retaliated in full force, pulling what was left of your pants down before spider-tickling all ten of her digits on your bare bottoms.

Unwittingly serving the crimson devil the perfect opportunity for a counter-attack on a silver platter, your giggles quickly shot past Ruby’s own in volume with each passing second. Soon, your futile attempt at resistance was shot down as you were reduced to a hysterical wreck as you vainly wriggled your butt in front of Ruby’s face like an idiot, your tickler haughtily laughing all the while as she dug into the sensitive areas of your crack. “If you wanted me to tickle these loafs, all you had to do was ask! When we get on my ship, I’ll surely give these bottoms the feathering they deserve.”

Pushing you off from her as you could only laugh weakly from the side, you felt your body get hoisted onto her shoulder in a surprising feat of strength from her lithe body as her other hand gripped the rope binding Elenor’s wrists. Tucking her wild crimson hair underneath the coachman’s cap to keep it hidden from sight, Ruby let out a bark of laughter as she slipped into the last article of clothing, a pair of the coach driver’s leather shoes. “I reckon that we’ll be long gone by the time help arrives for you, miss maid. Your coach driver should be waking up soon, so maybe the both of you can run to a nearby town for help. Not that it’ll do you any good, since the nearest town is five days away. Good fortune in trying to catch us, Haahahaha!”

~~~

Grumbling underneath the driver’s compartment as the carriage hit another bump in the road; you inwardly muttered a few choice words for the pirate. While Elenor was allowed to sit in the cabin as long as she behaved, your early attempt at escape had earned you a seat (or lying space) underneath Ruby’s seated figure at the reigns of the horses.

Hearing the sound of voices however, hope renewed in your mind. “Halt, this is the western border guard. Are you transporting a royal delegate or ambassador for official business?”

Already hearing Ruby’s charismatic laugher from your crawl-space, you could already imagine the flirty wink the beauty was giving the males, along with their swooning reactions. However, you ignored the sounds coming from above, for there was another reason you had chosen to remain alert. While Ruby had ensured that you couldn’t openly escape the compartment by using the weight of her body to press down on the seat, your captor had failed to check for another other openings in the dark of the night.

For shining with the light of the morning sun… You could barely see an open slot in the bottom of your prison with barely enough space for your hands to poke through. And through this space… A pair of freely hanging leather-clad shoes was well within your reach.
152131122211322212.title: Ruby decides to cut to the chase

choices: The Captain demands to inspect the carriage.
She let's you through without further trouble.
1521311222113222122.content:
“Why yes indeed. On a side note, lovely weather we’re having here isn’t it? I could have sworn there were clouds from where we came…” Distracting the guards with her flirtaceous tone, you got to work yourself. While Ruby was busy, a few quick tugs ensured you slipped out of the ropes holding your wrists, their looseness a testament in your captor’s confidence in not expecting you to get much farther than this.

Careful to not alert anyone of your new freedom, you made a loop of the ropes, tying the other end to a small metal hook inside the compartment. Making sure it was securely bond with a few hard tugs, you gingerly slipped your hands through the slot at the base, raising the loop of rope around the pair of dangling boots before pulling the knot hard. “You know, recently there has been a string of dissa-aah!”

“Is there something wrong, coachwoman? Although it is a pleasure sharing gossip with someone easy on the eyes, if you’re in a hurry…”

“O-Oh it’s nothing! I just remembered a funny joke that my passenger shared with me a few moments back!” Passing off the slip with a nervous laugh, you grinned in your dark space as you finished de-booting your captor, slipping the footwear into the trunk. Reminded of the rough yet sensitive soles you had barely gotten a chance to play with the night prior, you already knew what you had to do. If you could just get Ruby to break character… The guards to help to apprehend the criminal!

Softly testing the waters once more, the disguised pirate quickly broke into giggles to the surprise of the listening guards. “Was there something wrong? Did I say something in jest?”

“No-empphffff! It was just-eehheeeehee, that joke last night was that funny! Teehehheheee!” Clamping one hand over her grin in an attempt to stop the case of giggles from your stroking digits, some of the guards blushed quietly underneath their helmets at seeing the beautiful coachwoman’s smile. “Pray tell, would you share with us the joke?”

“W-Well, it went something like this…” As her mind raced to piece together a worthwhile story, you ramped up your efforts, determined to escape. Scratching the ball of her heel with fervor, you were rewarded with a stream of girlish squeals coming from the person atop.

“…A-And thahahahhahaat’s why she was there, because the chicken wanted to aahaAAAHAAHAA!!” Throwing her head back in full-blown laughter, the pirate inwardly cursed as you dug your fingers into her wiggling toes. Naked feet wiggling unseen in an attempt to escape, Ruby quickly grabbed her sides, unable to hold her hysterics. As more guards’ line of sight darted to her heaving chest, crimson lips and fiery red hair that threatened to spill out of her cap, many of the male’s shifted on the spot, Ruby’s shirt not the only place feeling constricted by the moment.

Letting out another howl of uncharacteristic laughter as she attempted to hide the falling crimson strands of hair, you heard the movement of metal boots dispersing before a single pair strode up to the carriage. “I am the Head Guard, of this gate, Liandra. While I thank you for relieving my subordinates’ boredom, I’m afraid we must cut our talk short lest they be further distracted. Do you have anything to declare before we begin?”
1521311222113222122.title: You take the oppurtunity to de(feet) the crimso...

choices: No escape for now! The two pirates take you to the brig and have their fun
15213112221132221222.content:
Though you can't see it, you're sure Liandra's eyes are intensely scrutinizing the carriage; hopefully she's suspicious of this beautiful character who suddenly showed up to distract all her guards. Then your heart sinks as Liandra sighs and says, "Alright, alright. Let her through. Sorry for troubling you, ma'am, we understand the princess has somewhere to be."

In one fell swoop, Ruby cracks the reigns of the horse and pulls her feet away from your fingers, letting her ticklish smile shift into a vindictive grin as she rides away from the border outpost and towards the port city. "I'll show you what I do to people who tickle me like that. You're in for a world of laughter once we get to my ship!" she cackles.You can only groan at what's in story for you and Princess Elenor. At least the princess has the chance of being ransomed; while you're a nobody who's now earned Ruby's full ire.

Gradually the farmland you've been passing through becomes more and more busy, you notice through the cracks of wood allowing you to see out from the compartment under the driver's bench. You can't see straight forward, but on either side there are more buildings, passers-by and wagons, including carts stacked high with salted meat and bags of flour. Ship's provisions, most likely headed to a port market.

Your carriage enters the port town, and you're greeted by the smell of fish and beer as your ride clops by fishmonger stalls, warehouses and taverns. They're two and three stories tall now, so you must be at the heart of the port. The horse takes a left on the cobblestone road and now you're in full view of the water, that vast sparkling sea that covers well over half of Zenith. Ships ranging from wooden rowboats to double and even a few triple-masted vessels packed with cargo line the several docks. The port city was nothing compared to the Rylestian or Coninze cities, but it had surely cemented itself as an important site for trade.

Then you saw it: Ruby's ship! It was unmistakably one of hers (she was said to own several), now that you knew what to look for. The medium sized vessel was painted with gold dust and expensive red lacquer to suggest opulent wealth and of course rubies, and looked to be in very good condition. The hatches and portholes on the sides of the ship were closed, which you knew meant they were concealing a variety of ship attacking and boarding weaponry, probably including illegal magical and technologically sophisticated armaments. While nothing outwardly suggested it to be a pirate ship, surely a patrol of guards should have at least given it a cursory examination. Bribes were definitely paid out in full.

Suddenly the carriage stops on the cobblestones next to the dock and you hear the door thrown open. Princess Elenor's dainty footsteps ring out on the ground as she exits the carriage hastily, probably pulled by Ruby. She's being more deliberate now that there aren't any border guards on the lookout.

"Hey, Lucie, Senette, stop loafing and get over here!" Ruby yells over to some people at the dock. "Help me get this scum out of the storage compartment. Watch out though, I've captured a real fighter!"

Several pairs of hands reach in and pull you out of the place Ruby stuffed you into. Your limbs are cramped and you're and covered in sweat from being stuffed into such a small space, so it's a relief to finally be in clean air. You're probably quite the sight, with your clothes ripped and dirty from wrestling Ruby in the forest. You see your other captors, obviously crew-members of Ruby's. Both are light-skinned, and one of them is petite, with golden blonde hair in a braid and ice blue eyes. The other is about your height, pleasantly fleshy and very buxom, with chest length brown hair and a naughty smile.

Ruby has Elenor by the arm, and the two of you are forced up the gangplank and onto her ship. Once on the top deck, where numerous others are hauling rigging and raising the sails, Ruby tells her two pirate minions about her exploits. From what you can tell, Lucie is the

"Your noble pirate queen has managed to capture a princess! We're gonna be rich, lasses, from the fortune we're sure to make off her ransom. And I also snagged this pathetic wormsack while securing our lovely princess Elenor. I wouldn't say this "bounty hunter" is even worth half a copper coin, but they've done an excellent job of inconveniencing me. I want you two to take our very ticklish bounty hunting friend below decks and show them what it really means to laugh. Meanwhile, I'll be loosening the tongue of our little princess here in my cabin, to see if she has any extra wealthy family members we could extract a double ransom from."

Lucie and Senette each grab you by a shoulder and haul you below deck, wickedly poking and prodding you all the way.
15213112221132221222.title: She let's you through without further trouble.

choices: You heard the sound of multiple people coming below deck.
You were left to wait in the cell.
152131122211322212221.content:
You gritted your teeth as two pairs of rough, mischievous hands forced you deeper into the bowels of the ship. While the thought of breaking free from your captors’ grasp and running back to the gangplank did seem enticing, small smirks from the females toiling about gave you second thoughts.

“You’re thinking of escaping from us, aren’t you?” Senette and Lucie were amused at seeing your panicked look. Giving you another poke to edge you down the deck, Ruby’s First Mate gave a short giggle. “Oh, don’t act all surprised. Every one of the prisoners we’ve brought back had the same thoughts at one point or another. If you even try anything remotely fishy, you’ll be in the kind hands of all our crew members for the next few days.”

“Who knows, maybe if you even play your cards right, our captain will have the mercy to maroon you on a deserted island.” Your captors shared another laugh together as the three of you finally arrived at what seemed to be the holding areas of the ship. With each cell separated only by thin metal bars, each individual area contained a set of hanging chains attached to the hull of the ship, along with thatches of dry hay haphazardly strewn about.

You felt a rough shove pushing you into the nearest one. “Go on, git.” Ignoring your protests, both pirates grabbed each of your hands before locking them in manacles with a rusty click. You protest, unable to even pull your arms down to block the cold draft seeping in through whatever cloth was left covering your body. “If you let me go, I swear to forget all that’s happened with your Captain and I!”

“Captain Ruby was right… She IS a feisty one!” Digging her fingers into your sides, the blonde of the two watched you shriek while your hips tried to shy away. Giggling with ticklish mischief, Lucie dialed down her antics to the occasional pokes. “You see, when Captain Ruby brings back a prisoner to the Crimson Voyage…”

“…we find it rude to not show them the hospitality of her crew!” Senette exclaimed as she joined her friend. With two hands now poking at you from either side, you quickly shook your head as chuckling was intermixed with the pleas of mercy you babbled. “Just let me go! I don’t have anything on me unlike that princess, so you won’t get any worth from having me around!”

Lucile softly scratched at your underarm through the tattered holes of your top. You snickered like a madman, the damnably featherlight touches keeping you on the brink of giggles, yet not inducing mirthful laughter. “Who said anything about money? You’re already proving your worth, with these cute giggles of yours.”

A small knot of fear formed in your belly at her spoken words. Were they going to keep you on the ship just for the purposes of being their plaything? Judging by what their captain had decreed, that might very well be the case. From the upper decks, you could hear the sound of another person’s ticklish laughter being forced through the air.

“It looks like our Captain’s starting to have her way with the princess.” Lucie gave another smirk as she brushed away stray lock of blonde hair, her fingers slowly spidering your taut hollows with annoying persistence. “She’ll be giving us quite the haul in no time. No one’s ever survived under Captain Ruby’s expert fingers, be it flamboyant royals or uncouth bandits. Now, as for you…”
152131122211322212221.title: No escape for now! The two pirates take you to ...

choices: Lucie and Senette return with the intent of torturing you for fun
Lucie and Senette return to "question" you
Lucie and Senette return under orders to take you elsewhere in the vessel
One of the two crewmembers returns by herself...
1521311222113222122212.content:
"...you just stay right here. Shouldn't be much trouble," Lucie smirked, pointing to the irons clasped around your wrists. The blonde turned and walked out of the cell towards the dim rays of light that penetrated weakly into the brig of the vessel from the upper levels above. Senette waited a moment longer, licking her lips as she looked over the torn remainder of cloth and leather armor that barely covered your body, then quickly drilled her strong fingers into your armpits. Her quick but effective tickle wracked a shrill, eager cry of laughter from your body, higher in pitch and more pathetic than you would have liked, then she too had walked out of her cell after her comrade with a promise to "see you soon". The curvy pirate henchwoman made sure to close the barred iron door, giving you one lascivious jiggle of her assets as she did.

As you quickly caught your breath you examined your surroundings. The manacles holding you prisoner were firm but not uncomfortably tight, something which was a relief given the considerable amount of rust built up on them. Had they been tighter, you might have risked an infected cut from them digging into your skin. Perhaps if you had something to slick up your wrists, preferably grease though simple water might do in a pinch, you could slip out of the cuffs. Not that it would much matter given that you'd still be locked inside the cell itself, with Ruby's guards having the key.

You look around to the other cells: the ones to your left and right are unoccupied, but you can see a couple figures sprawled out or sitting in the thin layer of straw in cells on the other side of the brig. Prisoners from raids on treasure-laden ships, hailing from Coninze or Rylestia or other, wealthier kingdoms far away whose very existence is only rumored. They're probably to be ransomed off, or perhaps they're just enemies of Ruby and her crew they've seen fit to hold prisoner for their amusement. It seems that most of the other prisoners have been freed at least from their manacles, which makes you think you've been locked in yours specifically for interrogation, or perhaps fun. As if on cue, you hear a shrill cry which could only be Princess Elenor's emanate somewhere from the one of the upper decks of the ship. Ruby was no doubt putting her to the question in her favorite way.

You consider your options. They made sure to take your weapons and tools, though perhaps when Lucie and Senette come back they'll bring something which might inadvertently aid in your escape, even if you have to suffer to get it. Getting out of your manacles would be a good start. Then again, Ruby might move you elsewhere, which could provide more or fewer options for escape. You ponder what might happen if escape is impossible, if her crew moves the ship out of port and there's nowhere for you to go until they dock again, which could take weeks. They might decide to sell you to some unscrupulous buyer, or even just get bored of you and make you walk the plank. Considering how you humiliated Ruby and gave her such a tough time, you're sure they won't just let you go, even if you did inadvertently assist in bringing them the wealthy Elenor.
1521311222113222122212.title: You were left to wait in the cell.

choices: Unsheathe your sword and get ready
1522.content:
Carefully, you ascend the downspout until you reach the third-floor window. Freeing one hand, you open it up and quickly climb in, though as you do your foot catches the window sill and you fall with a loud thud.

"Ow! Dammit," you mutter to yourself, standing back up.

The room looks like any other guest room. Three candles are lit to illuminate the room, and glancing around brings up two interesting clues.

One, there is a corset hanging on the coat rack. Two, there is a pair of knee-high, high-heeled boots standing by the door.

A woman is certainly using the room, but was it the right one?

Before you have a chance to examine anything, you hear footsteps approaching the door to the room. Someone must have heard you falling down!
1522.title: Climb up to the third floor

choices: Asuka continues her torture, eventually getting aid from her crew
You are discovered several hours later, still during Rubys punishment
15221.content:
You quickly make a dash for the nearby closet closing the door behind you softly. The door has a few slits in it around eye level, allowing you to see into the room. No less then a few seconds after closing the door do a group of people come in the room. You spot one women who stands out over the rest, given her attire and hair color. While the rest of the people in the room have black hair, she has red, further accented by pale skin, a red top, tied off to reveal her midriff, and sleeveless, it being as red as her hair. Beyond that covering her legs look nothing more then worn down leather pants, frayed up to a good portion of the thigh. She has no boots on, barefoot with red nail polish, not very surprising. You deduce that this must be Ruby herself.

Another woman, the one who came in first stands out because of her poise, dressed in tight black leather, with thigh high boots, she turns and signals one of the people in the room to close the door. Most everyone else in the room look like the average ruffian, but for some reason they don't seem to be taking orders from Ruby. The woman then crosses her arms and smiles at Ruby

"Alright Ruby, now that we are here, and the entire floor is just my people, tell me why you don't have the money I am owed" she says the slight venom in her tone

"We were too late, the map was correct, but when we got to the cave the entire place was cleaned out, all that remained was empty bottles and barrels of rum, and clear signs of celebration" Ruby said, her fists clenched to her sides the entire time of answering to this mysterious woman.

The woman just shakes her head and turns around, walking toward the very window you came in from to look out of it.

"Ruby Ruby Ruby, what will we do with you, you have made a name for yourself and you seem to love that title. However I think you forget it was myself that gave you the ship, and your original crew. Now you have all your own members, but the ship still is not paid for. I have been patient, the hauls you bring in are doing it, but you keep so much for yourself that by the time you and your crew finish with their pleasures, the rest you give me is hardly payment for the work I go through to keep you and your legend status from crashing down."

Ruby, still standing there during the whole speech, though obvious if this were under normal circumstances this woman would have been cut up like a thin piece of paper, she is now standing there silently fuming before she opens her mouth to speak.

"You will get all your money back on our next haul, the information is accurate, and I have everything planned out, Hell there will be enough to pay off you and buy another while ship" Ruby says in a businesslike tone.

The woman does not turn around, but looks at her long fingernails for a moment, then look up again

"I have heard that before from you, but you and your crew just love to spend before it reaches these shores, I think I need to hit my point across" She turns her head and nods, still looking out the window. With that nod the silent observers in the room grab ruby, while others takes the sheets off the bed, showing an assortment of leather straps on it. "You will learn to understand why no one in this part of the world crosses me, and why my group is the most feared band of Pirates.

"W-what?! Get your hands off me! Asuka damn you I said I would get your money!" Ruby yells out. being no match for the hands pulling her down onto the bed. In no time flat they have her on it, strapped in an X shape, a strap holding her down by each wrist, the elbows, the waist, her thighs, her calves, and finally her ankles. She struggles hard, but a dagger to the throat keeps her still and quiet after some time.

You guess now this woman must be a very power figure, the person who helped Ruby come to be, and you only shutter thinking of getting on the bad side of such a well organized group. She walks up to Ruby once the job is finished and takes a seat on the bed near her torso, looking down at her.

"This floor is and the one below us is occupied by my crew, yours get the rest...so none of yours will hear us. Now, before I begin, I heard, as much as you tried to hide this, you were captured once yes? Whole crew killed, you kept alive" she looks down with a smile, seeing a little twitch of worry come from Ruby "Need I go through the details of your capture, or should I skip to the part where I tell you it is one of the methods of torture that my crew, and I myself excel at."

With those words Ruby seems to look very worried now, and makes a visual effort to push away from Asuka, only to have that straps holds her very still "where did you hear that....c'mon give me a brrrmmmmmmmmehheee!" she is forced to snap her mouth shut and hold her breath. A single long nail from Asuka's index finger was brought down suddenly and was tracing up and down the side nearest to where she is sitting.

"No Ruby, this is punishment for failing to pay me so many times, and if you fail me one more time, you will be part of my crew, spending your days in the brig, chained as you are now, serving as the entertainment for my crew during long times at sea."

You watch, staying as still as you can while you watch the scene unfold. This Asuka woman seems to be very cruel in her work, and just sits there, now running all ten of her nails, five on each bared side, driving Ruby into fits of laughter. Curses fly from the pirates mouth, but no matter what, Asuka has the redheaded pirate in her control, tickling that spot till you see Ruby start to go a little mad from that single spot being probed for so long.

"Of course, I learned one place that you just drives you up the wall...." Ruby barely has time to get a word out before Asuka reaches down, and with those long devlish nails, she goes for the pirates long legs, dragging them down to the knees, where she spends a few minutes just tickling all around them.

"BWWBWHEEHAAHAHEHEEDAHAHAAAMAMANNSTTAHWHWHWHWHAAAP" Ruby screams out between cackles, the knees making her go nuts, and the straps holding them in place make you shiver thinking of your own knees going through such an ordeal, for such a long period of time. Of all things, you would not have guessed the legendary pirate to be the ticklish sort, and if you catch her, you are sure to not let that knowledge slide to the authority's. For now though you have no choice but to watch the show and hope no one comes into the closet anytime soon.

"
15221.title: Hide in the closet

choices: Scum! I'll gouge your eyes for peeping in on me!
152212.content:
You watched from the slits in the closet door as Ruby continued to be tickled by Asuka. It seemed to have gone on for ages, although you know it can't have been more than some minutes. Ruby was brought to the brink of tears, only to have Asuka lighten up, changing to a gentler touch as Ruby caught her breath before tormenting her once more. At the moment, a solitary fingernail gently traces wide circles over Ruby's belly. The pirate queen is sucking in her stomach and gasping for air at the same time, and doing a poor job of either. Light girlish giggles poor from her, her earlier resistance long since broken. Asuka doesn't seem to show any signs of ending, or becoming bored or tired. She seems content to tickle Ruby until doomsday. Her companions stoically stand by the door, unmoving as golems.

Glancing at the leather restraints, you notice either by design or Ruby's trickery they are becoming looser. You lean against the door frame, straining for a better look. However, in the process you inhale a nose full of dust from the door. Despite your best efforts, a sneeze builds, until finally a muffled but still very noticeable "achoo!" echoes in the room.

Everyone in the stops dead, except for Ruby, still giggling from the lingering tickling sensations. With a nod from Asuka, her two guards open the closet door, finding you standing there. "Woops." you say comically. "This isn't my room, it's a closet! Well, I'll just be going…" You try to slip past the pair, but they clearly aren't buying your rouse. The two women grab your shoulders and throw you onto the bed next to Ruby.

"Well…" Asuka says, studying you carefully. "It looks like Ruby had a friend in here after all. Did you want to join in on the fun too? My guards have been waiting patiently, maybe they should get a chance to play now…" You gulp at the suggestion and turn to the guards. Getting a closer look, you realize they are more than just run of the mill ruffians. The two women have long black hair resting on their shoulders. Black shirts look tattered or deliberately torn halfway down, revealing a darkly tanned midriff. Loose fitting pantaloons are tied loosely at their hip at a jaunty angle, revealing the other hip. At each woman's exposed hip is a tattoo of a black feather curling around the hipbone. If Asuka thinks they can join in the fun, you can only guess how good at Asuka's… craft they are. But with all that exposed skin, you wonder if they aren't vulnerable to it themselves.

Your musings are cut short as Ruby suddenly frees herself from the bonds at her wrists and dives at you. Tussling on the bed, you quickly try to defend yourself as Ruby grabs you and pulls you in close. Before the guards can pull you apart, she whispers in your ear...

Decline and tell her the real reason your here

Then the guards grab Ruby and pull her off you "hey let me go, hes not with me he was spying on all of us" then Asuka looks at Ruby and said "you expect me to believe that" Ruby gets upset and says "fine I will prove it, if you let me go I will tie him down and tickle him myself to get information on why he was really here", you give Ruby a look that says "what are you doing?". Asuka thinks about it for a minute "okay Ruby but dont think your getting out of your punishment, once your done with him your getting tickled some more" then Ruby comes over to you and ties you down then whispers in your ear "okay now for this plan to work im going to have to tickle you a little but dont worry I will make sure you dont get tortured very long" then Ruby asks you loud so everyone can hear "now tell me what you were doing spying on us" you look at Ruby and say "I wont tell you" Ruby smiles and says "fine then I will have to tickle the answer out of you then she lifts up your shirt and you feel her nails slide up and down your sides and you start laughing, after a minute or so she goes up to your underarms and you watch one of her hands lift up the pillow your head is on and she pushes a button then she lays the pillow back down and starts tickling your underarms. You continued laughing loudly then after about five minutes the door burst open and a ton of girl pirates wearing the same outfit as Ruby came in and started attacking Asuka's guards. Ruby quickly untied you and said "now help me capture Asuka and I will reward you" you decided that you might as well help her, so you and Ruby run towards Asuka and Asuka says "guards get them" but all her guards are being attacked by Ruby's crew then Ruby grabs Asuka's arms and you grab her legs and you bring her over to the bed and hold her down while Ruby ties her up. Then you both turn around Ruby grabs an extra sword and tosses it to you, then you both help get rid of all of Asuka's guards then once they are all gone you shut the door and Ruby comes over to you and says "thank you, you were very helpful now as your reward I would like to offer you a position as Quartermaster on my crew, you will be second in command under me and will help me with decisions for plans we make. You stood there stunned for a minute thinking it over, you were really here to capture Ruby and tickle her for information on where some treasure is but being on her crew would mean you would be with her all the time and you could help her find treasure and you would still be able to have some treasure. After a couple minutes you said...

15221211.content: Ruby I accept your offer on one condition "whats that" Ruby asked, then you whisper in her ear "this might sound a little weird but at times when we aren't hunting treasure I want to have some time with just the two of us in your quarters to tickle each other". Ruby just stood there and stared at you for a second before you whispered in her ear again "I wont torture you as bad as Asuka I just want to have some fun you know", then Ruby thought for a minute before saying "I guess but only on our time off that means when I am giving orders and we are on a journey I dont want you tickling me or I will have you tied up and tickled yourself" you looked at her in the eyes and said "you got it" Ruby smiled and said "okay but before we head to the ship and I get your outfit I would like to have some payback on Asuka, you nod and say "yes captain Ruby" then Ruby walks up to Asuka and Asuka yells at Ruby "untie me now or you will pay Ruby" Ruby laughed and said "no its time for my revenge then she takes off Asuka's shoes and and rolls up her shirt and begins by tickling...
