Teeheeheeheehehehehahahahahaaaa Oohhahahahahohohoho staahshahahahap!!!

Ruby just grins and chuckles quietly under her breath as she watches asuka squirm and shake her tummy from side to side to avoid the dreaded feather's kiss
"Cootchie cootchie coo...cootchie cootchie Coooohooo!!!
Who would have thought the great asuka,tough as nails and cruel as the sea herself...and an underbelly just as soft as the rest of us. Hmm...speaking of nails."

You look on as the pirate in red continues feathering her captives naked tummy as she uses her free hand to skitter her sharp nails all across her tender torso. Changing tactics by using her index finger to probe the soft meat between her ribs one at a time. Causing Asoka to scream madly with laughter.

"Bwhaaaaahahahahahahaha oh noooohohoho Nono dohohohntehahahaaaa!!
Oh please please please stahahahap!!!

Ruby turns to you and says. "Quartermaster would you like to give you captain a hand?
With a sinister look on your face you then...
152212112.title: Asuka's Belly

choices: Someone lands on top of you!
They decide to get into bed
15222.content:
You quickly dive under the covers, hoping whoever it is won't notice you under all those blankets. You lie on your back, trying to flatten out as much as possible, as the footsteps enter the room. You try to breath as shallowly as possible, not moving an inch.

"Ah, that was a relaxing bath." you hear a female voice say.

"Yea, it was worth it to buy the expensive soap this time. My skin feels so smooth." says a second female voice. You're outnumbered! In your vulnerable position, you might not be able to escape if they notice you. You continue to listen, hoping they'll leave the room, or at least say something about Ruby. One of them might even be the dread pirate herself!

"Your skin is always so nice, Yuki. I don't know how you do it."

"Ah! Hehehehehehe, stop that! I'm ticklish there, Shira!" Drat, neither of them are Ruby. But what's going on out there?

"Sorry, I couldn't resist, especially since you're always wearing such revealing clothing." says Shira.

"You're one to talk, Shira. But I'm envious of your figure. How can you have such a full bust and such a flat tummy?"

"Eek! Ahaha, not my stomach! If that's how you want to play, I'll get these smooth underarms!"

"Nohohoho, not there! Eehehehehehehe, I'll get you back!"

"Kootchie kootchie koo, Yuki. You always did have the most sensitive skin on the ship!"

"Ahahahahahahaha, stop! But I know where your worst spot is, Shira. Tickle tickle!"

Girlish giggles fill the air as the two continue to taunt and tickle each other. From what you can hear, they seem equally ticklish: Yuki all over, and Shira in one terrible spot. But Shira turns out to be the better tickler, and soon you hear Yuki begging for mercy.

"Ahahahahahha stop, mercy! Hehehehehehehe"

"Ok, ok, truce for tonight. But Yuki..."

Shira trails off into whispers, and you're unable to hear, until you notice...
15222.title: Hide IN the bed

choices: They knew you were there all along!
152222.content:
"Hmm? You want to sleep in my bed tonight, Shira?"

"Yep! I'll let you go if you give me the right half of the bed. My sheets are being washed and I'll be cold in my bed. Besides, your bed is so huge!" Shira says.

Oh no, they'll notice you for sure if they get into bed! But there's no way you'll be able to escape unnoticed. As you hear them approach the bed, you try to take up as little space as possible. Occupying the exact center, you stretch your legs below you, and move your arms above your head and under a pillow. Hopefully they'll give each other some personal space, and not notice you. Or maybe they'll assume the warm body next to them is the other pirate and not you. You hope against hope that your half-baked plan works.

They climb into the bed on either side of you as you watch out of the corner of your eye, seeing your adversaries for the first time. Yuki, on your right, has an oriental look to her, with long silky black hair and dark, doe eyes. Her skin is pale and beautiful, and covered by a thin silk blue camisole over her midsection. Shira, on your left, has western features: light brown hair comes down to her neck, partially obscuring pale, blue eyes. Her skin is somewhat tan, but boasts an impressive figure. A supple chest, flat smooth stomach and generous curves highlight a taut frame. Risque red undergarments provide the barest of coverings.

Against all odds, it appears they didn't notice you in the middle of this king sized bed. You start to feel relieved, and now all you have to do is wait until they fall asleep.

"Should I turn out the light, Shira?" Yuki asks.
152222.title: They decide to get into bed

1522221.content:
"Yep, g'night." Shira says, as the room becomes pitch black. You wait, making as little noise or movements as possible. Now that they can't see you, you just need to hold on until Shira and Yuki fall asleep. As long as neither of them begin moving to the center of the bed, you should be able to carefully escape from under the covers. You sit patiently, listening to their breathing, as first Yuki then Shira start to breathe regularly, drifting off to sleep.

You couldn't have hoped for your escape to have gone better. But just as you are about to start slowly sliding down the bed to freedom, an arm wraps around you! You freeze in horror as Shira scoots closer to you, cuddling against your left side. Her breathing is still slow and rhythmic, so she must still be asleep. Thankfully your arms are still free above your head. As she grips you tighter, you try to think of a way to pry her arm loose and get her to roll over. If she sticks to you all night, you'll be done for in the morning.

Suddenly, her hand starts to absentmindedly scratch your side. You stifle a jolt and try to remain perfectly still as her fingers lazily stroke your right side. Shira's fingers continue to gently scratch along your side, slowly turning into a teasing, kitchy motion. She's tickling you in your sleep! You try your best not to react as five fingers keep stroking your sensitive skin.

Her fingers drift slightly lower and begin tickling your right hip. It takes all your willpower not to squirm as those talented fingers drift over that ticklish spot between hip and leg. A silly grin overtakes your face as you clench your teeth, fighting the giggles welling up inside you. Shira's hand slips under your shirt and begins wriggling her fingers against your bare flesh. You twitch involuntarily at the new sensation, trying vainly to will her fingers away with your mind. What kind of dream could she be having?

Her hand crawls further underneath your shirt, stroking your stomach softly with gentle, unending strokes. Your resistance starts to ebb as your belly begins to shake with silent laughter. You swear you hear Shira chuckle in her sleep at the development, as spidery motions tickle in languorous circles around your belly. Part of your mind pleads with you to let it out and succumb to the irresistible tickling, but if you do both girls will wake up. if you don't think of something soon, awake girls will surely tickle worse than sleeping ones!
1522221.title: They fall asleep

15222211.content:
If you had a moment, you would have congratulated yourself on your incredible self-control thus far. Unfortunately you didn't, as your mind was too busy trying to ignore those wandering fingers on your stomach. Shira's nails were just long enough to tickle you with either her fingertips or her fingernails, depending on how she held her fingers, and the combination was driving you crazy.

Wiggling like a worm, you slowly begin to scoot down the bed, sliding out of Shira's loose hold on you, but the process is slow and torturous. You can't move fast or they may wake up, and every inch you move just means her wiggling fingers are tickling a new spot.

It felt like half an hour, but more likely it was just a minute, when you were able to slide about a foot down the bed. Shira's nails are scratching gently upon your lowest rib. Each time she ventures along it towards your side you quiver with held-back laughter, on the verge of breaking. Thankfully she always moves back up towards your stomach just a second before breaking.

Something soft and warm brushes up under your right arm. You glance over and see Yuki is burying her face under your arm, and her lips keep grazing your skin.

"Mmmm... chocolate..." she mutters under your breath. Your eyes go wide just before she begins to gently suckle and lick your underarm.

Your whole body shakes to a point that you half-expect them to wake up thinking it's an earthquake. Your mouth is stuck in a permanent grin, and tears are beginning to blur your vision.

Shira's fingers exploring your ribs... Yuki's mouth exploring your underarm.... you feel like you're going to explode!
15222211.title: Yuki joins in

152222112.content:
"EEEEEEEHEHEHEHEH" you yell, the soft tongue on your underarm has done you in. The two girls awaken simultaneously . Despite being such deviants when they play, they were surprisingly well disciplined, not screaming or even releasing their grip due to the shock of waking up torturing someone who is in your bed who wasn't there when they went to bed.
"Well, well, who would this be, Yuki?"
"An intruder it seems? A cute one at that."

This was too much for you.. "Wait, wait wait, you don't find it the least bit strange that you," you looked at Shira, "woke up tickling me senseless, and that you," you looked at Yuki, "woke up licking my armpit until I cracked?!"

The two exchanged glances and Yuki said, "We do it all the time when we're awake. Except when we're awake, we do it much better." She punctuated that with a long, slow, wet lick up your armpit. She's had practice. As she massaged her saliva into your armpit (with her fingernails and the tip of her tongue) you realized what you were in for now.

"Shira, what would it be worth to you to give me some one-on-one time with our... guest of honor?"
"I'll think about that. Just make sure our guest is broken and submissive when I come back with Ruby. I'll take my time."
Shira gave a teasing wink and left.

Yuki spoke to you, saying "Ruby will be here soon, and she'll have questions. When she gets here, you'll BEG to answer them. I think I'll stick with your upper body for now, but should I stick with your sensitive underarms or move... somewhere else?" She licked her lips as she made her choice.
152222112.title: Crack and burst out laughing

choices: Look for a way to restrain them
Get out and look on your own.
15222212.content:
Taking as much care and time as possible, you reach down and slowly tickle Shira's upper ribs with your fingers. You slowly trace a ticklish line over her ribcage, stroking softly and slowly to tickle, but not wake her up. Your efforts bear fruit as Shira breaks into a grin while she sleeps and stops her tickling, shifiting her hand away from your belly as she brings her arm up to cover her ribs, giggling softly "Yuki no..." She mutters as she turns over, leaving you free as her arm pulls away from your body completely.

Now free to move, you wiggle down towards the bottom of the bed, breathing out in a sigh of relief as you pull out from under the covers and step out from the bed. You take a moment to compose yourself before stepping towards the door... and then pausing. You look back and see Shira and Yuki, two beautiful, naked and very ticklish women. They're both asleep and have no idea of your presence. It's possible, if difficult, to find some way to restrain them for interrogation. It might save a lot of time rather than looking blindly about your task and above all, would be a lot of fun. But if you're caught before tying them up, then the tickling Shira gave you would be nothing compared to what they'd do to you.

Risk an attempt at interrogation of these two beauties, or continue the search on your own?
15222212.title: Tickle Shira back

choices: They wake up with their hands free!
The stay asleep, and you successfully tie their wrists.
152222121.content:
You decide to restrain the two pirates, hoping to coerce the location of Ruby from them. Or at the very least, some kind of treasure. If you can't get the reward for capturing a dangerous pirate, you might at least rob the robbers and get some kind of loot. As you pull a length of rope from your belt, a part of your mind admits that the allure of having these two attractive women at your disposal is hard to pass up. As you carefully peel back the blanket, your eyes linger over their forms, impressively beautiful for being ruthless pirates spending most of their days on a dirty stolen man o' war.

Shira's tan stomach and chest rise and fall with her slow, steady breathing. Her red undergarments accentuating her feminine appeal, her light brown hair falling over her face and neck as she sleeps on her side. On the other end of the bed, Yuki's pale skin glows in the pale moonlight from the window, her delicate features belying what must be quick and terrible abilities. Her blue silk garments provide little more covering than Shira's, and you notice goosebumps forming over Yuki's skin. Shaking yourself out of an embarrassing daze, you realize you'll have to restrain them quickly, before they wake up and notice the lack of blanket covering. And of course, that you are hovering over them.

You move to their feet, tying them to the footboard carefully but quickly. Thankfully, neither of them make any movements, and you successfully tie both sets of feet to the bed. The problem, you see, will come from restraining their wrists. You'll have to crawl back onto the middle of the bed to reach a good point to tie them to the headboard. Getting another length of rope and placing it in your teeth, you slowly crawl back up the bed. Every twitch from Yuki, every vocalization from Shira makes you pause in fear. Perhaps this wasn't the wisest decision, you think, as you contemplate how you are once again potentially vulnerable, caught between a seductive Scylla and Charybdis.

You maneuver their hands into the proper position, and miraculously manage to not wake either of them in the process. As you begin looping the rope around the headboard, you see jerking movements in your peripheral vision. Both of them are moving at once! Freezing once more and hoping this is another harmless dream, you wait...
152222121.title: Tie Up the Sleeping Beauties

1522221211.content:
Your heart leaps in your chest as you see the two females stirring. You hear Yuki mumbling in her sleep and Shire suddenly moving her arms up to stretch, brushing against the ropes you had prepared to bind her with in the process. She opens her eyes and looks at you, tilting her head quizzically.
She lifts up her right hand and scratches her ruffled hair,, before sighing.

"Why do all my dreams end before they get to the fun part..." she mumbled, before closing her eyes and yawning.

Rope in hand, you're currently straddled right next to her, as Shira rubs her eyes. You ponder whether it'd be easier to simply play along and wait for an opportunity to escape, or take the initiative and bind them down.
1522221211.title: They wake up with their hands free!

choices: Not a very happy pirate girl.
15222212111.content:
You decided to improvise wildly. Surely these two pirate girls wouldn't buy that you were a figment of their imagination for long! And you shuddered to think what would happen once they realized what you were planning to do to them. They'd probably end up playing with you for the rest of the night, before reporting you to their boss where God knows what would happen next! You'd end up either suffering suffering some horrible torment, taken as a slave, or killed. Worst case scenario all three.

All these nerve-wrecking facts were coursing through your mind as you quickly made a loop with the rope, slung it around the wrist of the groggy Shira and managed to quickly bind the left arm of the tanned girl. You were impressed by how quickly you managed to bind her limb, one down, one to go... You thought desperately, as you reached for another length of rope. Unfortunately, this was as far as you got, before a now awake and angry Shira leaned forward and punched you in the jaw.
"Oh, we're gonna make you pay for this, you little pervert..." She hissed, as she tried to get up, only to realize you had bound her legs down as well.

Reeling from the blow, you pushed off from the bed as you tried to lift your stinging face from the mattress. You heard her suddenly let out a yelp as you did so, you looked down and you noticed you had accidentally brushed the bottom of the girl’s right foot. Desperate to get the upper hand back, you quickly used both hands to aggressively scratch up and down the trapped tanned feet. The result was instantaneous, Shira burst into high pitched giggles, mixed in with silent laughter after the intial attack. You marveled at how lucky you were that Shira was a silent laugher, as the last thing you needed was more patrons of the inn bursting in to investigate the noise. Shira kept trying to reach forward to swipe at your arms, trying to get you to stop, but the rope that held her left arm back made it impossible to do so. Your eyes darted away from the wiggling and squirming tootsies and was surprised to see that Shira's fellow pirate was still asleep. It seemed Yuki was so used to the noise of forced laughter that she treated it as background music and didn't even respond to it. This theory really made you wonder what really happened on these pirate ships...

No time to dawdle though, Shira's right arm was still free, and she could probably untie her other arm or worse, wake up Yuki with a rousing shove. You quickly dropped one hand to scavenge for another piece of rope, while using your other hand to keep Shira's ticklish feet entertained.

You sprang up, rope in one hand, as your scrambled, you made sure to squeeze Shira's knees, keeping her giggling as you then grabbed her right arm and quickly tied it down. The tanned women seemed worn out from the ordeal. This is good news for you, if she seems this 'sensitive', after only a bit more persuading she'd probably be willing to give up some information. A makeshift gag quickly gets made from a piece of cloth, and while she tries to wiggle her head away, she seems breathless and exhausted, and you manage to put the gag around her mouth

You grab another piece of rope and nervously turn to Yuki, praying that she was still asleep despite all the struggling.. You turn and it seemed she was...
15222212111.title: Opportunity created!

152222121111.content:
"I think fair's fair, don't you?" Yuki said with a dangerous smile. You eyes darted to her raised hand, she had in her hand a large wooden hairbrush. You wondered for a moment what a hairbrush could possibly do, right before she conked at against the side of you head. Seeing stars, you flopped backwards, as Yuki calmly sat up, seeming to have wiggled out of the bonds you had tied around her legs. She happily took the length of rope you were going to bind her with, "Thank you, sweetie," and then flipped you onto your belly and tied your arms together.

"I'm not bad with ropes, either, you see," she bragged. It was true, she had tied a pretty good knot, but what she didn't know was when you were majoring in adventuring, you had also picked up a few good tricks in escaping ropes, you had habitually tensed up your muscles when she had wrapped the ropes around your arms to bind you, meaning you'd have more slack to work with later. Wiggling your arms free was only a matter of time, you tried to remind yourself. Of course, it was hard when an alluring female was menacingly wiggling her fingernails at you. "I was really wondering if you can take what you can dish out," she grinned, wasting no time in poking her fingers into your sides. You tried to squirm free, but she quickly straddled you, trapping your torso between her legs as she grabbed and goosed your sides easily. Your head was still spinning from the blow to the temple, and you hoped it was sweat you felt on your brow, not blood. All such thoughts were then blown out of your mind as the mischievous Yuki found a sensitive spot along your ribs and began tormenting it happily.

"Heh, anytime you're ready to start talking, sweetie, I'm wondering why I wake up with...
152222121111.title: Asian Persuasion

choices: As strong as ever. Curse you for buying such high quality rope!
Weakened enough that you could wriggle and arm free.
1522221211111.content:
...a handsome man in my bed, its an unexpected pleasure, that's for sure," Yuki smiled evilly.

Yuki kept talking as she played with your muscular upper body, you weren't sure what was worse, the way this small Asian women was having her way with all your vulnerable spots (well maybe not ALL) or the teasing way she did it.

"Who woulda thought a muscly cutie like you would be so sensitive?" She giggled as she rolled up your tunic, admiring your toned body as she scrapped her nails all over your ribcage. You tried squirming for mercy, cursing yourself for bringing such strong ropes, but you could feel them fraying silently, as you struggled more and more violently, but you couldn't stop the stream of ticklish laughter that was flowing from your lips as she prodded your sensitive spots.

Yuki seemed to enjoy herself more as she saw how determined you were to break out, "Oh, I love it when they struggle," she tittered as she reached down into your hips and dug vigorously, making you bounce up and down on the bed. You had been trying to keep the laughter down to a minimum, knowing that if another patron knocked on the door and alerted Ruby the pirate, it was all over for you, while if you could endure till you were able to get out of the ropes, you could overpower the smaller women and get some well deserved payback.

"You haven't answered me, so why are you here, cutie?" Yuki asked, feeling an evil finger begin to wiggle into your belly button. You feel it stroke around everywhere, before quickly retracting.

"I'll let you think about it while I try out those underarms of yours. Then we try out the hairbrush. Or you can give me some answers. I actually don't mind which," she smiled as she began to pull off your jacket to gain access to your underarms. Words could not describe how badly you wanted to either punch the girl or give her a large dose of tickling torture.

You tested your bonds expectantly, they were...
1522221211111.title: ...a handsome man in my bed."

15222212111111.content:
As strong as ever. Curse you for buying such high quality rope. You had bought the rope off a local merchant, and you were amazed that you had probably found the only honest merchant in all of Zenith. The rope was actually as good if not better than advertised, you were still stuck with a very bristly hairbrush and a devious women who intended to get all your secrets with it.

"I think let's play with the brush first, this little brush sure helped me out today, didn't it? Heh, nothing personal, if I hadn't got you, this brush would probably be scrubbing all over my feet right about now."

"Oh, it could still happen," you said defiantly. The throbbing pain in your temple and the adrenaline coursing through your system talking. You regretted it the second the words came out of your mouth.

"Looks like you need a bit more persuading," she said mischievously, stroking the brush affectionately, "I'll be happy to oblige."

"Wait, wait!" You say, a hint of desperation in your voice, you had finally been able to almost wiggle a thumb free, and you were anxious to buy for time, "I'll talk, just hold off."

"Fine, I'm listening, but make it quick," she says resting the brush down, before resting her hand back on your stomach, just above your navel. Slowly, her fingers begin to curl, just enough for her nails to scratch gently against your skin before she flexes them out straight again.

"Okay, okay, ehhehe, what did you want to know? Ask anything."

You can feel her fingers still. Curl, a gentle scratch, then relief. Curl, scratch, relief. Even though it's the same spot over and over, it still tickles just as bad as the first time. You squirm a little, struggling to keep a straight face.

"Hmm," she ponders, she seems to be enjoying the reaction she is causing, "Let's start with why you're here."

"Uhhh," you wonder if lying would be better than the truth, would pirates punish bounty hunters, thieves, or perverts harder?

The fingers at your stomach are maddening. "The thing is...
15222212111111.title: As good as advertised.

choices: lose enough to get an arm free.
still as strong as ever. Not good.
152222121111111.content:
..I was looking to rob you, you two looked like easy targets."

"Well, it sure looks you you got that wrong, didn't you?" Yuki said, her tone mocking. "But now why does that story not quite add up?" She asked, as she equipped the brush again. "Maybe its because no thief carries around so many weapons," she deduced, before sweeping the brush one full figure eight across your stomach.

You burst into giggles trying to explain, "Hahaha, I didn't know what I was going up agahahainst!"

"Maybe its because no thief would break into our rooms when the much wealthier and much more well known Baron of Zenith's son is staying next door, and is a renowned fool," she said as the brush completed another figure eight around your torso.

"Hehehe, I gohohot lost!"

"Maybe its because instead of just stealing our bags, you decided to tie us down instead?" Your mind actually wondered for a moment why Yuki hadn't untied her companion to have another ticklee to accompany her, but you reasoned she was enjoying this herself far too much, but the tickling was too intense to maintain thinking about this notion.

"I thouhohohght you could tell me where the trehehehesure wahahas HAHAHA!"

"And you went for the two of us and not the captain?" She asked, as the brush completed another circuit. "I can't say I buy it. Not. One. Bit," she announced, scrubbing more vigorously with the brush with every word.

You were in silent laughter now, breathless as attacked your helpless tummy. Your stomach was now red from the bristles.

There was a brief silence as you caught your breathe, flinching as she brandished the brush menacingly.

"So?" She said triumphantly, as gave your armpits an experimental tickle. "Ready to start talking? I'm quite happy if you say no, its been too long since I got to do this to a cutie like you," she paused, "But I do have to thank you for reminding me about Shira, I'm sure she'd love to join in the fun too."

As she bent over to remove her friend's gag, apologizing for her absent mindedness, you checked your bonds again, desperately hoping to avoid a two-way tickling. As you tested your bonds, it was more in hope than in expectation that you discovered that they were...
152222121111111.title: An honest thief.

1522221211111111.content:
Lathered in sweat, it seemed you had lost enough bodily fluids that now you were able to wiggle an arm free. As you silently freed both arms, you noted that Yuki was still lying on top of you, as she had from the start in order to stop your legs from squirming free, she was now leaning forward and in the midst of removing Shira's gag, cursing about what a tricky double knot you had used. You resisted the urge to crack your knuckles and throw out a witty one-liner as you rose up, looming behind her, devising a quick and simple plan. You saw Shira try to mouth something to warn Yuki, but everything translated to "Mmmm", in a gag, and Yuki just assumed the tanned girl was just nagging her to be quicker. "Almost got it."

"Oh, you're gonna get it, all right," you said thrusting your fingers into her sides, okay, maybe you hadn't been able to resist making some kind of terrible one-liner, but the beautiful girl writhing in ticklish laughter as the dug into her sides was quite the consolation. The asian-looking beauty tried to strike back, using her claw-like hands to scratch at your stomach, but you had grown accustomed to the torturous bristles and managed to shrug it off, and instead attacking her sides and ribs with more vigor as you managed to quickly tickle her till she was practically drooling status within a half-minute of rib tickling. She could barely formulate words, so you quickly deduced that those ribs of hers were quite the sore spot. Possibly a good note for later.

Taking advantage of her disoriented state, you manage to dive down and quickly pick up the rope than had suddenly turned from villainous captor to faithful friend, and after a quick belly tickle to stun her further, you quickly tied down all four of her limbs, taking advantage of her weakened state. After her right leg was tied down, in which she had recovered enough to try to kick and wiggle her foot away a little, she was caught her breath and was looking as you with a mixture of fear and surprise, and maybe even a little elation as she realized what awaited her. She opened her mouth to say something nasty to you but quickly shut up as you quickly dragged your nails up her right foot once, inciting a yelp from her.

"Looks a lot different when you have the brush, doesn't it?" You said cockily as you sat up next to the defeated Yuki, brush in one hand and gag in another.

"I guess it does," she sneered defiantly.

"Looks like its my turn to ask questions then, and because I'm such a 'sweetie', as you put it, I'm gonna tell you I'm not really a thief, I want information on Ruby."

Both Yuki and Shira shook their heads, Yuki who remained ungagged, did the talking. "We would never rat out our captain."

You shrug nonchalantly as you shove the gag in her mouth. "Let's see if you change your tone after a while. I understand being tickled when you can't even use your mouth to breath is unbearable. Now let's just see who's the lucky lady who gets the first wave..." You smile, enjoy the feeling of power as you point the brush at Yuki, the bold defiance is those dark eyes of her, to Shira with fear in her deep blue eyes, back to Yuki.

Who should be your first victim?
1522221211111111.title: Oh, how the tables have turned...

15222212111111112.content:
"You know, I'm sure poor ol' Shira just been sitting there bored for a while, since you didn't even have the sense to untie her," you chuckle, ignoring the evil glare Yuki is giving you. "I reckon she could use some entertaining, don't you?"

Both girls said something incomprehensible, probably either some obscenity or a threat to get revenge, or possibly both, you ignored this, as you wandered over to the tanned girl's feet. You recalled Shira's feet had been quite sensitive indeed. You then came up with a brilliant idea, before you started with your fingers, you used a smaller thread of rope to bind toes together, so that Shira's ticklish feet couldn't even try to squirm away. That wasn't your brilliant idea though. After you did this, you quietly declared: "I'm going to tickle Shira's feet here for twenty minutes, and after that, I'm going to ask you, Yuki, if you're going to tell me all about Ruby, her ship, treasure, everything. If not, Shira gets it for another twenty minutes. Sounds fair, no?"

As both girls exchanged fearful glances, you knew the strategy was working, being pirates, they had a strong set of camaraderie, so hopefully by manipulating the circumstances in such a way, you could use this against them. You snuck a look outside the window to see how much time you had left. It was starting to get light out, you had to work quick.

"Looks like I have plenty of time to work with," you lied, "so let's get started," you said rubbing your fingers as you sat at the foot of the bed by Shira's lovely feet, as you gave a few experimental strokes, you were amazed by how this pirate girl had managed to keep her feet in such good condition, you would never understood how women had the uncanny ability to avoid calluses.

"Soft, and very ticklish," you deduced loudly, hoping that saying this outloud would intimidate them into giving up the information quicker. "This should be fun," you said as you began to stroke your fingers up and down her feet.

As you began stroking your fingers up along both feet, you noticed that Shira's feet were quite long, proportional to her height, you quite pleased to discover this fact. Her feet were long enough for there to be space for two hands to tickle the same foot with space to spare, a privilege that you was abusing happily. A fact you happily pointed out as the girl squealed into the gag.

After twenty minutes of this, you stopped, a panting and sweating profusely Shira sighed in relief. You went up to Yuki and removed the gag. You looked into her dark sad eyes.

"And I haven't even used the brush yet. What's your answer? Ready to talk?"
15222212111111112.title: Oh, that's good....

152222121111111121.content:
"No, no, no, I can't! I can't betray Ruby like this!" Yuki shook her head.

Out of frustration more than anything else you picked up the brush and dragged it across Shira's soles, then Yuki's. Yuki squealed and Shira squealed into her gag, mirroring her friend.

"You know, I think I've been going about this wrong. I have two hands, this way might even work better," you smile, knowing that since you're running out of time, desperate times call for desperate measures.

You go down onto the floor and pick up a feather, probably a leftover from a bird, or more likely, a tool from the last tickle victim of this inn.

After regagging Yuki you position yourself at their feet. "Last chance?" You offer.

Both girls shake their heads.

"So be it", you sigh... tickling didn't seem nearly as fun when you had a deadline to make.

Wielding one feather in one hand and the hairbrush in another, you began, multitasking wasn't quite your forte, but it wasn't as hard as it looked keeping these two ticklish ladies in ticklish torment it seemed. Yuki was the feather's first 'guest' , and she moaned into the gag as the feather swished and swept across her pale, helpless feet. They dangled off the end of a cushion, allowing the tormenting tool free reign to sweep across and between them.

"Eheheyahaha! Ahahahaa! Please-pleheheheease!" Shira squealed into her gag, though that meant it all translated into "Mmmmmm! Mmmmmm! MMmem-memheheme!" Having already took so much torment as fell under the same torture that befell Yuki, only the brush with its many bristles were even worse than the fingers. Her feet, though larger than Yuki's were no less sensitive, if not more, she and wiggled and wobbled frantically in a desperate bid to escape the wrath of the feather. Her rosy cheeks puffed as sweet laughter spewed out, unable to keep it bottled up as she tried to plead with their captor.

Yuki was impressed by how much of this tortorous tickling both Shira and the strange man tickling her had been able to stand. She was actually immensely relieved she wouldn't have to be tickled as the man played his mind games, she was devastatingly ticklish, all over. She figured she was actually getting the lesser of the attack, with the slithery feather instead of the brutal brush and the fact her toes remained free to wiggle and look for less torturous spots to take the tickling (if any), but she didn't know how much more of this she could stand, and hoped that either freedom would come to the two of them, or this crazy thief/treasure hunter would get the picture and realize that they knew nothing of what she wanted. Her toes curled, trying to keep the feather from sweeping between and under them. Unfortunately, brushing over them was enough of a torturous sensation that the stubby digits would spread open and flex, allowing the feather to get to the soft spots within…

Yuki groaned into her gag, as she felt the weapons switch and the bristly brush introduce itself to her right foot. You had cleverly decided to switch the feather and the brush so each trapped girl got a different tool. A move to keep them on their toes, somewhat literally. It was clearly having a good effect, as thrashing her head side to side, Yuki struggled in vain to pull herself off the chair and away from the fluttering torture device. "Ahahahaaa! Plehehehehee-stahahaaa!!" She giggled into the gag, her poor little feet flapped and wiggled, one crossing over the other to protect its twin. This only had the amusing effect of leaving the protector vulnerable, forcing the roles to reverse in desperation, repeating an endless cycle of ticklish agony.

"I could do this all day, or night, mind you." You chuckled, lying through your teeth as you guessed you had maybe half an hour left till the people in the inn began to wake up and the other pirates began to wonder where these two had gone.based on their increased struggles you were getting to them. Any minute now...

Shira winced visually as she heard this, her toes curling with dread. She watched helplessly as the feather drew nearer, until the moment when it flicked across her silky skin. Her nerves reacted as if they had been struck by lightning. This sensation proved far more torturous than it had five minutes ago. You noted how anticipation had seemed to magically make her feet more ticklish, laughably enough, as the fluffy tool swept across her tanned feet.

"Willing to talk?"
152222121111111121.title: Never say never.

choices: "Well, you see, I was going to rob you guys blind!"
"...I was after your boss, Ruby, and wanted information from you girls..."
1522221211112.content:
"...An extra girl in my bed, but be sure sweetie, it's no displeasure," grinned the Asian Pirate girl, as she wiggled her fingers along your ribcage, poking each rib with her talon like fingernails.

You giggled like a little girl as she did so, trying to avoid bursting out with laughter, as if you were too loud and woke any more pirates up, you were essentially screwed. "Staahahp thaaaahaht..." you giggled under your breath, trying to plead with your tormenter. Yuki wore an evil smile.

"I don't think so yet cutie, you still have to tell me why you're messing around in our room" she replied, wiggling her fingers further up your shirt to your armpits, causing your laughter to slightly escalate. You knew if you didn't come up with a good excuse soon, you'd lose your cool and risk waking the entire inn! "I'm waiting little miss break in" Yuki stated in a sing-song voice, scraping her fingers ever faster. "You don't want me to use this brush on you, do you?"

Oh god, that brush and it's rugged bristles would be the epitome of torture! "Okay, Okay, I'll talk..." you spat, eager to end the tickling session. The only thing is, do you chance lying to them about why you were there, or do you admit the truth of your quest to her?

"Lets hear it girlie..."
1522221211112.title: "...An Extra Girl in My Bed"

choices: No, you cannot recover in time...
Cut from a strong cloath, you slip free!
15222212111121.content:
"I was going to rob you guys blind, you see, and the rest of this inn, but I couldn't risk letting you girls get in my way!" You feel as though the lie would work, as thievery was a common thing in the world of Zenith, and would pass as an excuse half the time. However, Yuki was a bit more astute than the average pirate, and bore a smug grin at you.

"Oh really? You felt the need to go through all the trouble of trying to tie us up while hunting for gold and treasures?" She wiggled the brush on your exposed stomach, causing you to giggle madly. "Especially considering any thief worth her salt wouldn't risk going after two normal pirates when Ruby herself was staying a few floors above? Sounds to me like your story's full of more holes than a rotted ship!"

"It'sahaha truehaha!" you laugh, barely able to contain your laughter. Yuki simply smiles and rakes the brush along your stomach, along with wiggling her fingers under an exposed arm. The combined sensations are maddening to keep bottled down, as if your body was a pressure system waiting to release!

"Admit it, Little Miss Break Inn, you're a liar as well," Yuki began, sweetly talking down to you. "And we don't take kindly to liars around here!" Yuki scrubbed the brush against your stomach faster, leaving you in ticklish shambles. You wheezed with laughter and your stomach turned a pinkish color from all the sensations. "As soon as I untie my lovely cohort here, we're going to have a lot of fun with you..."

With that, the pirate woman stood up and moved over to Shira, to get rid of the bonds that held her down. You are struggling to recover from her tickles, but feel the ropes loosen from when you tensed your muscles. If you try hard enough, you'll be able to slip through. Are you in enough control to escape this situation?
15222212111121.title: Liars Never Prosper...

152222121111211.content:
Try as you might, the pale Asian beauty Yuki was shown to be brutal in her tickling methods, causing your own girlish and sensitive form to collapse under the unavoidable sensations. Given enough time, you would have been able to get loose, but not before Yuki was able to finally undo your knots on her cohort, the tanned pirate woman Shira.

"Nice going Yuki..." muttered Shira in a pleased mood, but still a bit sore at the fact you had managed to tie her up.

Yuki smiled and nodded. "My pleasure. After all, now we have someone new to play with. A little liar to torture!"

Shira grinned. "I'm ready to show her some payback for trying to bind us up! No one messes with Ruby's Pirates and gets away with it..."

Just as she spoke that, Shira leaned down and ran her fingers on your sides, sending you back into uncontrollable giggles. "She's a pretty one, ain't she Yuki?"

"Indeed Shira," grinned the Asian woman, kneeling down beside her and running her own fingers on your sensitive ribcage. "A worthy capture!"

They continued to tickle playfully, never actually breaking you, but keeping your ticklish form on the edge for roughly ten agonizing minutes that would to any normal being have felt like hours. As those few minutes wore on, the girls let up a bit, and began to talk amongst themselves.

"She's sure trying to be tough huh? Holding in those laughs?" came Shira, a bit unsatisfied finally of your suppressed giggles.

"You're right Shira, as usual!" grinned Yuki. "We should move on up a step, don't you think?" Shira smiled evilly.

"With pleasure."

With that, they picked up your weary form, and placed you in the center of the bed. Shira gathered the ropes you tied her with earlier, while Yuki started to untie your hands. Too weak from the extended tickling and the lack of proper breathing to fight back, your arms are stretched out taut. "No need for these!" came a bubbly Yuki, stripping you of your light jacket and tunic, and then binding your wrists together to the headboard.

"No need for these either!" came Shira, who was at the foot of the bed with the ropes. She began removing your boots, setting them aside, and pulling off your plain white socks to reveal your long and delicate feet. "Oh, what delightful fun we're going to have..." Shira muttered giddily, as she moved to your waist next, and pulled off your light cotton pants, leaving you completely vulnerable just about everywhere! Shira finished her job by tying your ankles to the footboard, your bare and sensitive feet sticking through the wooden bars.

"Puhahalease...I'm sorry for...breaking in..." you muster with barely any breath, your hair a wild mess over your reddened face.

"It's a bite late for thaaat." Yuki replies, grabbing the gag you tried to use on Shira and sticking it in your own mouth. As she finishes making you completely unable to say any comprehensible word, she whispers into your ear, "We're going to make you scream in delightful, ticklish agony..."
152222121111211.title: At the Hands of Pirates

15222212112.content:
You decide to play along as Shira starts to awaken, hoping this isn't the first time a crazy idea of yours pays off. As you straddle the pirate woman's waist, she stretches out once again, her arms up over her head and pulling her tanned body taut. You can't help noticing once again how alluring she is, nor the fact that all she wears beneath you are red undergarments. They do nothing to obscure the curves of her body or the smoothness of her skin.

"Who said your dream is over, Shira? Haven't you heard of lucid dreaming?" You tell her, trying to convince her that you are indeed a figment of her imagination, and that she's still in the midst of her dreaming. You never said it was a good plan.

"Huh…? Lucid dreaming, that's where you realize it's a dream, right?" Shira says groggily, opening her eyes and gazing up at you in the dim moonlight coming in through the window.

"Indeed, Shira. You are still in your dream, but are now self-aware. But that does not mean your dream will passively obey you. I am a manifestation of your subconscious desires, Shira. The fun part has yet to begin. Do you wish to continue your dream?" You speak to her in a passionate whisper, recalling that if Yuki wakes, this plan will surely fail.

With each passing moment, you think about how stupid this plan really is. There's no way she's going to believe you! You should have bolted the second she stirred. Yet, you refuse to admit even to yourself that what keeps you is not thought of success, but the silky feel of her skin.

Shira brushes a strand of light brown hair from her face and looks up into your face. Shira looks confused, but as the mist fades away from those pale blue eyes, you realize you have your answer.
15222212112.title: Play Along

152222122.content:
You realize it's too risky to try and tie up the two pirate beauties. Odds are, they'd wake up and then you'd be in over your head. Now, they'll sleep all night as if nothing happened. You creep out into the hallway, leaving Yuki's door cracked open to avoid the noise. You shake your head, slightly wistful at leaving them. But you're here to bring Ruby to justice! And collect the handsome reward.

Looking around the hallway, you see it's little more than a corridor with shut doors. Any one of them could hold Ruby, other pirates, or even innocent bystanders sleeping at the tavern. You stop and think, realizing your plan isn't as well thought out as it should be. Just opening doors at random would probably alert them before you could find her. Hands folded across your chest, a pensive expression on your face in the dark, barely lit hallway, you're surprised when suddenly you feel something soft and silky press against your back!

"Did you honestly think I was asleep, cutie?" a voice whispers to you from behind, hot breath tickling your ear. It's Shira! She was pretending to be asleep the entire time! You feel her alluring bosom press into your, just your clothes and her silky undergarment separating you. Her hands slip around your waist and make their way under your shirt, sensually rubbing against the skin of your stomach. You stiffen, remaining still and silent. The last thing you should do would be to let out a yelp.

"I was having a lot of fun earlier. I'd love to get the chance to... explore you. Every inch of that obviously ticklish body of yours. It's not often I get the chance to play with someone as attractive as you." She tells you, her fingers curling slightly, just barely tickling your lower belly with her fingertips. Your belly sucks in and you suppress a shudder, and you feel her chuckling in your ear.

"I won't make any noise or call for help, cutie. It's just you and me. So as long as you stay quiet, we can play all night. I promise to make it worth your while..." She tells you, whispering huskily in your ear as her fingers continue to glide over your belly, barely making contact, drawing out her conquest. You don't know if you can trust her words. If you turn around, she might call out. It may be best to stay still until you think of something. Then again, you don't know how long you can last under Shira's skilled fingers. A forced grin spreading over your face, you decide what to do next.
152222122.title: Leave the room.

choices: Shira keeps her end of the bargain (in her own special way).
An unexpected guest enters the room!
1522221222.content:
Doing your best to remain silent, the only sound that you could hear were your own quiet snickers, along with Shira’s hot breath against your ear. Deciding that complying with your new captor would be the best course of action for now, Shira gave another low chuckle. “That’s right cutie. Now come along. The night is still young, and if you play your cards right, there might be a reward waiting for you.”

Feeling a push on your back, you tried to ignore her soft chest as the brunette leads you into an adjacent room. As she gestured for you to disrobe before getting onto the large bed, you heard the door click shut while you quickly turned away with a furious blush, Shira winking as she pocketed the key by slipping it into her brassiere. “We can’t have you getting any weird ideas now, can we? Now, lie down.”

“D-Do you promise to let me go if I-” Not getting a chance to finish the sentence as the female fatale pounced on you, you felt the wind leave your lungs as Shira’s… tools occupied most of your vision, the pirate pressing a finger to your lips, her own curled into a seductive smile. “Of course, of course. But no more talking. Would you kindly lift your arms? Or do I need to call for help?”

Drumming her fingers against your sides to give extra incentive, you squirmed while hesitantly raising your hands to the head of the bed. Bringing out a small coil of rope hidden somehow behind her back, the pirate’s red lingerie rested inches away from your similarly colored cheeks as she leaned forward to bind your hands above your head, with your eyes all the while trying their best to tear away from the alluring sight.

“So obedient… If Captain Ruby would have given me permission, I would take you aboard our ship as my personal toy.” Smacking yourself mentally, you reprimanded yourself for missing the obvious opportunity. If the room was soundproofed to contain any sound you might make during your little ‘session’, nobody would have also known had you managed to turn the tables on your mischievous captor. However, it was too late for regrets. “But just for tonight, I’ll have you all to myself. As a reward for going along with my whims, I’ll show you a good night.”

Starting by slowly drumming her fingers along your bare sides, you instantly burst into giggles as your hips moved by themselves, trying to escape the digits which were barely making contact. “So ticklish! You might be even more ticklish than Yuki! How did you even keep quiet when I caught you just now… Ooh looking at you squirm makes me want to squirm as well!”

Giggling at her own antics, you saw her fingers trace teasing shapes along the circumference of your quivering belly. A large grin already plastered on your face, you were no match when Shira skittered her fingers up and down your front, wiggling a devious finger into your bellybutton. Screaming and bucking with ticklish laughter, Shira cooed as she held you down with her body. “Coochie Coochie Coo! Just look at that smooth belly! So ticklish as well! Tickle tickle tickle!”

With your mind going crazier with every mention of the word ‘ticklish’, the constant stream of laughter pouring from your mouth definitely wasn’t helping your cause either as Shira merely laughed at your attempts to escape, raking her fingers upwards to your ribs. Playing a game of counting each individual rib, Shira giggled at your hysterical expense, the pirate constantly managing to ‘lose count’ when she was almost finished.

“I’m so glad I kept you all to myself. If I had to share you with Yuki, I don’t think you would have lasted this long.” Catching your breath back in a rare moment of mercy, your lips quickly snapped shut as a lone nail traced its way back to your vulnerable stomach. Drawing maddeningly smaller circles with each pass, the smile on your cheeks grew wider by every second. Dipping low into your bellybutton while you sucked in a huge breath of air, the unexpected sensation of five nails scratching into your taut hollows sent you screaming and buckling into laughter again.

1522321.content:
"...How would you like to join up with me?"

Her words don't even register in your head at first. It takes several seconds before you blink a few times and respond. "...I... I'm sorry, what?"

"You heard me," she says, rubbing her thumb gently over your chin. "You may not have much brains, but you have guts. Guts and determination. That's what I need in my crew to ensure that they don't back down in a fight, no matter the odds."

You get the urge to spit in her face, but swallow that thought, and action, just as quickly. She can kill you right now with the flick of her wrist, but instead she's offering you a chance, even though you were trying to bring her in for her crimes.

"You must forgive me if I'm a bit... surprised at your offer," you say, offering a small smile. You felt like you needed to stall and think about this more, as well as wean some more information out of her. "What would happen if I were to accept?"

Ruby matches your smile with one of her own. Her brilliant white teeth catch what little light there is outside of the tavern. "We'll sail the seas together. You'll do what you want, take what you want, and no one will stop you. This is your chance to set yourself free of the shackles that hold you back and finally take that piece in life that you crave and deserve!"

So that was it. Anarchy or law. Unfortunately, you don't have much choice at the moment. If you refuse, you're sure that one of the lovely ladies around you would spill your blood into the dirt beneath your feet. You take a deep breath, ignoring the pain in your leg for now, and give the only answer you can.

"I'll join you."

It is one of the most curious creatures you've ever seen.

Of course, you've read plenty about them. Dragonites are similar to dragons, though more human in shape: they walk on two legs instead of four, have two arms as dexterous as a human's, and all the other basic body characteristics. They wear clothes, but little of it - they prefer to remain closer to their dragon side in that regard. They're wild to a point, but some speak the languages of humans and they never cause damage to their wingless relatives.

Noticing you, the young dragonite turns and you are met with the dragon-ish face. The creature is obviously female, as shown through her ample bosom and curvy form (another aspect dragonites share with humans). Dark blue scales cover her back and wings, and a tail lies on the ground that curves around so the tip is near her feet. Covering what needs to be hidden on her body are a couple of azure cloths that look silky smooth, probably provided by the mages. Her wings, until recently folded up, now stretch wide for some reason or other.

The elder who lead you here chuckles.

"She is showing off," he says, amused. "That is the first time since she's been brought here that she has ever displayed her wings." Relying on an old willow staff to support him, the elder makes his way to where the dragonite is standing.

Apart from the manacles the dragonite is left free of restraint, and the chains are quite loose. To be honest, the clamps look quite comfortable. The dragonite looks at the approaching elder with a mix of excitement and curiosity, a confusing combination when displayed across her reptilian face. As soon as the elder is close enough to the dragonite, he turns to face you.

"This is your challenge, and quite a peculiar one too. You see, this young dragonite came to us asking for someone to serve. Her reasons remain unknown, but this is an excellent opportunity to study dragonites more thoroughly and experiment with their magical potential. Perhaps we can bring our two species together - who knows? This might be the beginning of a mutual friendship with our winged relatives.

"In the meantime, this young dragonite needs someplace to stay - errrr, and someone to serve I guess - so the council has chosen you for this task. Don't look so relieved, it is not as easy as you think. And I daresay your small chamber isn't enough to house her. You must begin by building her a home outside the tower, and from there see what you can learn about her past and her people. Despite their likeness to humans we know little about the dragonites and their culture, so this is a great opportunity."

So you are to be her, erm, master? And you're supposed to look after her. Not quite what you were expecting, but hard enough. Question is though, for how long? This isn't going to be a 'do this and you pass' test. This will take along while. There is also the matter of why on zenith she wants a master, but it isn't very important.

"What is your name?" you ask the dragonite tentatively. It is an odd position you find yourself in, being the master of another species.

"My name is Hannah," the dark blue dragonite replies calmly. "I've come to look for someone serve. May I serve you?"

Peculiar indeed.

"Ooookay, this is a little weird." You turn to the elder, who is busy unlocking the manacles. He faces you and smiles, before offering some advice:

"I suggest you begin by taking her outside," he says. "It is where she will be spending most of her alone time, so she better get used to where we are so she can come back from long errands. It would also be good to get started on building her a new home out there.

"On the other hand, you could take her to your chamber, show her some of your books and tomes, and some of your, ahem, projects that I know you've been working on. Letting it get to know you better will be the foundation of a good, ah, friendship I suppose."

"Alternatively, you could simply wander around the tower with her and show her some of our training rooms or laboratories. We will need to perform a few tests, and letting her practice spells with you will be a good way to gauge her potential for magic. She will need to learn her way around, sommay as well start now."
1532.title: Reptilian Servant?

choices: Yes, Hannah was hit with the spell.
No, it backfired! You suddenly feel incredibly ticklish!
15322.content:
"Hannah, I think it's best you see my quarters and get acquainted with some of my basic spells before we do anything else." you tell her, curious about your new dragon servant but eager to try using some magic on a willing subject.

"I serve you with body and mind, master." Hannah says, the blue dragon woman following you up some stairs to your small quarters in one of the towers. As you walk, you try to get to learn about her better, but each question you ask only makes her seem more mysterious.

"So Hannah, what would you like to do here? Do you have any experience with magic?" you ask her, making conversation.

"I would like to serve you, of course. I will have experience with your magics, whatever spells you wish." She tells you, not exactly giving helpful answers. Still, you're eager to test her enthusiasm. Arriving at your quarters, you open the door to reveal a small space, barely enough room for the two of you and your possessions. Piles of books and tomes lay in corners, a medium sized bed underneath a window at one wall. The dragon woman looks about the room. "The space is too small for the two of us to live, we will have to build outside the compound quickly. But until then I can fly in through that window whenever you call me, master. I have excellent hearing." Hannah tells you, seemingly proud of her abilities.

As she looks around, you take a good long look at her. Her dark blue scales cover arms, legs, feet and back. But the front of her torso isn't scaly at all. Smooth, sky blue skin stretches from waist to chest. Small silky garments cover her breasts and hips, but you notice her belly is as smooth and vulnerable looking as a humans. You've just thought of the perfect first spell to test on your new servant.

"Hannah, stand still and face me for a moment. I'm going to try a spell." You tell her and watch pleasantly as she obeys, watching you expectantly. You channel your mirth magic into a new spell you've been working on. This one magnifies a being's ticklishness tenfold, and the only way to undo the spell is to have someone tickle your worst spot for a considerable period of time. You eye that toned belly again as you contemplate what will happen to her, briefly imaging your own ticklish midriff under the same spell. It is a difficult spell to cast, but you can't pass up this opportunity with the attractive looking dragon woman standing right in front of you. As you silently murmur the chant for the spell, the room brightens. Was the spell a success?
15322.title: The Bedchamber

153221.content:
A bright beam of orange light connects to Hannah's stomach turning it a light red. When the spell is finished the lights dull down andd everything turns back to normal.

"Did it work?" asks Hannah looking puzzled.

"Only one way to find out," you say conjuring up a feather "Now hold still." you say as you will the feather closer to Hannah's stomach. Hannah watches the feather approach with a calm exterior, but her eyes are wild with excitment.

As soon as the feather touched her stomach she was a giggling mess on the floor. Smiling you continue to prod her stomach as she trys in vain to protect. Finally after a few hours of fun you officially annouce that the spell works.

"What shall we do now master?" asks Hannah.
153221.title: Yes, Hannah was hit with the spell.

1532212.content:
You instantly teleport Hannah and yourself to an area which would be perfect to build the house. The actual construction didn't take long thanks to your magic and Hannah's strength. Both of you easily finish the house under four hours even the interior designing (which was a pain in the butt), leaving plenty of time for you and Hannah.

"What shall we do now?" asks Hannah. You grin evilly and summon several feathers exactly like the one you used to test the spell which was still on Hannah. Hannah smiles in return and takes off. With that you send the hoard of feathers after her starting a game off sorts.

Hannah had to protect her stomach, but was trying to get closer you with a look in her eyes that said she was going to have fun with you. You on the otherhand wanted to find out about any other ticklish spots ans try some new spells.

So who wins.....
1532212.title: Build Hannah's house

15322122.content:
As Hannah begins a steep dive toward you claws outstreched and ready to begin their ticklish assault, you prepare two spells, one in each hand. Right before Hannah reaches you, you launch your spells. The first one was an immobilizing bubble spell which left her hanging in thin air, and the second spell was a buzzer ball spell with which a mage summons several spherical creatures that were covered with small vibrating nubs, which attacked the mage's enemy. The number of buzzer balls is determined by the magic ability of the mage. A decent mage could summon about five and still control them, you summoned around twelve.

Hannah was in absolute tickle bliss/agony, twisting and turning in an attempt to escape the buzzer balls. Five of them rubbed around her stomach and ribs along with the feather hoard which caught up with her, three of the buzzers went after her feet which were trying to cover each other up but failling. Finally the other four buzzers were teasing her armpits since her arms got caught out side the bubble and could move in to protect her vulnerable armpits.

You decide to join in on the fun, so you change the bubble into ropes which keep her spreadout. As you move toward her you go for.........
15322122.title: You

1533.content:
Bounds in chains before you is a giantess. Her wrists are clad in heavy looking manacles above her head, keeping her in a standing position. She's almost twice your height! While you've always been on the short side, you still marvel at her stature. Her long, think hair is wild and unkept in a tussle above her head. She glares at you silently, her dark eyes boring into you as if she were a caged animal and not a woman. She wears little, some type of animal skin wraps around her chest, barely covering her appropriately giant breasts. A similarly... furry garment is unevenly tied around her waist, wrapped around a hip and thigh. The lack of clothing shows off her fit physique. Her tanned skin looks strong without being overmuscled, perhaps like a runner's build. A giant runner, at least. The only normal garment appears to be a set of long boots, coming up to just below her knees, and looking capable of squashing sheep as if they were roaches. As you approach, you can see her body movements with each deep breath. Certainly, she's no mere human. But if she were normal sized, she could be the beauty of many a town.

"She's quite a specimen, isn't she?" the elder says to you suddenly, pulling you out of your reverie. You turn to find her grinning at you with a knowing look. You feel yourself blushing slightly, caught ogling a creature you should be analyzing. The elder turns back to the giant, continuing. "She was given to us by the Kitcha tribe as payment for our services. An unseemly practice, slavery, but they don't have much else to trade but their disgraced warriors. You remember your studies of giants?"

You nod knowingly, but secretly your mind is racing. You don't remember ever studying giants! What lesson was it in? Summoning? Who could summon a creature that large? She's apparently a disgraced warrior, what was the significance of that? Your mind races behind your confident veneer. All the while the giantess seems to be staring directly at you. You flinch slightly as you try to imagine what she's thinking.

Whether the elder picked up on your thoughts or not, she spoke on. "She hasn't spoken a word to us. She won't even tell us her name. I'm hopeful you can change that. As you might have guessed, you're going to have to earn your keep today. In order to rise to the rank of Acolyte and learn our most coveted spells, you must complete a task. That is why you are here. This giantess is to be your...
1533.title: Giantess

15331.content:
And with a wave of the hand the elder the chains holding the giantess disappeared, and with a smile the wizened figure vanishes from the chamber. You blink, slightly astonished at the relative quickness of this trial, and then you remember the giantess that was just set loose. Focusing on where she was held you notice that she is almost on top of you. Casting a shield charm, you managed to catch her first attack, though much to your horror cracks start to appear in the shield.

“How strong are!!?” you shout surprised at the apparent strength that the giantess had, though the only response you got was a very creepy smile on her face, along with a malevolent glint in her eyes.

“Oh boy” you mutter to yourself, teleporting behind her at a distance, and prepare another spell. Of course, the giantess had already covered most of the distance between you. Unfortunately for her your spell was ready. Finishing the incantation with a loud shout you release several bolts of electricity each one crackling with substantial power.

“Got you” you smile, only for that to quickly disappear as she simple shrugs off the bolts, a slight smile forming on her face. However, it was quickly replaced with a look of pure murder on her face. Thankfully you were somewhat proficient in combat (really the only interesting class, and the teacher was hot), thus your second spell was already in your other hand. Flinging it forward you release an arctic blast that stuns the giantess in her charge, but she eventually pushes her way through the howling winds. This once again forces you to evade as her fist comes crashing down cracking the floor that you had stood on a moment ago, rolling away to create distance you notice your handiwork. While her body itself was mostly unharmed, the same couldn’t be said for her apparel. The hide wrappings around her body were singed in places where the electrical bolts had struck, long with frozen bits from the chill wind. Her boots however were a different story as the ice had forced her to tear them up, leaving her massive feet bear. You quickly form two plans to deal with her, but which one?
15331.title: Opponent

15333.content:
"To the north in the giant lands, there is rumored to be an ancient library in a ruined tower, deep in the Graying Wood," explains the sorcerer. "If true, the knowledge hidden there could be of great benefit to our Order, but we can't very well interrupt our mages' studies with wild ghast chases and rumors. So this will be your test, young apprentice. And this powerful creature here will be your guide."

You look to the manacled giantess who audibly snarls at you. You gulp and look back at the elder.

"Not willingly, of course," the old master snorts. "Physical strength will never be found on the wizard's path, and so we must learn to harness the strength of those around us."

"You have a handful of minor cantrips at your disposal; a pony and supplies are awaiting you at the South Gate," says the elder, turning with a flourish of his silvered robes and heading toward the stairs. "Tame this beastly beauty and seek out the library, but do not disturb anything within."

The torch light in the cellar dims noticeably and the wizard speaks ominously "Ancient knowledge must never be handled lightly."

"Do this and return in one piece, with or without your guide, and you will begin your training in earnest," says the elder, mounting the stairs.

Just before he reaches the door at the top, he snaps his fingers and the chains holding the giantess unlock and clatter back against the wall.

She moves slowly toward you with a look in her eyes that makes you a little uncomfortable; you're not sure if it's hunger or malice or just the way giant kind look normally!

You''ll have to bend her to your will if you want to survive this adventure, but there's more than one way to skin a gnoll. You can attempt to talk to her (in the hopes that she understands common), or bluff her with a show of your "powerful magic"!
15333.title: Guide

153331.content:
You look at the giantess with a nervous glance, trying to ignore how her dark eyes were staring at you angrily. Her great size and menacing glare aside, she was quite stunning. Between her lack of much clothing and her lean (for a giant) and fit form, she was quite the looker. But just because she was attractive, did not mean she wouldn't stomp you flat. You decided that you might as well try talking to her now.

"Look, Ms...what's your name?" She glared at you. "Could you at least give some indication to if you speak common or not?" She continued to glare at you. "Well alright Ms Glarey-No Speak, you probably want to be anywhere that's not here. I get that. Being someone's prisoner isn't fun. I've been there before." She raised an eyebrow at that. Which meant that she knew what you were saying at least. "What? You thought I was an apprentice here my entire life? I'm fairly new here. So I know what it's like being someone's slave and I know it's really bad. So how about we not treat this like a slave-master relationship because I don't want to be on either end of that. But you're probably enslaved by the elders' mind spells. But if you can get me to that tower and back, I can talk to them about undoing it or even eventually find a way to undo it myself. Then you can be free and do what you wish. Alright?

You could see the giantess debating it in her head. Until she finally spoke. "I am Dione the barbarian. I shall help with this quest. At the very least to see if the silver in your tongue is valuable or cheap." Well. A giantess with wit. You knew that had NOT been covered in your studies.

"Hello Dione. I am ........ It is a pleasure to meet you. Do you wish to get acquainted or shall we get going?"

"Let's just get going. Plenty of time to talk on the road." You went your separate ways to get out of the tower. After collecting your things, you went out toward the southern gate where you saw someone standing there waiting for you. It was..?
153331.title: Attempt conversation

choices: Asking the traveling merchant what she knows.
154.content:
You order another exorbitantly expensive glass of water from the bartender as you sit in the shade. You've finally made it to the city of Shajan, rumored to be just north of the fabled Oasis. It took you half your life savings and a good pair of boots, but you've finally arrived. You sit in your chair heavily, sweating profusely in the heat. Now that you've arrived here, you have to admit you don't know how to proceed. Sipping water as slowly as thirst permits, you decide to question the bartender.

"Barkeep, what do you know about the Oasis? The one that makes your greatest dreams and nightmares come true?"

"Hmph, its a fable." he tells you gruffly, "not like that'll stop you. Everyone comes here to find it, but I've yet to hear anyone say they've come back from it. At least tourists like you are good for business."

"I'm not a tourist! I need to get there, you don't understand!" you tell him emphatically, as the indescribable dreams flit through your mind. You've been having them since adolescence, but over the past year your sleep has become more and more... vivid. Abandoning your friends and your country, you've crossed so many miles to find the meaning of those dreams, and you can't be stopped here, not so close!

"Yea, yea, I get it. Well, since you've got that crazed look in your eye, I guess I'll give you a tip or two." the bartender says to you, his tone softening a bit.

"First, you need better clothes. Those heavy leather garments might be good where you're from, but do you see anyone wearing that here? No, we all wear white cloaks to keep the sun out, and as little else underneath as possible. You'd be wise to do the same.

"Now, about your grand Oasis. The way I see it, you could go three ways. First, there's a traveling merchant in town. You could buy yer cloak, and beg for some tips from her. It won't come cheap, mind, but she's been to the edge of the world and back.

"Second, ya see those yellow cloaks over there? Them's the Oasis worshippers. A cult if you ask me, but they obsess over it just as much as you do, so they probably know something. Keep to themselves, though, you'd have to join them to get anywhere with them.

"Third, there's a hermit that lives at the edge of town. I've never known anyone to talk to the hermit, and no one knows anything about them. Could be a man, a woman, or whatever else for all I know. But the hermits been a mystery since I've been a kid, long ago, and has to have some power. Might be related to the Oasis, but I don't think its worth your hide."

You thank the bartender for his advice, and set off getting a cloak and...
154.title: Desert dreams

choices: Met by the lady in blue
1541.content:
As you walk through the market place where the bartender told you to look, you hear a sudden shouting and a group of people around one of the shops. You move in closer and you see a fight going on. The combatants are a ruffian who was trying to steal and a young lady with red clothes. The lady in red is using dual scimitars while the ruffian has a nasty looking dagger.

The fight ends quickly with the lady in red slicing off the thief's head. You then notice another women in the shop dressed in a clear light blue dress and her face matches the one the bartender gives you. As you move toward the shop you are....
1541.title: Asking the traveling merchant what she knows.

choices: Too good to pass up - deal!
No,  I'll just use the discount.
15411.content:
Before you can act, you find a scimitar pointing at your face. The skilled woman wore loose silk pants, a thin sleeveless vest, and a Gurkha which hid most of her face. Everything was red, but her vest had a gold trim which told you that she was more than a common mercenary. Then again, her swordplay was enough to prove that. A jet black ponytail bobs behind her head.

"State your business," she ordered, huskily. Her voice was smooth and feminine, but carried a dangerous edge to it.

You answer "I'm here to trade with the merchant." The scimitar doesn't back away from your face, and you begin to get more and more nervous. Most of the crowd ignores you (and the headless body on the ground), but you do catch glimpses of people glancing at your predicament occasionally. "I have some money, I'm not here to steal anything."

"How do I know you're not lying you-"

"Jenna! What are you doing?" cries a voice.

You look left to see the woman in blue emerge from her shop and run to the scene. She quickly starts talking to the girl in red - Jenna, you presume - in a language that sounds something like the native dialect of these lands. There are some faces and gestures, but the conversation ends with Jenna lowering her scimitar and giving you a frosty glare.

"I'm so sorry sir," apologizes the merchant, whose voice is melodic, soft, and slightly accented. "My daughter can be a little... Ah, jumpy. She's used to people trying to steal from our store." A quick comparison in your mind confirms it: these two are mother and daughter. The merchant looks just like Jenna except she wears blue instead of red, stands slightly taller, and has turban on her head as opposed to a burkha.

"My, that must've quite a shock for you! As an apology, you may have a discount at my store. Why don't I get you something to drink - on me. Please, come in." She walks back towards her store and beckons. Jenna follows close behind, throwing one last glare at you before dissappearing into the shop.

Left with nothing else to do and the invitation open, you decide to follow.

The shop was not the largest shop you'd seen, but certainly not the smallest. All kinds of foreign items lined the shelves, presumably from the merchant's travels. On one wall is a row of hangers, with unique clothing hanging from each one. On the counter at the back are some small local souvenirs - hand-made by the look - and a pile of white cotton robes.

Peering into the back room, you see the merchant approach you with a cup of ice water in her hands. Jenna is leaning on the entrance to the doorway with her scimitars leaning against the wall. After the little event outside and her frosty glares, she refuses to look at you. The merchant on the other hand is quite warm and friendly.

"Here, don't be shy: have a cup! I know how dreadfully expensive water is here, so consider this as part of my apology on my daughter's behalf." At hearing herself mentioned, Jenna glares at you again.

"Much appreciated madam," you say politely. The merchant chuckles and hands you the water.

"Oh please, just Julie will do." The merchant disappears into the back room, and after a while says "Come in!" You oblige, sitting in the chair Julie beckons to. The back room is a kitchen, with a large table in the middle. There are a three doors leading out besides the one to the shop, one of which Jenna enters and doesn't emerge. After some fiddling, Julie grabs a cup of water as well and sits down opposite you.

"So, what brings you to this desert town?" Julie asks. " Judging from your clothes, you don't look like you're from anywhere near here."

That's when you start to explain. Your quest for the oasis, your talk with the bartender, and the fantasies that drive you. You don't want go into too much detail, wanting to make this conversation a short one. However, once you start talking, you find it hard to stop.
