You go into every detail about everything that brought you here, even about your wishes. By the end of it half an hour has elapsed, and Julie takes a whilebto sip at her water.

"You make it sound like life or death," she says finally, calmly resting her cup on the table.

"If you know anything about where it is, please tell me! I'll pay you watered I have."

"No, no, keep your money. If you want to know that badly, I have another idea of payment." Julie smiles cryptically. "You will spend the night with us, and we will provide dinner and breakfast. However, from the dusk to dawn you must do whatever me and my daughter tell you to, unless it is physically impossible or brings any injury to you."

You gulp loudly. "Doesn't your daughter want to kill me?"

Julie laughs. "Oh no dear! She's not angry at you, she's just a little embarrassed and frustrated that she threatened you without reason. If she's angry at anybody, she's angry at me. But back to the deal dear. What do you say?"

You consider. It sounds like a good deal, and from dusk to dawn in these lands is only a few hours. Besides, if there's nothing painful there's nothing to be afraid of.

And yet...

"How about this: as well as telling you what I know about the oasis, I will give you free provisions and clothes so you can get there. Deal?"
15411.title: A Strange Proposition

154111.content:
You quickly told Julie that you'd take the deal. It was one of the best deals you've ever received. You were almost thankful that Jenna almost decided to decapitate you. Afterward, you took your belongings upstairs and got changed. When you heard the knock at your door, you were surprised to see Jenna without the gurkha and her hair down. Even more surprised to see her looking sheepish.

"I...umm...wanted to apologize for my actions earlier. I was paranoid and jumpy after the guy with the dagger. And since you're probably thinking this, no. This wasn't my mother's idea." Despite said actions being a sword at your face, you felt bad. Afterall, she did.

"Hey don't worry about it. Your mom is more than making up for that with the deal we made." You were slightly worried about the impish grin that Jenna grew at that.

"I'd wait on that belief until dusk comes. By the way, dinner is ready." She began walking away, giggling musically to herself. You wondered what she meant by that. No matter. It was dinner time. You went down and appreciated a very good lizard steak while having good conversation with Julie and Jenna. Afterward, you went upstairs to relax for the hour that you had. Precisely at dusk, there was a loud knock on your door. You opened the door to find...
154111.title: Too good to pass up - deal!

1541112.content:
Julie standing in the doorway, having traded her earlier clothing for a simple blue nightie which didn’t exactly hide much, as the translucent material easily clung to her gorgeous figure. As you backpedal into your room, dumbstruck at the sight of her, she approaches with a light chuckle, that seemingly soothes your soul.

“Don’t worry, this is all real” she speaks gesturing to her lithe body and generous assets, and moving forward. She bends down, giving a wonderful view down the nightie, and helps you up, and walks over toward the bed.

“So is this the favor…” you ask hesitantly as both desire and concern dance through your body. Julie turns slightly, smiling as she slowly peels the gown off, revealing her naked body. Your eyes widen as she lounges on the bed, her naked flesh slightly obscured as the shadows curl around her. You take hesitant steps toward the alluring woman, worried this may be a trap of some sort, as most women don’t exactly come into a sudden stranger’s room naked, at least not yours.

“Ah do not worry, I just have a unique kink that is hard to satisfy these days,” Julie states raising on of her feet, showing of the smooth soles, slightly paler than the rest of her body. “So here are the rules, you get to tickle me all night, but that’s it, unless of course you manage to break me.” She replies slightly flippantly. You raise your eyebrows at the final statement, and finally reaching the end of the bead drag one of your fingers across her soles, eliciting a melodious flow of laughter from the beauty before you. Grinning you start to add more fingers to her soles, and Julie lets lose a torrent of giggles as you wiggle your fingers up and down her soles.

“hehehe is that all you got?” she questions in between her laughs as you…
1541112.title: Julie the ticklee

1542.content:
You head toward the building the trader had pointed out when she gave you your cloak. It was a blunt squared shaped clay brick building. The color of the clay however was a pale blue which made it stand out.

As you approach you see several guards around enterences that lead into the building. Gathering your wits you head striaght at the guards. To your suprise they kindly ask what is your business, so you decide to tell them about your dreams. As you finish one of them leave and heads into the building and the other kindly asks you to wait with him.

A moment later the guard that left returned and beckoned you to follow him. As you entered the house you see that there is a flight of stairs that lead down and the air was filled with light giggles and shrieks of laughter.

The guard takes you down the hall and to the stairs. You and the guard descend deeper and deeper into the earth until you come to a pool with a nymph in it.
"What have you brought me Sicur" said she.
"One who claims to have the dreams mistress" said Sicur
"Bring him in and leave us Sicur" said she as she looked with interest at you.

With out further promting the guard pushes you in and leaves. You splash around until the water takes a life of its own and removes all your clothing and restrains you.
"Well what should I do with you" says the nymph. She moves closer to you and puts her hand on your forehead and says....
1542.title: Joining the Oasis worshippers.

1543.content:
It cost almost all of the coins you have left, but you get yourself one of the white cloaks that the bartender spoke about. It's extremely roomy underneathe and covers you from the neck down. The material is quite thin, and taking a suggestion, the only thing you've worn underneath is your underwear, but if the heat gets too bad you may change that.

The bartender gave you three choices, but you opted to check out the hermit at the edge of town. It wasn't hard to find them. It seems everyone in town knew where the hermit lived, but none could provide you with any more information than that.

You travel towards the edge of town and look around, but it only takes a few seconds to spot your goal. There is a medium-sized white tent set up a short distance from the town's edge. It looks like one could live relatively comfortable inside, and if it really was a hermit, then one person is all you would find inside.

Making your way across the sand to the front of the tent, you notice that the flaps are closed, though that isn't to unusual. It's better to stay in the shade and keep sand from being kicked inside.

"Hello?" you call out, not wanting to surprise the hermit and possibly end up being attacked. However, there is no response. Was the hermit not inside? Your quest to find the fabled oasis won't be stopped by something as simple as that!

You pull open one of the flaps and step inside. Your eyes, having been outside, aren't adjusted to the darkness yet, and it feels as though you are swimming in a pool of darkness. Even so, you quickly take note that there is someone standing a very short distance in front of you.

Squinting, you see...
1543.title: Seeing the hermit.

choices: I will tell you of the trials and temptations
15431.content:
"What do you want, child?" a croaking voice says to you. Squinting in the darkness, you see a short old woman standing in front of you, leaning on a strange wooden cane. She wears a cloak just like yours, although its edges are frayed with age, the white freckled with tans and grays of a lifetime of use. Her face is wrinkled and leathery, from what seems like ten lifetimes of too much sun. She's hunched over, and by all appearances looks frail and incapable. But her voice sounded neither senile nor weak, and everyone in the town spoke of this hermit with respect. You must remain cautious.

"Are you the hermit? I... I was told you might be able to help me reach the Oasis." you say to her, your eyes starting to adjust to the blackness in the tent. Looking around, you see a number of bowls along the edges of the tent. Some seem to be filled with beetle shells, another with feathers, a large one with a dark, thick liquid... it looks like ingredients for a witch's brew. And perhaps it is.

"I might, young one, I might..." she replies, looking you up and down. Her stare seems to run straight through you, making a shudder run up your spine despite the heat. "But why should I help you? Are you sure you can get past the trials that await you? Can you resist the temptations that will be in your path?"

"I will overcome anything to get to the Oasis! I won't stop until I've reached it, no matter what!" you tell her strongly, enthusiasm crawling back into your voice. However, it doesn't seem to sway her much. She just chuckles dryly, and turns back to one of her bowls, sitting on the cool dark sand. The old woman opens her mouth to give you her answer...
15431.title: An old, short woman.

154311.content:
The stoic woman says aloud. "Though I question how much it will help you." She chuckles dryly. She points at you, more specifically your cloak.. "You were already swayed out of your coin, child. What does that say of your faith in yourself?" She begins stirring a bowl's contents.

Your brow furls in confusion. "But I was told I would need this cloak." You complain. The hermit chuckles again with a slight cough. "By one who thought you a fool and did not hide it. The journey you desire to undertake must be done in darkness. Your body will give to the cold." She explains with apathy.

You felt cheated. You had spent so much of your money only to be duped. "But why?" You ask. A single chuckle is heard. "Isn't it obvious child? The purpose is twofold. It is to make coin off the naivete of outlanders, but it is a saving grace to some." She mixes the contents of two bowls.

"To keep those unprepared from undertaking this path." She explains. You felt a bit annoyed. She was clearly mocking you, but her words seemed to carry wisdom. "This land is harsh and unforgiving child. You would be better off returning to whence you came." She does not look at you.

"Please wise one. I'll take any test. I'll do anything!" You plead. The hermit pauses. "Very well" She answers. She pulls a vial from her cloak. It's filled with a dark blue liquid. "Drink" She tells you.

As much trepidation as you feel, the people you spoke with all had great reverence for this woman, and thus you took the elixir and drank it. A warmness spread through your body and then quickly passed. "Ah I see." The hermit noted. "I shall prepare your test. Come back in an hour's time."

You went back into town and changed into your leather traveling clothes since you knew now you would only find the oasis at night. When you returned to the dark abode, the old woman was sitting across from you at her table. She pointed a bony finger at the floor. "Sit down..."
154311.title: I will test your resolve.

choices: Give in and burst out laughing.
1543111.content:
You sat down across from her. Wiping the sweat from your brow, you waited patiently on the hermit. The wisewoman stood and walked over to you. She poked your arm with a bony finger then lifted your sleeve slightly. She then leaned in and did the same with your torso.

"I-is this necessary?" You ask with a stutter. "Hush" the hermit chided with a wave of a hand as she tapped your legs. "Hmm" she said with a rub of the chin. "Fair enough" she said without acknowledging your presence.

She walked around to the other side of the table again. Then to your puzzlement, she turned and curled her finger as if leading a child. Without warning, your legs shot out in front of you, straight under the table. "What did you do to me?" You asked in shock.

"Relax." Her voice wisped like smoke.. She pulled up the legs of your pants from your boots. A blue light filled the room then quickly faded. "The elixir has shown me what I need. Now I can begin the test." The hermit answered.

You tried to shift your legs but found yourself unable to. You could twist your ankles and move your feet but your legs were completely stiff. "What did the elixir show you?" You ask concerned. "It is simple child." She says as if you should know the answer already.

"Your weakness" she mouthed foreboding. "Show me you resist temptation, the urge to give into it." She sat down. "Do that and I shall give you the means to reach the oasis" she explained. "And my legs?" You asked."As soon as this is over, unless you'd like to give up now." She chuckled again. "No no no that's all right" You shook your head quickly. You had come too far now.

"Very well" The white ragged wisewoman rasped. "Now, not a word" she ordered. She gently picked up your immobile legs and put them on her lap. You had to admit you were surprised as you watched her tug off your boot and set it on the table.

"What are yo-" You stopped yourself. "No talking." She responded, a loss of patience evident in her voice. Your other boot quickly joined the table You were shocked to see a glowing symbol on top of each of your bare feet. You crossed and flexed them, the desert breeze highlighting their dampness. The blue runes immediately vanished. "A scrying spell" the hermit explained. "Nothing more. Do not worry." You felt relieved that she understood your concern. But what your feet had to do with this still escaped you.

The answer came quickly. Your unsuspecting appendages began to be teased by the hermit's long nails, and you were not prepared. You shifted from leaning on one arm to the other, hoping the hermit would finish whatever she was doing. You let air build in your cheeks, looking at her with quivering lips. You clenched your toes and swung your ankles, desperate to get your suffering feet away from the wisewoman. "No laughing" the hermit warned. "But you're tickling my fehmmph!" You clamped your hands over your mouth.

You fell forward and used one hand to bang your fist on the table. You were so off-guard, being tickled like this, that the sensation shot through your whole body. You looked up, hoping for some sign you would be spared this torture. But you simply watched as the wisewoman focused on digging into the wrinkles of your sensitive soles with upward scraping, making you want to bounce. The sight of your unwillfully exposed bare feet suffering under her touches right in front was almost too much to bear. This had to end one way or the other. You...
1543111.title: Girl

155.content:
Even more paths to take...

Rumor has it that the infamous pirate Ruby was captured once, and only once, during an exploration of a tropical island. No one has ever seen nor heard of any signs of life on the island other than animals. However, those that have dared to venture in deeper in search of rare plants or animals have never come back. Whether it be to find proof of life, or a rare item to make you rich, you have just come ashore on the island with a small group of explorers...

While there are many ways to acquire the energy needed for magic, the most potent method is by eating the dust powder of a fairy. The powder falls off naturally and is collected by flowers beneathe them. Thus, if one finds the flowers, they can harvest the powder from it. However, fairies love beautiful things and are highly territorial. To come so close to their home in the forest and kill the flowers for the dust powder, well, it is sure to draw their attention...

And still, the paths continue...
155.title: Even more options

1551.content: As you and your group start to set up camp on the beach you hear a loud skreech. everyone turns around and looks at the ship that brought you hear, except that its is in two peices and is slowly sinking into the water. The skreeching repeats and several shadows jump down from the trees and out of the oceans, taking people as they got close. Several of the team escapes though, but where are you.....
1551.title: The island

choices: I want a few short hours of tickling you
I want to see how good humans are at tickling
15511.content:
You black out when the shadows get you.

When you wake up you see you are surrounded by Anthropomorphic Animals, all kinds! Felines, Canines, Rodents, Ungulates, Birds, Reptiles.

Sitting on a large throne made of bones is a Lioness Anthro, she is tawny gold in color she has short sea green hair on her head which surprises you as lionesses aren't supposed to have manes (You suspect it is a wig) The Lion Queen smiles graciously, her yellow eyes do not show any spite or hunger but mere interest.

"Greeting Young Human." She says "It has been so long since we had a genuine homo sapian in our midst! Tell us Homo Sapian are you ticklish?"

"Yes." Is all you can say, you don't think you'll gt very far lying in a place run by wild animals.

"Don't afraid Little Human." The Lioness says "We're not murderous wild beasts we are actually quite gentle, you are not even tied up young human! You can walk around if you want!"

You then realize you are not tied up, you walk around and look at the pretty beast folk, nearly every animal you can imagine makes an appearance in this wild tribe.

"What do you wish of me Your Majesty?" You ask the Lion Queen

"Well..." She says
15511.title: Forest shadows got you

155111.content:
Your heart rate quickens as she declares her intent. It takes you a moment to process this and you have to ask again to make sure you head right.

"Yes tickling," the Lion Queen affirms, "The beast races have seen tickling as a source of pleasure since our inception. Unfortunately," she says gesturing towards a lizard who's scales look thicker than plate armor," most of us are not susceptible to the touch of others. Humans on the other hand..."

You're given decidedly little choice in the matter. The passage of time becomes a half conscious blur owing to the exhaustive last few hours; shipwrecked, struggling to shore, dragging the others to land and your capture at the hands of the beast race. You wonder what happened to the others. Are they alive? Trapped in a similarly ridiculous situation? You give up on thinking about it soon enough. Your mind can't hold onto any trail of thought for long.

They strip you, bathe you and redress you, before you find yourself tied standing with you arms stretched well above your head in a dark room bathed in the orange glow of candles. An interesting touch. And there you were expecting a tree.

You're not long alone when the wooden door opens and...
155111.title: Ticklish smooth-skin

1551111.content:
The Lion Queen enters the room as you shiver nervously, and she grins evilly at you.

''Now that I have you all tied up, I can have as much fun as I want to.'' She said. She then looks at your barefoot and belly.

''Hmm….. I wonder which of those parts I should tickle first.'' She said. After 5 seconds she decides to tickle your…..
1551111.title: ...The Queen enters the room.

15511111.content:
As the lioness sinks down in front of your bare feet, you nervously scrunch your toes. You try and brace herself for the oncoming attack, as her hot breath ghosted over your toes.

"Such smooth soles you have," states the queen as she admires your feet, causing you to blush slightly.Before you could speak, however, you feel the light touch of something hard along the bottom of your left foot. The sudden jolt of feeling causes you to buck in your bonds and brings a smile to the lioness's face.

"Oh so sensitive, this is going to be fun" she states, before scratching her nails all over your feet. You howl in laughter as the claws effortlessly glide over your soles, scratching over the wrinkles that formed as you try and scrunch your soles up. Lost in laughter you easily lose track of time, as the queen continues her assault on your feet, constantly teasing you with her voice. Your torment continues until the queen removes her nails from your soles and gives you a brief respite.

"Now what shall we do?" she questions giving your toes a quick suckle, almost sending you back into hysteria.
15511111.title: Feet

1551112.content:
The young cat looks you up and down before giving you a smile. "Greetings human. I am Princess Fareel." Princess? There's not much in the way of family resemblance.

"You don't look like a lion," you note after a moment.

"Adopted daughter," she nods, "The Queen had no heir. This one had no parents." She speaks with a sly, almost husky voice. Not similar to the Queen's at all. Speaking of which...

"When is the Queen coming?" you ask. Not that you're getting impatient but you did expect her to turn up first.

"She decreed that I might have first touch of you," she smiles. Once more she takes a moment to admire your body and exposed skin, of which there is plenty, and you shudder slightly on the inside.

She grins slyly. "Don't worry little human, I can make it fun." She pauses before thinking about what she just said and adds, "You look young for a sailor. What was your role upon that ship?"
1551112.title: The Princess

155112.content:
"Really?" You ask "Is that all you want?"

"Yes, we Beast Folk love a good tickle, but unfortunately most of us aren't very ticklish because we've got thick fur or feathers, or hard scaly skin."

"Why do you think Humans are such good ticklers?" You ask

"Well you have had three thousand years of evolution to practice." The Queen says "We Beast Folk are a young race we've only existed for one hundred years."

"So what do I do?" You ask

"We will give you our most ticklish subject for you to practice with." The Queen says

The Subject is
155112.title: I want to see how good humans are at tickling

15512.content:
The Ocean Shadows grab you, they drag you into the water, you are terrified for a few moments, fearing you might drown, but quickly you black out.

You wake up to the feeling of tentacles prodding you, You open your eyes and see it is an Anthropomorphic Octopus!

"Shall I take you to meet the Queen of the Sea?" The Octopus asks you.

"Um...Yes?" Is all you can say. The Octopus helps you to your feet and leads you to another room,

You take the time to look at where you are, you seem to be in a castle under the sea, fortunately there is air for you to breathe in this castle. Th castle seems to be made of white limestone, the floor is a bit slick but still a pleasure to walk on.

Then you and the Octopus walk into the throne room, you meet the Queen of the Sea! She is...
15512.title: The Kingdom Under The Sea

155122.content:
You see an Anthropomorphic Dolphin sitting on a throne made of pearls.

Her skin is blueish grey her eyes are a bright sky blue, so big and soulful, they seem to draw you in.

"Welcome Home Sapian." The Dolphin says in a musical voice

"Um..Hello..." You say meekly

"Do you find me attractive Young Human?" The Dolphin Queen asks

"Yes." Is all you can say

The Dolphin Queen gets off her throne and walks over to you, since she has no proper legs she walks on her tail fin.

She gets right up close to you and puts her hand on your right cheek.

"Your not bad for a Homo Sapian." She says grinning as only a dolphin can and...
155122.title: ...An Anthro Dolphin?

choices: You see a patch of the flowers
You see a lone fairy perched on a log
1552.content:
A soldier had a tolerable pay so long as they served their king. A blacksmith lived decently after every big purchase someone made. A fairy dust collector could live comfortably for a whole year by just collecting a large sack of the rare powder.

And that's exactly what you are here to do.

Trudging through the thick forest with several empty burlap sacks in hand, you're searching for any signs of fairies. After all, if there are fairies, then the flowers which collected their powder would be close by.

Of course, capturing a fairy and just getting the powder straight from the course was always a possibility, albeit a rare one. The small creatures look like women with wings, and certainly appear innocent, but you know better. They possess not only powerful magic, but they're mischeivous and attack in swarms.

Your only hope of escape comes from a little vial you have on your hip: a vial of nectar from an Alraune. The fairies go crazy for the stuff, attracting every single one of them in sight and causing them to lap it up like it was a drug, and should you get in trouble you always had the option of pouring it out and hope that they go for it instead of you.

Although, first you needed to actually find the things. You sigh and squint to see what is up ahead.
1552.title: Fairy forest

choices: A spell hits you from behind
15521.content:
Up ahead, you notice a patch of peculiar-looking flowers. They look like daffodils, only colored silver and twinkling in the patches of light that break through the tree canopy.

Jackpot.

You open up one of the sacks and hurry over to the flowers, wasting no time in yanking them out of the ground and tossing them into the sack. It's a fairly well-sized patch you've stumbled across, worth enough to feed you for the year. Maybe more.

However, in your excitement, your attention is focused solely on the flowers and nothing around you.
15521.title: Patch of flowers

155212.content:
A jolt of pure energy strikes you square in the back. You drop the sack, gasping, a tingling sensation flowing over your body.

It's a magic spell, you realize, and after a moment you quickly realize what kind of spell it is.
155212.title: A spell hits you from behind

1552121.content:
The type of spell became apparent the moment you try to turn around.

You can't.

You're contortedly slightly, but still balanced enough to remain standing. It's like being a prisoner in your own body. You can feel everything, and even though you are still able to move your eyes and mouth, everything else refuses to obey.

The only question left in your mind now is... who cast the spell at you?
1552121.title: A paralysis spell

choices: She pours the nectar down your shirt
She brings you over to a large tree
15521212.content:
"The spirits of the forest are not pleased with your indiscretions, young one," comes a mature, feminine voice behind you. You hear footsteps approach you from behind and circle around in front of you. Your eyes turn towards the woman once she is in sight.

Her clothing consists of intertwining leaves forming a strapless gown of sorts, with bare feet peeking out from underneathe each time she takes a step. Her curly, black hair tumbles down to her shoulderblades, and a few leaves are trapped in it. There is little doubt as to what she is.

"I did not hear anything about a druidess defending these woods," you say, hoping that ignorance will save you.

It doesn't.

"Mother nature does not require forewarning to outsiders when we come to protect her," she fires back, glaring. Her attention drifts down to the vial of Alraune nectar on your belt. She carefully unhooks it and brings it closer for examination. "Mmm... you're a smart one. Using this in case the fairies catch you harvesting the flowers."

She shakes her head disapprovingly. "Tsk tsk, we'll have to persuade you to never return again..."
15521212.title: A druidess

choices: Two dryads come out from the tree
155212122.content:
The druidess hooks an arm around your waist. Surprisingly, she is much stronger than she looks, and with seemingly little effort she drags your statue-like body over a short distance to a rather large tree. She presses your back against it before stepping back, smiling.

"Why must you humans always destroy the very things you need for survival? It's a wonder you ever survive," she remarks.

You narrow your eyes at her before snapping back. "You're human as well."

"True," she concedes. "But at least I have learned from others mistakes and now strive to do good for the world. No more delays, hmm? That paralysis spell doesn't last for very long."

The druidess steps to your side. You're barely able to see her out of the corner of your eye. She places a hand against the tree and closes her eyes, lips moving in a silent ritual of words.

You can feel the tree itself trembling against you. The sound of branches creaking and groaning fill the forest. Something rough brushes against your thigh. You strain to look around you, and your eyes go wide with realization.

The tree is actually moving.

Some branches are coming down while others are forming in the trunk beside you. They grow and stretch out, curling around your body, and lifting you up into the air while manipulating your immobile-form into a different position. It only lasts for a minute, but that was all she needed.

Your body is now lifted more than a foot off the ground. A thick branch stretches over your waist, pressing you into the trunk. Both of your arms are stretched up like a V, with nearly a dozen small branches wrapped around equal distances on them. Even tiny wooden tendrils are wrapped around your fingers, forcing your hands open, palms facing out. Your legs, on the other hand, are bound together straight down. There's a branch coiled just above your knees, and another around your ankles.

The druidess steps around in front of you, her blue eyes scanning over your body with obvious approval at her own work.

"And now," she says with a smirk. "The fun begins."
155212122.title: She brings you over to a large tree

choices: The tree joins in to help
1552121221.content:
"Fun?" you ask with a quizzal look. She doesn't answer your question. Or rather, she doesn't answer you with words. Her hands dart out and bury into your ribs, fingers wriggling over and between them. You throw your head back and burst out laughing, twisting in your bark bondage helplessly. You can barely move your upper body an inch in any direction, and that's not nearly enough to help you.

"I would not dare to taint the ground with your blood... but there are other methods to teach you a lesson," she says with a grin. Her fingers scribble downwards towards the bottom of your ribs, and your laughter grows in pitch slightly. You can't kick your legs at her, you can't even curl your hands into fists!

She changes tactics and begins to squeeze your ribs lightly and quickly. Each one causes you to squeal and jump, your head thrashing about.

"Staaahahahahahaap eheheeit! Ahahahaaa'm sohohohoreeeheheeheeee!"

"Sorry? I doubt it," she murmurs, squeezing your next pair of ribs higher, and then the next pair up. About halfway up, she suddenly jumps back down to the bottom and starts all over. Your mind is flooded with ticklish sensations! And just when you think it can't get any worse...
1552121221.title: She tickles you

choices: the druidess cast a rejuvenating spell upon you to keep the torture going
15521212211.content: She stops for a moment and you catch your breath. she unlaces your boots and runs a finger down the middle of your socked sole. You try to explode into motion but the tree holds you fast, the druidess smiles realizing she just found your most ticklish weak spot. "Oh do we have very ticklish feet?" she asks as she removes your socks. Your eyes widen and you shake your head and plead with her to release you but your pleas fall on deaf ears and soon your smooth tender soles are bared before her. Her eyes shine, you gulp nervously, then her fingers begin dancing wildly all over your bare feet. You howl in laughter and once again try to free yourself from bondage but the tree still prevents you from going anywhere. She drags her fingers from your heel up to your toes, then she holds your toes back and licks your arches. "PLHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEAASEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!" you exclaim with tears streaming down your face. Suddenly she does stop, you pant heavily trying to catch your breath. She leans over resting her hand on your waist and leans in close smiling smugly all the while until your forced to look up at her. You raise an eyebrow quizzically at her she then removes her hand from your hip holding up the special nectar that you use to draw fairies. your still puzzled until you consider your position; your incredibly ticklish feet are bare, your tied up by a tree, and the only other person for miles around is your captor the druidess who is still mad at you for digging up the flowers. She uncorks the nectar bottle and holds it up in the air and it isn't long until you hear the buzzing of fairy wings. The druidess pours the nectar all over your bare feet despite your protests, she turns around and waves her hand and a tree opposite your own lowers its branches and the druidess sits down and crosses her legs and stares at you intent to watch you suffer horribly at the hands of the incoming fairies. A horde of the winged fiends arrives in the clearing and upon seeing the nectar they all chatter excitingly and dart towards your exposed soles. The Fairies lap up the nectar hungrily once again driving you into hysterics you cry and plea with the fairies to stop but they just lap the nectar from your heels, soles, arches and between your toes the torture continues until...
15521212211.title: She removes your boots

155212122111.content:
A cool breeze drifts through the surrounding foliage, causing the dew-wet leaves to sparkle green and silver in the waning moonlight.

You awaken with a shiver, unable to move or speak. Your head is pounding and your muscles ache. You groggily determine you're pinned to the thick trunk of a gnarled tree near a desolate stretch of road and you're totally naked! You look a bit like a racy figurehead on the prow of a ship. Darkly verdurous vines wreathe your ankles and body, while an unnecessarily ropy tendril sits snugly between your teeth, holding your head in place and inciting a steady stream of errant spittle to drip incessantly from your chin ... on to your belongings.

You notice them then, piled neatly in the bed of ivy ringing the tree trunk, your clothing, boots, and sacks, emptied now, no doubt. A single toothy sprig of holly sits atop the pile. Perhaps Fairy Dust Collector is a less worthwhile occupation than you previously thought.

You struggle feebly, but the scabrous tree bark scraps uncomfortably against your naked skin, and you don't make much progress loosening the vines anyway.

Groaning cheerlessly, you try to call out for help, but your voice is hoarse from the furious fairy tickling in the druid's grove, and the sinewy gag in your mouth reduces most of what you say to slobbering nonsense and gouts of dripping saliva.

Hours seem to pass, but morning never arrives. You drift in an out of consciousness until you hear voices in the distance! Two slurring songsters mumbling through some bawdy tavern ballad. You struggle and moan with renewed vigor as the voices grow nearer, and the road is increasingly bathed in wavering lantern light.

"Oh my!" Squeaks a woman, drunkenly, illuminating your helpless, naked body with a tarnished brass lantern.

"Well, well!" Laughs a man, boisterously, staggering past his momentarily stunned companion. "Looks like someone's run afoul of nixies ... or some such ill tempered fae!" He hiccups, belches, and kneels clumsily next to your pile of belongings.

"No gold I suppose," the plump but not unlovely young woman says, standing waveringly next to her smartly mustachioed companion.

Filthy, drunken thieves! Just your luck.

You plead intelligibly for them to leave your clothing alone and help you down, but they're entirely focused on rifling through your pouches, pockets, boots, and bags.

Finding nothing of interest the duo groans and grumbles, paying almost no attention to the naked, squirming adventurer above them. Until something catches the woman's eye.

"What soft little feet you have!" she coos, sauntering toward you.

Your eyes go wide as saucers and you begin struggling like mad. You're suddenly aware that hanging here off the ground for as long as you have has turned your bare feet a ruddy crimson and exponentially increased their already extreme sensitivity!

"If we can't have gold, let's have fun," she giggles to the man.

"Oooo, a bit of conscripted singing, eh?" The man replies, smiling widely. "They do look like an awfully good singer don't they?"

The two inebriated bandits step menacingly toward you, wiggling their cruel fingers.
155212122111.title: you black out

choices: They investigate other areas. (Or release you?)
1552121221111.content:
You groan into the gag feebly, toes scrunching in horrified anticipation of what is to come. You can hardly believe your own lack of luck -but that's not stopping your leering assailants from coming on. You give one last disbelieving moan, and then they've each got a foot, pulling your big-toes back with one hand as the other braces, moving in perfect sync. Clearly, this isn't the first time they've had someone 'sing' for them. The night air is cold on your bared soles, the rough vines holding them entrapped like an insect in amber.

And you still can't believe it -not your feet! As long as you could remember, you'd always tried to protect them from such tortuous attentions from all and sundry, failing as often as not. Since you were little, siblings and friends had never left them alone, and compromising accidents had befallen them wherever you went. Tangled in sheets, trapped under a fallen log, stuck in a piece of farm equipment, wrongfully accused and sealed in the village stocks -you had to be cursed. And now, as the two smirking bandits exchange grins and go to work, your ill-fortune has caught up to you once again.

Fingers claw and skate over your rouged soles without the most minimal preamble, plunging you into hysterics. Your eyes roll in desperation and panic as you try to fight against the vines, now completely heedless of the rough bark. Drool forms a waterfall down your chin as you try to blubber out a cry for mercy -or even simply to let out the wild laughter welling up within you.

Your nerves course with lightning as the carolers scratch and scramble over your feet, urging the most primal part of your brain to escape, to make it stop. But the vines press you tight, no matter the exertion, and the hands keep the grip on your feet completely firm. Admittedly, you can wiggle your little toes, but that's about it. Overall, you can do naught but moan into the gag helplessly, feeling the endless tickling stretching on and on, the thugs never tiring of your stifled laughter.
1552121221111.title: The Thieves Tickle You Mercilessly

choices: One of them jumps on you
15521212211111.content:
It's only a few more minutes until one of the drunken thieves notices the tears forming at your eyes. She musses at your hair and then wipes the tears away.

"Does it tickle? Aww, I bet it does! Kitchee kitchee!" she taunts. Her intoxicated friend continues his scratching of your soles, but she begins to gently tickle your immobile head's ears, nose, and cheeks with her fingertips. "Mmmmph! Mhmhmhmph!"you scream into the ropy tendril holding your mouth shut. The most you can fight against this aggravating assault is to slightly wiggle your head, as the thick vine gag prevents anything more.

The two have fun for an even longer time, long enough so that your stomach begins to moan and you notice your thirst between muffled sessions of agonizing laughter. Soon the two rascals stop to take a drink, but give none to you. The thieves are obviously feeling peckish and maybe a bit hungover too, and so the woman stops poking your neck and goes to fry up some sort of meat strip on a pan. Her mustached friend puts all your belongings (really just clothes and a blade) in a leather sack, and you catch a glimpse of some stolen silver utensils, probably stolen from the very tavern they got drunk at.

You feel a wriggling sensation in your mouth. It's the vine that makes up your gag, slowly drawing back. The druidess's spell must be wearing off! Soon you can actually take in deep breaths, but you don't speak in fear of being gagged by your ticklers. They don't notice that the vines covering you have loosened as they are too busy eating lunch.

Already the vines are loose enough to start wiggling around in. Then- Whump!- you hit the ground. Your legs have been stiff for so many hours that you immediately collapsed as soon as you were free. Before you can run away the two bandits are upon you yet again, unhappy that the vines have become useless. However, they make up for it by pouncing on you and tickling to their hearts content. You wriggle around on the ground as the man and the woman dig their fingers into you sides, belly, and armpits. When you are good and exhausted they both tie rope around your wrists tightly, binding them behind your back and soleaving you able to walk but not to use your hands.

"Let's take him to the hideout." says the mustachioed thief.

"Mmm..." purrs his plump companion, "I can think of a number of things I'd like to do to our captive there!"

They lead you down a dirt path for a while, with thick foliage on either side. You feel dread well up inside you as you think on what might become of you now. If only your hands weren't tied! Perhaps you should make a run for it? If they catch you you're no worse then before, and as it's getting dark you might be able to lose them.

You bolt off to the side, much to the thieves' surprise.
15521212211111.title: They investigate other areas. (Or release you?)

choices: The druidess joins in on the fun
The druidess does something before leaving
1552121222.content:
A soft hand touches your arm. Surprised, you look up, only to gasp at the sight.

A woman is sticking out of the tree from the waist up. Her skin is a deep brown, the same shade as the tree itself, and her hair is nothing more than tightly-woven leaves that cascade down her back. Her green eyes appear quite human and are twinkling with mischief.

Another hand touches your other arm. You turn your head and see that second dryad is sticking out of the same tree. The branches hold your body tight, allowing them to freely brush their hands along your arms, seemingly examining you. Perhaps they do not have much contact with humans.

One of the dryads' hands brushes along the side of your neck. You let out a soft gasp and quickly tilt your head, shielding your skin. However, this leaves the other side more exposed, which the other dryad exploits by fluttering her fingertips at the base of your neck. You giggle and snap your head the other way to shield that spot.

The two of them squeal and clap with delight. Something tells you that showing weakness was the last thing you wanted to do in this situation.

You feel a finger begin poking you in the side, causing you to stretch to the side with a wide grin on your face. The other dryad pokes you in the other side and you quickly pull the other way, only to be poked again in the first side. Back and forth you dance, being sent to either side where the dryads await, poking along your sides randomly.

Soft giggles pour freely past your lips. Your own fingers strain to curl into fists, but the tendrils around them prevent even the smallest movements.

"Pleeheheheease! Lehehet meeheehee gohohooo," you beg through your giggles, hoping the druidess may be merciful.
1552121222.title: Two dryads come out from the tree

choices: Gave the Dryads a turn at your feet.
Stepped up your torture for their amusement
15521212221.content:
"I don't see any reason why I should." The Druidess responded matter of fact. "The spirits of this forest and I are simply persuading you to never step foot here again. You should count yourself lucky this is your only transgression"she went on watching your treatment with interest.

As the Dryads traced the undersides of your arms, unbeknown to you the Druidess had a look of revelation upon her face. She stood up off her tree stump and approached you. She waved a hand and the tree spirits backed off, watching their summoner.

Your pulse quickened as she yanked off your boots one at a time. She wasted no time in pulling off your socks, leaving your bare feet exposed to the outdoors. The Dryads let out simultaneous " oohs" and moved down, fascinated by your naked appendages.

You flailed, desperate to get your vulnerable feet away from your captor. You didn't go barefoot in public or much at all really. You knew you were ticklish, and you wanted to go the rest of your life without finding out how much that applied to your feet. Especially given your predicament.

The Druidess smirked, let out a "hmm" then looked up at you. She grasped the top of your left foot, feeling the imprint on your skin left by your sock, and pulled it up. You jerked, just the feeling of someone touching your foot felt invasive. You braced. You couldn't let her see how sensitive your feet felt. "It's here isn't it?" She asks in a accusatory tone.

You stare her down with the sternest face you can manage. "Thick boots. Thick socks. Hence the sweat." She traces a single finger down your sole. You bite your lip. "Every human has a weakness." She begins lightly grazing your sole with her fingertips, spidering in one spot.

Your foot waves slightly to free from her grasp but you stop yourself. You can hear the air of giggles in your breathing. "Yours just happens to be your bare feet. And I will play with them just like this. For as long as I and the denizens of this grove see fit.That will make you think twice about bringing your feet here, to be stripped bare and be at our mercy." The Druidess' teasing was torture itself. Her nails felt worse as she went on. More accurately, you felt more aware of them.

She was keeping you on edge on purpose, not letting your dam break, knowing you'll fight it.At once she dropped your left foot and changed stance. She stuck her fingers up into your arches, pushing them in and out of the soft soles. She kept you from lifting your feet with her thumbs.

"No pleheheheaase!" Was all you could bubble out before laughing through a closed mouth.. "How fitting" The Druidess remarked still goosing your damp flesh. " One so disconnected from nature as to disrespect it would have such soft feet." She mused.

"Not the feeet! Staahap!" You begged as jolts shot up your thighs. Jumping laughs poured from your throat. "It's not my fault your feet are so ticklish." The Druidess stated innocently.

She then wiggled all ten fingers in different patterns on your soles, running nails along the lines of your feet. She allowed you to dance your feet in vain to get out of your grasp, wiggling your toes frantically for a form a respite. The dryads watched this with giggles and squeals, enjoying the show your feet put on for them. It was clear they desperately wanted a turn with them. The Druidess noticed this and...
15521212221.title: The druidess joins in on the fun

choices: Try to go deeper into the forest
Try to escape out of the forest
155212122211.content:
"I think my familiars would also love to have the chance to play with these ticklish feet of yours, don't you think?" Giving your feet one last tickle with her nails, the Druidess walked off deeper into the grove, waving back at you with a cunning smile.

Taking in a few deep breaths, as your chest heaved with every gasp of air you took in, you saw the two Dryads which were previously giggling to themselves by the side now move closer towards your bare feet, curiosity wide in their eyes. Mustering the most sternest glare you could do, you looked them both in the eye, anger apparent on your face.

"If you don't release me right now, I can promise you, you'll both be sorry later!" For a moment, you see hope, slight fear showing on their features as they paused, unsure of whether to continue tickling you. However, that hope was vanished as soon as it appeared. With a mischievous glint in her eyes, one of the Dryads placed a finger on your bare soles, dragging it down your arch. Grimacing inwardly, you grit your teeth, begging them not to continue.

Your slight grimace did not go unnoticed however. The other Dryad saw the slight tilt of the corners of your mouth, an idea already forming in her mind. Calling the other Dryad closer, she whispered something into her ear. When they were both done, they turned towards you, giggling menacingly as they raised their fingers towards your wiggling feet.

"Get back! Don't you dare touch me! I'm not afraid to-ehahahah! Sta-ahahhahap!" Giggling, they continued their tickles, both of them taking one foot, their bark-like fingers scribbling up and down your bare soles, digging in between the sensitive areas of your toes. Throwing your head back in laughter, you struggle as hard as you can to break out of the branches holding you down.

As the Dryads continued to giggle to themselves as they were tickling your feet, you couldn't figure out which was worse, the Druidess' constant teasing, or the Dryads' infectious giggling. Shaking your head from side to side, laughter continued to pour from your throat, your body not having the energy to do much else.

After what seemed like an eternity of fingers scraping across your feet, you feel the bark grabbing at your arms and body creaking. Looking up, the Dryad's saw the branches holding you starting to weaken. Giggling to themselves again, they gave your feet one last flutter of their rough fingers, before disappearing into the trunk of the tree that was binding you.

Gasping heavily, you hear the sound of branches snapping as you fall to the ground, spent and exhausted. As you sat up to recover your bearings, you couldn't see anything around you, except the local wildlife, as well as the trees and fauna that spanned throughout the forest. Clearing your head, you....
155212122211.title: Gave the Dryads a turn at your feet.

choices: You decide to do something else
1552121222111.content:
Feeling as if you have rested enough, you stand up, wary of anything that might pop out of the trees. Following in the direction where the Druidess went, you went deeper and deeper into the bright forest, unsure of which way was the exit already.

After moving in a straight direction for a few minutes, you start to hear something peculiar. "Is that... Water, coming from somewhere?" Carefully moving forward, you push past the many trees, until you finally came out into a small clearing, with a tranquil pool at it's center surrounded by some rocks.

As you started to walk again, your feet stepped on something soft. Tilting your head in confusion, you looked down, picking up whatever you had trampled over. "Wait... Isn't this the gown that the Druidess was wearing? And if that's here... That means she's somewhere nearby!"

Placing the gown of leaves back down on the floor, you look at the pool, the relaxing calm waters already tempting you to go in and soak all your worries away...
1552121222111.title: Try to go deeper into the forest

15521212221111.content: As you begin to strip down, you were reminded by the reflection of the water that you were a....
15521212221111.title: You go into the pool

choices: You offer to massage her first
155212122211111.content:
Stripping out of your clothes, you grabbed one of the small towels lying next to the leafy gown on the grass floor, wrapping it around your chest and waist. As you tested the temperature of the waters with your foot, you smiled to yourself, before lowering your whole body in the water, closing your eyes in relaxation.

"The water is quite cool, is it not? I always do like coming here to relax every once in a while. I feel as if this place relieves all of the stress that I have to deal with while I am guarding the grove." Smiling and nodding your head, you took a moment to register the fact that there was someone else in the lake along with you. Opening your eyes, you almost jumped out of the pool in surprise. There, on the opposite site of the small pool of water, was the Druidess, wearing nothing but a small towel covering her waist and chest, her black curls draped across her shoulder.

"What are you doing here!" Pointing a finger at her accusingly, you wondered if you had enough time to run out from the pool before she caught you with a spell or by physical means. "Relax, I'm just here to relieve my stresses, just like you." Resting the back of her head against the rocks, she let out a relaxed sigh, enjoying the cool water around her body.

"Say... How about we put our grievances aside, and just enjoy the calm nature. If you want to, I can massage your back for you, in repayment for leaving you just now to the mercy of my Dryads." Giving you a small pout, you had to admit that was a extremely tempting offer. However, you also realize that she might take this chance to make you lower your guard, in order to tickle you even more!
155212122211111.title: Woman (Female)

1552121222111111.content:
Feeling quite exhausted from the earlier tickling, you nod your head, taking her up on her offer. Walking slowly towards you, she gently turned you around, so that you were now facing the rocks surrounding the pool.

"Ok... Now if you would just lie down on this big rock in front of you... Just relax, and let me show you nature's techniques." Obeying her, you lie down, your face resting on your hands. You feel the Druidess smooth hands peel apart your towel, letting it rest between you and the rocks. "Such smooth skin... Even I'm envious... Let me have a feel of it..."

Grinning, you felt her hands make contact with your back, the palm of her hand smoothly gliding across your back. "No resistance whatsoever... I wonder how you have kept your skin in such a refined condition..." Feeling her nails drawl up and down your back, you bit your lip, the ticklish sensations already threatening to make you giggle.

"Oh where are my manners, let me begin right away." Stopping her teasing of your back, she got to work, her hands starting to squeeze your shoulders. Tensing up, you prepared for the inevitable mischievous tickle from maybe a finger, or perhaps a fluttering of digits. To your surprise, you softly moan as she continued to work out all the tension from your stiff limbs, taking extra care where your muscles felt taut.

"Ohh... Right there... Yes a bit to the left... Ahhh yes... That's it... It feels so good..." Softly letting out a breather, your whole body felt like it was in heaven, no other fingers having been able to massage better than her's. Smiling, the Druidess continued rubbing your back, slowly going lower and lower. "To be honest, I actually think that tickling, the sensation of it, is actually quite nice, when done correctly. Do you want to try it out?" Nodding your head subconsciously, you felt like you were in utopia.

Only after a second did you realize what you had given her permission to do. "W-wait, tickling can be good, but I don't think we need to bring that in here!" Giggling to herself, the Druidess got ready her fingers, eager to show you what she meant. "Ohh don't worry, it won't be like just now. I'll be extremely gentle with you this time."

Shutting your eyes, you waited for the inevitable tickling to come. After a few moments of nothing happening, one eye opening in question. You didn't need to wait for long, however. You first felt the feeling of light fluttering fingers, skittering across the small of your back, bringing a small smile to your face, as well as a pleasurable sensation in your mind. Soon after, the dancing fingers moved to your sides, giving them a quick tickle before moving to the sides of your exposed breasts, light spider tickling them. Unlike a few moments ago, you let your giggles flow freely from your mouth this time, not wanting to hold it back.

"Ooooohhh, it seems I found quite a ticklish spot over here. Such ticklish breasts... And so firm too... I wonder how long before your giggles turn into laughter..." Giggling herself, the Druidess continued to use one hand to skitter across the sides of your breasts, her other hand moving downwards to drawl across your quivering belly.

"It reheheheally feheheheeels good... I didn't imagine tickling would be like this, heeehhhahhaaa!" Giggling to yourself like a little girl, you tried your best not to move from the Druidess' teasing ministrations, her fingers working your whole body in tune like a precise instrument.

Finally finishing up with a skitter of her fingertips to the undersides of your breasts, she stepped back, giving you room to tie your towel around your body again. Stretching around, you truly felt that all of the knots and stresses in your body have been relieved, through a mixture of massage and tickle therapy.

Smiling, the Druidess inquired. "So, do you want to..."
1552121222111111.title: Let her massage your back

15521212221111112.content: Moving to get out of the pool, she tilted her head, the corner of her lips upturned in a smile "So what kind of game do you want to play?"
15521212221111112.title: "Play a little game?"

choices: The dryads explore for sensitive spots
15521212222.content:
The Druidess places a lone finger up to her lips as though she were pondering your pleas for mercy. All the while, the dryads continue to entertain themselves with your sides, poking up and down them randomly. The Druidess' delayed response feels like an eternity, but eventually she makes her decision and reaches into a near-invisible slit in the hip of her gown to retrieve a black, silk sash.

"Alright, then, I will do something," she comments as she rolls up the sash into a tight wad. "Spirits, will you help for a moment?"

All of a sudden, the dryads' playful tickling ratchets up. One grabs a hold of your hips and begins squeezing them sporatically. Two quick squeezes, a break, then wriggling her fingers in, a break, one squeeze, she never picks a pattern. The other buries her fingers into your underarms and swirls them around, wiggling and scratching against your clothing.

There's no holding back. You clench your eyes shut and howl with laughter, thrashing his head about. With your eyes closed, you don't notice the druidess' actions until she shoves the wadded up sash in to your mouth, effectivelly muffling your hysteria. Your eyes fly back open and stare at her, and her own gaze of malice stares back at you.

"Have fun, my dears..." she comments, and with a graceful spin on her toes she heads away from you, leaving your trapped and gagged form helpless to the torment of the dryads.
15521212222.title: The druidess does something before leaving

choices: The dryads continue to explore your body
The scene draws more dryads to you
155212122221.content:
Your head shakes side-to-side, and despite your best efforts, you cannot budge the branches that have wrapped around your body. You're utterly helpless and at the mercy of the two dryads who seem utterly delighted at their new toy.

Their hands eventually wander away from their previous spots, but instead of granting you a break you realize that they are simply choosing a different area. Hands slide away from your hips over to your stomach, her slender fingers burying into your body. The one who had been tormenting your underarms repositioned herself to tease both sides of your neck. Her touch is much lighter, like a feather, stroking along the curves your neck. No matter which way you tilt your head, you leave the other side more exposed for her.

It's impossible to stop laughing for even a moment. You can't even turn your body away from the fingers prodding and wriggling into the sides of your stomach, burrowing in deep, drawing out more and more laughter from you with each passing second.

Desperate, you beg for mercy, but the sash in your mouth turns your words into gibberish amidst your laughter. "Mmmphhphphghmphh! Ssssphhmphphhhphh!" Making eye contact with the dryad teasing your neck, her beaming expression makes it clear that she's loving your ticklish body and frenzied pleas.
155212122221.title: The dryads explore for sensitive spots

155212122222.content:
It was five minutes before you got any help. In that time, your sides and underarms were poked, prodded, scribbled and scratched on and squeezed. With suppressed laughter, you felt like you would bust. Poke, poke, scribble. Scratch, prod, prod. Squeeze, poke, pr-
"Let that person go right now or I burn this whole damned forest to the ground!"

The dryads stopped, as they wanted the opposite of that. You looked around and spotted your savior. A woman stood at around 5 and a half feet with shoulder length blond hair. She was quite well armed with a battle axe and a throwing hatchet. She had pouches at her waist, which meant she must be after fairy dust, same as you! But why would she help out the competition...?

She barked at the dryads, "Where's the druidess? Bring her to me. Be back in 10 minutes or the forest burns! And let your 'guest' go!"

The two dryads panicked as they melted back into your tree, but they released you. The woman gingerly took the sash out from your mouth and put her hand on your shoulder.
"It's OK," she said in a comforting tone, "It's over, they can't tickle you anymore."
She went on, "I see you're after fairy dust. That's why I was here last time... until that druidess found me."

"Thank you! Thank you so much! I thought it was going to go on for hours!" you cried.
"When she found me, it went on for a whole day. The dryads poked and tickled me almost non-stop. Every now and then, the druidess herself would get involved. I traded all the dust I had gotten for powder. I have it set up around the forest. I'm going to take that druidess back into the city. It turns out that there are 3 other women who she's done this to, so we all get payback."
"Can I help?"
"Of course! Here come the dryads now, I see the druidess. Ready yourself."

You drew a hunting knife you brought along with you in case the dryads tried anything...
155212122222.title: Someone or something finds you

1552121222221.content:
You then see the 2 dryads come out of the tree again, as you see the Druidess come striding towards you.
"I see you've come back to this forest, Crystal." the Druidess says nonchalantly.
"I've come back to this accursed place to bring you back to my town, back to the 3 other woman you tortured, including me, and this young adventurer!"
"Well, i'm sorry to disappoint you, but i think i want to have more fun with you, and hear your beautiful laughter."

"What are you saying! i surrounded this forest with powder, that will burn it down! Now, either you come with me, or el-hehhheehhehee! What?!" You see crystal burst into a few, quick frenzied giggles, as you see a vine slip into her light-leather armor to give her side a quick tickle, making her drop her battle axe, which a vine then grabs and quickly drags away, and another vine reach to her back and take her throwing hatchet.

"Well now, let's see, you're unarmed, no threat to me, and don't even have the means to fight me. So why should i follow you to town again? Dryads! Shall we teach them what happens when you threaten mother nature!"

Vines then burst out of the trees, and traps both Crystal and you onto two different trees. The Druidess then whispers a few words of magic again, as the trees then grow branches to pull both your arms over your heads, and wrap branches around your mid-section to grip the both of you tightly against the trees. The two dryads then go to one tree each, and melts into them, as the Druidess then sits down on a tree stump and crosses her legs, smiling as she awaits what happens.

"H-hey! No fair! I just got tickled by you!" You protest to the Dryad that you see above your head. She just gives you a sly grin, as she wiggles her wooden fingers in front of your eyes.

Also, you notice that Crystal is wearing a sleeveless white sleeveless tunic, along with a thin metal chainmail over it, with a metal plate skirt. She is also wearing leather boots, along with her blonde hair that goes up to shoulder length, tied in a pony tail. You see the dryad on her tree remove her chainmail, and set it on the ground. The dryad on her tree then places its fingers on her sides, making her visibly tense up. You make eye contact with her, as she gives you a look of nervousness of what ticklish torment is to come.

"Well now, my ticklish ladies, where shall we begin!"
1552121222221.title: It's a trap!

1552122.content:
Your clothes begin to feel looser before it becomes clear that the spell is actually making you shrink. Unfortunately, it's not shrinking your clothing or anything else on your body. Smaller and smaller you become, soon covered by your own tunic, and then even your own underwear, before finally stopping at a size only five or six inches tall.

Desperately, you crawl out of your clothing as if you are under the sheets in a giant bed, and step out into the open air.

Everything is huge! The flowers you were collecting now tower above you. Even the pebbles in the ground appear to be boulders.

However, there is still the matter of who used the spell on you, and considering your location you aren't surprised by who it is when you look up into the sky.

Spiraling down from above you is a swarm of fairies. Dozens of them, possibly forty or more. While they would have been big trouble for you at full size, now you're the same size as them, which just made things a hundred times worse.

An idea springs to mind. You look over to where your belt lays and you spot the vial of Alraune nectar you brought along specifically for a situation like this. Unfortunately, the cork of the vial is large enough to reach your waist.

You aren't sure if you have the strength to open it, but it's either that or try to run.
1552122.title: A shrinking spell

choices: Try to fight through them and escape
15521221.content:
As the fairies descend, you quickly make up your mind and bolt over to the vial. Clutching the large cork on either-side, you grunt and begin tugging on it with all your might.

At first, it seems hopeless, but with another tug it loosens. With each harge tug it slides a little bit more.

With one more hard tug the cork pops off... and the nectar comes pouring out like a tidal wave, washing over you and sending you falling over.

You wipe some of the nectar out of your eyes and look up. The fairies have landed around you in a circle, glaring. Each of them are wearing a few leaves for modesty, carefully woven to resembles gowns or skirts, and their ears are pointed much like an elf's.

Suddenly, their expressions go wide and they lock their eyes on the nectar on the ground. The scent finally caught their attention. Like a pack of wolves they drop down to their knees and begin lapping up the nectar.

You're relieved, but only for a moment until you notice another major problem.

As the rest of the fairies struggle to join in the feeding frenzy, they push and dive in for unclaimed spots, slowly closing the circle in on you... and you're covered in the same nectar that they're going wild for. In a very short time dozens of hungry fairies will be upon you.
15521221.title: Try to uncork the vial

choices: They roll you onto your back
They lift your other foot up
155212211.content:
You don't want to spend another second around them.

Scrambling up onto your feet, your run in a random direction, straight for the crowd of feeding fairies...

...and slip on the oily nectar under your feet. Falling face-down, you slide on the slick liquid straight into the crowd, like a bowling ball, until your momentum stops.

And then they descend on you.

It's all a blur, each one fighting for a spot. Their tongues move fast, like a little puppy, lapping in random spots on your body. You feel them on your neck, your back, your ear, several on your rear, and one was even sucking on your fingers like a lollipop.

You end up giggling wildly, twisting about, but each time you try to swat at them they just make a grab for the exposed area. You decide it's probably best if you keep face-down, but then you won't be able to escape.

One of them grabs one of your ankles and lifts it up, and suddenly you feel several tongues hungrilly lapping over your sole, fighting for the nectar. One devious fairy is flicking her tongue inbetween your toes, going for the nectar that had gathered there.

That pushes you over the edge and you cry out in laughter, flopping around like a fish out of water. You twist your leg about, but they have an iron grip on it while they lick every last bit of nectar that they can. And still, there were many more pushing in to get their fill.
155212211.title: Try to fight through them

1552122112.content:
Soon you are writhing in laughter as both of your feet are swarmed by tongues. Unfortunately your cries of laughter draw more and more fairies to the area. Eventually your feet were clean of the nectar and the fairies now were fighting to see who would get your frontside which currently was the only place with nectar on it.

As they fight you try to crawl away silently and almost make it before they noticed, so several of the you ger fairies lifted you up revealing the nectar that is on you. You shiver as you see thousands of fairies looking at you with hungry eyes. Before you can do anything though something emerges from the brush.....,
1552122112.title: They lift your other foot up

15522.content: You instantly stop in your tracks as you try and see what type of fairy it was, some where known to give their dust for a small price while others would kinap any humans who entered their land. This one was a large fairy about 1/2 a foot and it was a female. You quickly try find out if she is friendly or not but unfortunatly she sees you and....
15522.title: You see a lone fairy perched on a log

155222.content:
A wide smile blooms on her face and before you realize what has happened she’s zipping around you at high speed. You attempt to follow the fairy but she easily moves past your line of sight, and it also doesn’t help that she seems to be poking you at various intervals causing you to giggle and flinch. This process continues for several minutes until the fairy launches a full-scale poking assault on your midriff sending you down to the ground in a fit of laughter.

“Yes you’ll do just fine” the fairy replies and with a wave of her hand, the grass around you started to bind you to the earth, though it mostly being grass you could easily rip your way free. The issue was that every now and again one of the grass blades would swipe against a sensitive spot, causing you to giggle and lose some progress.

“So here’s the issue, my friends have made a deal with me, in that I could not find a willing victim to let me play with, and no I’m just keeping you occupied until I’m finish, so here’s the deal you let me parade you in front of my friends and possibly endure a session or two with us, and I’ll give you enough dust to set you for life what do you say.” She states moving closer to your giggling face.

Unfortunately for you’ve only managed to hear a part of what the fairy said, with the teasing and her fast-paced speech rambling one thing into another. You only knew that a deal had been offered and you might get set. So you…
155222.title: Smiles like an Angel

15523.content:
As you look ahead, you see a large open container in the middle of the field. As you get closer, you realize that it appears to be filled to the brim with fairy dust! It seems too good to be true: you could scoop out all that fairy dust and make a killing! But, thinking on it, you realize it may be a trap. Who leaves giant buckets of fairy dust out in the open? Fairies maybe, you didn't exactly become an expert on them before setting out.

You put down your burlap sacks and cover them with your jacket, hiding them them so any nearby fairies don't suspect your intentions. You cautiously approach the container for a closer look. The dust appears to be a vibrant pink. You remember that brightly colored fairy dust is more potent and valuable, and this looks to be as high a grade as they come. Different colors have different properties, but you can't remember which were which. At any rate, that pink fairy dust is probably worth any risk.

You walk up to the bucket to carry away the fairy dust, when suddenly the ground gives out under you. You let out a yelp as you feel yourself falling. Looking down, you see a massive deep hole opening up underneath you. Acting on instinct, you grab onto a large root, hanging on for dear life. Looking around, you see a number of roots sticking out of the ground into the hole. Below you is only pitch blackness, who knows how far you'd fall if you let go. As your predicament begins to sink in, you wonder with more than a little resignation what's going to happen to you next.
15523.title: You step into a trap

choices: The fairies begin tickling your in earnest
155231.content:
"Hey, it looks like your trap worked, Ali!" you hear a girlish voice call out above you.

"Of course it worked, Fay, humans aren't very smart." another girlish voice, presumably named Ali, replies.

"Um, hello up there?" you call out, hoping for some much needed help. "Could you ladies help an ill-fortuned traveler out of this dark hole?" You don't want to sound too pathetic, but it doesn't look like you're going to be able to climb out of this trap on your own. It's all you can do to cling to a well placed root and dangle like a worm on a hook.

"We can't do that silly, we built this trap just to get you here!" Fay tells you, as you see two fairies drift down in front of you. They do indeed look like small women, only a foot tall. They have pale, smooth looking skin, long blond hair, and blue eyes. They also have pink butterfly wings on their back, as you realize that these must be the ones who laid out the pink fairy dusk. The situation having gone from bad to worse, you eye them carefully. The fairies flutter to either side of you. Ali, on your right, casually places a hand on your upper arm.

"Besides," she says, "I don't think you're just a traveler. It looks to me like you're some kind of hunter." As she says this, she slowly drags a finger up and down your upper arm. On your left, you feel Fay do the same. The light touch sends a shudder down your spine, as you realize how vulnerable you are. Having discarded your jacket, you're left with a sleeveless shirt, some cloth pants and leather boots. Hardly the protection you'd like.

"I think you're right, Ali" Faye says, "Now that I think about it, you aren't a fairy hunter, are you?" The fairies begin stroking your arm a little faster, making you twitch before quickly regaining your composure. The fairies both grin at your reaction, and now you realize: they're tickling you.

"N-no, I'm not. Hey girls, c-come on, cut it out." you plead, trying to stop them before the situation gets any worse.

"Cut what out?" Ali asks, a mischievous grin on her face. "You mean this?" As she talks, her finger drifts into the hollow of your exposed underarm, causing you to flinch away. But this only exposes your other side all the more, causing Fay to begin gently tickling your left underarm.

"Oh, does this tickle? Do we have a ticklish fairy hunter in our trap?" Fay taunts. You don't respond, trying to keep your composure as the fairies continue to gently tease your underarms. You don't know how long you can hold on like this...
155231.title: The fairies find you

choices: Fay flies off to get something/someone
1552311.content:
With their fingers relentlessly stroking your skin, your defenses crumble, and if you weren't giggling and trying so hard to hang on, you would've been amazed that you've lasted this long already. Ali and Fay continue to deftly stroke around your defenseless underarms, their touches feeling more like crawling ants than fingers. Not that it helps much.

Your teeth grind together in a permanent grin as you try to hold on. The tickling is keeping you from pulling yourself up, but maybe you can find a place to put your feet and finally defend yourself.

"Wheee!" shouts one of the fairies before she suddenly burrows into your shirt and tumbles down until you feel her on your stomach.

"G-Gehehet out from thehehere," you demand through your giggles. That leaves Ali, you finally identify, as the one still outside brushing your left underarm.

"Oooo, what's in here?" you hear Fay ask just prior to her sticking her hand into your navel and lightly tickling around the sides. Your eyes bulge out of your head and you cackle, twisting madly. Your grip loosens for just a fraction of a second, but it's enough for you to slide an inch down the roots before you can catch yourself. The soft tickling in and around your navel is driving you crazy, but no matter how much you buck your hips you can't get her away. Why did you have to tuck in your shirt this day?

You want to let go so much. The tickling is driving you crazy, and the idea of just risking the fall to escape them crosses your mind repeatedly. But even if you survive the fall, what if there is something worse waiting for you down below? It's the only thing that keeps you holdong on to the roots... and suffering more.

The tickling at your navel finally stops, thankfully, and you can feel your shirt being untucked before the fairy slips out from underneath and flutters before your face. Ali ceases as well and joins Fay's side. You don't question the moment of peace and use it to gasp for air.

"The hunter is doing quite well for a human."

"Indeed. Do you think we have to go to extreme measures?"

"I think we do, Ali!"

Your jaw hangs wide open. They have something worse in store for you?!
1552311.title: The fairies begin tickling your in earnest

choices: "No man can resist what we have in store!"
"No woman can resist what we have in store!"
15523112.content:
The two fairies move in closer towards your face. You tense up, expecting another round of tickling, but instead they kiss your cheeks. You feel your face grow hot with a blush, and they giggle before suddenly descending down your body.

You drop your head and watch them as they move to either hip and place their hands on the top of your pants. They look at each other and count in unison.

"One... two... three!"

With a burst of strength they dive, pulling your pants down to around your ankles!

Now you have two regrets: one being that you had tucked in your shirt, and two being that you didn't wear underwear today.

Fay giggles mischeviously and says to you...
15523112.title: The fairies fly lower

155231121.content:
"No man can resist what we have in store!" exclaims Fay. You try to cross your legs, but it doesn't help much to conceal your private parts from the two fairies. They giggle and float up, and you look down to the side to keep them within your sight. You can see Ali fluttering right in front of your manhood, but you've lost track of Fay.

"Wooooow, I don't get to see this often," says Ali, which prompts more giggling from her. All you can do is whimper as she slowly reaches out with her wiggling fingers...

Suddenly, Fay zips past your vision and stops beside Ali, having returned from a short but quick trip. "We're lucky! I found one in no time," she says. You aren't sure what she means at first, but then you notice that she's branding a short bird feather in her hand like a sword. She hands it off to Ali who eagerly takes it. "You do the tickling, and I'll do the talking. We'll switch if he doesn't fall soon!"
