Quickly you try to get up as she jumps towards you, but even as you turn to the side and get on your all four, in one smooth move, you feel her weight press against your lower back and soon you are back, flat on the floor, face down. More alarming though is, the fact that your soles (both bare and booted one) are upturned and that she is facing them. Struggle as you might, you can't get up, she is too strong and heavy.

Then you feel, what you've been dreading all the time, she grabs the ankle of your soleless boot and pulls it towards her. Her grip is strong, you can't pull your foot free. As you brace yourself for the inevitable, you feel a soft breeze on your toes, as she blows on them. Even that feels tickly and you wiggle your toes in anticipation. You hear her amused giggle and curse yourself for being so weak. It's just tickling you try to tell yourself, but it doesn't help much, panic is setting in.

"Usually I have to search far and wide, to get myself a prize like you. Your heel is just begging to be touched, those wiggling toes are made to draw attention and tease, especially with that sexy toenail color, but the wrinkly sole just make my mouth water. I'm gonna enjoy our time together, so very much." Obviously she has a huge fetish and nothing you can say can make her leave your feet alone. Still you are trying hard to find some way to reason with her. Promise her wealth, promise her glory, promise to find other women to take your place. That las one might actually work, but before you can develop that idea, she speaks again: "you fought well, even if not too long", she says, "you are a good warrior. My victory over you is a glorious one. All great victories deserve great feasts. Fortunately these huge delicious soles of yours, are going to provide a feast to remember".

With those words she grips your bare soled foot even more tightly and pulls is slightly more towards herself then stops. Though nothing is happening, you can't stand the anticipation any more, all thoughts and plans vanish from your mind, as the memory of your recent foot treatment returns to you. You start giggling preemptively and once more desperately try to pull your exposed foot free. Then, obviously waiting for your nerves to betray you, she begins, as you feel hot wet tongue land on your heel, covering it almost whole, and start its agonizingly slow ascent up your bare sole. As it travels toward your arch, the skin of your sole becomes taught behind the tongue, while the wrinkles are pushed and bunch up in front of it, until the tongue reaches the ball of your sole and wrinkles are passed over and released to return and spread out all over the arch and sole Mean while the tongue licks hard at your toes, then the process is repeated again, slowly, thoroughly, lovingly. Fortunately for you, you're not able to see entranced look in her eyes and concentration on your arch, or you'd know she's not stopping any time soon.

Whenever her tongue reaches your arch, your laughter goes up a notch, only to go back down as she gets to the toes. She seems to like this and starts concentrating on that area more, mixing in quick licks with the tip of her tongue, between slow long ones. This keeps you unable to even slightly adjust to the feelings invading the bottom of your foot and makes your laugh even harder. Soon you are becoming exhausted from all the laughter and what's left of your sanity is welcoming the possibility of passing out with the lack of oxygen. She, however, seems to sense this and changes tactics. Now she is sticking her tongue between the helpless toes and stimulating sensitive nerve endings, or licking and kissing the heel with occasional lick of the center of your sole, just to keep you laughing hard, when your laughter begins to die down a bit. She seems to be in the mood for a long day of foot fun

Several minutes pass and you begin to relax, hoping that the session is over and that she'll leave you alone, at least for the time being.

Then she gets up, but she does not let go of your leg. Her grip is strong as steel and you, in your exhausted state, abandon any thought of escape. Moments later you feel her removing your boots, lying on the floor, on her left side with her left hand propping her head and your bare feet crossed at the ankles and held in a leg lock between her muscular thighs. Meanwhile, she is just lying there taking in the sight of two beautiful big sensitive soles in front her, trying to hold herself from touching them as long as possible, to both tease you and her own lust. She has tickled hundreds of women over the years, some with long narrow feet and long toes, some with tiny feet, some with wide meaty soles and short pudgy toes, but rarely has she seen a pair of such big feet with perfectly proportioned toes, and toenails painted in such a sexy way.

She starts walking towards the trap door with you thrown over her shoulder, like a sack, your upper body hanging over her back. But then you catch a lucky break: as she playfully pokes the sole of your foot, you bend your knee reflexively and your heel connects with her chin. She tumbles down, face first and you find yourself lying with your back to the floor. Her head is on your stomach, but she is not moving. Slowly and carefully you pull yourself away from her and up on your feet. She is still lying motionless, so you decide to make a run for it. You pull your boots on and fix the ripped boot sole with a tape that she used earlier and run out of the cabin as fast as your legs will carry you.

You determine the direction you need to take to get back to the coast and you run, run like the crazy she orc tickler with a huge foot fetish and lust for your ticklish wrinkly soles, is after you. After some time and few short pauses to catch your breath, you make it to the coast and to your camp. Rather then to wait for the orc to come after you, you decide to pack your things, everything you can carry, but that won't slow you down and go through the grasslands. The orc has clear advantage in the woods, and maybe she knows grasslands as well, but it's your only hope of trying to evade her. You leave your mangled boots behind and put on those you wore aboard the ship and start on your way. You had to leave your tent and much of the supplies, but your sleeping bag, some food and water are all you dare take, knowing that your pursuer is not gonna give up the chase easily and that your best hope is speed.

After several hours of walking through the tall grass, that makes you impossible to spot from just a few feet away darkness comes and you reluctantly decide to stop. You are aware of the danger you're in, but you are physically exhausted from all the walking and running, not to mention the tickling. You have to sleep for a few hours, even if an army of tickler orcs is on your heels.
